1b1(rgyud 'bum): #rgya gar skad du/ tan+d+ha rA dza shI la g+hu saM ba ra nA ma/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
1b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// mdor bsdus pa ste/
2a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed
2a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//
2a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems
2a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin// skra
2b1(rgyud 'bum): yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams/ / dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog
2b2(rgyud 'bum): ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ / bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyor// ji lta ba ni de bzhin du// sngags bzlas bsam
2b3(rgyud 'bum): gtan la sogs ldan/ / sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni// rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis// dbugs 'byin par
2b4(rgyud 'bum): ma mchog dag dang / / dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang // rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du// rigs ldan rtag tu mchod par bya//
2b5(rgyud 'bum): pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa yi ni dngos grub pa//
3a1(rgyud 'bum): rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa
3a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am ni dran pa yis/ / sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba// de ltar nyid du the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig
3a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'joms byed pa/ / gsang sngags zlos dang bsam gtan dang // bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya//
3a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos// dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mar dang /
3a5(rgyud 'bum): ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po dang sbyar ba// tshogs kyi nang du bzhag pa ni// thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin// ming med mthe
3a6(rgyud 'bum): bong rtse sbyar bas/ / rnal 'byor rig pos rtag tu spyad// myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin// dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur// 'di
3b1(rgyud 'bum): ngom 'chi bcu byed 'gyur/ / dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin// mchod pa ni dpa' bo can pon// yi la 'dod pa byed pa ste// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi// rnams
3b2(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs pa'ang de nyid 'dzin/ / lha dang mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de lta bur ni byed pa yi// bcu drug char ni mi phod do// ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam// chu bo
3b3(rgyud 'bum): chetshe rnams ngogs dag dang / / gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du// der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
3b4(rgyud 'bum): der ni lci ba ma lhung bas// dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug/ dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa ne nyer byugs te/
3b5(rgyud 'bum): der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam// gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis// dur khrod du ni kun tu brtag/ ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod so phag ldan pa yis// dkyil
3b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ / slob dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can// yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes// khro med gtsang zhing mkhas
3b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro// thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing // yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang // gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing // rus pa'i 'phreng la sogs
4a1(rgyud 'bum): pas brgyan/ / du ma gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // rus pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par 'phyang // kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas// bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas// de 'og
4a2(rgyud 'bum): khrag 'thung dpal dran byas/ / 'khor lo 'di ni snying khar dgod// bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas// ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod// de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas// 'og tu yang ni mtshon
4a3(rgyud 'bum): cha dgod/ / 'khor lo mtshon cha'i 'phreng ba dag/ steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid// slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du// gur byas de ni go char 'gyur// de ltar go cha de bgos nas// sum cu pas kyang
4a4(rgyud 'bum): mi phyed do/ / de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas// dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'o// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// de nas sems med srad bu
4a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan// he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya// khru gang khru bzhi 'am khru brgyad pa// sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa// rta babs
4a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ / sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod// de yi dbus su pad+ma ni// 'dab bcas lte ba 'bar dang bcas// ge sar yang
4a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag ldan par bzhag/ lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni// 'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad// mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan
4b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'// glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos// smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes// phyag na kha T+wAM mi thod bsnams// brgya phyed 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
4b2(rgyud 'bum): de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma// he ru ka dpal che la phyogs// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can yin// ka pA la ni an+ta sa bkang // kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag
4b3(rgyud 'bum): cing / lha dang lha min mir bcas pa// phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi// phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang /
4b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i dbus su mchod par bya// de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang // 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod// sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod// gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya// de
4b5(rgyud 'bum): nas bum pa bya ba ni/ / rtsa ba nag po la sogs med// mu tig gser dang rin chen dang // byu ru dngul dang zangs ma ste// bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i// snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/
4b6(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa srang bus dkri ba dang // kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya// gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa// brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod// gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa'i// bum pa dgu
4b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dbus su gzhag/ gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam// mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya// dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang // gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya// grong mchog yid 'ong
5a1(rgyud 'bum): bachod na na/ / grub pa nyid du the chom med// bdag nyid kun nas sgol ni// dri ma chu yis legs par gdag/ gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// mar me brgya ni dngul
5a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod// sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin// dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya// gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro
5a3(rgyud 'bum): ma de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod/ / ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni// phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dri dang me tog de bzhin spros//
5a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du de bzhin mchod// mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing // dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gnas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/
5a5(rgyud 'bum): dkar dang gnag dang ser cha dang // me tog 'phreng ba du ma dang // de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang // bla re dang ni yol ba dag/ mdzes pa ji lta de bzhin te// de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba
5a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod par bya// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas sgrub pos dngos kun
5a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ 'dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya// grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// ci nus pas ni bla ma mchod// dril bu sgra ldan dayangs pa dang // me tog spos rnams kyis brgyan cing/
5b1(rgyud 'bum): / gag / na smra ma/
5b2(rgyud 'bum): dA ras legs par bka ba nas su// thal mo me tog gis bkang ste// yang dag par ni zhugs pa dag/ sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/
5b3(rgyud 'bum): blo bzang yid ni mnyam bzhag pa// pho brang nyams dgar gzhug par bya// lce yi phyogs su lus brten la// thal me'i me tog de nas dor// dkyil 'khor steng du dor bar bya// gang du me
5b4(rgyud 'bum): tog de lhung ba/ / shrI he ru ka'i gnas sogs bstan// de yi rigs ni rnam bstan te// de ni rigs de'i ming 'gyur bar// slob dpon gyis ni ming bstan to// de nas slob dpon legs
5b5(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / mnyam pa bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod// de nas slob sa kyi de nyin// las ni yang dag spyad par bya// mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis// de rnams su ni thig le bya// slo
5b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi mi gdong phye la/ / de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// lnga gang gi ni gnas gang yin// der de yang dag bstan par bya// slob dpon dang bcas pho brang la// de nas slob mas ra
5b7(rgyud 'bum): btud nas/ / phyir yang g.yon nas brtsams pa yis// de nas bskor ba byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang ni tha ma la// de bzhin tshogs phyag bya'o// de ras bla ma ngag la yon/
6a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul// gser ni ba rtswa lhong bu la ba dang / rin chen rnam pa sna chog dang / ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang // rna rgyan nam ni gdu bu
6a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / mgul rgyun sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid// bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams// phyag btsal nas ni dbul bar bya//
6a3(rgyud 'bum): ji skad gsungs bzhin slob ma ni// blo dang ldan pas bla ma la// dngos po kun gyis bdag nyid ni// de bzhin du ni dbul bar bya// deng nas brtsams te bran du bdag/ khyed la bdag gis
6a4(rgyud 'bum): phul ba lags/ / de nas sgrub pos rab nges par// de ltar cho ga byas na ni// de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang //
6a5(rgyud 'bum): khaN+Da ro he gzugs can ma// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig/ de dang rnam spyod kun tu 'gro// thams cad sgrub po de yi ni// ci bgyid byed par 'i tsham med// rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgrub gyur
6a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ 'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing // mi snang 'og dang nam mkhar rgyu// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len// sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis// rtag par rgyun du bskyed par 'gyur
6a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / / nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnams kyang khyad par du// skad cig de la sbyor ba skyed de// 'gro ba rnams kyang nges gnon par// lan cig/
6b1(rgyud 'bum): bltas pas rnal 'byor pas// sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar// gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod// mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang // smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs//
6b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa// lha dang lha min mi rnams te// 'di dag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// rgyud 'di ru ni
6b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bas/ / thams cad kyi ni sgrub pa po// dgod dang lha dang lag 'dzin gyis// 'khyud dang gnyis sprod la sogs la// dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin// thams cad rgyud las
6b4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'o/ / 'di ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro// de nyid bsdus pa'am sdom pa 'am// gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi
6b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung // de kun he ru ka la gnas// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yon tan dang bcas pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum
6b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// gnas na rnam par 'gying ba ste// brtson chen 'khor lo sgyur ma dang // stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' mo// 'khor
6b7(rgyud 'bum): le'i go cha chang 'tsheng ma/ / khaN+Da ro he 'khor le'i shugs// bya gdong ma dang rtan mo// shin tu bzang mo ljang lha mo// chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma// de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo
7a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / a srungs ma dang shing grib ma// lang ka'i dbang phyug mi'u thung ma// dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen ma// 'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma// rab gtum ma sde sgrub
7a2(rgyud 'bum): byed yin/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi// 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin// rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni// mthar ni hUM hUM phaT sbyar te// rnal 'byor rab mchog 'di mthong na// me ste/
7a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag sog mar mtshungs// oM ni kun la gsal byed de// grub stsol 'dod pa thams cad byed// dpa' bo nyid 'gyur grub pa ni// khyim du dkyil 'khor mthong ba yin// de nas de rtag
7a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / dngos grub de bzhin gshegs gsungs bzhin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis su med par dgod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
7a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar// sna tshogs lte bar mi shigs dge/ sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri// chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya// 'dir sngags tshig ni 'di yin te//
7a6(rgyud 'bum): A li kA li mnyam byas nas// sde tshan la ni yongs bsdoms pa// bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la// thub pa mchog gi re mig la// der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// 'dod don thams cad
7a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed pa'o/ / bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang
7b1(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / / mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // sum cu pa ni yang dag blang // de bzhin nyi shu drug pa nyid// de dag thams cad legs bsdus la// de bzhin brgya yi
7b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed phyed yang / / de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gzung // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis
7b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag dang / / bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po gang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa
7b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dang po yi yang dang po dang // de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang
7b5(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / / uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // de
7b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin sum cu rtsa gcig blang / / bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // uSh+ma Na yi tha ma nyi/
7b7(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// a nusma mi
8a1(rgyud 'bum): dang po dang / / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// ana?s+tha yi gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // uSh+ma Na yi dang po nyid// de bzhin gyi
8a2(rgyud 'bum): ge rgya nyid dang / / bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang // dang po'i
8a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa gang yin dang / / bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang // an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang // gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang // yi ge byA ni de nas blang // dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang // de nas brgyad pa
8a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag dang / / bzhi pa'i lnga pa nyid dag yin// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa//
8a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang // sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yi yang lnga pa dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu
8a6(rgyud 'bum): rdza bdun pa/ / an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// dang po'i dang po nyid dang ni// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa
8a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid// drug pa yi yang gnyis pa'o// dang po yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas gnyis pa de bzhin te// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa
8b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi yang lnga pa la// bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la// bzhi pa yis ni gdan du bya//
8b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa yi ni dang po la// 'og tu me yi gdan dang ldan// uSh+ma Na yi gsum de bzhin// mthar gnas pa yi dang po yang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po nyid// me yis gdan du byas pa'o// bdun pa yi
8b3(rgyud 'bum): ni gsum pa dang / / drug pa yi yang dang po gang // ka Shar grags pa'i dang po gzung // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po gang // de bzhin yang ni ril po nyid// lnga pa yi/
8b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi yang dang po dang // uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa gzung // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag/ uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid// 'od byed gdan byas tshig
8b5(rgyud 'bum): dradrug ldan/ / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// 'og tu yang ni me yi gdan// tsheg drag dang ni yang dag ldan// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// drug pa yi ni gnyis
8b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / / de bzhin bcu gcig par ni nges// slar yang nyi shu rtsa gnyis gzung // gsum pa yi ni dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+mA Na yi bzhi pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni gsum
8b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // nyi shu gcig pa de nas btu// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni dang por nges// gnyis las drug pa'i yi ge'o// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
9a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ka Shar grags nyid dang // nyi shu bzhi pa de nas btu// slar yang ril po ji bzhin dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+mA Na yi gsum pa dang // mthar
9a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ / lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // slar yang 'od byed sbyin par bya// yi ge nyi shu'i 'og tu ni// bcu drug pa ni gdan du bya// 'og tu me yis gsal byas la// lnga pa yi/
9a3(rgyud 'bum): ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // nyi shu lnga pas khyad par dbye//
9a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// nyi ma'i bu yis khyad par dbye// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa dang // 'og tu bco lnga pa yi gdan// dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // de nas
9a5(rgyud 'bum): me yis gdan du bya/ / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // 'og tu bco lnga pa yi gdan// uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni dang po la// bcu drug pa yis gdan du'o// de nas nyi shu gcig
9a6(rgyud 'bum): pablang / / bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang /
9a7(rgyud 'bum): dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// 'od byed mnyam par mnan pa'o// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa
9b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ni gsum pa la/ / me yis steng nas gsal bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi dang por gsungs// de nas yi ge bcu drug pa'o// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // spyi bor me yi yi ges mtshan//
9b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug nyid// dang po yi ni dang po dang // gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa la// bcu gsum pa yis mnan pa'o// dang po'i dang po de bzhin te// gnyis pa
9b3(rgyud 'bum): ni dang po dang / / gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa yi// steng du bcu gsum pa nyid dang // uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// nyi shu bdun pas gdan du bya// dbyangs yig bzhi pa'i sa bon la// 'od byed kyis ni
9b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal byas pa/ / gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// bco lnga pa yis gdan du bya// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// gsum pa'i lnga pa la ni skyon// ka Sha'i sa bon btus nas ni// nyi shu lnga
9b5(rgyud 'bum): pas gdon du bya/ / ril po mdzes pa btus nas ni// yi ge ma yis gdan du bya// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // ma tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin
9b6(rgyud 'bum): sum cu gsum par nges/ / lnga pa'i bdag nyid yongs btus la// yang ni de la gnyis par nges// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis
9b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa'i gsum pa de bzhin te// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa ste// gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi yin no//
10a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags te// bya ba thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod min te// he ru ka dpal sngags
10a2(rgyud 'bum): shes na/ / me ste gzhan dag sog ma 'dra// rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
10a3(rgyud 'bum): / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying po nye snying yi ge bdun// la tshegs brgyud pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge bar ma dor byas la/
10a4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag drug ni he ru ka/ dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba// yi ge re rer yang dag gnas// oM hA na ma hI swa ha hU// bau ShaT+Te hUM hUM ho// phaT hang ni dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pos snying por
10a5(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / dang po snying la nyid du ste// gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya// gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar// bzhi pa go cha nyid du yin// lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste// drug pa mtshon cha zhes
10a6(rgyud 'bum): byar 'dod/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo drug gi go cha btu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid// yi ge gnyis pa ngag dang
10a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag ldan// yi ge drug pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge bdun pa nyid dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// mkhas
10b1(rgyud 'bum): pas yi ge brgyad dang sbyar/ / dbangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par// yi ge dgu pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig
10b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis par ldan par ni/ / yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung // mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa// yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dang ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar//
10b3(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig bco lngar yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni// yi ge ba
10b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa ru sbyar/ / dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang ni// yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gsum
10b5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid ni/ / yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar// sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa// yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur//
10b6(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu brgyad pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig bco lnga pa dang sbyar// gsum pa'i dang po yang dag ldan// 'og ma'i cha ni me dang bcas// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// yi
10b7(rgyud 'bum): ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig pa// dbyings yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu rtsa
11a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa/ / nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya// dbyangs yig bzhi pa nyid dang ni// yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// dbyangs yig lnga pa
11a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag ni/ / sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan// mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin// sum cu brgyad pa 'di dag ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa
11a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid la// 'og gi char ni sgrub pa pos// me dang sbyar ba bya ba nyid// bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa
11a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang sbyar/ / yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag kyang // bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ldan pa// dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod yin//
11a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis// mdzes pa mchog
11a6(rgyud 'bum): ni yin par 'dod/ / lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/
11a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// brgya yi yi ge blangs nas ni// lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa 'gyur// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig drug pa dang yang sbyar// dgra rnams nges par gsod
11b1(rgyud 'bum): byed yin/ / ar+thaswa yi bzhi pa dang // dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams cad sgrub par yin// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/
11b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nyid// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad// de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs yig gsum par sbyar ba ni//
11b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sa yi mchog tu 'dod// yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang ngag ldan// mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog nyid// de bzhin drug cu rtsa lnga pa// rdo rje
11b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas phye ba dag/ sa bon 'di ni lha rdzas mchog/ grub sbyin thar pa sbyin chen po// yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang yang sbyar// bya ba kun la grub sbyin par/
11b5(rgyud 'bum): dere ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa// dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba kun// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// drug cu
11b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa nyid la yang / / der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba// sa bon yi ge 'di yis ni// 'og gi char ni brtag par bya// yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag sbyar// ye
11b7(rgyud 'bum): ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ / 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag/ gdod nas grub pa yin par ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas/
12a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs// yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid// ma mo drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor rab mchog ste// bya ba kun la dam pa yin// bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni//
12a2(rgyud 'bum): dbangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing // nyi ma yis ni dbye bya ste// yi ge ba ni der sbyar bya// mchog tu mdzes pa gzhan yod min// yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa// der ni d+ha dang sbyar bar bya//
12a3(rgyud 'bum): sa bon 'di ni rdzas kyi mchog/ mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod// bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing // sa bon 'di ni mchog bzang po// rgyu yi mchog ni yin
12a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod/ / yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa// bzhi pa'i mtha' yi khyad par byed// gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te// dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs
12a5(rgyud 'bum): yig gnyis pa dang sbyar bya/ / ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid// de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad// ma mo dag las lnga pa nyid// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa// ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid// de
12a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ / ma mo dag las lnga pa dang // yi ge dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa// ma mo rnams las gnyis pa nyid// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa dang //
12a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa// gdug pa rnams ni skrag byed cing // sngags pa rnams la bde 'byung byed// dbyangs rnams kyi ni bcu gsum pa/ yi ge gnyis par yang dag ldan// dbyangs las
12b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu gsum pa nyid dang / / yi ge lnga par yang dag ldan// gdug pa rnams ni zad byed cing // mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bde 'bab pa'o// dbyangs rnams las ni bcu bzhi nyid// yi ge brgyad par
12b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / bco lnga pa yis gdan du byas// dbyangs dag las ni bcu bzhi pa// yi ge dgu par yang dag ldan// spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/
12b3(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du ni dga' byed pa'o// dbyangs rnams las ni bcu gcig pa// bcu gnyis pa yig yang dag ldan// spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o// 'byung po thams cad skrag byed cing // sgrub
12b4(rgyud 'bum): po rnams la phan 'byung ba'o/ / bcu gcig par ni yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu gsum pa nyid la// thig les rnam par brgyan pa'o// 'byung po thams cad skrag byed cing // sgrub po rnams la
12b5(rgyud 'bum): phan 'byung ba'o/ / dbyangs rnams las ni lnga pa nyid// yi ge sum cu gnyis par ldan// dbyangs rnams las ni gsum pa dang // yi ge sum cu gsum par ldan// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid
12b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / yi ge sum cu bzhi par ldan// dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge sum cu drug par ldan// thog ma'i gnyis par yang dag ldan// yi ge sum cu rtsa bdun pa// dbyangs
12b7(rgyud 'bum): las gsum par yang dag ldan/ / yi ge bzhi bcu pa la'o// ma mo'i bcu gcig yang dag ldan// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa nyid// yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par
13a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa nyid// yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi par ldan// ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par ldan// dbyangs dag las ni
13a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa nyid/ / yi ge bzhi bcu lnga par ldan// ma mo las ni lnga pa nyid// yi ge lnga bcu gsum par ldan// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa// thig les kyang ni rnam brgyan pa'o// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa
13a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa/ / spyi bor thig les mtshan pa la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar ba'o// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa// spyi bor thig les mnan pa'o// dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge
13a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ / ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge drug cu rtsa lnga pa la'o// ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge drug cu brgyad par ldan// dngos grub thams cad 'gugs byed
13a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / sgrub po rnams la dpal sbyin pa'o// ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid// yi ge bdun cu gcig par ldan// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid// yi ge
13a6(rgyud 'bum): bdun cu gnyis par ldan/ / sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// thig le yis ni mnyam par mnan// dbyangs kyi bcu bzhi par nges ldan// yi ge bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o// ma mo
13a7(rgyud 'bum): las ni bcu bzhi pa/ / yi ge bdun cu bzhi par ldan// de bzhin thig les rnam brgyan pa'o// dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bdun cu lnga par ldan// phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa nyid//
13b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge bdun cu drug pa ldan// ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bdun cu brgyad par ldan// steng du thig les mtshan pa'o// ma mo las ni bzhi pa dang // yi ge bdun cu rtsa dgu pa// sgra
13b2(rgyud 'bum): bor thig les mnan pa'o/ / dbyangs rnams las ni drug pa nyid// rnga yi rgyal po bskyed pa la// thig le nA ngas rnam brgyan pa// dbyangs rnams las ni gsum pa nyid// yi ge bcu
13b3(rgyud 'bum): drug ldan pa'o/ / yi ge'i grangs ni brgya yi steng // dgu bcu dang ni rtsa brgyad do// 'di ni re mig las btus pa// he ru ka dpal mgon po yi// rtsa ba'i sngags mchog tu shes bya//
13b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun gyi gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa yin// dpal ldam phrag 'thung lha rig rgyal// bklags pas grub pa don yod pa// yi ge oM ni dang po ste// hU~M hUM la tsan
13b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' mar sbyar/ / rtsa ba'i sngags te sngags 'di ni// grub pa thams cad sbyin byed yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u sde bdun pa'o//
13b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba yi// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod// hA sA ra m+bas la dzA nI ki DA Ta phaHhUM hUM kaM ru ru he
13b7(rgyud 'bum): n+da trA ya/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// thab hU~M hU~M sa ha rmA oM/ yi ge baM dang yo dang ni// yi ge mo dang rnaM nying dang // hUM dang paT ces bshad po ni// rnam
14a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad/ / oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni ye swA hA/ mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi// 'phreng ba'i
14a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni dam pa yin/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che// rig pa'i rgyal po he ru ka/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las go bzlog pa'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags btu ba'i
14a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi// las mchog go rims ji bzhin du// de ni rnam par bshad par bya// 'jig rten gsum gang
14a4(rgyud 'bum): yod rnams/ / thams cad skad cig gis 'grub par// las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad kyi
14a5(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas thams cad dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do/ / sprin thams cad 'thor ba dang / char 'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa'o// rgya mtsho skems par byed do//
14a6(rgyud 'bum): chu bo rgyun phyogs las bzlog ste 'bab par ston to// dbang po zlog par byed do// gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas sa g.yo bar byed pa dang / shing la 'dzegs te gang du
14a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do/ / sngags thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do// khrag 'dren par byed pa dang / slar yang gtong bar byed do//
14b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brgya stong phrag du mar byed do// 'dod na snang bar byed cing 'dod na mi snang bar byed do// khang bzangs dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa phye mar byed do// dug bdud rtsir byed pa dang
14b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'ang dug tu byed do/ / zla ba chur byed pa dang / chu'ang zla bar byed do// dri thams cad 'phrog par byed do// gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do// nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang
14b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba 'byin par byas pa zhi ba 'dus pa'i lha mo dang / gang zhig kun tu spyod pa'i mi'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga
14b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed pa dang / me skyed par byed do// sa 'og rnam par gsheg par byed pa dang / ser ba'ang
14b5(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed de dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed do/ / lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gar byed du 'jug go// gang gis grub pa'i phyir mi 'anas bzung ste lan cig bzlas na de de'i mod la 'chi bar
14b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sa ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dod na sdud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ni brtul zhugs mi dgos/ spyod pa dang bsrung ba mi dgos te/ rtog
14b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bya ba cho ga 'dis ci 'dod pa'i las rnams bya'o/ / gal te khros pas lan cig bzlas na bye ba gsod par 'gyur ro// zhi bas bzlas na 'tshe bar byed do// dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas
15a1(rgyud 'bum): bas gang la bsnun pa de de'i mod la ltung bar byed do/ / thal ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsnun na de de'i mod la sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol ba la
15a2(rgyud 'bum): lan cig bzlas nas spang le ba la sogs pa la mtshan ma gang gi maung bris pa de gdon chen pos gzung bar 'gyur ro/ / a ti mug ta'i lcug ma la lan cig bzlas nas gang la bsnun pa de'i mod la
15a3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gseg ma la lan cig bzlas te gang la btab pa de rengs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan cig
15a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te spos su sbyar na sems can thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa la lan cig bzlas te bkab na nag pos zin pa'i dug sos par byed do// mkha' 'gros rgyas btab la lan cig
15a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i chus de gtor bar byed do/ / ka ra wI ra'i lcug ma la lan cig bzlas pas mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro// he ru ka dpal ye shes ni// mi shes dngos grub mngon 'dod
15a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de ni phub ma rdung ba ste// gsang sngags 'di ni med pa ru// dngos grub dang ni bde ba dag/ mi yis thob par mi 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di ni mi shes par// rnal 'byor pa ni
15a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon 'dod pa/ / de yi ngal ba don med de// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed yin// sgrub po sngags dang phyag
15b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya dag/ bder gshegs gsungs pa 'di shes pa// bza' btung la sogs tsa ru yi// bza' dang btung ba'i ro sogs pas// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin// dpal he ru
15b2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i nges par brjod pa las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / / de nas sku gsum bshad par bya// khrag 'thung dpal gnyis med sbyor bas//
15b3(rgyud 'bum): gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'dir ni grub par the tshom med// sku gsum po 'di bshad par bya// chos kyi sku yi lus can du// gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba// de ltar legs
15b4(rgyud 'bum): sems gyur pa la/ / de tshe ye shes nga smra'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus can du// gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba// de nas mnyam par gzhag pa la// longs spyod rdzogs par nga
15b5(rgyud 'bum): rab smra/ / sprul pa'i sku yi lus can du// gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba// de tshe sems de rtse gcig la// sprul pa'i skur yang nga smra ste// ye shes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul//
15b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag thob par gdon mi za// bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gsang sngags 'di yi snying po 'di// gsang ba bshad kyis sgrub po nyon// snying
15b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i gsang sngags bzlas pas dpag tshad bye ba 'phags par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs stong phrag du mar byed do// khang bzangs dang / shing dang / khyim la
16a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzegs te mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang lhan cig dpag tshad bye ba'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'ong ba las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'dod na
16a2(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dod na byis pa dang / rgan po dang / ngar la bab pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dod na glang po che dang / ma he dang /
16a3(rgyud 'bum): ba men dang / rta dang / stag dang / seng ge dang / khyu mchog dang / byi la dang / rnga mo'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod na rma bya dang / khyim bya dang / ngang
16a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ngur pa dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de'i gzugs su byed do// tshig 'phrog
16a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mthong ba 'phrog pa dang / nyan pa 'phrog pa dang / sna 'phrog pa dang / lce 'phrog par byed do// gang gi 'dod pa de'i khrag 'dren par byed pa 'am rengs par byed do// dpal
16a6(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa lngas sku gsum grub pa'i snying po'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa pos// skye ba bdun pa'i bar
16a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba/ / gang gis bsten pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa'i// dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad par bya// skyes bu gang zhig rdul gyi dri zhim par 'byung ba dang /
16b1(rgyud 'bum): bden par smra ba dang / yun ring por mig mi 'dzums pa dang / khro ba med par gyur pa dang / kha nas dbugs dri zhim par 'byung ba de ni skye ba bdun du mi'i skye bar gyur pa yin/ grib ma bdun
16b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bya ngang pa'i 'gros can snying rje dang yang dag par ldan pa de bsten na de'i snying kha na ro tsa na yod de/ de blangs la dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas thig le byas na steng du lding bar
16b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing dpag tshad dbye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de bsten pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur ro// dpag tshad bye ba lnga bcur nyin zhag gcig gis 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur
16b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / lha'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro// dpal he ru ka'i snying po gang zhig shes pa de gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de ster bar 'gyur ro// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las skye ba bdun
16b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / / de nas nye ba'i snying po ni// dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed cing // 'jig rten gsum 'gyur gang cung zad//
16b6(rgyud 'bum): de kun skad cig gis 'grub bshad// Ta pha hUM hUM ha ha hrIHoM/ 'di ni snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'o// gsang sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar byed do//
16b7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci rnams 'gugs par byed do// rgya mtsho dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u la
17a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa skems pa 'am/ gnon par byed do// gang du bzlas pa'i gnas der mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur ro// 'dis chu la
17a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas te bdag nyid kyi mig bkrus na skye ba bdud pa'i mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / tshe zad pa dang 'chi ba bzhin du snang ba'ang tshe ring ba dang gson par snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la mngon
17a3(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags nas gang la bltas pa de gnon par 'gyur ro/ / dpa' bo shi ba'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa blangs te/ mi'i khrag dang btags te rna ba'i mig sman dang thod par bcug la ldong ros dang /
17a4(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / khrag dang bsnol te grib ma la bskams la lcags gsum gyis dkris pa bya ste/ yang de lhag par gnas pa skar ma rgyal la bya ba yang dpal he ru ka'i zhal du
17a5(rgyud 'bum): bcug la lag pa g.yon pas la bkab ste/ yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na de de'i mod la mi snang bar 'gyur zhing grib ma med par 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur na/ sa steng gi mi
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du kha las bton na ni snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyud 'dir mkha' spyod grub pa'i ril bu 'di ni dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no// dpal he ru
17a7(rgyud 'bum): ka'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags 'dis mdzub mo'i rtses mgo'i thod pa'i sha med par byas la mnyes na de'i khrag 'dren par byed do/ / g.yon pas yang dang yang du mnyes pas ni 'dzug par 'gyur ro//
17b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bzlas te mgo'i thod par khu tshur bsnun na gang gi ming nas smos te byas pa de'i klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rjes su dran la thod pa 'o mas bkang na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
17b2(rgyud 'bum): gi ru zang la bzlas te thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro// mdzub mo la yongs su bzlas te gang la sdigs mdzub byas pa de de'i mod la lhung bar 'gyur ro// sngags
17b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas nas rkang pa sa la bsnun na gang gi ming nas smos pa de de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / chu la bzlas te sa la gtor na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mos stong
17b4(rgyud 'bum): la yang sdigs mdzub byas nas bltas pas 'dug pa de thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro/ / tshig gis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// sme sha can gyi thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te sems can gang rjes su
17b5(rgyud 'bum): dran pa de la bsnun pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sbyin sreg gi me'i thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te gang la bsnun pa de lha nyid kyis kyang mi mthong ngo // chu la brgya bzlas pas gtor na slar snang
17b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / thod pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyar bcings la dbugs mi 'byin par gang gi ming nas bzlas pa de spyo bar 'gyur ro// skye bo stong yang smyo bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro// gang gi
17b7(rgyud 'bum): ming nas spos te gtsug pud la lan bcu bzlas te mdud na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / khang sdong du song ste lan brgya bzlas nas spyi bor bcings la mig bgrad de ji srid du bzlas pa de srid du mi
18a1(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur ro/ / bkrol na slar yang snang bar 'gyur ro// gseg ma la mngon par bzlas te steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor na lha dang
18a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyang 'ching bar 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba thams cad kyang 'phrog
18a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / stan dang mal khri la skyes pa dang bud med 'du ba la bltas te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'byar bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// gyo mog dang bcas pa la yod
18a4(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas te chu bor bcug na rgyun phyogs las bzlog ste 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gyo mog dang bcas pa de nyid kyis dba' rlabs gnon par 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni bzlog par 'gyur ro// sngags
18a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te steng du blta bzhin du stong bzlas na char chen po gcod par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan gyi dpung mngon du phyogs na bzlas brjod stong byas te g.yul du zhugs pa na mtshon cha brgyas bsnun kyang gnod pa'i tshor ba
18a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing mtshon gyis kyang chod par mi 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i lus can du 'gyur ro// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nye ba'i snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
18a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas go cha'i las rnams ni// 'jig rten gsum na gang yod pa// yid la 'dod pa de dag kun// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// de la go cha zlos bzhin du yang
18b1(rgyud 'bum): lam du zhugs na rkun ma dang stag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba 'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// go cha zlos bzhin du yang rgyal po'i pho brang gi bud med kyi gnas su zhugs na yang mi snang bar 'gyur/
18b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ ngagang 'dod pa de blangs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo // go cha'i sngags brgya zlos pa'i lag pas gang la reg pa de mdung bzhin du rengs par 'gyur ro// sum
18b3(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa gsum pas kyang mi g.yo'o/ / sngags zlos pa'i rkang pas bsnun na thar par 'gyur ro// rang gi khrag la lan gsum bzlas nas thig le byas la gang dang lhan cig smra ba dang / gang gis
18b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong zhing gang mthong ba de thams cad kyi khrag 'dren par byed do/ / gang gi khyim du khro ba dang bcas pas lan stong bzlas na thams cad la rims kyis btab par 'gyur ro// chu la lan lnga bzlas
18b5(rgyud 'bum): te gtor na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi gdong la bltas te bzlas pa de'i tshig 'phrog par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu'i 'gram dang lteng kar gnas te stong bzlas na chu'i steng du gnas te/ thang
18b6(rgyud 'bum): la ji lta ba de bzhin du chu la'ang de bzhin du 'gro'o/ / chu la zhugs na chu bo 'am rgya mtsho yang gnas so// lag pa gnyis dril phyis byas la lan stong bzlas na rnal 'byor ma rnams dbang du 'gyur ro//
18b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs gzugs// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro he de bzhin te// gzugs can ma ru rab grags pa// de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma// de kun de yi dbang
19a1(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / skar ma rgyal gyi sbyor bas ras byas la/ de gyon pa'i lus kyis rnal 'byor ma mnyam par bzhag pas stong phrag bcu bzlas na de'i 'og tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//
19a2(rgyud 'bum): de gyon pa'i lus kyis dpag tshad stong gi bar du nam mkhar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// des rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i sa rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// steng
19a3(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyud du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur// de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// mchog tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'gyur//
19a4(rgyud 'bum): shing longs 'du'i khu bcud blangs la bzlas brjod spong byas te gang la thig le byas pa de shing du 'gyur ro// tshu la lan bdun bzlas pas gtor na 'di ni slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// glang po
19a5(rgyud 'bum): che'i rkang mthil dang bsgrub bya'i rdul blangs te bzlas brjod stong bzlas nas gang la bsnun na de glang po cher 'gyur ro/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las go cha'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i
19a6(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / / bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ yid kyi shugs ni bzlog bya'i phyir// gang gis sgrub po 'grub pa yi// sgrub pa de nas bshad
19a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro gi 'dod gzugs can// bong bu'i rnam pa khrag 'dzag zhal// mkha' 'gro rtse gsum lag ni thogs// bsgrubs ni che zad pa dang ni/
19b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe ring ba yang snang ba yin// 'dir ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor bdag/ de bzhin bong bur mthong ba yin// glang po nyid du sngon du gang // mthong ste glang po'i gzugs can yin// gang dang gang gi skye ba
19b2(rgyud 'bum): gang / / sngon gyi skye bar gyur pa dag/ de dang de yi gzugs snang bar// rnal 'byor pas ni 'dir mthong 'gyur// skyes bu dngos grub 'di sbyin 'gyur// sngon nas skye ba bdun du mi// grub pa
19b3(rgyud 'bum): ster ba yod gyur na/ / de yis gtor ma'i bya ba dag/ byas na sgrub pos 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin dpag tshad brgya phrag ni// stong gi steng du skad cig 'gro// 'di ni rnal 'byor sngags mchog
19b4(rgyud 'bum): gtso/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor sgrub byed// rnal 'byor mtshan mas gang zlos pa// zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// de ni gsang ba'i rgyud 'di yi// sngags kyi snying po dge ba yin// de
19b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog shes gang de 'dir/ / rnal 'byor pa ru the tshom med// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom par ni// de dag thams cad brjod pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpal he ru ka bong
19b6(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rnam par mdzad pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas sdom pa rnams la ni// gang zhig brdar gyur shes pa dag/ de nyid kyis de grub pa ni// the tshom med par
19b7(rgyud 'bum): bshang par bya/ / DA zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad// TI zhes bya ba bud med yin// pU zhes bya ba gnon pa yin// su zhes bya ba bza' ba yin// mA zhes bya ba ma ru bshad// yo zhes bya ba chung ma
20a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ dab+hI zhes sring mo de bzhin te// bI zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad// lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin// shrI zhes khrag tu shes par bya// so zhes zhi ba'i btung
20a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / pe zhes de bzhin btung ba ste// hI zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ b+ha zhes bya ba za ba yin// b+hU zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin// pI zhes dur khrod de bzhin te// d+hu zhes bya ba ro ru zhes//
20a3(rgyud 'bum): hi zhes rnal 'byor ma ru bshad// ga zhes de bzhin lA ma yin// tI zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma// ha ni khaN+Da ro he nyid// yA zhes bya ba byin pa
20a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / ka zhes bya ba dpung bzung // b+ha zhes bya ba gsong por smra// su zhes legs 'ong bya ba yin// mi zhes bya ba nya yin la// pa zhes bya ba za ba yin// pe zhes bya ba
20a5(rgyud 'bum): btung ba btung / / g+ha ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin// ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro// ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes
20a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba skal bzang ma/ / na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma// sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can// a zhes bya ba dam tshig med// A zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin// na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin//
20a7(rgyud 'bum): sau zhes bya ba chags pa yin// 'di dag ni yi ge re re'i brda yin te// dpa' bo dang sring mor 'du shes par byed pa// gus pa dang mi gus pa la sbyin par bya ba dam tshig gi mchog yid du 'ong ba phan
20b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dogs par byed pa ste gus pa la sbyin par bya ba'o/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// de nas skal ldan skal ldan
20b2(rgyud 'bum): min/ / mdor bsdus nas ni rab bshad bya// dam tshig mchog la gnas pa ste// skal ldan yid 'ong phan 'dogs byed// gus pa nyid la rab sbyin bya// de nas rigs kyi dbye bzung
20b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ / gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar gang // pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring
20b4(rgyud 'bum): mig/ rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'// tsan dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs pa 'dus nyid la dga'// de rigs rus byung shes par bya// bud med btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing //
20b5(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de ni dpa' bo'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// gang zhig ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs// gos ni sngon po 'dzin la dga'// ut+pal
20b6(rgyud 'bum): sngon por sdang ba'i dri/ / de ni dpa' bo dran rjes 'gro// bud med gang zhig mdzes ma ste// pags pa pad dkar 'dab 'dra ma// rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i dri// de ni de bzhin dpa' bo'i bla/
20b7(rgyud 'bum): dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang kha ni dmar ba dang // ma li ka dang ut+pal dri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang // gos ni dkar
21a1(rgyud 'bum): kho 'chang bar dga'/ / mgo la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de yi mdog gi gos
21a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang zhing / / rtag tu ga pur dri dang ldan// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin// rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun spyod la
21a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag dga'/ / 'di dag rang rgya'i mdog gis khyab// rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang // rigs kyi rjes su 'dir gyur pa// 'di la kha dog drug tu 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba
21a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra// g.yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang // rnal 'byor ma la'ang g.yon pa brtag/ skad ni chen por rab smra ba// g.yon nas blta bas rnam
21a5(rgyud 'bum): par blta/ / bud med rnams mthong rab smra ba// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad// bud med rnams gang gsol btab byed// rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra// rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor
21a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / rang gi bstan bcos gsungs pa skyong // rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni dam tshig ldan par brjod// phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba// g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu
21a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dud/ / lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba// de ni nges par bden par 'gro// mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing // mgo ni 'phrug par byed pa ste// zur gyis lta
21b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing lag g.yon gyis/ / sgrub pa po la khyad par du// de yi rang rig dran pa'o// mkhur ba'am kos sgo dag dang ni// sna dag tu ni sor mo ston// zur gyis lta zhing lan cig
21b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / bzlas nas rigs la rnam par blta// bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nges par dam tshig can yin no// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma bdun
21b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtshan nyid nges par brtags pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang
21b4(rgyud 'bum): dag 'byung / / ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma// nags tshal ma dang de bzhin 'jigs// gzugs kun spyod ma mdzes ma dag/ b+hA su rA mkha' 'gro rnams bdun// bsdus ma rang
21b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid 'dir bshad/ / gzugs can ma dang tsum+bi ka/ lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog e hi ka lha mo// mkha' 'gro ma rnams bdun du bshad// mngon par
21b6(rgyud 'bum): zhen pas blta ba dang / / smin ma 'degs pas gar byed cing // sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud byed gang // phyis ni 'jig par byed pa yin// de ni gzugs can mar shes bya// dpa' bo
21b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med bstan par bya/ / drung pa'am ya na mi drung ba// byis par 'khyud cing cu smin// de ni tsu maM kar zhes bya// mkha' 'gro sdig pa 'joms ma yin// zur blta gdong
22a1(rgyud 'bum): la khro gnyer ldan/ / smin ma sbyar zhing sdigs mdzub dang // dbugs 'byin 'jigs par byed gang yin// 'di na gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin// 'jigs par
22a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa gang yin pa/ / de ni lA ma yin par bshad// phag dang dred dang byi la dang // ce spyang ri dgas rta dag dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa// yongs su gyur par de bshad do// /
22a3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang // song nas slar yang mi ldog pa// rjes su chags pas gsol bar 'dod// khaN+Da ro her de bzhin bshad// yid ni byung bas lag pa 'am// bong ba
22a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am ni rkang pas sam/ / gos mtha' 'am yang na shing dag gis// des reg pa ni 'tshe mi 'gyur// mi ldog par ni shes bya ste// bsgrub bya min par de la brjod// dgod smra rgyu med pa ru
22a5(rgyud 'bum): nI dbu ning rab tu khros pa ste/ / de ni e hi kar dran bya// lha mo gsong bor smra ba yin// sangs rgyas pa dang rtag tu smra// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs las byung // mkha' 'gro ma mi
22a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs phyag rgya/ / dpa' bos bsten phyir mtshon par bya// thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // 'khor lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang // ral gri kun tu skrag byed nyid// dung dang brgyad du shes par
22a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gzugs yongs su brje ba dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya bstan pa'i
22b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro mchog gi go 'phang ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i
22b2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ / dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang // pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong // lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang // zhen par lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba// bud med gang
22b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig sen mo dmar/ / de bzhin skye bo kun la brtse// khyim du pad+ma 'dri ba ni// pad+ma gar dbang rigs byung yin// smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum yod// lus kyi mdog ni skya bsangs
22b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rtag tu rdo rje'i rigs sgom pa// gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi// mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni// he ru ka yi rigs byung yin// gang gi
22b5(rgyud 'bum): dpral bar rtse gsum mam/ / mdung thung dag kyang snang 'gyur zhing // mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang // de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang //
22b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu yid ni dga' 'gyur zhing // de yi khyim du rdo rje'i mtshan// rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa// shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung // mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za// 'khor
22b7(rgyud 'bum): lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ / lag par yang ni snang gyur pa// sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ste// rtag tu dpral bar dar 'ching ba// skal ba chen por kun tshogs shing // mchog tu
23a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba gang yin dang / / khyim du 'khor lo 'dri byed cing // rtag tu de la mchod byed pa// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi stobs kyis dregs//
23a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig smin ma gnag 'dra zhing // so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang // g.yon pa rtag tu ma rungs pa// snying stobs ldan par gyur pa dang // rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang // ma
23a3(rgyud 'bum): du smra bar mi byed cing / / khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang // rtag tu dge bas mchod byed cing // rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba// stong phrag bcu ni lnga dang ldan// ser zhing gser gyi
23a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog 'drar snang / / mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser// rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni snang gyur pa// rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas// snyems shing bden par
23a5(rgyud 'bum): smra ba dang / / ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing // gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni// rtag tu 'dri zhing cher mchod pa// khaN+Da ro ha'i rigs las byung // rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug mchog/
23a6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'// skem zhing smin ma nag po'i mdog/ dpral bar mdung rtse lta bu yod// gang zhig gdug pa'i las la dga'// rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro//
23a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med cing brtsog med de// gang gi dpral bar thig le dang // khyim du thod pa 'dri zhing mchod// dpal he ru ka lha yi ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs las byung //
23b1(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang // so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing // rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'// g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dag/ de yi khyim du dgra lta ni//
23b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa// rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro yin par the tshom med// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag/ shrI he ru ka'i rigs las
23b3(rgyud 'bum): byung / / sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid sprul pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang /
23b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i nges pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// lA ma yi ni mtshan nyid ni// sgrub po gang gis yan lag gi
23b5(rgyud 'bum): shas yang dag par shes pa'o/ / gang gi bzhin ni yongs rgyas par// kun nas zlum por snang 'gyur zhing // kha yi smrar rtag par yod// spu dang smin ma ring ba dang // gos
23b6(rgyud 'bum): bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / / mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'// de ni dpa' bo'i sring mor bshad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin bya ba// yang na rus
23b7(rgyud 'bum): sbal phyag rgya bya/ / pags pa ril ba spyi blugs nyid// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin// de ni tshes bcu'i dus tshogs la// khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur// lA ma'i bud med
24a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni/ / mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// mchu gnyis glo zhing mig dkyus ring // mig ni dmar zhing ser sbyar gnas// phyug cing skal bzang
24a2(rgyud 'bum): phan yon can/ / dkar zhing tsam pa lta bur snang // shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min// sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'// dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing // mtshams
24a3(rgyud 'bum): ni gyen du bstan pa las/ / dgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang // lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'//
24a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rab dregs mthong nas ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi// gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya// g.yon pa dag nas yongs bzlog pa/
24a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad ni// de yi dus tshigs yin par bshad// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang // bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod//
24a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gang gi mkhur tshes dag tu ni// khur bur snang ba'ang gnas gyur cing // de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser//
24a7(rgyud 'bum): mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang // skra ni de bzhin 'khyil pa dang // mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang // ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas// de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang // rtag
24b1(rgyud 'bum): tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / / dgod cing glu ni len pa nyid// glo bur du ni khro ba dang // sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang // rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste// 'di 'dra'i rab
24b2(rgyud 'bum): dregs mthong nas ni/ / mdung gi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// g.yon gyi phyogs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni
24b3(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / thung zhing byin pa sgom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing // phrag pa dag nas gos kyang 'phyang // de 'dra'i bud med mthong nas ni// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya
24b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan bya zhing / / 'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang // dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi de yi
24b5(rgyud 'bum): dus yin te/ / de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// shrI he ru kA lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// lus kun la ni ba spu yod// mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang // sbom
24b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing rnam 'gyur mi bzad pa/ / bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la// gsus pa gro zhing kha dog gnag/ mig zlum sngan nyams pa dang // rtag tu gru la mkhas pa dang // sprin gyi mdog
24b7(rgyud 'bum): can yid 'phrog pa/ / 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni// glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon
25a1(rgyud 'bum): nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ / phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// de yi dus tshigs bcu gcig ste// khyim du mche ba 'dri bar byed// rdo rje phag sa
25a2(rgyud 'bum): lA ma yi/ / mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
25a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lag pa g.yon gyi brda rnams ni// gang gis shes pas yang dag par// ming srid du ni de bzhin 'gyur// gang gis
25a4(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yon ston pa ni/ / gsong por smra zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni// gsong por smra ba'i lan 'gyur yin// gang zhig lto ba rdebs pa ni// bdag nyid
25a5(rgyud 'bum): bkres par ston pa yin/ / gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o// gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'jug/ zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig lce ni
25a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa dag/ za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig pus mo la reg pa// ngal le zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig sor me'i rtse la reg/ ngal sos zhes ni smra ba yin// gang
25a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig so ni 'cha' byed pa/ / bza' yis zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni// bcings so zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni// grol lo zhes ni
25b1(rgyud 'bum): smyon pa yin/ / gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni// de la pa ti'i sa bstan bya// rnam par 'gyur ba bltas nas ni// gang zhig sgra ni ston pa la// kha thA ga ni de la bstan// gang /
25b2(rgyud 'bum): zhig yan lag bskyod pa dang // de la mche ba gnyis bstan bya// gang zhig lag pas lag pa sngon// gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin// gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston// de la
25b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis zhes smra ba yin/ / gang zhig rna ba la reg pa// gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg/ shi yis khyer zhes smra ba yin// gang zhig sa la dkyil
25b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dri/ / de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin// gang zhig nu ma la reg pa// bdag gi bu ni srungs zhes smra// gang zhig g.yon mthos sa la 'dri// bla ma'i skye bos nga bsrungs smra//
25b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzums byed// de ltar byos zhes smra ba yin// gang zhig tshigs la reg pa ni// bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin// pho nya mo ni gang yang rung // de dag kun
25b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis yang dag spyad/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gsang
25b7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po yi/ / lta ba nga yis bshad par bya// bud med spyi gtsug reg byed pa// mgo bo de la bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni// de la mkhur chos bstan par bya//
26a1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig son ston pa la// de la lce ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mtshuni ston byed pa// de la kos sgo bstan par bya// gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/
26a2(rgyud 'bum): brla ni de la bstan par bya// gang zhig lag pa ston byed pa// de la dpung pa bstan par bya// gang zhig sum skyed ston byed pa// de la rgyab ni bstan par bya// gang zhig nu ma
26a3(rgyud 'bum): ston byed pa/ / de la kos sko bstan par bya// gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa// de la lte ba bstan par bya// gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa// de la ling ka bstan par bya//
26a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa// de la 'phongs ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa// de la byin pa bstan par bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa// de la rkang mthil
26a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / gang zhig sor tshigs ston byed pa// de la sor mo bstan par bya// gang zhig sa ni ston pa la// de la nam mkha' bstan par bya// gang zhig nam mkha'
26a6(rgyud 'bum): ston byed pa/ / de la nyi ma bstan par bya// gang zhig 'bab chu ston byed pa// de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya// 'di dag mkha' 'gro ma yi ni// lus kyi phyag rgya the tshom med//
26a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba ste// ya' dag ston par 'gro bar 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las lta ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shuH
26b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// yan lag phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin// gang zhig shes pas ming po 'am// sring mor the tshom med 'gyur
26b2(rgyud 'bum): pabapa'o/ / sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis// legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis// legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba yin// 'di ni rnal
26b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma kun gyi/ / yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// g.yon gyi gung mo brkyang ba la// cung zad mdzub mo bskum pa ni// mig gi phyag rgyar shes par bya// sngags
26b4(rgyud 'bum): pas de la de bstan te/ / do mod ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar// dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med// gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa// de la mdzub mo bstan par bya// gang zhig srin
26b5(rgyud 'bum): lag ston byed pa/ / de la lce ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pa tis ston pa// de la mdung ni bstan par bya// gang zhig spyi bo ston byed pa// de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya//
26b6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa// de la mkha' ni bstan par bya// gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa// de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// gang zhig so ni ston byed pa// de la
26b7(rgyud 'bum): mchu ni bstan par bya/ / gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa// de la kha ni bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa// de la mig ni bstan par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma
27a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi/ / rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin// 'di dag rtags bstan gsang ba ba// yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par dzod/
27a2(rgyud 'bum): pa las khyad par gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi rnam rol pa// gang
27a3(rgyud 'bum): gis rig nas ring nas kyang / / dpa' bo dpa' bo'i snying mo ru'o// dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa// dpa' bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin// gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su//
27a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod// 'di dag rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// go bzlog pa yis lta ba ni// bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba rtag pa smin ma g.yo// snga
27a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ / de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o// rnam 'gyur bskor bar shes bya ste// ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum// mkha' 'gro ma rnams nges 'gro ba la
27a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi mtshan ma kun shes bya/ / glo bur rnam par bzlog 'gyur te// sngar bzhin gdong ni 'jigs gyur pa// rnam pa de lta de yi de// gang gi rdo rje lta bur gsal// sgra ni khu byug
27a7(rgyud 'bum): skad lta bur/ / mchog tu gsal bar de'i de nyid// 'di yi mtshan ma khyim du ni// rdo rje lta bur me long bcas// gnyis par yang ni gyur pa yang // ral gri 'dra bar me long
27b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ pagam du 'dra ga tu 'brug la 'ong basbyang bar shes bya/ ba ra byas pa'i gzugranas ni/ da rdzus rnam par shes bya ste/ mtshan nyid 'di gdang ldan gapapa' 'gros 'chog yin zhes bya/ sa te ga'i nges par rjod pa las ma pa
27b2(rgyud 'bum): / dang byi mtshan ma'i byag kyis tshan kyi cho ga'i le'u ni sus gsus pa'o// de nas gzhan skad brda rnams ni// sgrub po la 'dir bshad bya ba// gang gis ming po 'am sring mor ni// the tsom med par shes
27b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'o/ / po tang+gi zhes bya ba ni gsong por smra ba'o// pra ti bo tang+gi zhes bya ba ni gsong bor smra ba'i lan no// ga mu zhes bya ba ni 'gro'o zhes smra ba yin no// lum pa zhes bya ba ni
27b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ong ngo zhes brjod pa yin no/ / de ha ma zhes bya ba ni grong khyer zhes smra ba yin no// tsa tu ka zhes bya ba ni zung cig ces smra ba yin no// bI tA Na zhes bya ba ni snying nyid do// mA ra Na zhes bya ba ni
27b5(rgyud 'bum): sgra ngan no/ / kar Ni ka ni dril bu'o// a li ni spyi bo'o// ka ra Na ni phag pa'i ze ba'o// shra ba Na ni rna ba'o// man tha na ni bdud rtsi'i gnas so// sa mA ga mA ni mi'o// ta li
27b6(rgyud 'bum): ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/ / nar kas ni dkyil 'khor ro// a mu kan dur khrod do// ka khai la ni sgra'o// shA sa nam ni bram ze'i rigs so// ba ridi ni rgyal rigs so// bi ra ta na
27b7(rgyud 'bum): rje rigs so/ / krur ni dmangs rigs so// ana?s+sa ni sle sha can no// pa shu li ka ni khyim mo// b+ha gi ni ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// me da ka ni chu'o// gr-i ha Ne ni phyag rgyas 'debs
28a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / lce so la reg pa ni bdag cag ltogs so zhes ston pa'o// kr-iSh+Na ni dris bsgos pa'o// gan da ba si ni sred pa'o// ku ta ni gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes
28a2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / ki ra Na ni me tog go// tu laM ba ni dgod pa'o// da ron so'o// ni ro d+ha ni char 'bab pa bzlog pa'o// tri ba ti ni zhu ba'o// dur yu ni phyi rol lo// d+hu pa pri ya ni sprin no//
28a3(rgyud 'bum): sA nu ni ri bo'o// sa ri ta ni 'bab chu'o// ang gu li ni yan lag go// ba da na ni gdong ngo // rA dzA kA ni lce'o// a da nA ni so'o// pak+ti ni rgyal mtshan no// tshan+do ni 'phreng ba'o//
28a4(rgyud 'bum): tsa la ni rlung ngo // pra ba hA ni gru'o// pa shu ni ri dgas so// yA ti ni dkyil 'khor ro// na ra ka ni dam tshig go// sa ma na ni bzhi mdo'o// phAl+lA sha ma ni skye ba'o// ma hA k+Sha ram ni phyug
28a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'o/ / ts+ya nir skyes so// nA zhes bya ba ni mi'o// go zhes bya ba ni khyu mchog go// ma zhes bya ba ni ma he'o// b+ha ni za ba'o// ha rnams grangs so// a pe ka ni rgyal po'i skyes bu'o//
28a6(rgyud 'bum): brang la reg pa ni nags na gnas pa'o// kha la reg pa ni zos so zhes pa'o// so la reg pa ni ngoms so zhes bya'o// ho zhes pa ni rnam grangs te kha cig tu'o// hrI kA ni ngo tsha'o// stong pa la
28a7(rgyud 'bum): reg pa ni med do zhes pa'o/ / brlal reg pa ni me thun gyis shig pa'o// steng nyid ni de bzhin no zhes pa'o// e waM zhes bya ba ni 'og na med pa'o// phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gsang ba'i
28b1(rgyud 'bum): brda nyid de dpa' bos gsungs pa sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid do/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi brda'i tshig gi brdar btags pa'i cho ga'i le'u me nyi
28b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / de nas don kun 'dod pa yi// sbas pa brgyad mthar sbyar byas te// mos pa dman pa'i sems can dag/ rmongs shing mi shes sems ldan la'o//
28b3(rgyud 'bum): de la dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gsal bar gsungs pa'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin te// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wI re shA ya/ ma hA ka lAg+ni san+ni b+hA ya/ dza TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya
28b4(rgyud 'bum): daMSh+Ta ka rA lo gra b+hI ShaN mu khA ya/ sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA yA/ par shu pA sho d+hA ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ne/ b+ha g+hA dzi nam+ba rad+hA ra ya/ ma hA d+hum+b+hang+ga kA ra wa pu ShA ya/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru
28b5(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+he ban+ta/ tA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha yaM/ hr-irbaM/ hrahraHpo / phaT paH/ dA ha da/ ba tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+ShA b+ha/ ba sa ru d+hid+hang+ku mA lA wa lan+di ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/
28b6(rgyud 'bum): mam+b+ha g+hAt+pa la ge nga / gas u0f7f/ rdzas ta yA/ a r+N+Na mA sa // u0f7f/ kau ma~M ka~M la~M mamam/ ma d+
28b7(rgyud 'bum): hi li d+hi la~M/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten ni
29a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum po dag na yod man pan/ / shI ru ka'i sngags shes na// gsang sngags thams cad yongs 'dor ba'o// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/
29a2(rgyud 'bum): po nya rnams ni yang dag gnas// 'og dang steng gi dngos grub ster// bdag gi pho nya ma kun 'gro// pho nya mo de don kun ster// mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang // tsum+ban dang rtag
29a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'khyud/ / rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid// ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni// thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad// bden dngos thams cad sbyin bya ste// gzhan
29a4(rgyud 'bum): du nam yang ma yin no/ / ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo gnas la// gang la rtag tu sngags sbyin pa// de yi de nyid cho ga bshad// de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad// skyes pa bud med g.yon nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa// shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur//
29a6(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor mchog/ slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin// rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po// legs par gyur pa nyid yin te// brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya// nus pa yis
29a7(rgyud 'bum): ni mchod par bya/ / kA kha'i gdong sogs brgyad po ni// grol dang dad pa 'phel byed pa// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgya// dam tshig rnams kyang sbyong bar byed// lha mo gzhan
29b1(rgyud 'bum): yang kun sbyor ba/ / rnam par rmongs pas 'dod pa min// gnyis su med dang thogs med yin// dam tshig spyod pa spyad bya ba// bud med dbang phyug legs par sbyor//
29b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod de bzhin bsam gtan te// khro med sbubs su kun tu spyod// 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin// sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi// sgrub pa pos ni rtag shes bya// rgyud
29b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad thung song ste/ / rgyu med par ni gzhom mi bya// dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi// mig dang lag pas ma yin no// gsang ba 'ong ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad pa/
29b4(rgyud 'bum): sbaspabar bya// blo ldan mthe'u chung bstod par ni// pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas// dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste// sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas// mnyam byed rnam par dag
29b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// /
29b6(rgyud 'bum): de.aM dpa' ze 'i spyad bdul zhugs// rnal 'byor ma kun rab sgrub pa// mtshan nyid dbye ba shes byas nas// dngos grub sbyar du 'jug byed ni// grong dang grong du song nas/
29b7(rgyud 'bum): mo 'i gzugs ni mtshon par bya// lo nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing // dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin// de bzhin pa nya logs 'grogs pas// sgrub pa po mes dngos grub
30a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ / bzlas brjod pasam gtan mchod med par// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgyas sgrub pa po// mchod pa nyid la
30a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jug/ 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de// de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yis// pho nya'i lam la dga' rnams kyi// sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson//
30a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// tsA ru rtag tu bza' bar bya// sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// rigs rnams kun la spyad par bya// bza' min par ni mi
30a4(rgyud 'bum): brtag go/ / de nyid dbyer med de yis ni// pho nya mo ni gnyis bsgrub bya// dngos grub cho ga la spyad tshe// pho nya gcig pu kho na yin// rang dga' nyid dang dngos grub ni//
30a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa dag dang nye ba ste// bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i// dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan// pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad// phyag rgyar legs sbyor ngang tshul
30a6(rgyud 'bum): can/ / legs rdzogs ye shes rgyu skyes pa'o// nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid// lus la thams cad byas nas ni// yan lag las 'das mtshon cha rnams//
30a7(rgyud 'bum): lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad// lus ni dag byed byas nas su// rtag tu sngags ni brjod nas su// rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing // mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom
30b1(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / dam tshig can la khro mi byed// mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya// de dang lhan cig bde bar bya// grol ba'i don dang bde don du// dam tshig spyod pa nyid du
30b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rnam 'phrul sems pa las grol min// mtshan mor rtag par gtsor bu ste// gnag dang dmar bar rtag tu 'gyur// srog chags yan lag na bzar gyon// bde
30b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod pas bde bstod bya/ / mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs la// gtsang sna shrI he ru kar gnas// phrag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pa po yi dngos grub bcom
30b4(rgyud 'bum): mgul rgyan gdu bu rna rgyan dang / / spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang // dus kun tu ni rnam par gnas// mtshan mo rtag par gsal bya zhing //
30b5(rgyud 'bum): nyin par gsang ba nyid du bya// dbye ba'i ye shes shin tu sbas// rab tu zhi zhing dal ba thul// gtsang sbra gsum du shes bya zhing // rang gi rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas//
30b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang rigs min ngor mi blta// spyi gtsug la sogs bcing ba spangs// pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin// gnyis pa zhi ba yin par 'dod// zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid//
30b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag pa ru// gtsang sbra 'di dag rtag tu bsrung // gtsang ma dag pa'i rim thob na// dngos grub gang las 'gyu
31a1(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang // de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs// gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad// de bzhin
31a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal mchog dang bo dang / / rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud du ni// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs grub ster// de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni// sngags pas skad cig gis 'grub
31a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor lam la dga' rnams kyi// 'di ni gtsang sbra'i spyod par bshad// gtsang sbra'i bsod nams gang gyur pa// smra bar nus par 'os ma yin// sgrub po'i yon tan
31a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen po/ / kha cig gis ni smra ba 'am// gdong gcig gcig gis brjod de ci// stong phrag brgya yi gdong gyur min// he ru ka dpal ye shes che// rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid
31a5(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / sgrub pa po yi bde ba'i chu// gnyis med gnyis su med pa nyid// gnyis med sbyor bas reg pa ni// dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa// reg pa dang ni smra bas kyang //
31a6(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// lus dag pa las skyon med pa'i// mi mchog kun nas spyod byed pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dngos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob bo//
31a7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs skye zhing // chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas// gus pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin//
31b1(rgyud 'bum): 'ad las la rnal 'byor pas// cho ga ji bzhin sbyin par bya// mar gyi ngo la chos bcu dang // zla ba yang ngo'ang gang gyur la// b+hur du 'bad pas mchod bya ste// rdo rje lag
31b2(rgyud 'bum): po myos byed sha rnams kyis/ / skye bo gus pas de rnams mchod byas pas// he ru ka dpal mngon dgar gyur pa la// gang phyir de rnams lag na mchog gi rnams// mgu ba'i thugs
31b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchog ni stsol 'gyur te/ / de rnams lag gnas mchog gi bya// mtshan mo brtul zhugs can gtor ma// skra grol gcer bur gyur pas sbyin// shrI he ru ka'i bdag nyid du//
