31b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor des ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las spyod pa dang brtul zhugs la mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//
31b5(rgyud 'bum): gang yang legs mchod rnam dag dngos// mya ngan 'das 'byung dpa' bo ste// bdag nyid mchod pa de yis ni// sangs rgyas sogs kun mchod pa yin// dpa' bo kun dang rnal
31b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / brtan pa sngon 'gro'i g.yo ba ste// zhi ba'i 'dus pas legs gnas pa'i// spun dang dpa' bo mchod par bya// spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu// bde dang sdug
31b7(rgyud 'bum): bsngal kun 'byung bya/ / sngags dang phyag rgya nyid dag dang // ye shes der ni bstan mi bya// dge byed zas la bza' bar bya// rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas nas// gsang sngags
32a1(rgyud 'bum): su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ / man ngag nyams par sbyin mi bya// dam tshig gnas la don ji bzhin// man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya// pho nya ma gtogs
32a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la/ / 'dod la rmongs pas 'gro mi byed// pho nya la rtag zhen thar pa// 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya// skye gnas dman dang cig shos la'ang // bsnyen
32a3(rgyud 'bum): bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ / ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas// dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur// 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la// mchog la
32a4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig dgug par bya/ / de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin// 'jig rten la rtag g.yon nas spyod// rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor// lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur// g.yon
32a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi spyod pas rab mchod byed/ / g.yon pas 'khyud pa tsam dang ni// g.yon pa yis ni mchod cing za// brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs// sgrub pa po ni bya ba brtson//
32a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // gcig tu zas la spyod par byed// rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa// rigs bzhir rab tu brtag par bya// rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa//
32a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor grub pa rab tu mchod// ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang bya dag gis// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/
32b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin// shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa// nyes spyod bstan bcos kun rnams spangs// gnyis med rnal 'byor ye
32b2(rgyud 'bum): shes sems/ / rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni// las rnams kun la srung ba dang // bgegs med de bzhin de grub pa// 'dir ni 'gar yang 'grub ma yin// de yi pho nya ma
32b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog bzang / / lhan cig brtson par ldan pa yin// kun nas chags dga'i legs sbyor bas// rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid// bla ma'i man ngag la chags pa/
32b4(rgyud 'bum): de ni don nor sprin dang mtshungs// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi sbyin sreg dang / rigs gcig dang ldan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// /
32b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bstan pa ni// pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba// gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba// mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o// ming po dang ni pha dang yang // /
32b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong // lce sbom mig ni dmar ser lo// nub cing spu ni dmar ser yin// thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang // bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/
32b7(rgyud 'bum): dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan// pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas// mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster// rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos//
33a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// bdud kun rab tu zhi bar byed// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster// gsang
33a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin/ / sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson// phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags te// lus can rnams la 'grub
33a3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag/ mngon par brtson nas rtogs par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i// rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang // khyi yi skye gnas
33a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyar skyes te/ / sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur// dper na la la mar 'dod pas// 'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang // mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// lus nyon
33a5(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa kho nar zad / / 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni// 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor gzhan la brten pa yi// gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur// rnal
33a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor che mchog dpa' bo che/ / yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa// rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang // yul de yongs su brtags pa ste// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i
33a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyurgya/ / de rung ni rtag par gnas// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang // nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
33b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin tu rnyed dka'i dgos pa ste// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub sgrub byed pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong //
33b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyis ni nye bar byug/ dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing // mar me'i 'phreng ba yang dag dkrigs// spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bar//
33b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni// phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// de nas rdza rnga bcing bya ste// ri mo dgu pa yongs su zlum// zlum po'i ri mo dgu bya ste// yi ge
33b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi mo mnyam bris la/ / shin tu mnyam gzhag dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed du// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis//
33b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos// grangs de dag gi nang chud par// dge ba thub pas byas nas ni// re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed
33b6(rgyud 'bum): phyed pa yang dag blang / / nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re mig sum cu drug pa blang // gsum pa yi ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yi ni khyad par
33b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum cu gsum pa yang dag blangs// re mig bco lnga pa yir ldan// lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas//
34a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// dang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya// re mig bcu dgu pa gzung bya// me yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re mig gsum pas
34a2(rgyud 'bum): phye ba'o/ / ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re mig sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger gyur// slar yang tshig ni de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin//
34a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas rang byung blangs nas ni// re mig las ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor nA da thig ler sbyar// don kun sgrub ces bya ba yi// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re mig bcu dgu
34a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid la/ / nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum po dag dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te// re mig gi ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan//
34a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dong // de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu// de
34a6(rgyud 'bum): nas go rims bzlog pas gzung / / re mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang bcas// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi//
34a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad// re mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // ri mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yang // sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang // re mig bcu
34b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa yir ldan/ / re mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pas sgrub pos blang // re mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re mig nyi shu gsum pa la// re mig gnyis
34b2(rgyud 'bum): par yang dag ldan/ / steng du thig les rnam par brgyan// de nas sa bdag bzung byas la// brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dbye// yi ge hUM gis
34b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ru sbyar/ / 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya'i// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// oM ni kun la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rig rgyal
34b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags/ / 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bang mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// skad
34b5(rgyud 'bum): cig gis ni sku brgyad 'gyur/ / de yi dkyil 'khor srung don du// gdug pa thams cad khyad par gyis// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur//
34b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la sbyor bdag nyid kyis bzla// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM suM b+hA ni suM b+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-iha huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM An la
34b7(rgyud 'bum): hoHb+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rdza rnga bcing ba'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// de nas sha chen thams
35a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis/ / 'jigs byed rdo rje bskyed yin bshad// 'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do// 'di ltar khyi dang phag gi sha/
35a2(rgyud 'bum): zangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma yi// bya ba rnam dpyod med par bya// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // rgyal srid
35a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ / dung dang nya phyis mu tig gi/ rgyu mtshan gsum po 'byung ba yin// chos kyi sku yi lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng
35a4(rgyud 'bum): bcan/ / zla ba phyed pas rgyun du byas// rnam pa de ltar gyur pa nyid// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug yin par bshad// brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag/ sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis/
35a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te// brda rnams kyi ni rab 'jug pa'o// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dang // 'gro kun g.yon las 'byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' bla mar bzhugs//
35a6(rgyud 'bum): lcug mar de bzhin rnam snang mdzad// cho ga'i rnam pa de lta bur// gtso bor pad+ma gar mdzad de// brtan par dngos grub thams cad ni// rab stsol ba yi dpa' bo bzhugs// mthe'u
35a7(rgyud 'bum): chung la ni mkha' snying po/ / mi zang sku dang ldan pa nyid// sen mo'i ngos ni rta mgrin gyi// gnas su gyur par bshad pa yin// 'di dag thams cad dpa' bo ni// g.yon pa las byung
35b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yin no/ / lag mthil shrI he ru ka yi// phag mo'i 'dus pa dga' byed yin// rgyab tu shin tu nges byas nas// brda nyid lnga po bstan par bya// 'di dag lag tu dgod pa
35b2(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin/ / rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis// dpa' bo dam pa mchod par bya// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru brjod//
35b3(rgyud 'bum): memi ni gos dkar mor bshad de// rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu brjod// tsum+bi ka ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus su dpa' bo kun gyi gnas// mkhas pas
35b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyachub tu gshegs su gsol/ / gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda bya dpa' bo rnams// gcig tu zas la brtsam par bya// dpa'
35b5(rgyud 'bum): bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bza' ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma'i bya ba la lag
35b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// dngos
35b7(rgyud 'bum): grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o/ / phyugs rnams kyi ni dgug pa nyid// sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa 'dis// phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin lnga// bong bu rus sbal mi rnga mo//
36a1(rgyud 'bum): ce spyang rta la sogs rnams kyis// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag/ rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog
36a2(rgyud 'bum): phyugs/ / rkang bzhi rnams las glang por brjod// 'dab chags rnams las ngang pa nyid// dud 'gro rnams las rus sbal rgyal// lha rnams las ni mchu g.yo ba// rnam
36a3(rgyud 'bum): pa de ltar brjod pa ste/ / dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs de dag ni rnam par bshad// khwa dang chu skyar ce spyang dang // skye gnyis blon po chen po dang // khrung
36a4(rgyud 'bum): khrung bzhad dang ka dam pa/ / bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor bya bas// 'dod pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// khyi nag po yi 'o thug ni// ma sha'i 'bras ni nag por ldan//
36a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas dgos pa med pa ru// ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar// ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bya// de nas yi dgas langs nas ni// sgrub po de la 'dri byed de// ci bgyi
36a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni sgra 'gyur zhing / / sa 'og las sam ral gri'am// tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dag dang // ril bu mig sman gter rnams sam// rkang mgyogs dag gam
36a7(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyis len/ / dngos 'di de bzhin gcig byin nas// 'gro bar 'gyur gyis gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin// ba lang
36b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang lding ba nyid/ / lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya// yang na rus sbal dag gi'o// 'di de dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing // phyag bzhi pa dang
36b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal bzhi pa/ / ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// sku ni dkar po'i khro bo che// de nas drag shul gzugs 'chang ba// rdo rje phag mo la gzigs pa// de yi sku mdog mtshon
36b3(rgyud 'bum): cha 'chang / / dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sku la thal bas nye bar byugs// ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// phyag rgya yis ni sku la brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad
36b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs/ / yi dgas chen po gdan du byas// sgrub pa po yis dus rtag tu// sngags de shes nas bsgom par bya// de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags pas// 'dod pa yi ni dngos
36b5(rgyud 'bum): grub 'gyur/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges por brjod pa las/ dud 'gro'i phyugs dang ro langs sgrub pa dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
36b6(rgyud 'bum): nas sgrub po'i mchog kun ni// sbyor ba kun la med pa'o// bza' dang bca' dang nya sha sogs// nus pa ji bzhin bya ba ste// med par gyur kyang bza' ba dang /
36b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga po nyid du bya ba yin// bza' dang bca' ba rgya che ba// rtag tu mtshan mo nyid du bya// de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing // khyad par du ni sgrub pa po// rang gi pang du mgo gzhag la/
37a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo gnyis med rab tu mchod// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo 'am yang na chung ma gnyen// rnam pa 'di lta'i cho ga yis// bcings pa las
37a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rab grol bya/ / de nas sngags ni grub 'gyur te// ji srid 'byung ba yod par du'o// slob dpon lus su legs gnas te// sgrub pa po las mchod pa len// dpa' bo rnams
37a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi stan dag dang / / phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med// sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// glu dang gar la sogs pa bya// ji srid lus can thams cad kyang // rnal 'byor ye shes
37a4(rgyud 'bum): zhen ma gyur/ / de srid 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yengs 'gyur// dngos po kun gyis sgrub pa pos// de nas phyag rgya mchod par bya// mchod pas
37a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par 'dod pa ste/ / brnyas pa yis ni nges par bsreg/ phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub// rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams kyis// rab tu 'bad pos mchod par bya// dngos po kun
37a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnal 'byor pa/ / phyi nas dpa' bo rnams kyis ni// dpa' bo nyid la spyad par bya// de ltar mchod byas de nas ni// sa 'og sgrub po langs pa dang // zhi bo nyid dang rgyas pa dang //
37a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang dgug pa dag dang ni// gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang // rmugs dang rengs pa de bzhin te// dbye ba nyid dang tshar gcod dang // las kyi dngos grub mchod par bya// gang
37b1(rgyud 'bum): ci'ang rung ba'i las gyur la/ / nyon mi mongs par 'grub 'gyur te// the tshom med par sgrub pa po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
37b2(rgyud 'bum): las gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i// 'khor lo zhes pa'i cho ga rgyas// las
37b3(rgyud 'bum): gang ci yang de myur bar/ / sgrub pa po ni the tshom med// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar// smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya// a ba d+hU tI'i
37b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas de bzhin/ / dpa' bo'i 'chol bar byas chags par// bza' ba yang ni de nas sreg/ gau mangs dang ru d+hi ra// 'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag bya// de nas 'bar ba'i byin
37b5(rgyud 'bum): zal/ / sreg blugs dgu ni sbyin par bya// 'bar 'phreng rgya mtsho blta bar bya// kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo nyid// dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i
37b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas de bzhin/ / 'dab la pho nya mo bzhi yin// dpa' bo kun dang gnyis med bde// cho ga ji bzhin rnam pa yis// khaN+Da ro he phyi rol sbyin// rang gi gzugs su rnam
37b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa/ / 'khor lo'i dbus su blta bar bya// 'khor lo 'di dag gsal bar ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bya// rig pa'i rgya mtsho'i las de bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni
38a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / po nya gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las pho nya mo'i sbyin sreg dang 'gug
38a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas las kyi rab mchog ni// ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste// mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/
38a3(rgyud 'bum): las ni so sor sbyar bar bya// gang dag rab grub byed pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad// kha dog pho nya sogs sngags gang // mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su
38a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor/ / phan tshun mdud rgyus dpa' bo ni// yul nyid kyis ni phye ba'o// sa bon 'phreng bas de nas gzung // hUM ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin// bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur pa
38a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o// kha sbyor sbyar bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin bung ba ltar 'khor bya// lcags
38a6(rgyud 'bum): kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang / / gtun shing gis bskyod de bzhin te// rdo rje nyid kyis 'debs par bshad// dbugs la mdas ni sbyar bya ste// dus min 'chi ba bslu ba la//
38a7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag kha T+wAM dag dang sbar// thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni// zhal du mtshon cha nges par sbyar// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las gnyis su med pa'i las dang dus ma yin
38b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'chi ba ba slu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / // de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang // sngags kyi dgod par rab tu grags// myur du dngos grub byed par ni//
38b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med// mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa// snying po rnams kyis de bzhin du// sngags pa mkha' 'gro ma la sbyar//
38b3(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan mkha' 'gro ma bsrub bya// gang yang phyag rgya gnon pa zas// las dang mtshon cha dag gi mthu// de bzhin sngags pas snying pos dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor ma sbyar bya//
38b4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i lus ni rang 'dod pa// dpa' bo mchod pa rnams byas nas// las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pa ni// phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar// tshar
38b5(rgyud 'bum): gcod pan 'dogs don rnams la/ / las kyi dngos por rnam par bsgom// de nyid dbye bar phye nas ni// rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya// rab tu sgrub pas sbyor don la// phyi rol
38b6(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin nang de bzhin/ / 'di yis myur du lha dang ni// lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum
38b7(rgyud 'bum): cu drug pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gzugs ni gnon pa'i cho ga ste// phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu
39a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ bza' ba zos mid de nas ni// bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya// mtshan mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang // bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar//
39a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gro bar the tshom med// ser skya'i mar ni 'thungs nas su// bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya// de yis rang gi gdong bskus na/
39a3(rgyud 'bum): gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa// mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// til mar sa lu btags pa dang // ldan pas lus ni bskus gyur cing // snum khur sngags pas byas
39a4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / bza' ba la ni rab tu sbyar// gal te las 'di ma btang na// ji srid 'tsho bar rtag dbang 'gyur// til nag dag ni zos nas su// ske tshe bcas pas skyugs pa
39a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ru rta bshang ba dang ldan pa// las skyes lto ba'i srin bu ni// rang gi khrag dang btags nas ni// rang gi khu ba nyid dang sbyar// bza' btung mig sman gos la ni//
39a6(rgyud 'bum): byug pa nyid du rab tu sbyar// 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// ba lang sha sreg sbyin sreg ni// khrag gis bskus na lha rnams ni// de mod
39a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ba 'am/ / gal te ma 'ongs 'chi bar 'gyur// bdag nyid de yi mdun du ni// bsgoms nas mkhas pas sbyin sreg bya// sbyin sreg mthar ni gtor ma bya// khams
39b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum skad cig gis 'gugs pa/ / mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i// dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtag tu rang
39b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags sbas pa yis/ / rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya// sbas don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing // skal ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos
39b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / nga mnyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//
39b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas brda ni mkha' 'gro ma'i// lus kyi mtshan nyid gang yin dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag dbye ba ni// grub par 'gyur ba de 'grub 'gyur// dpa' bo'i dbang
39b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug mi bri zhing / / rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya// gang gi thad du'ang mi gdon te// g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi// sngags
39b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams bag med pas 'don na/ / de la nga ni mi blta ste// mkha' 'gro stong phrag du ma yis// ngan pa'i bdag nyid can de za// dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod de//
39b7(rgyud 'bum): bram ze gsod par the tshom med// sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// bslus gyur ngan pa'i bdag nyid de// mkha' 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang // de la ngo ni skyob mi byed//
40a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba pa yi nang na ni// sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra// bla ma dam tshig la 'khu ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung // he ru ka dpal ba la
40a2(rgyud 'bum): dka'i rgyud/ / gang zhig srung bar byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge gdong zhes// de la nga ni rjes su 'dzin// bla ma sa ni bsnyen bkur byed// gsong por smra ba'i
40a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po/ / mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba// de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur// khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/
40a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug/ yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par gyur// he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin//
40a5(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon dpa' bo mthong gyur na// mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'// sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis// dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ lan bdun dun
40a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / rab bsngags hUM la sogs pas phye// de rnams 'bad de phyag byas na// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad mchod// rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang // rol
40a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ldan po 'i chos med/ / de yi thugs kar gnas phag mo// ngadang dpa' bo rnal 'byor sa/ pog rnams dang lhan cig bcas// de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin// 'bab chu'i 'gram dang rgya mtsho dang // ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang // lteng ka dang ni khron pa mtshe'u// khang stong dang ni lam sra
40b2(rgyud 'bum): dag/ thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu zhen par lnga la gnas// 'jigs pa chen po drur khrod du// mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang // ro langs kyang ni dum
40b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos// de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che// ci bde bar ni rol bar mdzad// ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba dang // rnal
40b4(rgyud 'bum): byo sa dang gas bya'o/ / phyogs ni da gaH/ lhung po yongs nga // ya gA'i rim par ba pa las rnal 'byo ma'i sgrub pa'i sang ngags
40b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che// sngags ni rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod// de nas 'di la yang
40b6(rgyud 'bum): dag mthong / / gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po// mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa// dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni// skrag
40b7(rgyud 'bum): cing rnam par 'byer bar byed/ / gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// rang gi gnas su khyer nas su// mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag dang //
41a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mngon par ci byed de// bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur// ce ru ka dpal gus 'dod pas// ma gal 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// sgrub pa
41a2(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags lus can/ / 'khor bar 'chi dang rga ba med// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las blta ba dang ha ha ra dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o//
41a3(rgyud 'bum): / da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// gang gis sa steng dbang du 'gyur// dpa' bo'i sngags kyis zla ba yis// rnal 'byor cho gar gnas pas 'grub// sgron ma myos byed bcas pa
41a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / nya yi sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du// nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa po'i// mtshan mo'i sbyin sreg bye ba la gzhol// dngos grub rgya chen
41a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol bar 'gyur/ / brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis// thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na// rgyal po dpung dang bcas par ni// nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// phyed kyis
41a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo'i blon po ste/ / de yi phyed kyis blon po yi// rdul phran sogs la sum cu gnyis// sreg pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya// nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni// nyi ma bdun gyis
41a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya/ / de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun// sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la// dmangs rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum// tha ma la ni sbyin sreg gcig/ de ltar dpa'
41b1(rgyud 'bum): bos rigs rim gyis/ / zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad// sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pos// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// dpa' bos cho ga snga ma yis// 'dad
41b2(rgyud 'bum): pas bsten na thob par 'gyur/ / sa steng 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin// dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon
41b3(rgyud 'bum): mi za/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rigs lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// de nas las kyi mchog rab
41b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / gang gis shes nas sgrub pa pos// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang // rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang // rmongs dang de bzhin
41b5(rgyud 'bum): phur bus gdab/ / tshig 'phrog lkugs par 'gyur ba dang // 'on dang de bzhin long ba dang // ma ning nyid du bya ba dang // gzugs ni yongs su sgyur ba ste// las chen bcu
41b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis 'di dag ni/ / rtag tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrub// dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni// dran pas 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// thams cad bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha'
41b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ / ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// de rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad/
42a1(rgyud 'bum): ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang // sin+d+hu'i yul dang grong khyer dbang // gser gyi gling dang so rany+dza// de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni// yi dgas grong dang kha ba
42a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / kAny+tsi'am laM pa ka yi yul// ka ling ka dang ko sa la// tri sha ku ne o te dang // kA ma rU pa mA le wa// lha mo'i mkhar dang rA mi'i dbang // go dA wa ri ar+tha
42a3(rgyud 'bum): dadar/ / oMr+yan dzA lan+d+ha ra dang // pul+lI ra ma la ya sogs// yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang // dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te//
42a4(rgyud 'bum): yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin// rnal 'byor ma drug ku lu tar/ mya ngam yul nam mo rnams// sin+d+hu'i yul na lA ma ste// rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar// lam+ba ka dang saM
42a5(rgyud 'bum): rany+dzar/ / rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin no// yi dgas grong du nag chen mo// mkha' 'gro rU pi kA ru btsa sa// kha ba'i ri dang kAT+Tir ni// byi bcas ma ru bshad pa ste// pany+tsal
42a6(rgyud 'bum): yi yul dag na/ / khyim gyi lha mo ka ling kar// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no// ko sa lar ni sha za ba// yi dgas grong du de bzhin du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbom
42a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug/ tri sha ku ner dum skyes ma// pu l+lI ra ma la yi de bzhin// gser rir sle sha can rigs skyes// bud med stong phrag nyi shu gcig/ lhag ma gzhan dag ji snyed pa//
42b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni// 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma yin no// he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che// de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis// rgyu dang mi
42b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ / 'gro ba kun ni 'di yis khyab// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig 'di// sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te// bsam gtan la sogs gang ci'ang rung // sa
42b3(rgyud 'bum): stong na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o/ / g.yon gyi spyod pa gcer bu yis// mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam bzhag pas// skyes pa'am gal te g.yon pa kun// rnal 'byor ma kun dpa'
42b4(rgyud 'bum): po 'gro/ / phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// rang byung rtag tu mchod na ni// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rab 'jug/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par
42b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa las yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / / de nas dpa' bo me tog chu// 'thungs nas sngags 'di
42b6(rgyud 'bum): rjes dran bya/ / rtag tu 'di ltar bya ba nyid// phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos// mtshan mo rtag tu sha bza' ba// sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngags// myur du
42b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thob par 'gyur/ / 'thungs dang de bzhin byin pa dang // reg nas bzhag na gtso mo che// bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang // thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgya yis//
43a1(rgyud 'bum): balbu ba'i bsnyems pa grags ldan pa// sa tshan mo 'du banan tan man// 'dis ni bsha pa dag tuH// gzugs dpa las sogs ba kA /
43a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyon// rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung // dad pas de yi spu yang ldang // rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed// de bzhin gcer bur mchod pa ste// 'dod pa
43a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug thams cad kyi/ / phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid// dbugs 'byin skul dang dgod pa dang // sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas// sna tshogs dbang phyug mdun
43a4(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya// ha ha he he rnam brgyad bzhad// sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'// hA hA zhes bya 'di nye bar// rtag tu mchi mi 'byung ba
43a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing // bsam gtan gyi sngags legs par sbyor// gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni// spu ldang ba dang lhan cig bde// rdo rje 'gom par
43a6(rgyud 'bum): me bya ba/ / g.yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
43a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / de nas spyan ras gzigs bshad de// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med ma// gnas kyi dbye ba cho ga shes// sgom la rtag tu mngon dga'
43b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / lam gyi bzhi mdo' ma khyim dag gas// dpa' bo'i gnas dang ri bor ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig gnas// ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur// phyag
43b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi/ / lag pas go 'phang dam pa ste// gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa'am gzhan// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin skra grol gtsor gyur
43b3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan// phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis// lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang // ma

43b5(rgyud 'bum): khyad par la gnas dang / / mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag gi/ gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur// ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang // ngag gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur//

44a1(rgyud 'bum): yul phyogs 'di dag tu/ / sgrub pa po ni rtag tu gnas// yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can// shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas// myur du lhung ba
44a2(rgyud 'bum): mi phyed par/ / sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min// bdag gi lus la rnam bkod de// sa la ku sha'i stan du nyal// yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad
44a3(rgyud 'bum): mo nyid du bzlas/ / rmi lam du ni bya ba kun// yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur// dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams// bya ba kun tu gang 'gyur dang // rnam pa sna tshogs

44a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis te/ / nyi ma'i dbus su bsams nus ni// stong gi bar du bzlas par bya// shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni// nad kyis gdungs la bstan par bya// mthong btsam gyi

44b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'khor lo nyid/ / yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang // nad rnams kun la dgod par bya// rims dang gdon sogs brjed byed dang // gzer sogs kun dang mdze

49b1(rgyud 'bum): la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro/ / slar gso ba gcig ni mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal

50a1(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang gi sprul srad bu byas la mngon par bzlas te mgul du btags na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / bkrol na thar par 'gyur ro// 'bras
50a2(rgyud 'bum): so ba la bzlas la nor gyi bdag po chen po'i khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bsgyur na mtshan mo bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges
50a3(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya

50a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid yin par grags/ / sa 'og yang na mtho ris sam// de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang // las ni gang dag yod pa dag/ sngags kyis de dag thams cad sgrub/
