50b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis// ri bo bzang po bri bya zhing // de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro he rnal 'byor ma// dpa'
50b4(rgyud 'bum): po rnams kyi dpa' bo nyid/ / ha ha he he zhes bya ba// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad//
50b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin pad+ma gar dbang dang // shrI he ru ka nyid dang ni// mkha' snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid// rin chen rdo rje stobs po che// mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang /
50b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang // rdo rje hUM mdzad dpa' chen po// de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can// myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'od ni nyid dag dang // 'od dpag med
50b7(rgyud 'bum): dang lha yi dgra/ / de bzhin mche ba rnam gtsigs dang // keng rus keng rus chen po dang // thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// 'gro ba
51a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad khyab/ / dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs// bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos// 'khor
51a2(rgyud 'bum): lor bzhugs par blta bar bya/ / grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu sgom// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i
51a3(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog brjod/ / 'khor lo chen po grub kun gnas// de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang // dpa' bo bye bas legs par gsungs//
51a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yi// 'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro nyid// gzugs can ma dang dum skyes ma// de bzhin lA ma la sogs ni//
51a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
51a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji bzhin cho gas phyugs bsgrub bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur
51a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las// rim bzhin du ni phyugs gzugs bya// mi dang rus sbal rnga mo dang // bong bu spyang ki rta la sogs// de ltar sna tshogs phag dag
51b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang // 'di rnams las ni bshad par bya// skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis// gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga nyid
51b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / skye ba drug dang bdun gyur pa// phyugs rnams su ni gdon mi za// gang gi kha yi dri zhim zhing // mig mi 'dzums par rnam par blta// bden par smra zhing mthong na
51b3(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ / rtag tu dam chos dgar 'gyur zhing // rang gi skye ba shes pa dang // lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim// mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan par ni// skye ba bdun du 'byung ba
51b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsnams pa'am reg pa tsam gyis kyang // gang zhig thig le byed pa de// mod la 'grub par
51b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba ste/ / 'di ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur// de yi snying ka'i ro tsa na// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas su// de yi thig le//
51b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin// sems can gang dang gang gi ni// gzugs su byed par 'dod pa na// de dang de yi gzugs su ni// thig les 'gyur bar the tshom med// mkhas pas
51b7(rgyud 'bum): shing lo khu ba ni/ / ro tsa nar bcas blangs nas su// dpral bar thig le byas na ni// de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med// phyugs nyid kyi ni ba spu yis// lag pa
52a1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor bcing bar bya/ / de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing // de yi spu dang rnam bsres la// lag pa spyi bor bcings na ni// de yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med// rnal 'byor la ni goms
52a2(rgyud 'bum): shing zlos/ / mi rnams nus pa ldan yon yang // dka' zhing nyon mongs la dga' ba// dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin// glang po rnga dang bong bu dang // rus sbal rnga
52a3(rgyud 'bum): mo phag dang wa/ / khwa dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang // khrung khrung khra dang sa ra la// gzugs bzang ba dang gzugs ngan dang // lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// rnal
52a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs/ / skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di bas shin tu mchog grub pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par
52a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa las skye ba bdun pa bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs su brje ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / / de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni// nges par dbang du
52a6(rgyud 'bum): byed 'gyur ba/ / yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad// gau mangs ni myos byed bsre// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// sangs rgyas
52a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi dbang 'gyur na/ / phran tshegs mi ni smos ci dgos// kha chu so shing dag dang ni// de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa// myos byed ming dang bcas pa yis// khams
52b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum dag ni dbang du 'gyur/ / zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni// zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang // mi yi skra dang ldan pa yis// mong la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin//
52b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am// mkhas pas rang skras sbyin sreg bya// nim pa'i shing la rab sbar na// mod la dbye bar 'gyur ba yin// mnyam par bzhag pas d+ha dur
52b3(rgyud 'bum): me/ nyungs mar tshan der bsgres pa yi// bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg bya// 'phral du 'chi ba'am skrod par 'gyur// nyal dang ma nyal 'dug pa 'am// zas dang
52b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba sogs la yang / / mkhas pas rtag tu zlos byed na// de la bgegs ni yod ma yin// wa yi sha yis sreg blugs brgyas// yang dag sreg blugs byed pa'i mi//
52b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni zla ba gsum rjes la// rigs kyi dbul ba 'jig par 'gyur// sha chen dag gis gang la zhig/ myos byed ldan pas sbyin sreg byed// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni//
52b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed// ma lus sa rnams spyod pa dang // zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur// tshim 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma de la// rgyal srid ster bar gdon mi
52b7(rgyud 'bum): zo/ lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni// thun gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas// rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur// gau mA yu ba'i
53a1(rgyud 'bum): sha chang gis/ / phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya// myur du de yi lag tu 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug/ sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan
53a2(rgyud 'bum): mo bzlas/ / yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed// de ltar nyin re byas na ni// rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur// 'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni// 'jig rten
53a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum na yod ma yin/ / rnal 'byor chen po rang dgas 'chi// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol// bil ba de bzhin pa la sha/ u dum+ba ra nyid dag ni// sbyin
53a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg 'bum pas myur du ni/ / nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur// gau mangs dang myos byed bsre// rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes
53a5(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur// gau mA yu ni bsreg byas pas// ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur// gau mA yu yi sbyin sreg gis// myur du nor pa dag
53a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par 'gyur/ / brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang // bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// lhag pa'i tshe dang kut+sarbANAM/ mung ga mA sha tsa na~M ka/ spa
53a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs ma se tshe dang / / khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs// kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin// ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang du dga' ba der gnas so//
53b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sa dang gnas// he ru ka dpal yan lag nyid// thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu
53b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i sa/ / de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// tshan+do ha ni mngon 'gyur nyid// nye ba'i tshan+de sbyang
53b3(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba/ / 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shrI he ru ka gzhung
53b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i/ / 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa// pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad// mtho ris sa stang sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag
53b5(rgyud 'bum): brtan g.yo'i bdag/ pu ril la sogs gang bstan pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtse//
53b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // thams cad du ni spun zhal dbu// kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos
53b7(rgyud 'bum): grub bsgrub bya ba/ / bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
54a1(rgyud 'bum): las dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u sde lnga bcu pa'o/ / de nas de yi rab bshad bya// man+da
54a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ / dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yis rgyud du smras pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li
54a3(rgyud 'bum): kA li zhes brjod pa/ / rgyu la sogs stong mngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa// bdud ni tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag
54a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba/ / go cha chen pos yang dag srung // sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin//
54a5(rgyud 'bum): mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob cing // skye dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos
54a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'gyur/ / ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi// mtshan nyid thams cad dman pa ste// gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa// sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ dper na mar
54a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis gang ba'i snod/ / me yi dbus su bzhag na ni// mar gsar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing // snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin shI he ru ka ya~M// mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig
54b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing kha ton bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba 'thob
54b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ / khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma// lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan pa dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra
54b3(rgyud 'bum): ni sna tshogs dang / / sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rdog 'di// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma//
54b4(rgyud 'bum): sa steng na ni rnyed par dka'// dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen// gang zhig shes nas ma dad pa// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
54b5(rgyud 'bum): mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang // rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // do shal mgo yi 'phreng ba dang // ska rags sil sil sgra sgrog pa// ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi//
54b6(rgyud 'bum): lte bar A li kA li skyes// dkar mo bdag po rnams gnon cing // rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang /
54b7(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas dbus su sbyor ldan pa// thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med
55a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod pa sna tshogs sngon mdzad de// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba
55a2(rgyud 'bum): thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin/ / zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la// gal te mos par ma gyur kyang // slong pa dag tu mi bya ste// chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya// gang
55a3(rgyud 'bum): gis 'dir bdag yul min pa/ / gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni// bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams
55a4(rgyud 'bum): ni byung gyur tam/ / ma byung na yang rnam kun tu// bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// de ltar rnam par gzhal nas kyang //
55a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad// de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing // sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor gsang tha'i dbye ba nyid//
55a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams// de dang de la dga' ba bzhin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rmad du byung
55a7(rgyud 'bum): ba po mtshar dang bcas pa byed pa bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po bklags pas grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa bla ma yin no/ /
55b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar paN chen pad+ma ka ra dang // grags
55b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i/ / rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yis// mkhas pa pad+ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur//
55b3(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing // dri med dka' don 'thang pa dang bcas par// rtog pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni// sgra bsgyur dge slong pra dzA kIrti dang /
55b4(rgyud 'bum): mar pa sgra bsgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis// mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro pa'i phyag dpe dang gtugs pa'o// /
55b5(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ a b+hi d+ha na ut+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo//
55b6(rgyud 'bum): srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni byed// chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan rdo rje
55b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ni/ / sku gsum ye shes lnga yi dngos// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs// 'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//
56a1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rtog pa'i bcings pa bcad// 'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/ de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
56a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan
56a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
56a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor
56a5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs par rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ de la bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// thal mo sbyar ba btud
56a6(rgyud 'bum): pal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nas gsang ba bshad byas pa// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas pa min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed
56a7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / bla ma las kyang bla sa ni// mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid dag tu
56b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / mkha' 'gro sgyum sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni ranga'abyung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin// thog
56b2(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di/ / b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs skyes gnas// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka'
56b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ bsrubs dang bsrubs par yang dag sbyor// gang la de la ji ltar bzhin// rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu nyes
56b4(rgyud 'bum): bral zhi ba ste/ / nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// spro dang sdud par byed pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster// bzlas dang bsam
56b5(rgyud 'bum): gtan ldan pa dang / / sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi// de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang // dri yi
56b6(rgyud 'bum): chu dang bcas pa dag/ mkhas pas ril bur byas nas ni// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod// 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub//
56b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung // dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur// rang rdzas thig le'i sangs
57a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / / byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
57a2(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed//
57a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang ba sdus pa bstan pa
57a4(rgyud 'bum): ste le'u dang po'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
57a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po la 'di lta 'o/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo
57a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'du byed ngo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang
57b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo
57b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po
57b3(rgyud 'bum): me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
57b4(rgyud 'bum): pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu
57b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam
57b6(rgyud 'bum): par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang
57b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo
58a1(rgyud 'bum): rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang /
58a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha' snying po dang / dpa' bo
58a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa'
58a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
58a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba
58a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang /
58a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma ched mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma tshan mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal
58b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma
58b2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen po
58b3(rgyud 'bum): gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma zhes
58b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u zung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang /
58b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal
58b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo
58b7(rgyud 'bum): rta rnam zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma
59a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen po 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen me
59a2(rgyud 'bum): rab dpal mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor mtshon mo 'khor lo sgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus
59a3(rgyud 'bum): chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hUM dang phaT gyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang
59a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud pa dang / tsum+ba nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas zhus te/ dpa' bo'i mi mchog
59a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no/ / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol
59a6(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa 'byung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug
59a7(rgyud 'bum): gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje sreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje bo
59b1(rgyud 'bum): mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis nam
59b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal he ru ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
59b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag byung //
59b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje
59b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
59b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu dgod
59b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ srung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo // rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/
60a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo la mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ga
60a2(rgyud 'bum): byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsaN+Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis
60a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gis mchod pa byas
60a4(rgyud 'bum): nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gi spyi bos gtugs so// de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang
60a5(rgyud 'bum): gi ba spu'i bu go nas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs
60a6(rgyud 'bum): pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir
60a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsung ba/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / dbang chen gyi
60b1(rgyud 'bum): steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po
60b2(rgyud 'bum): phyubyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brngan par bzhugs so//
60b3(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshar dang
60b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srang bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
60b5(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang
60b6(rgyud 'bum): ro langs dang / ro dang / re sreg pa dang / khyi dang / ce spyang dang / ce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra 'phreng dang /
60b7(rgyud 'bum): a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang dge ba'i las kyis grol
61a1(rgyud 'bum): ba sems can thams cad la snying rje ros pan 'dogs pa rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.ya
61a2(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa'i thal mo sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus
61a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrog pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i
61a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba na/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs
61a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
61a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying khar zla ba bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul pa// bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni/
61a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdos// de ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa// snying po mchog ni legs par nyon/ bla ma yi yang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/
61b1(rgyud 'bum): sab+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+bad+harmAHsa zlab u0f7f/ yo shUn+ya tAnanas b+hA ba At+maHoM badz+ra shum+b+ha saH mabadz+ra u0f85ts+tshaH/ ma yog shud+d+haHsar+b+baHsa/ so ga tuShA/ oM d+has rba s
61b2(rgyud 'bum): arba d+harmAHdz+nyAn shud+d+hoha~M.oM sa mA ya shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHsa ma ye shud+d+hoha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga te shU n+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hri~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti bi shud+d+haHsarba d+ha mAdz+dza
61b3(rgyud 'bum): tudz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM sarba man+ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsarba man+ta shud+d+hohaM/ oM kro d+ha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkro d+ha shud+d+hoha~M/ oM tsit+pa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtsit+ta shud+d+hoha~M/ oM bA ka shud+d+haH
61b4(rgyud 'bum): sarba d+harmAHbA kaM shud+d+hoha~M/ oM kA ya shud+d+haHsarba d+him+b+haHkA ya shud+d+hoHoM dAn a mr-i ta shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHdA na a mr-i tA shud+d+hoHha~M/ oM nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+haH/ sarba d+harmAHnA mA sa ma ya shud+d+ha
61b5(rgyud 'bum): oM tsAr+ya na ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtsar+ya na ya shuSh+ToH/ au tri yau ga pa raM shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtri yo ga pa ri shud+d+hohaM/ oM a b+hi She ka shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa b+hi She ka shud+d+hiHha/ oM pU dza shud+d+haHsarba d+harma
61b6(rgyud 'bum): pU dza~M shudz+dza.oM sarba ta thA ga tA a dA ya~M pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma koha~M/ oM maN+Dal shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHmaN+Da la shud+d+hoha~M/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa dI pa ti shud+d+hoha~M/ oM b+hA
61b7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbI ra shud+d+hoha~M/ oM yo gI ni shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga ni shud+d+hoha/ oM ta pre shud+d+ha sarba d+ha rmAHta t+ya shud+d+hoha~M/ he mi Thi he tu a pa ga ta sarba d+harmAHhe tu a pa ga toH/ ru ma
62a1(rgyud 'bum): ti dru ka pa ya pag tus saHsa sgyu/ bam pa ga/ sa t+ya nA gtsatas tA.AHrmAHnAnaH/ oM ta ka sak+shar+dz+dza sa rmA.AHdz+nyAHtak+Sha ba
62a2(rgyud 'bum): oM sa b+hA ba shrad+d+ha sarba d+harmAHsa b+hA ba shud+d+hodz+dza/ oM dz+wa la sh+tsab+h+yas pa mA la sa ya hA sh+yed+d+he sar+b+ba d+har+dz+dza A hA shu / maT+Te/ ur+d+ha s+'usad+g+harmA/
62a3(rgyud 'bum): oM a sa mA hi ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa sa mA hi ta shud+d+hoH/ oM sau saM be dan shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsi saM be dan shud+d+ho.oM de Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmarmAHde Sha shu.oM mo he shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA
62a4(rgyud 'bum): / mo ha shud+d+ho.oM rA ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHrA ga shud+d+hoH/ oM mA na shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHmA na shud+d+hoHoM i ra shud+d+haHsarba d+ha hrIHi ra shud+d+hoHoM kha badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkhaM
62a5(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra shuSh+Ta.oM tri tsakra pa ri shrAm+b+ha sarbeHm+b+ha tr-iHkrA pA ri shud+d+ho.oMT+Ta kin+ti shrad+d+ha s+yArbad+har+m+mAHn+ta ki nI shwad+d+ho.oM ku la shud+d+ha sarbad+hamAHku la shud+d+ho.oM mAt+ma shred+d+ha/ mo ha shud+d+ho.oM rA ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHrA ga shud+d+hoH/ oM mA na shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHmA na shud+d+hoHoM i ra shud+d+haHsarba d+ha hrIHi ra shud+d+hoHoM kha badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkhaM
62a6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra shuSh+Ta.oM tri tsakra pa ri shrAm+b+ha sarbeHm+b+ha tr-iHkrA pA ri shud+d+ho.oMT+Ta kin+ti shrad+d+ha s+yArbad+har+m+mAHn+ta ki nI shwad+d+ho.oM ku la shud+d+ha sarbad+hamAHku la shud+d+ho.oM mAt+ma shred+d+ha/ oM bi tr-i shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpi tr-i shud+d+hehaM/ 'di ltar dzi nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// pu dza o a go ra de ma kA
62a7(rgyud 'bum): o tr-i ko ka laM ka hi pre gr-i so su na si ma ku sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te// shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu po de dag rnam par
62b1(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba// sum cu rtsa
62b2(rgyud 'bum): bdun rnam dag don/ / mngon mthong he ru ka las byung // mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis//
62b3(rgyud 'bum): dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig/
62b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan du slob ma spro ba dang // brtul dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang /
62b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan pa der ni lung bar 'gyur// glegs bam bshes min la sbyor ba// ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi// phol mig rims dang dug dang nang // mkha' 'gro gdor gyis gtses
62b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / mi bsrun rdeg dang 'chog dag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du/
62b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni// myung du sngags kyis dngos grub 'gyur// thams thams cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod chu kyi rim pa bzhin// lha yi rnal 'byor la sgra
63a1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spangs/
63a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing // drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan// mi bsrun snying rje med pa dang // brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang // smra zhing ngan la phrag dog
63a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin// puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug
63a4(rgyud 'bum): blang / / gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyun// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med//
63a5(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis long // phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas//
63a6(rgyud 'bum): zotho pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs// rtag tu ma hA mAM sa bza'// thams cad btung bas myos pa dang // ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang /
63a7(rgyud 'bum): pags pa chen po gos su gyon// rjes su 'thun pa'i bza' ba za// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang // grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang // gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na/
63b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing // rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshong dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes gti mug gis khyab
63b2(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i/ / gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya// ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje
63b3(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis rnam par rol/ / rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing // dri chen sha chen zas su bza'// myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi// dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i//
63b4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung
63b5(rgyud 'bum): gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i/ / gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na// bde la dga' ba'i dngos
63b6(rgyud 'bum): grub 'gyur/ / shes rab thabs kyis cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // skye ba
63b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ / g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no// sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed//
64a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma mi dngos grub dang // gnod sbyin klu yi bu ma dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs drib mo// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod// de nyid gas
64a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog gyur pa/ / A li kA li rtag tu sgrom// rang gi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/ dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor pa
64a3(rgyud 'bum): yis lag g.yon gyis/ / brda rnams la ni 'jug par byas// dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin// /
64a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid// mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas// srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la ni mi zad sku//
64a5(rgyud 'bum): sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthil pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges byas
64a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ badz+ra ni lnga po bstan par bya// sgrub pa po yis shes pa gyis// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad//
64a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags// 'o bad ma ni spong ba ste// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/
64b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams// de dang lhan cig bza' bas bza'// dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//
64b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang // pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid
64b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dang ni sgyu gzugs dag/ 'drin de bzhin dam tshig dang // sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis//
64b4(rgyud 'bum): gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzad pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs
64b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus// mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus// rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma
64b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du/ / slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs// gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa
64b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas// phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtogs// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang // rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang // mkha' 'gro
65a1(rgyud 'bum): ma yang de bzhin te/ / phyi rol ma po'i phyag rgya dag/ phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu
65a2(rgyud 'bum): bslabs/ / phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas// he ru ka dpal rigs las byung // dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yul gyi
65a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i khyad par dang / / slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgyu che ba// bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim// thams cad
65a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams rnam par shes/ / 'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang // mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te// bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag/ shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // phyi
65a5(rgyud 'bum): rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas/ / phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni// bza' ba thams cad bza'
65a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / yi ge brgya pas thams cad du// gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su// rang gi ming dang ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// rtag tu 'phreng
65a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags kyang bzla/ / don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang //
65b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po dang ni nye snying dang // gsang sngags btus pas rjes su bsrung // dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas// dpa' bo rnal
65b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma rnams bskyed/ / 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do// ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa
65b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no// 'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab// de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te// dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yis// sgom pa 'di
65b4(rgyud 'bum): ni mchog yin te/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste//
65b5(rgyud 'bum): snying rje chos kyi go cha yin// shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin// nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs// phyir bzlog chen mos bsrung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam
65b6(rgyud 'bum): par mtshan/ / sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// thams cad mchog gi srung ba che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// bka'
65b7(rgyud 'bum): yi 'khor lo srung ba che/ / phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur// srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis// sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol// rdo rje phur bus rab dang // rdo
66a1(rgyud 'bum): rje'i sa dang dra ba dang / / steng gi gur dang tha re las// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskang byas nas// mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin// gang gis rang sems
66a2(rgyud 'bum): thul ba yis/ / bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin// gang la gang gis gsod pa yin// mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te// gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin// tsan dan
66a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po lus yin te/ / mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad// rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste/
66a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma chen po las/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//
66a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsungs pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa
66a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// chos
66a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs med cing skar ma med/ / bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin// gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i ba ba'ang yod ma yin// dus dang tshong las rnam par grol//
66b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// ril bu dang ni ri'i rtse dang // chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang //
66b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas// ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam// sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang // lha khang dang ni mchod rten
66b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / khyim mam gzhi mdo dag tu ni// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang // yid ni gang
66b4(rgyud 'bum): du dga' ba der/ / sna tshogs bde mchod dam pa ni// de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni// du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis//
66b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang // bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yis// me tog 'bad pas dgram par bya// sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong
66b6(rgyud 'bum): gdan/ / mnyam par bzhag pas rgya cher bya// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te//
66b7(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya// dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang du bltas na ni/ chos rnams thams cad stong ba yin/
67a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub tshegs kyi mchog dam pa// sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas// rang gi snying la mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par sgom/
67a2(rgyud 'bum): de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin// sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi// rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab// sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni//
67a3(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin// nam mkha'i khams ni sgom dga' bas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin// til gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos khyab
67a4(rgyud 'bum): par mthong / / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso// lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing rjed par bya//
67a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs// khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba rigs drug sems cad rnams// sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed// nam mkha'i
67a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i/ / mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas sa// thams cad gsum la skyabs su mchi// byang chub mthar thug bar du ni// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams/
67a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas go 'phang de la bzhag/ de la sgrub pa pos gsol gang ba// dge ba'i las las byung ba la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ rmongs pa'i gzugs can dargyal
67b1(rgyud 'bum): / dang // gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no// d+hU AM hUMHhoHhUM hrI/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje
67b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos khyab pa yin/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// he ru ka dpal rdo rje yi// mig dang rna ba snga dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de
67b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / oM hUM hra oM khaM haM/ gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang // de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang // ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched dag ni thams cad la//
67b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag go// lAM mAM pAM tA khA/ ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang // 'gug byed dang ni gar dbang
67b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / pad+ma'i drab mo lha'o// mkha' mnyam nam mkha' lta bu'o// de ltar phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas// tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni//
67b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag par shes par bya// tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste// bdag kyang yongs su dag pa yin// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro// sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis//
67b7(rgyud 'bum): he ruka dpal dag gyur nas// sems can kun gyi 'on yang byed// he rug yi go 'phang mchog/ thob nas sems can ma lus pa// 'di la 'jog cing 'god par shog/ mor+tha
68a1(rgyud 'bum): kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpra kr-i ti pa ri tsuts+tshaH/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa b+hA ba shud+d+haHlan gsum bar du bzla bar bya// dngos med mdun
68a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs phyogs bcu ru/ / snying po'i 'phreng ba spro bar bya// de na snying po de mthong nas// dra ba ra ba de bzhin to// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlabs// bla re mda' yi dra ba dang /
68a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor// phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra bi d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM paM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/
68a4(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra sha ra dz+wa la tA tsa tra~M/ oM badz+ra dz+wa lA ya na lAH/ hUM hUMdz+haiM/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo// gtso bo brgyad po'i ba ba dag/ de mthong nas ni legs pa ru// nyi mo'i ngol
68a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus bzhugs pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra// phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan//
68a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs// zod pa'i 'phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu// mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyun bzhugs// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thams cad
68a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mas mtshan pa yin/ / dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing /
68b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal chen bde ba'i go 'phang zhugs// dkar zhing ser la ljang khu ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis// de yi khro ba
68b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dag spro/ / rdo rje drug pon la// / rdo rje gtsur tor de bzhin te// thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/
68b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu ngu ba'i mdog can to// dkar zhing gnag la gur kum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan
68b4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi// rgyan gyis spyad pa rab tu 'byar// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pa yin
68b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs shing / / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
68b6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang // thams cad dril bu cang te'u// shes rab bde bas legs par 'khyud// dmar ser dbu skra dag gis brgyan// mche ba rnam
68b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig 'jigs pa can/ / stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// 'jigs pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des ni bdag nyid rgyan du byas// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom//
69a1(rgyud 'bum): khro zhing 'bar la g.yo ba dang // drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas
69a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / lcags kyu zhags pa kha T+wAM 'chang // dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i ska rags can// gdug pa thams
69a3(rgyud 'bum): cad zhabs 'og mnan/ / thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya// khro bo gnyis po rnam par sgom/
69a4(rgyud 'bum): steng du gtsug tor 'khor sbyar te// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par sgom// 'og tu rdo rjes 'og go// dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor lo
69a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni mdung 'dzin cing / / zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// phur bu khro bor byas nas su// de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spros//
69a6(rgyud 'bum): de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni// bgegs ni myur du med par gyis// gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su// phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs// mthe bong sdigs mdzub
69a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/
69b1(rgyud 'bum): nub tu'o// oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga baM bi d+yA rA dza hu hUM phaT/ lce phyogs su'o// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la// rdo rje phur bus dgod
69b2(rgyud 'bum): cing mnan/ / lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin// oM g+ha gA g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta bi g+h+raM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM huM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha
69b3(rgyud 'bum): ro Adz+nyA sarba duSh+TAn pa ya ti kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur pa rdo rje khro bo ru// bltas nas yongs su brtag par bya// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// dngos
69b4(rgyud 'bum): grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya/ / oM hUM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya huM hUM phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshog/ gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla// oM kha badz+ra d+h+r-ika badz+ra
69b5(rgyud 'bum): hUM kA ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ya na lAr+k+ka badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha badz+ra hU~M phaT
69b6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra kA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la badz+ra pU phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hI Sha Na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA tA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ bka' 'di dag ni
69b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa yi/ / de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur// mAMs rkang dang zhag kha chu// shu kra rak+ta lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis ril bur byas// zos na dngos grub nges par
70a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sngo zhing ser la ljang khu ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zhing gnag la ljang khu dang // dud kha ser la ser skya dang // dkar zhing
70a2(rgyud 'bum): ser la ljang khu dang / / dmar zhing ser la ldang ba dag/ de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes// 'di ltar
70a3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo thams cad kyang / / dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis// rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa// bgegs
70a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad med par mthong / / gcer bu'am yang na mi gcer ba'am// skra grol thal bas yan lag byug/ ji ltar ji srid ma ngal bar// 'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa
70a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni// dad pas dram ning mnyam par gzhag/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pa At+ma kohaM/ oM a pra Ni hing
70a6(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems can du ni rnam par brtag/ 'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yin// chos med chos mim pa yang med// nam
70a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' gos pa med pa ltar/ / dngos po med cing dmigs su med// gang gi snying kha kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal// phra bar lta ba rang byung ba yi sems 'jug pa// khams gsum ma
70b1(rgyud 'bum): lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ / gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dbang po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du ngas sbyar ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma lus
70b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ / khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyi 'gro ba'i// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//
70b3(rgyud 'bum): chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom// chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur// dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams
70b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the tsom med// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis// thig le gcig pu yi ge med// skyes bu de ni bsgoms
70b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/ sems dpa' rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// sems dpa' rjes su dran par sgom// sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni// chos
70b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung / / bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa// smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang // mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//
70b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag/ dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung //
71a1(rgyud 'bum): sngo ba'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o// rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par sgom// dud pa'i 'phreng ba khyab par dmigs// de yi steng du yi ge ra// me yi dkyil
71a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mchog dam pa/ / gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'bar bas khyab// nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas// rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya//
71a3(rgyud 'bum): yi steng du chu nyid de// yi ge baM mchog las byung ba// du shar ra yi mdog 'dra ba// zlum la 'od zer 'phreng ba can// de yi steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor// laM las byung ba ser
71a4(rgyud 'bum): bo ste/ / zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs// rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni// ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la rin chen
71a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi/ / rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi ge suM las legs par byung // 'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o// de yi steng du bsam pa ni// bruM ni dkar po las
71a6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsams// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed kyis
71a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes shing / / ba dan 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi yi dkyil
71b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thig gdab bo/ / de yi nang du 'khor lo nI// brdud po dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi dbus su pad+ma che// sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la// skye ba ges
71b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis khyab pa/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas// dkar po ser po de bzhin te// dmar dang ljang khu zhal bzhi pa/ zhi zhing dgod
71b3(rgyud 'bum): dang khro ba dang / / rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang // gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tshangs pa'i bags
71b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gos su mnabs/ / zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan cam
71b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ / dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan// thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can// cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ji ltar thabs
71b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin shes rab de/ / phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog/ bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas//
71b7(rgyud 'bum): sku ni gnyis su med par thim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung // g.yas brkyang g.yon
72a1(rgyud 'bum): brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ / dkar sngo ser dmar zhal mdog ste// 'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i//
72a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag mtshan rim pa 'dzin pa yin// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba rlon pas spud// zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa// zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par
72a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs/ / spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa/ na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyun
72a4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod ba dang gdug pa la sdigs mdzub kyi
72a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril pa/ bde ba dang dgyes pas mos pa/ khams dang / phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlab
72a6(rgyud 'bum): tesa'i khams ni lo ste ltung byed ma'o/ / chu'i khams ni maM ste gsod byed ma'o// me'i khams ni raM ste 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni yaM ste gar gyi dbang phyug
72a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / nam mkha'i khams ni khaM ste pad+ma'i drab ma'o// ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / dud kha dang / sngo ba'o// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par
72b1(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad oM mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te aM gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes hri ste pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po
72b2(rgyud 'bum): hihe ljang khu/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste hUM dkar po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka ste hi mdog nag po'o// mig bru ste
72b3(rgyud 'bum): gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rna ba hUM zhe sdang rdo rje ste nag po'o// swA ni khaM phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o// ngag chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o// reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje ste haM ljang khu'o//
72b4(rgyud 'bum): skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste haM dkar po'o// lus ni hU~M ste dkar po'o// ngag ni AHste dmar po'o// yid ni o ste sngon po'o// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi
72b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so/ / de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon po'o// lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lA ma ni ljang khu ste sngo bsangs so// nub phyogs
72b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo/ / byang gi 'dab ma la gzugs can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang
72b7(rgyud 'bum): ba g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wA~M ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug
73a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o// mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du
73a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go/ / shar du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po// byang du gr-i ha de ba tar rdo rje rin chen dang
73a3(rgyud 'bum): dum skyes ma ser po/ nub tu sau raSh+Ta ra rta mgrin dang / chang 'tsheng ma dmar po'o// lhor su bar+Na dI par nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang khu'o// mer
73a4(rgyud 'bum): na ga rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab tu dpa' mo dmar po'o// bden bral du sin+d+hur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang ser skya'o// rlung phyogs na ma
73a5(rgyud 'bum): ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma dung kha'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du kuM lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o// stobs po che la sogs
73a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin
73a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang /
73b1(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa/
73b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gos can ma/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i 'phreb
73b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / g.yer ka sa 'og pag byas pa shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor khakhwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang
73b4(rgyud 'bum): phag gdong ma rnams so/ / me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang / gshin rje pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang /
73b5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so// ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhin kha gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba'ang de bzhin no// mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa yid 'phrog pa'i tshul
73b6(rgyud 'bum): can/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba can no//
73b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing /
74a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste// chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni// de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed// a la la ho dgyes pa che// bde ba chen po de nyid yin//
74a2(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// dga' bas srid pa dag las grol// bde bar gshegs pa dag pa che// dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par
74a3(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par// rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin// mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste// ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni// mchod
74a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom// rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar// bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla//
74a5(rgyud 'bum): skye ba can gyi lus grub ste// mkha' la spyod par the tshom med// oM shrI kA ya DA ka ru lu ru lu b+hUM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nA~M dz+wa la shaM ba raM swAhA/ snying po'o// oM b+h+rUM ha ha b+h+rUM hUM phaT/
74a6(rgyud 'bum): / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye b+h+rUM bai ro tsa nI ye b+h+rUM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// oM b+h+rUM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye hUM b+h+rUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM k+ShAM ma hA pa la d+hA dzu hUM phaT/
74a7(rgyud 'bum): oM tsakra bi ge hu hUM phaT/ oM hr-i ra badz+re drA hU~M hU~M phaTa.oM khaN+Da re he hU hUM phaT/ oM hi ha ya grI bA hi hu~M hU~M phaTa.oM shoN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pU A kA shA gar+b+ha hu hUM phaT/ oM
74b1(rgyud 'bum): tsakra barmi NI ye tsu hUM phaT+Ta/ oM kA li shrI he ru ka ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+hI re hu hu hUM phaT/ oM si li pad+ma na rte sha ra si li tsu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le tsu hUM phaT/ oM hi le bai ro tsa nI me
74b2(rgyud 'bum): hi li hu~M chu bAT+Ta/ oM tsakra brti nI ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi la~M badz+ra satwA d+hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bI d+ye ma hA hu hU~M phaT/ mo kA kA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT+Ta/ oM A l+yA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shA nA s+yai tshwa
74b3(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dAn+thi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM la ma dadz+dzi Ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha na~M ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/
74b4(rgyud 'bum): oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU bir+N+Na ye huM hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la// thog ma pad+ma la gnas nas mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang
74b5(rgyud 'bum): bzla/ / rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang // rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag/ sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste// /
74b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// dam tshig can dag langs dus su// yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba// rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams
74b7(rgyud 'bum): blta/ / o ha snying kha la/ na maHhi mgo bo la/ sa ha hu spyi gtsug la/ oM bo Ta he go cha'o// pU hU~M ho mig la'o// phaT haM yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o//
75a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ljang khu dung kha dang // yid kyis mdog drug rnam par sgom// oM ba~M sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba
75a2(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ / haM yau ya mi ni ste snying kha la'o// hrI mau rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o// hUM hr-i g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT phaT na maH
75a3(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs nas kyang // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams
75a4(rgyud 'bum): cad 'di yis rnam par brtag/ 'chi med ye shes lnga bza' zhing // ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas// dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya//
75a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam
75a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms te/ / sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sgom// rtsibs brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la// nang gi 'dab ma snga ma bzhin//
75a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// gsung gi rdo rje rnam par sgom// gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mas
75b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud cing / / rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs// pad+ma dril bus mnyam par 'khyud// dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang bar gnas//
75b2(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma lnga pa'i rim pa bzhin// dbang phyug chen po'i mthar thug par// zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta// dmar zhing sngo la de bzhin ser// g.yon pa dkar la spyan
75b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa/ / ral pa'i dbu rgyun dag gis brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbul mdzes// zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang // sna tshogs pad+ma rnam dgod cing // mche bo rnam
75b4(rgyud 'bum): bar gtsigs pa dang / / 'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing // sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi pags pa gos su bgos// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba
75b5(rgyud 'bum): can/ / mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang // mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de dag pha rol phyin
75b6(rgyud 'bum): drug ste/ / phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o// de yi pang na bcom ldan ma// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// gcer bu
75b7(rgyud 'bum): sman grol ba ste/ / dum bu rgyan gyi ska rags can// phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang // gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing // bad ldan log pas phyogs kun tu/
76a1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa kun la sdigs mdzub byed// drag cing bskal pa'i me yi gzi// zhal nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing // byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril//
76a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po thugs rje'i bdag/ mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad bzhin// pad+ma la sogs phyogs bkod na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// sngar bshad mdog tu
76a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ / 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar po// dum skyes ma ni de bzhin gnag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin// phyag g.yon kha T+wA~M thod pa dang // g.yas bcang
76a4(rgyud 'bum): te'u gri gug 'dzin/ / mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // 'chi med lnga po'i bum stengs su// byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma ru pa na mya
76a5(rgyud 'bum): gu can dang / sa srungs ma ste dkar po'o// byang du u tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed ma chen mo ste dmar po'o// nub tu tri sha ku ne na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi
76a6(rgyud 'bum): shugs can ma ste nag po'o/ / lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste nag mdog ljang khu'o// me phyogs la ka ling ka ni rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs ma ste
76a7(rgyud 'bum): ser po dang dkar skya'o/ / bden bral du lAM pa ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste dkar po'o// rlung phyogs su ka po tsa na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste ljang khu'o//
76b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan la ni hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste gnam mdog sngo bsangs so// gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o// myu gu can la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal
76b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na cang te'u
76b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa'o// dpa' bo la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa// zhal
76b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa la thod pa dang / / sdigs mdzub pad+ma can gyis 'khyud// mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang // rna cha tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // mgrin pa'i rgyan dang thod pa'i
76b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng / / 'og pag dag gi ska rags can// sngar bshad sgo srungs la sogs bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya//
76b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang // dpral bar pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can// phung po skye mched khams rnams kun// sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag/ sngar bshad pa
76b7(rgyud 'bum): yi cho ga bzhi/ / yi ge rnams ni dgod cing sgom// thugs ni AHste dmar po yin// gsung ni oM ste dkar por bshad// rdo rje sku ni hUM yin te// nam mkha' zla ba lnga
77a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / / thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya//
77a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byung ste thim nas su// thams cad sgrom zhing bsam par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya// oM shrI bAka DA ki A ro lika hUM
77a3(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ hAM hAn+ta ki nI dzA shaM ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM A ro li ka hrIHhU phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma DA ki nI ya hrIHhuM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// oM sarba pad+mAr+tha
77a4(rgyud 'bum): ki nI ye e huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT aM ku ri ka phaT hu~M hUM
77a5(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM ai ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da hA badz+ra dza Ta la da ha huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ma hA bI ra ba tsa tsu hU~M phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hU~M phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha
77a6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra hUM kA ra b+ha k+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ne tsu hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na su b+ha drA gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dza ga sarbaM bA tardza ya tadz+nyA ya hu~M hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma da
77a7(rgyud 'bum): bI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya bedz+re su b+ha dra A kan+tu hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su byai dr-i tsuM phaT/ oM dzA ma pra b+hai ra ba ha~M su~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha la ke hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tA~M bi rU bAk+Sha le hU~M hu dru
77b1(rgyud 'bum): oM khA gA na ne tsu hru phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye tsu hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye s+'uhU~M phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye hu hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye hu hU phaT/ oM sa ma dA n+d+ri ye tsu hUM phaT/ oM ya ma
77b2(rgyud 'bum): dUtI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM las pedz+dzaN+Da le hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI la~M hun+tu phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas// bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya// dgug pa dang na
77b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa nyid/ / sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste// ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang //
77b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthar gnas la// de la thams cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags// 'dod pa'i

77b6(rgyud 'bum): bu 'dod chags chos kyi bdag/ bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni// dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing // chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas//
77b7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs 'grub// oM ha snying kha la/ na maHhi mgo la/ swAhA A ro li ka spyi gtsug la/ bo ShaT he go cha/ pU hUM ho mig la'o// phaT
78a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha'o/ / chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang /

78a3(rgyud 'bum): ste lte ba la'o/ / ha yoM pad+ma la mi ni dang / hU~M mau pad+ma'i rmongs byed ma dang / hreM hrI pad+ma g.yo byed ma dang / huM hUM pad+ma skrag byed ma dang / phaT phaT haM pad+ma tsaN+Di ka ste/
78a4(rgyud 'bum): snying kha dang / mgo dang / spyi gtsug dang / mig dang / chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so// dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu

78a6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / mnyam par bzhag pas drod 'byung ba// rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste// gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// chos rnams
78a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang // sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyor// lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis// snying po'i ye shes de nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan
78b1(rgyud 'bum): la bsgoms la/ / ci bde bar ni bza' ba bza'// lU yi gzugs su gyur nas su// 'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye// bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis// nad
78b2(rgyud 'bum): dang rga ba rnam par spangs/ / sems can rjes su chags pa yi// lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis// byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi// sems can don ni bla med
78b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis// thugs rje bskyed cing bstan par mdzad// gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang // ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub//

78b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM ha ha ho/ / dza la ma hA su kha su kha te dze sa ya ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ke tu su kha ba hUM bi ti ta dza mu kra dza la te dza ra/ han ta so pa rAha/ sa su kha ho hUM ho ho su ra to tA ra ga su kha ra ti rI
79a1(rgyud 'bum): na ba ra ma shI ra ti ho/ / ba ra ma he tu ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu yo na ra ba ra me shwa ra ho/ ho b+ha ga ban ma hA su khaM hUM ho/ ba hu bi ti bi ti bi sha dz+wa la ra ti bi
79a2(rgyud 'bum): sha ma ho/ su ra ti su khaM ga tsit+tA pa ra ma ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu gr-i hU ho/ su ra ta ud+d+ha ma san di su khaM a A ro li ka/ a ma hA su kha gr-i h+na ho/ glu 'di dag ni blangs

80b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsis gang ba dgod/ / de steng byang chub sems kyis ni// yongs su gang ba gzhag par bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// bu li ra ma la yan thong

81b5(rgyud 'bum): oM hra a mi tA b+hA dza~M hu~M phU phanA~M/ oM kharba rI me hu~M hUM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+rA pra d+hA pra mu r+dz+dza pAT+Ta/ oM la~M ke shai rI le hu~M hUM bAn+d+ha/ oM pa~M badz+ra de he ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM dru mats+tshal hu~M thu T+Ta

83b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma/ / dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni// sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba// gcer bu ska rags 'og pag
84a1(rgyud 'bum): gis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na sdigs mdzub rdo rje dang
84a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pas phyogs bcur bsdigs par byed pa/ bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can// khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag/ byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud // thugs/
84a3(rgyud 'bum): rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin// A li kA li las byung ba// rnam par rtog pa med pa ste// chos dang chos min rnam par spangs// par 'dab
84a4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo dgod pa yis/ / dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis/
84a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma la dngos grub stsol// gnag cing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu drag po'i gzugs can te// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum g.yas
84a6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ / gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnon pa dang // chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang // thod pa dag gis dbu rgyan can//
84a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// gnag cing sngo la ldang ba dang // shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can// ser zhing gnag la ljang khu ste// snying rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs//
84b1(rgyud 'bum): dmar zhing gnag la ldang ba dang // sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor// ldang zhing gnag la ser ba dang // 'jam zhing khro bas 'jigs pa dang // thod pa dang ni Shar+Na
84b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / g.yon bcang te'u gri gug ste// mgo bo rdo rje dung g.yas na// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus// yongs su gang ba'i steng du
84b3(rgyud 'bum): yang / / byang chub sems kyis gang snod gzhug/ kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya/
84b4(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can la// skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga lis rnam
84b5(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / gcer bu yi dgas gdar du mnan// 'dod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos// g.yon par mgo bo kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas nathod pa gri gug go// mtshams ni bzhi po
84b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag tu yang / / gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la yi dgas
84b7(rgyud 'bum): gang na/ / sgra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyad// gcer bu sna tshogs gzugs can la/ @
85a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing bde bas rnam par myos/ / g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas la cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod byas na// mtshams kyi dngos
85a2(rgyud 'bum): grub stsol bar 'gyur/ / khwa gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa// g.yas nas bskor zhing dgod par bya// khams dang skye mched phung po rnams// sku gsung thugs su rnam par
85a3(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// go cha bzhin du dgod par bya// dbang chen dang ni chu dang ni// me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi dbus su bkod pa ni//
85a4(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs bzhi po dag yin no// ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid// 'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag/ de nyid nam mkha'i khams yin te// pad+ma'i dra ba stong pa yin//
85a5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes gar dbang rgyal po ste// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste//
85a6(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ka/ mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste// rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje yin// sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste// lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin// lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o// skye
85a7(rgyud 'bum): mched kun dbang rdo rje'o/ / hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// AHzhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur// i ni sku yi rdo rje ste// he ni rdo rje ye shes yin// lus sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/
85b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad rnam par sgom// bde ba'i chags pa bcom ldan 'das// chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te// ye shes 'khor le de mthong nas// mchod dang bstod dang
85b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang yang bskur/ / rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/ 'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rnam bsgoms na// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor byas nas//
85b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis// cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya// oM shrI badz+ra ha he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hrIMHha haM huM hUM phaT/
85b4(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAH/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT/ phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ a
85b5(rgyud 'bum): / lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u l+yA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaTa.oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/
