85b6(rgyud 'bum): oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni yai huM hUM phaT/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa mchog ni
85b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / 'di ni rnal 'byor mo rnams kyi// mchog tu gseng ba smras pa yin// bcu drug cha ni yongs rdzogs pa// sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso//
86a1(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'i dus las langs nas ni// go cha gnyis ni rnam par dgod// oM ha rdo rje sems dpa' snying kha la/ na maHhi rnam par snang mdzad mgo bo la/
86a2(rgyud 'bum): sAha hu pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la/ bo ShaTA he khrag 'thung ste dpung pa la'o// hu hU~M ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o// phaT haM rta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon
86a3(rgyud 'bum): tshwa'o/ / oM baM rdo rje phag mo ste lte ba la'o// haM yoM ya mi ni sne snying khwa la'o// hriM mo rmongs byed ma ste lce la'o// hreM hriM g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// huM ng+ku skrag byed maste
86a4(rgyud 'bum): spyi gtsug la'o/ / phaT haM gtum mo ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// 'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam// thams cad chos su ro gcig ste// mnyam pa nyid
86a5(rgyud 'bum): la rnam par bzhugs/ / mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di// rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs// dus bzhi'am yang na dus gsum du// ji tsam nus pa bsrung ba bya//
86a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin te// gang la yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sdom pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// /
86a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas cho ga'i gzhung bzhin bshad// pad+ma 'dab brgyad legs par mdzes// sna tshogs 'dab ma yid 'ong ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma'i
86b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnam par bsam/ / lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa// de steng A li kA li ste/
86b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su reg bya stong pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gis khyab// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal nyid// zhal gdong lnga la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur
86b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// g.yon brkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bri//
86b4(rgyud 'bum): sdug gi pags pa gos su mnabs// thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// ral pa'i cod pan rgyun du thogs// zla ba phyed pa'i spyi
86b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug la/ / sna tshogs rnga rjes dbu la mnan// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// mi mgo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// zong rlon 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
86b6(rgyud 'bum): mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang // thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu la brgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug po rnam par sgom// phyag gnyis thod pa dril bu yis//
86b7(rgyud 'bum): phag mo la ni rnam par 'khyud // phyag gzhan gnyis po dag gis ni// 'jigs byed chen po'i pags rlon bsnams// g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje gsor zhing ba ngan
87a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi pa la mdung rtse lnga pa/ lnga pa la dgra sta/ drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u rnams so// g.yon pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje kha
87a2(rgyud 'bum): T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la gri gug/ drug pa la drag po'i mgo bo/ pang na gnas pa'i phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdog can/ phyag gnyis pa/
87a3(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can// phyag g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams
87a4(rgyud 'bum): pas 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa kun la phyogs su sdigs mdzub byed cing gri gug 'dzin pa/ bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can// khrag la
87a5(rgyud 'bum): dgyes shing khrag 'dzag pa/ / byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// bde ba'i mchog gi dam pa'o// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur// thugs rje'i chags
87a6(rgyud 'bum): pas rnam par rol/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// he ru ka dpal rnam par sgom// nam mkha'i mdog can ser ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu ser skya'o// khro
87a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang / / rngam dang zhi bar ldan pa dang // khams dang skye mched phung po dang // reg pa'ang de bzhin sgom pa ste// mkha' 'gro lA ma de bzhin te// dum
87b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ / phyag bzhi pa la gdong gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos can
87b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan// lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // 'dod pa'i rnam grol rab tu ster// shar dang
87b3(rgyud 'bum): lho dang nub dang ni/ / byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod// dkar dang ser ba de bzhin du// dmar dang ljang khu chags pas myos// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u
87b4(rgyud 'bum): gri gug 'chang / / mtshams bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi// ye shes lnga yis yongs gang ba// thod pa'o mas yongs gang bas// bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya// g.yon nas
87b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor zhing bkod nas kyang / / ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas su// mchod dang bstod dang gzhug par bya// yid ngag lus la bkod nas ni// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par
87b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ hUM AHoM ni rnam par sgom// gsang sngags ji bzhin bzlas na ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM pa raM swAhA
87b7(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o//
88a1(rgyud 'bum): oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ khro bo'i sprul pa spros nas ni// 'gro ba gsum po rdzog
88a2(rgyud 'bum): par byas/ / sgom par bzlas par ldan pa yis// bdag gis spro dang bsdu bar bya// khams gsum me lus kun tu yang // lus ngag yid gsum ci bder spyad// dam tshig
88a3(rgyud 'bum): can bsgoms langs nas ni/ / go cha gnyis po bgo bar bya// oM ha rdo rje sems dpa' ste snying kha la'o// na maHhi rnam par snang mdzad ste mgo bo la'o// swa ha hu pad+ma gar dbang
88a4(rgyud 'bum): ste spyi gtsug la'o/ / pau ShaT he dpal khrag 'thung ste dpung pa gnyis la'o// hUM hUM ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o// phaT haM rta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o// oM baM rdo rje
88a5(rgyud 'bum): phag mo sde lte ba la'o/ / ha yo ya mi ni sde snying kha la'o// hUM mo rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o// dro dzAM g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// d+hu hUM skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT
88a6(rgyud 'bum): oM ni tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ / 'di ni dam tshig ngo bo ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no// sngags dbyibs chos bdag rnal 'byor ni// bdag nyid chos su
88a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnas kyi rim pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang
88b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ba/ / dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga ni// sngags pas lte bar rnam bsams pa// rlung dang me yi dbus su ni// de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i
88b2(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du thod pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba/ de'i dbus su A li kA li lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul du nyis bltab tu
88b3(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ hUM byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dga' zhing dgyes pa las byung ba ni/ dpal thugs rje'i bdag nyid he ru ka chags pas rnam par 'khor bar sgom mo//
88b4(rgyud 'bum): de yang zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ zhabs g.ya pa brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/
88b5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ dpa' bo'i phyag rgya drug gis sku lus phyag rgyas bdab pa/ 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan gnyis kyi mgo dang nu ma mnan pa/ stag gi pags pa mnapa
88b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ snying rje'i ros 'khor ba/ rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis la rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ rdo rje dril bu/ phyag gzhan gnyis la tshogs kyi bdag po'i pags pa'i stobs 'dzin pa/
88b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje mdung / bzhi pa la lcags kyu/ lnga pa la rdo rje gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum pa na thod pa rkang gis yongs su
89a1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang / rdo rje kha dzA ga/ steng du rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'chang ba/ sna tshogs pa
89a2(rgyud 'bum): dan rab tu sbyangs pa/ dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ 'og nas rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la tshangs pa'i mgo bo/ drug pa la dgra sta bsnam
89a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ zhal mdog sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khu rab tu 'jigs su rung ba/ sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / 'gying bag can du bzhugs pa'o//
89a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i mdun du A li kA li las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo 'khyud nas bzhugs te/ sku mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu
89a5(rgyud 'bum): sgra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bu'i ska rags can/ phyag g.yon pa na thod pa byang chub kyi sems dang gdug pa'i bdud kyi rak+tas yongs su gang ba/ g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub can la rdo rje
89a6(rgyud 'bum): gri gug thogs pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis la cang te'u dang kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid can/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag cing khrag la dga' ba/ byin pa gnyis
89a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bsnol ba/ bde ba chen po'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ dmar ba dang / ljang khu dang / ser ba dang / sngo ba'i zhal gdug cing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o// bcom
89b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhal dang sku mdog ji lta ba/ phyag dang sku mdog kyang de bzhin du bris te/ 'di la rnal 'byor pa mchog gis nang gi gnas la sogs pa'i rim par dgod do// pu ste thod pa'i
89b2(rgyud 'bum): dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ni mgo la'o// dzA ste keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma ni spyi gtsug la'o// oM ste keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ni rna ba g.yas par ro//
89b3(rgyud 'bum): a ste mche ba rnam par gcig pa dang / sna chen ma ni spyi bo'i rgyab tu ste gnas so// go ste lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ni rna ba g.yon par ro// rA ste smin ma'i dbus su ni 'od
89b4(rgyud 'bum): dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o// de ste mig gnyis su ni rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA ste dbu rtsar ni rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma'o// nye ba'i gnas
89b5(rgyud 'bum): te thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la spyod pa'o/ / kA ste mtshan khung gnyis su ni myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// oM ste nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed
89b6(rgyud 'bum): chen mo ste zhing ngo / / tri ste lte ba'i dbus su stobs po che dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko ste sna rtser ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka ste kha la ni rab
89b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o// lA ste mgrin par ni rdo rje 'od dang / rab bzang ma ste tshan do ha'o// kA ste snying la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / rta sna ma'o// hi ste bshang sgol
90a1(rgyud 'bum): ni mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma'o// nye ba'i tshan do ha ste gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o// pre ste mtshan ma la ni stobs po che dang / 'khor le'i shugs
90a2(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / gri ste gzhang la ni rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o// 'dus pa can no// so ste brla gnyis su ni rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma'o// su te byin pa gnyis la ni
90a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// nA ste sor mo rnams la ni dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' me'o// si ste rkang po la gnyis su ni
90a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// dur khrod do// ma ste mthe bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// ku ste pus me gnyis su rdo rje sem
90a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo'o// nye ba'i dur khrod de sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje/ lA ma ni dril bu/ dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma
90a6(rgyud 'bum): ni glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur/ khwa gdong ma ni rdo rje mdung / 'ug gdong ma ni lcags kyu/ khyi gdong ma ni gri gug/ phag gdong ma ni cang te'u/ gshin rje sreg ma
90a7(rgyud 'bum): ni thod pa'i kha T+wAM ga ma/ gshin rje pho nya ma ni zhags pa ma/ gshin rje mche ba ma ni tshangs pa'i mgo bo ma/ gshin rje 'joms ma ni dgra sta ma/ byang chub kyi sems kyi snod ni
90b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal bzhi'i ngo bo sa'i khams ni 'bebs ma chu'i khams ni gsod ma/ me'i khams ni 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ nam mkha'i khams
90b2(rgyud 'bum): ni pad+ma'i dra ba can no/ / gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/ tsher ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal
90b3(rgyud 'bum): bornam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka'o// mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba gnyis ni zhe
90b4(rgyud 'bum): sdang rdo rje/ sna ni ser sna rdo rje/ kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad la ni dbang phyug rdorje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs pa/ ngag ni rtse
90b5(rgyud 'bum): dpag med/ lus ni rnam par snang mdzad do// oM ha snying la rdo rje sems dpa'/ na maHhaM mgo la rnam par snang mdzad/ swA ha hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
90b6(rgyud 'bum): po ShaT he dpung pa gnyis la he ru ka/ hU hUM ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma phaT haM yan lag thams cad du rta mchog gi go cha'o// oM baM lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o// ha yau sing la ya
90b7(rgyud 'bum): mi ni'o/ / hriM mo kha la rmongs byed ma'o// hreM hri mgo la skyong byed ma'o// hUM hU spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o//
91a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar// de yi dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas// bskor zhing bskor
91a2(rgyud 'bum): bas kun tu bskor bar bya/ / rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta// gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrog cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnam
91a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs/ / dzaHhUM baM hoHrdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug cing rab tu gzhug ste bcing la dbang du bsdu'o// dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma des nam mkha'i dkyil
91a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor yongs su gang bar mthong bzhin du thod pa bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang bas stang stabs dang bcas pas dbang bskur dbul lo/ / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin
91a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ / lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shI huM hUM/ rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi
91a6(rgyud 'bum): steng du thod pa/ der yi ge a bskyed pa la/ ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba/ zla ba'i cha bcu drug pa la yi ge hUM dang AHoM gyis byin gyis brlabs te/ yi ge gsum pa'i sgo
91a7(rgyud 'bum): pab las 'khor lo gsum 'byung bar sgom mo/ / oM sa ma ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa ma ya shud+d+hohaM/ chos thams cad kyi bcud mnyam par gnas par bsam mo// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba
91b1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu btung ngo // oM badz+ra la mr-i ta u da ka hUM laSha tra a khaM hUM oM/ ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro// dung chen
91b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba blangs nas ni/ / de nas de la bzlas pa bya// rang srog stsol pa byas nas ni// bsgoms pas de ma thag tu 'bar// oM badz+ra shrI he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI dza
91b3(rgyud 'bum): la saM ba ra swA hA/ oM hA ha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud+d+hA DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying ba
91b4(rgyud 'bum): dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ / ci ste ngal bar ma gyur na// de ltar bzlas shing bsam gtan bya// ngal bar gyur ni rnam dag sgom// de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te//
91b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye
91b6(rgyud 'bum): bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o/ / 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu
91b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/ / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o// ye shes kyi pad+ma rnam par sbyang ba'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo chen ma'o// brtson
92a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/ / dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam
92a2(rgyud 'bum): par sbyang ba'o/ / shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni
92a3(rgyud 'bum): / chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus
92a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o/ / gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa
92a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni du ma skyes ma'o/ / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha
92a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i
92a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni dpa' bo chen mo'o/ / sku'i 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug pa'i gdong can no// yang dag pa'i rtsol
92b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni khyi'i gdong can no/ / yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong ma'o// rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka ste/ shin tu rnam
92b2(rgyud 'bum): papar dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo ni bdag kho na'o/ / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje sreg ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag
92b3(rgyud 'bum): par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya mo'o/ / mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms
92b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rnam par sbyang ba'o// 'di ltar ma lus pa bsgoms na// sgrub pos nges par 'grub par 'gyur// sems can don du rnal 'byor bdag/ mnyam
92b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid dam tshig dam pa'o/ / 'khor lo lnga po so so yin// cho ga so so'i dbye ba sgom// mngal skyes so so'i dbye ba dag/ 'khor lo lnga yi mchog nyid can// rnal 'byor ma
92b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs gcor sgom pa/ / so so'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin// ji ltar rdo rje he ru ka/ de bzhin lha mo'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma sbyor ba// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor de
92b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par sgom// ji ltar sgom pa'i rim pa yis// de ltar 'khor lo gsum du sbyor// b+ha ga lnga po bdag gis sgom//
93a1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su mkha' 'gro ma sbyor dang // pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dbye la// b+ha ga'i dbus su 'khor lo gsum// he ru ka
93a2(rgyud 'bum): ni mchog nyid sgom/ / dam tshig 'khor lo bsgoms pa la// dam tshig mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor// sna tshogs pad+ma la
93a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs dbus/ / ye shes 'khor lo'i sbyor ba dag/ de 'di b+ha ga'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo lnga po dag la sgom// dpa' bo gcig pu he ru ka/ ji bzhin phag mo de bzhin du//
93a4(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog zhal dang phyag dang mtshan// de nyid sna tshogs pad+mar sgrom// de nyid pad+ma'i dbus dag tu// he ru ka ni mchog nyid sgom// thod pa lhan cig mnyam par ni// lnga yi dbye
93a5(rgyud 'bum): ba bdag sbyor te/ / rnal 'byor ma yi rim pa sgom// b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par sgom// 'khor lo'i bdag po mthong ma gyur// 'khyud pa yi ni phyag rgya can// dpa' bo
93a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo de la bsam/ / rang rang gi ni rnal 'byor ma// snying du smras pa rnam par sgrom// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ni// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes//
93a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni 'khyud pa'i phyag yin te// gzhan ni sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin// phyag gnyis dag ni 'khyud pa dang // de yi b+ha ga'i dbus su ni// dpa' bos sgom pa ma mthong ngo //
93b1(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob sbas pa'i sbyor ba ni// sgom pa'i mchog kyang mi mthong ngo // sgo nga las skyes rim sbyor ba'i// sgom pa'i rnam par sgom pa ni// lnga po 'dus pa'i bsam pa ste//
93b2(rgyud 'bum): sgo skyes mchog ni sgom pa'o// 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// 'di ltar rnal 'byor sgom pa'o// ji ltar bsam pa'i bye brag gis// de ltar 'dod pa sgom pa'o//
93b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par sgom// lha mo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// bdag po yang ni rnam par sgom// ming gi dbye ba'i dpe ba yis//
93b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra la sbyor// yang na sku gsum dbye gang gis// de ni bdag por bya gang yin// bdag po la sogs dbye ba yis// 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin//
93b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis dbye// mngal skyes glu yis sbyor ba yis// sgom pa rnams ni yongs su brtag/ sgong skyes glu ni med
93b6(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / sgra dang sgra nyams spangs pa'o// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog dam pa// kha cig gi ni rnal 'byor 'dod// kha cig rnal
93b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor 'dod min te/ / glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi// dngos po med pa'i go 'pha' bzhugs// phra zhing mi zad dngos po med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o//
94a1(rgyud 'bum): glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yis// go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni// glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi// dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs//
94a2(rgyud 'bum): phra zhing mi zad dngos po med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o// go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni// glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad
94a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / phan dang snying brtser bdag gis bza'// sems can don la brtson pa yis// bzod pa brtson 'grus mchog dam pa// rnal 'byor pas glu mi smad cing // mkha'
94a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro mas ni phan par dgyes/ / hoHsrid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtse// a la la ho/ rgyal ba bde can 'phreng ba'i tshegs// pad+ma la ni rdo rje rol// a la la ho/ bde
94a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs bral ba'i bzhad las grol/ / bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud// chags pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing // srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud// a la la ho//
94a6(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pas mngon par grol ba po// bdag ni 'dod las rab grol mdzod// A li las ni byung ba yi// pad+ma yi ni rnal 'byor pas// glu yi rgyal po 'di blangs pas// rdo
94a7(rgyud 'bum): rje rnal 'byor bde ba ni/ / pad+ma'i dra ba las bzhengs so// 'dis bskul bas ni mgon po rnams// bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhengs 'khrung
94b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ rgyal ba ma lus skye bar 'gyur// klu dang bcas pa'i dngos po med// klong skyes cha ni spangs pa yi// de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste// bde ba med cing sdug bsngal me
94b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med cing dngos po med/ / brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag/ chos dang chos las rnam grol zhing // sdig pa nyes pas mi gos so// thams cad gnyis med rnam
94b3(rgyud 'bum): grol ba'i/ / sgong skyes dngos po dang bcas yin// glus ni gnyid las sad pas na// rmongs pas mkhas pa mi smad do// ma rtogs pa dang rtogs bya'i phyir// sems can
94b4(rgyud 'bum): don du sangs rgyas so/ / zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo// gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// rigs skyes ma mo skyes lha mo// mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin// tha ma'i
94b5(rgyud 'bum): skye ba mchog nyid de/ / bar ma sna tshogs dam pa yin// sum cu pa ni sa la spyod// sa 'og spyod pa 'og na gnas// gnod sbyin ma dang klu mo dang // mi 'am ci mo dri za mo//
94b6(rgyud 'bum): lngalha mo thams cad sngon grub dang // gzhan yang bde gshegs bsam pa can// dkon mchog gsum la bdag dga' ba// thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo// sna tshogs glu
94b7(rgyud 'bum): ninyer spyad cing / / rtag tu glu ni blang bar bya// sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis// lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso bo mchog/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// sku yi 'khor lo
95a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / mkhas pas chu la rab gnas nas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgom// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// thugs kyi dkyil
95a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bde ba che/ / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa// ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// de la bsam bzhin rnam par sgom//
95a3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma'i rnam par sgom// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dpa' bo gcig pu rnam par sgom// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje 'phreng // 'khor
95a4(rgyud 'bum): lo gsum po yongs su bskor/ / ji ltar dam tshig mchog 'khor lo// sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'phreng gis bskor// yi dgas rnam pa lngas de bzhin// phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor//
95a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol dur khrod ma rungs pa'i// sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa// sna tshogs shing ni mnyam dga' ba// khyi dang ce spyang 'jigs pa dang // bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar dang // bya rgod
95a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni si bi ka/ sreg pa'i sa yang de bzhin te// keng rus gsal shing bskyon pa dang // rag rog bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang // de bzhin phyed tshig phyed ma tshig/ mgo bo thod pa rje
95a7(rgyud 'bum): ngar dang / / khog pa lag pa mgo bo dang // ce spyang sgra ni sgrog pa dang // sbrul ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas// seng ge phag dang stag dang ni// ra dang lug dang de bzhin te// glang
95b1(rgyud 'bum): po khyi dang bong bu grang / / rnga mo sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // chang gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // dpa' bo 'dus pa'i mchog dag dang // rnal
95b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma ni mchog sna tshogs/ / thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang // ro mchog bza' ba sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs
95b3(rgyud 'bum): tsum pa A li kA/ / ku sha le mchog dam pa dag/ de lta bu yi dur khrod du// gnod sbyin ro langs srin po la// gtor ma de la sbyin bya zhing // he ru ka yi gzugs rnams sgom//
95b4(rgyud 'bum): cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang // sil snyan gar rnams rab tu bya// phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgya sbyor// hUM phaT ca co'i sgra 'byin cing // zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis//
95b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas// 'di la gsang sngags rjes dran bya// oM A ra li ho dzaHhUM ba ho/ badz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya sta dr-i sh+ya ho/
95b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gsum mam bzhi lnga ru// yang dang yang du brjod par bya// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// thod par de rnams la yang sbyin// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas// 'di la
95b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags gdab par bya/ / oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa/ un mA da a pa s+phA ra NA ka DA ki nu da yaHi ma~M ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+ShaM tu/ ma ma sarba sid+d+him+ba
96a1(rgyud 'bum): pra la tsA nu/ ya thai ba larbAdz+dza/ b+huny+dzatha/ bi ba tha/ dza~M g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kA ra ta lA sa su kha bi shud+d+ha le sa ha yi kaM b+ha ban+tu pu hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
96a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga 'di yi rim pa yis// thun mtshams bzhi ru sbyin par bya// gcig pu bde bar gnas nas su// ma hA maM sa don bya ste// rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag nas ni// 'di la
96a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bza' bar bya/ / nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis su med pa'i 'khor lo'i rim par phye ba bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas
96a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / dag pa'i gnas kyi cho ga ste// gsang ba'i cho ga'i gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog/ gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba// dngos
96a5(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad stsol ba yin/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje 'khor dang mngag gzhug dang bcas pa/ mkha' 'gro chen po dang / mkha' 'gro
96a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i tshogs rnams dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams rang gi bdag po la phyag byas te gsol pa/ e ma'o bde ba'i sems dpa' khyod//
96a7(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o bde ba'i gtso bo yis// mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang ba mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal
96b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor mchog gyur pa/ / rang gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs// 'jig rten gsum gyi bde ba 'byung // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma che// sna tshogs sbyor dang sna tshogs gas
96b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dkyil 'khor dag pa gsungs/ / rdo rje rnam snang las 'byung ba// gzhal yas zur bzhi rab tu mdzes// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rgyan rnams thams cad
96b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs/ / dkyil 'khor bde ba las byung ba// de yi dbus su 'khor lo gnyis// thugs dang gsung gi 'khor lo mchog/ rtsibs brgyad pa la sngo dang dmar//
96b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+mas rnam par bskor// phyi rol 'khor los bskor bar bri// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog gis ni// phyi rol rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs// glu dang gar gyis rnam
96b5(rgyud 'bum): par rol/ / phyi rol yi dgas 'phreng ba yi// sna tshogs mdog ni mchog dam pa// lag pa'i gar gyis gar byed pa// gdong ni rnam bsgyur lce yang bskyod// de dbus stong
96b6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa ste/ / zla bar yi ge hUM mchog yin// der ni rdo rjes khyab pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// sku gsum snying rje'i nyam
96b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dkar zhing sngo la gur
97a1(rgyud 'bum): kum zhal/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// thod pa dang mi kha nA 'dzin// rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud// cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'chang // mi bskyod
97a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi cod pan 'dzin/ / mkha' 'gro'i gnas ni dgod bya ste// dpa' bo'ang de bzhin dgod par bya// khams dang phung po skye mched rnams// sku gsung thugs su rnam par sgom//
97a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'ang de 'dra'i gzugs can te// phyag rgya chen po bde ba yin// snying khar maM gyi sa bon ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// ho gnyis dang ni bcas pa ru// sngon du
97a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rjes dran nas/ / phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// de ma thag tu lha mo yi// snying kha'i gsang ba'i pad+ma la// chags par spyod par gyur nas su// mgon po chen po
97a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa yis/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba ches// de dang lhan cig rol pa ste// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor bar 'gyur// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// yid ni dga'
97a6(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur nas su/ / dga' ba yi ni bsams pa yis// cang te'u'i sgra yis bskul na ni// mnyam nyid dga' las bzhengs par 'gyur// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba//
97a7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po dgyes par 'gyur// de nas nam mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa thams cad kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa
97b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsang ba'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pas khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos mdun du bdar ba/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mkha' 'gro
97b2(rgyud 'bum): dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / spyi'i rig ma'i bdag nyid pho nya dang pho nya ma'i tshegs rgya che ba rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig gis lta zhing mnyam par 'khyud de/ gar gyi rnam par
97b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa yis/ / dga' ba chen pos langs nas ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// byin gyis brlabs kyis dgyes pa yis// mgon po chen po dgyes pa yi// glu
97b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag gis bskul bar bya/ / e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi lugs// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsang // e ma'o bde ba las byung ba// e ma'i
97b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po'i don/ / e ma'o bde ba yang dag 'dus// e ma'o bde chen dag pa ste// e ma'o bde ba bde ba'i mchog/ e ma'o gsang sngags mnyam sbyor ba// e ma'o thugs
97b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa ste/ / e ma'o mnyam nyid phyag rgyar ldan// e ma grub pa yang dag 'byung // e ma pha rol phyin pa yis// e ma rig pa rjes chags pa// e ma sna tshogs las chen po//
97b7(rgyud 'bum): e mkha sbyar gsum dag pa// e ma rdo rje mnyam la sbyor// e ma pad+ma rnam 'byed pa// e ma dbang po gnyis mnyam ldan// e ma rmad byung mnyam pa ste// e ma dag pa'i gar
98a1(rgyud 'bum): chen te/ / e ma dri med glu re legs// e ma rol mo legs sbyor ba// e ma phaT kyis mun sel ba// e ma me tog na bza' mdzes// e ma bdug pa
98a2(rgyud 'bum): g+ha ti bdug/ e ma sgron ma gti mug sel// e ma dri mchog bsil ba ste// e ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba// e ma sgyu 'phrul mkha' lta bu// e ma gdod nas sangs rgyas
98a3(rgyud 'bum): gdod nas rdo rje ste/ / e ma gdod nas rin chen bde ba rab stsol ba// e ma gdod nas pad+ma gdong nas bris pa ste// e ma sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yin// e
98a4(rgyud 'bum): mngo mtshar rmad sangs rgyas/ / e ma ngo mtshar 'di nyid rmang // e ma ngo mtshar sems can rnams// e ma ngo mtshar lha mo yin// 'dis bskul ba ni mgon po rnams//
98a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu sbyor ba'i sa bon las// gur kum gyi ni mdog lta bu// rdo rjes mtshan pa 'byung bar 'gyur// zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan//
98a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// skyil krung phyed par yang dag gnas// spyan gsum pa la rab tu bzhad// drag cing 'jigs la rngam pa dang // snying rje gar gyi nyams can te//
98a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// zhabs g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor 'byung ba chen po skyes// zla ba'i
98b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / sna tshogs pad+ma dag la bzhugs// ge sar gsar pa'i mdog can la// phyag rgya des ni rnam par brgyan// sngo zhing ldang la ser ba dang //
98b2(rgyud 'bum): dmar zhing dkar la zhi ba ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'chir
98b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / tshangs pa'i srud pa 'dzin mdzad cing // drag po'i 'jigs byed lpags pa ni// rked pa 'ching zhing bzhugs pa yin// thong pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // ral gri sut+pa
98b4(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bsnams shing / / ljags kyu zhags bcang te'u// mgo bo gzhu yang de bzhin no// de yi sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhin// rdo rje phag mo chen mo ni// chags pa chen po
98b5(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang gnas/ / byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// dga' ba chen mo yid 'ong ba// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas sku lus brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par mtshan//
98b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms byas te// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// gnas sogs bdag por sbyor ba yis// ye shes la sogs bdag po kun// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sbyor
98b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / sdom pa sdom pa'i mchog yin no// thog ma thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su pu lI ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste dkar ba dang /
99a1(rgyud 'bum): sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// byang phyogs su dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// nub phyog
99a2(rgyud 'bum): su oMr+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// lho ru ar pu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang khu dang /
99a3(rgyud 'bum): ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// me'i phyogs la go dA ba rir lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// bden bral du rA me shwa ra na 'od
99a4(rgyud 'bum): dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste nam mkha'i mdog
99a5(rgyud 'bum): can/ ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ljang khu dang / ser ba dang / sngo ba'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo ste thod pa'i
99a6(rgyud 'bum): dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni rab gtum ma la sogs pas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ / gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo'ang shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su kA ma rU pa na myu gu can
99a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sa srungs ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// byang phyogs su o tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste ljang khu dang / ser ba dang /
99b1(rgyud 'bum): sngo ba'o// nub tu tri sha ku ne na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// lho ru ko sa lan rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma
99b2(rgyud 'bum): ste dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su ka ling kar rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs ma ste ljang khu dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// bden
99b3(rgyud 'bum): bral du lAM pa ka na rdo rje 'od dang / rab bzang ma ste ser ba dang sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// rlung phyogs su kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste dud pa'i mdog dang /
99b4(rgyud 'bum): ser ba dang / stonga'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste gnam gyi mdog dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// gsung gi 'khor
99b5(rgyud 'bum): lo ste myu gu can la sogs pa ni sa srungs ma la sogs pas pad+ma dang pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ de ltar mkha' la spyod pa dang / sa la spyod pa'i 'khor lo gnyis po yin no//
99b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i sku rdo rje 'byung ba ni zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pre ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o
99b7(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs kyi sgo la gri ha de ba tA na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// nub kyi sgor sau raSh+Ta narta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma ste dmar ba
100a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// lho'i sgror su war+Na dI ba na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o//
100a2(rgyud 'bum): me'i phyogs su na ga ra na khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste nam mkha'i mdog dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// bder bral du sid+d+ha na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen
100a3(rgyud 'bum): ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// dbang
100a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan du ku lu ta na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// sku'i 'khor lo stobs po che la sogs pa ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la
100a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ / dpa' bo 'di thams cad g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/
100a6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug bsnams pa/ ji ltar dpa' bo'i phyag dang phyag mtshan bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang de bzhin te/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i
100a7(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan can/ rang gi rigs kyi mchog gis brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing // stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// lha mo dbu skra grol ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis
100b1(rgyud 'bum): legs par 'khril/ / thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing // sku lus 'jigs pa rnam par bsgyur// de'i dbus 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sna tshog
100b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnam gnon pa'o/ / phag mo dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// snga ma'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// bcug nas thim
100b3(rgyud 'bum): par rnam par sgom/ / spyod pa bzhi ru byin gyis brlabs// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// gnas la sogs pa'i rim par dgod// khams dang phung po skye mched rnams// sku
100b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi dam pa ste/ / snying po ye shes mchog gyur pa// dbang bskur yang ni dbul bar bya// de nas go cha dgod bya ste// mkhas pas ye shes bzlas pa ni// srog rtsol bsdam
100b5(rgyud 'bum): te legs bzlas pa/ / sgom pa'i bsgoms pas gsang bar bya// oM AHhUM/ spro bsdu dag gi sbyor ba yis// gnyis med 'phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla// de nas dam tshig sems dpa'
100b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// oM shrI san+d+ha badz+ra d+ha/ AHhAr+dz+dza / DA ki nI dz+wA la sa bair b+hu phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra bA rarA hi phu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kA ra ka ra khaN+Da ka pA li hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pra
100b7(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kaM kA la huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+ShI yai huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kaM kA la huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tra sa ya trA sa ya bi ka Ta daSh+Ti Ni huM hUM phaT/
101a1(rgyud 'bum): oMmA d+hAnA me b+h+ya/ sa u0f7fla bar cu chu n+tu/ a ng+ga ra ma tI la ts+tsha/ aHdz+dzas mi k+Sha T+Ta/ ya 'adz+ran la rgyalaT/ oM b
101a2(rgyud 'bum): adz+ra pra b+hA hUM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwa rI li huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM badz+ra de ha huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT ang+ga ri ka phu hU~M phaT/ oM ai rA ba tI le hu~M hUM phaT/ oM da hAd hA
101a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra dza Ti la huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bi huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa ma hA bI ra huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badz+ra hUM ka ra ba saM ru d+hi ra an+ta mA lAM ba laM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra
101a4(rgyud 'bum): b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na su b+ha dra sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya badz+ra b+ha dra huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/
101a5(rgyud 'bum): aM hriM hU~M ma hA b+hai ra ba huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+r-IM dzI bi rU pAk+Sha huM hUM phaT/ oM kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+mAMk+Sh+mAM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM haM rat+na badz+ra tsu
101a6(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da re he huM hUM phaT/ oM hrIM hU~M ha ya gri ba huM hUM phaT/ oM shaiN+Do nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM huM hUM A kA sha gar+b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmi NA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li he ru ka huM hUM phaT/
101a7(rgyud 'bum): oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM sa li si li pad+ma narte sha ri huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi laM bai ro tsa nI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra brti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li badz+ra satwa huM hUM phaT/
101b1(rgyud 'bum): / oM ma hA bAR+Sha huM hUM phaT/ dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas ni// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du bzla// dus bzhir sbyor ba byas nas ni// bzlas dang bsgom pa rtse gcig bya// rnal 'byor myur
101b2(rgyud 'bum): du grub nas ni/ / gsang sngags grub pa'i rim pa yis// bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan byas nas// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni//
101b3(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'grub pa yin// dkyil 'khor lha yi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad rab
101b4(rgyud 'bum): tu stsol/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las/ 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
101b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / rigs kyi dbye ba'i mchog dam pa// gnas sogs sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// phyogs kyi rim pas rnam par dbye// thams cad mchog gi sbyor chen po// rnal 'byor dbang
101b6(rgyud 'bum): phyug rab tu 'grub/ / rdo rje sku las nges 'byung ba// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / yang dpa' bo dang rnal
101b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma thams cad 'dus shing 'ongs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ mig g.yangs dga' bas gar byed cing // myur bas bsdus
102a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa yis/ / rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon gyis ni// mdun du gom stabs spros pa yis// 'di ltar rnam bsgyur khros pa'i spyan// smin ma 'degs dang 'khor
102a2(rgyud 'bum): bar ldan/ / skye med phyag rgyar 'gro ba dag/ mig gi phyag rgyas phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa du mas bskul nas zhus te/ rnal 'byor mtshan mo thams cad dgyes
102a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid dang // dkyil 'khor mchog ni mdzes pa ste// dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bde ba che// rol pa'i
102a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po ni/ / de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba chen po mchog tu dgyes// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// shin tu
102a5(rgyud 'bum): srid pa nges ldog pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa che// dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dgongs shing spyan rnam par phye ste/
102a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhi rnam par 'khor ba'i gar gyis smin ma 'degs shing / mdun du gzigs shing gom stabs kyis// dregs pas snyems par rnam 'khor ba'i// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje rang /
102a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid 'di la bzhugs pa yin// dkyil 'khor da ni dkyil 'khor ming // rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// rtog pa med par bdag sbyor ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// zla ba'i
102b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni// dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'o// ri mo mkhan gyi dkar po ltar// byang chub sems mchog 'di lta bu// sngo zhing 'bar ba
102b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa'i/ / rlung gis bskyod pa'i me lta bu// zla ba phyed pas bdag nyid mdzes// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs// cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba// 'bar ba'i
102b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dang bcas pa/ / dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen de// bde ba mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma 'dab brgyad kha phye ba// lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa// pad+ma pad+ma nyid las ni// dga'
102b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba yin/ / dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba na// byin za 'bar ba ji bzhin du// las kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor du// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
102b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar de dag mtha' yas pa// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu brtag/ gang du gang la sprul pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung yin// thams cad bdag nyid kun tu bzang // nam mkha'i
102b6(rgyud 'bum): khams ni kun tu khyab/ / mkha' dbyings sa yi mchog gyur par// khang pa brtsegs par rnam par sgom// khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus dkyil du// dkyil 'khor lnga ni rnam par brtag/
102b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes pa la// ji ltar gnas su rnam par dgod// dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// sngar bshad sku mdog gnas rnams dang /
103a1(rgyud 'bum): phag mo'i bde la rnam par gnas// shar du pu lI ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma'o// byang du dz+wA lad+ha rar keng rus chen po dang / rab gtum ma'i
103a2(rgyud 'bum): mig can ma'o/ / nub tu oMr+yan la keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma'o// lho ru ar pu dar mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma'o// dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i shar gyi dkyil
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dbus su go dA ba rir lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// shar phyogs su rA me sha rar 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o// byang phyogs su de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang /
103a4(rgyud 'bum): lang ga'i dbang phyug ma'o// nub tu mA la pa na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma'o// lho phyogs su kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
103a5(rgyud 'bum): su o tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o// shar du tri sha ku ne na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// byang du ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung
103a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / nub phyogs su ka ling ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o// lho phyogs su lAM pa ka na rdo rje rab bzang dang / shin tu bzang mo'o// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
103a7(rgyud 'bum): su kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o// shar phyogs su hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma'o// byang du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor le'i shugs can
103b1(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / nub tu gri ha de brtan rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o// lho ru so raSh+Ta na ta mgrin dang / chang 'tsheng ma'o// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su su waN dI pa na nam
103b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// shar du na ga ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo'o// byang du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// nub tu
103b3(rgyud 'bum): ma ru na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// lho ru ku lu ta na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab
103b4(rgyud 'bum): gtum ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang gzugs sna tshogs pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas rgyas btab pa
103b5(rgyud 'bum): lha mo gcer bu skra grol ba/ zod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug dang / rdo rje dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ lha mo'i byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ dgyes pa
103b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i dga' ba'i ros rnam par myos pa'o/ / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dpa' bo yin// zur bzhi bum pa'i steng du ni// byang chub sems kyis yongs gang ba'i// thod ba'i snod ni
103b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi zur la ni// bum pa'i thod pa gnyis po dgod// mtshams kyi char mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po gzugs phyed pa bud med dbang
104a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma ste/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ phyag rgya lnga brtan par
104a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje 'phreng bas yongs bskor ba// dkyil 'khor lnga yi phyi rol tu// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bri// dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i
104a3(rgyud 'bum): steng du yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ sgo bzhi'i shar phyogs su khA gdong ma khros pa'i mig can/ shel mig khros pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa
104a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / kha T+wAM dang / dril bu dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/
104a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs te/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa'o// 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi mdor ma dang / phag
104a6(rgyud 'bum): gdong ma ni/ ji ltar khwa gdong ma'i mdog dang / phyag dang / 'dug stangs dang / gdan bzhin no// bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ra dang / byi la'i zhal te/ shin tu drag
104a7(rgyud 'bum): pos mngon du gsol ba'o/ / gshin rje sreg ma nas/ gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar ni gar byed pa'i dbang phyug ma ste/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas
104b1(rgyud 'bum): btung bas gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang yi dgas mnan pa/ phyag rgya lngas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zong pa dang khajug 'dzin pa/ mgo bo dang gri gug bsnams
104b2(rgyud 'bum): nang te'u dang / rdo rje dang / mdung 'dzin pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ thams cad kyang mi mgo'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba rgyan du 'chang ba/ zod pa
104b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// cod pan rdo rje'i 'phreng bas byas// rdo rje las byas rgyan can te// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis// dbul mnan cing brgyan
104b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// rdo rje phag mo'i zhal mdog phyag/ phyag rgya 'dug stangs las kyang de// gcer bu sgra ni grol ba ste// dum bu'i ska rags rgyan can te/
104b5(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang rdo rje phag mo yi// steng gi zhal gdong dkar po ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o// ji ltar gnas kyi rim pa dag/ 'bum pa mngon brjod rim pa las// rnal 'byor
104b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ / le'u rdo rje sems dpas bshad// gzhan du rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang // mngon brjod rgyud kyi dang po yi// le'u la nges par 'gal ba med// snyems pa'i dkyil
104b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni cho ga ste/ / lnga po lnga pa'i bdag nyid sbyor chen po// sdom pa'i cho ga sbas pa gsang ba ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni ma lus thams cad kyi// 'di ltar gzhan du bka' yi phyogs bzhin
105a1(rgyud 'bum): du/ bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa// bum pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin// gser dang dngul las byas pa ste// sna tshogs gos kyis mdzes pa dang // me tog 'phreng
105a2(rgyud 'bum): bas rnam par brgyan/ / 'chi med lnga yis yongs su bkang // rnam lnga sman dang yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa dang // 'bru lnga dag gis rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor
105a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ / bum pa bcu drug gzhag nas kyang // mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs mchod// glu dang gar dang bde ba che// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// sna tshog
105a4(rgyud 'bum): rol mo'i sgra dag dang / / sna tshogs yi dgas 'phreng ba yis// dkyil 'khor phyi rol yongs su bskor// de yi phyi rol su khyud kyi// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma yin te// phyi rol ska rags
105a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bskor ba/ / dur khrod rnam par 'jigs pa dag/ sna tshogs du mas rnam par mdzes// mdun du ye shes dam tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong nas kyang // mngon brjod dam
105a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig de bzhin mchod/ / rim pa bzhin du dbang yang bskur// mkhas pas lus la bkod nas ni// gcig tu bsdus te thim nas su// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// phung po khams dang
105a7(rgyud 'bum): skye mched rnams/ / go cha gnyis po bgo bar bya// 'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgoms nas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // lus ngag yid la rnam par dgod// ye shes sems
105b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' snying la dgod/ / sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba yi// dam tshig lha yi mchod pas mchod// ye shes bzlas pa'i bya ba dag/ grangs med pa ni rnam par spros// dung chen 'phreng ba blang
105b2(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya// de ni ye shes 'khor lo la// mkhas pas mchod bstod bzlas pa bya// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor pa
105b3(rgyud 'bum): / yis smon lam gdab// theg pa chen po'i chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor pa yis myur bas 'grub// oM badz+ra he he ru ru kaM shrI DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/
105b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM khaN+Da ka pA li ka ra ka ra huM hUM phaT/
105b5(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA kI ka la ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tsaN+DA kI ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM kaM ka la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pra b+ha ba tI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM
105b6(rgyud 'bum): bi ka TA da~MSh+Ti Na trA sa ya~M trA sa ya hu~M hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hAnA sa hu~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM su ra bI ra N+Do k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha la huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bI ra ma tI le tsu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a mi tA b+hA hr-i dz+riM huM hUM phaT
105b7(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ oM khawa rI ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pra b+hA hra hriM huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM lo ke sha rI ye hu~M pU phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra da ha pa pheM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dru matsA le huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a~M ku
106a1(rgyud 'bum): ri ka phaT phaT huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ai ra ba tI le huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra dza Ti la da ha da ha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA bI ra pa tsa pa
106a2(rgyud 'bum): tsahuM hUM phaT swAh+ma/ oM bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra hUM kA ra b+huk+Sha b+hak+Sha be sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM su b+ha dra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta/
106a3(rgyud 'bum): pA tA la ga ta b+hu dza ga sarba pA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+yA ma de bI la hu~M hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra b+ha dra A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM suM b+ha dre huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA b+he ra ba hr-i hriM hu hUM/
106a4(rgyud 'bum): phaT swA hA/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bi rU pUk+ShaM dz+r-IM dz+r-IM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM khaM gA na ne huhUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA ba la k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM rat+na baH
106a5(rgyud 'bum): haha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khaN+Da ro ha huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM ha ya gri ba hriM hriM hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shoN+Do nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AM kA sha gar+b+ha hu~M hUM huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tsakra wa rmi NI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/
106a6(rgyud 'bum): oM he ru ka ki li ki li huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pad+ma narte shwa ri si li si li huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bai ro tsa ni hi li hi li huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM
106a7(rgyud 'bum): tsakra warti nI le huM hUM phaT swA hU~M/ oM badz+ra satwa d+hi li d+hi lo ts+yai pU phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA bIr+ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM DA ka~M ni ye huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM lA me tsu hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT swAhA/
106b1(rgyud 'bum): oM rU pi NI ye huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM kA kA s+ye phuhUM phaT swA hA/ oM u lU kA s+ye hu~M hUM phaT swAt+ma/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM phruM phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma dA n+d+hi ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/
106b2(rgyud 'bum): / oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma daSh+Ti Ni ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma ma the ni ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni ji lta'i rim pa ya sa// gzhan la phan phyir dam tshig can// mchod dang
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom dang bzlas pa bya/ / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa 'phel// yid du 'ong ba'i dngos grub thob// sgong skyes dbye ba'i mchog dam pa// sbyor bas 'dod pa thams cad stsol// ji lta'i las
106b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams byas nas ni/ / 'grub par yang ni the tsom med// sbyor ba'i dngos grub dam pa'i mchog/ bla ma'i ngag las rnyed par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma yi gnas// brgyud pa'i
106b5(rgyud 'bum): rim pa'i mchog gyur pa/ / yang na sngon gyi dngos grub ni// rmi lam du ni ston pa yin// gzhan yang bla ma'i go 'phang brnyes pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yis rab tu stsol// dam tshig mchog gi
106b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dang / / sbas pa 'di ni bstan mi bya// rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dang ni// sangs rgyas thugs ni mchog gyur pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po gsang // rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog yin
106b7(rgyud 'bum): no/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dngos grub kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don kun srub byed pa// bla ma
107a1(rgyud 'bum): las kyang bla ma ste/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// phag mo bdag mo chen mo ni// rnal 'byor ma yis legs bsgrubs pa// 'di ni kun gyi rnal 'byor te// rnal
107a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor snying po bsdus pa yin/ / pad+ma 'dab brgyad la bri ba// sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa// lte ba ge sar bcas pa la// thams cad yongs su dag pa'i gdan// de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha//
107a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dag cing dri ma med// de steng A li kA li ste// dbus su baM gyi rnam pas brgyan// de dbus lha mo bzhengs pa ni// rdo rje phag mo rnal 'byor ma// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis//
107a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// gar gyi rnam par legs brgyan cing // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal// dkar
107a5(rgyud 'bum): la dmar ba'i gzugs 'dzin cing / / thod pa'i cod pan rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang // pad+ma 'khyil bas rnam bskor cing // dpral ba yi ni phyag rgya 'bar// gnyis
107a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis mi yi pags pa mnabs/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug tshangs pa yi// mgo bo gdong ni bzhi pa ste// sngo zhing ser la
107a7(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba yi/ / zhal gyis lha mo rnam par brgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing // zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan mtshan// dngos grub thams cad
107b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu stsol/ / phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing // lha mo dum bu'i ska rags brgyan// g.yer ka'i ska rags sgra dang ldan// rkang gdub dag gis legs par brgyan// dpung rgyan dag
107b2(rgyud 'bum): gis rnam par mdzes/ / dpral ba la ni rdo rje'i 'phreng // rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya can// sku las mdzes shing yid 'phrog pa'o// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma// seng ge'i gdong ste
107b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'jigs/ / g.yon du phag gi gdong can te// lha mo lA ma rab 'jigs ma// nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdong // dum skyes ma ni dbang ma'o// lho ru lha mo'i tshul can ni// gzugs
107b4(rgyud 'bum): can ma ste rta yi gdong / / spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs gzugs// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mgo dang gri gug phyag na bsnams// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la// gar gyis kyang ni
107b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par mdzes/ / yi dgas rgyab la skyil krung phyed// bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing rab tu 'jigs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ lha mo'i zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan// me
107b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs mtshams ni bzhi po la/ / byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bum pa'i steng du rnam par dgod// dung dang kun zla ba'i mdog/ 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bri// mkhas pas
107b7(rgyud 'bum): dedabus bri ba ni/ / ma mo'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste// mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba ste// lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug/ dkar dang sngo
108a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dmar ba'i zhal/ / lha mo rtag pa'i rigs yin no// ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba yi// lha mo las kyi rigs yin no// dmar dang ser dang ljang khu yi//
108a2(rgyud 'bum): mo pad+ma'i rigs yin no// spyan gsum pa la skra grol zhing // phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan//
108a3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rang gi phyag mtshan bzhi pa ste// rdo rje 'khor lo kun rdo rje// pad+ma dmar po mchog dam pa// thams cad de bzhin dril bu 'dzin// thod pa 'khyil pas rnam par
108a4(rgyud 'bum): bskor/ / bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam gnon cing // gar dang glu yis bzhad pa'i zhal// sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs// rigs kyi dngos grub rab ster ba'o// phyag na mgo
108a5(rgyud 'bum): bo cang te'u bsnams/ / rdo rje gri gug gis rnam brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams cad du// gnas la
108a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i rim pa dgod/ / shar du rtsibs drug 'khor lo la// ji lta'i rjes 'brang lha mo dgod// thog ma'i zur la pu lI ra// ma la ya na rab gtum ma'o// gnyis pa
108a7(rgyud 'bum): dzA lan+d+ha ra na gtum mig ma'o/ / gsum pa oMr+yan na 'od ldan ma'o// bzhi pa ar bu ngan sna chen ma'o// lnga pa go dA ba rin dpa' ba'i blo gros ma'o// drug pa rA me shwa ra na mi'u thung ma'o//
108b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs drug pa/ dang po de bi ko Ta na lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// gnyis pa mA la ba na shing grib ma'o// gsum pa kA ma rU pa na sa srungs ma'o// bzhi
108b2(rgyud 'bum): pa o tre na 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ / lnga pa tri sha ku ne na rlung gi shugs can ma'o// drug pa ko sa la na chang 'thung ma'o// nub kyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar du ka ling ka na sngo
108b3(rgyud 'bum): bsangs lha mo'o/ / gnyis pa laM pA ka na rab bzang ma'o// gsum pa kAny+tsi na rta rna ma'o// bzhi pa hi ma la ya na bya gdong ma'o// lnga pa pre ta pu ri na 'khor le'i shugs can ma'o// drug
108b4(rgyud 'bum): ba gri ha de ba ta na dum skyes ma'o/ / lho'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar la sau raSh+Ta na chang 'tsheng ma'o// gnyis pa na su bar+Na dI pa na 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// gsum pa na ga ra na rab tu
108b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo'o/ / bzhi pa sin+d+hu na stobs chen ma'o// lnga pa ma ru ta na 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// drug pa ku lu ta na brtson 'grus chen mo'o// thog ma dkar zhing ldang ba dang // thod pa dang ni kha
108b6(rgyud 'bum): DA ga/ 'khor lo cang te'u gri gug go/ gnyis pa byang ni sngo la ser// rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u dang ni gri gug go// gsum pa nub ni dmar la ser// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/
108b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma cang te'u gri gug go// bzhi pa lho yi lha mo ni// ser dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang // cing te'u gri gug thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga yang yongs su 'dzin// lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
109a1(rgyud 'bum): phyed ni bud me dbang phyug ma'o// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // skyil mo krung phyed gar bcas pas// yi dgas rgyub la
109a2(rgyud 'bum): zhabs kyis bzhugs/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rkang rgyan dang ni ska rags dang // dbu rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// 'khor lo de yi rgyab tu
109a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ shar du rdo rje 'phreng bas bskor// byang du 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba ste// nub tu sna tshogs rdo rje 'phreng // lho ru pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'o// dbus su rdo rje 'phreng bas brgyan// zur
109a4(rgyud 'bum): cha ni thams cad du/ / sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam par bri// de rgyab yi dgas sna tshogs kyi// 'phreng bas mkhas pas bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo rnams dang // zung
109a5(rgyud 'bum): cha ni bzhi po la/ / mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i gzugs de ni// mnyam par bzhag nas bri zhing dgod// kha gdong shar du dgod pa ste// sngo la dmar dang yid 'phrog pa// 'ug gdong
109a6(rgyud 'bum): byang sgor dgod pa ste/ / ldang zhing dmar la legs par mdzes// khyi gdong nub kyi sgo la ni// ser zhing dud kha rab tu gdug/ phag gdong lho ru dgod pa ni// ldang zhing sngo ba'i gzug
109a7(rgyud 'bum): can no/ / spyan gsum bzhin bsgyur rab gdug cing // dam pa phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba'o// mig g.yon dang ni gzugs mi sdug/ g.yal brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// sna
109b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs/ / phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// gcer bu skra grol rnam par
109b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs/ / gshin rje sreg ma ma he gdong // me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// gshin rje pho nya bong bu'i gdong // bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// gshin rje mche ba
109b3(rgyud 'bum): rnga mo'i gdong / / gdug pa rlung phyogs rab tu bzhugs// gshin rje 'joms ma rta yi gdong // 'di dag chags pas rab tu myos// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs
109b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can yid 'phrog ma'o/ / gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la// skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sku// sna tshogs
109b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs/ / mi sdug rjes su chags pas myos// thams cad yi dgas steng na bzhugs// 'khor lo sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //
109b6(rgyud 'bum): gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang // phyag g.yas dag na cang te'u yi// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ phyi rol bskor ba'i tshul can no// gzhan du rnam pa du ma yi// glu dang gar gyi
109b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / / sna tshogs dam tshig pA yi// me tog spos dang mar me dang // dri dang 'phreng ba byug pa dang // lha yi gos kyi rnam pa dang // lha mo sil snyan mchog dam pa// phyi
110a1(rgyud 'bum): rol rnal 'byor ma dag mchod/ / de yi dbus mdun mtha' yas pa'i// thams cad du ni 'khor yongs kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba'i// phag
110a2(rgyud 'bum): mo'i mchog ni dam pa dang / / rnal 'byor ma gdug rnams kyang mchod// mchog 'di dag ni gsang zhing sba// su la yang ni mi brjod do// phyi rol yi dgas 'phreng ba yis//
110a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog gi rang bzhin ni// rnam par 'phrul pa dgod bya ste// ji lta'i rim pas rjes su dgod// sen mo so ni rab gtum ma'o// sgra dang spu ni gtum mig ma'o//
110a4(rgyud 'bum): pags pa dang dri ma ni 'od ldan ma'o// sha ni sna chen ma'o// rtsa rgyus ni dpa' ba'i blo gros ma'o// rus pa ni mi'u thung ma'o// mkhal ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// snying ni shing
110a5(rgyud 'bum): grib ma'o/ / mig ni sa srungs ma'o// mkhris pa ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// glo ba ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// rgyu ma ni chang 'thung ma'o// gnye ma ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//
110a6(rgyud 'bum): lto ba ni rab bzangs lha mo'o// lgang ba ni rta rna ma'o// sgra mtshams ni bya gdong ma'o// bad kan ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// rnag ni dum skyes ma'o// khrag ni chang 'tshong ma'o//
110a7(rgyud 'bum): rdul ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// tshil ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// mchi ma ni stobs chen ma'o// mchil ma ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// snabs ni brtson chen ma'o// pul+lI ra ma la ya ste mgo ba
110b1(rgyud 'bum): la rab gtum ma'o/ / dzA lan d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug la gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// oMr+yan te rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o// ar bu da ste spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma'o// go dA ba ri
110b2(rgyud 'bum): ste rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ / rA me shA ra ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de bi ko Ta ste mig tu lang ka' dbang phyug ma'o// mA la ba ste phrag pa gnyis su ni shing
110b3(rgyud 'bum): grib ma'o/ / kA ma rU pa ste mig gnyis la sa srungs me'o// o tre ste nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo'o// tri sha ku ne ste lte bar rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko sa la ste sA
110b4(rgyud 'bum): rtser ni chang 'thung ma'o/ / ka ling ka ste khar ni shA ma de bA'o// laM pA ka ste mgrin par shin tu bzang mo'o// kAny+tsi ste snying khar na rta rna ma'o// hi ma la la ste mngoms su ni bya gdo
110b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / pre ta pu ri ste mtshan ma la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// gri ha de ba ste gzhang la ni dum skyes ma'o// sau raSh+Ta ste brla gnyis la ni chang 'tshong ma'o// su bar+Na dI pa ste rje ngar
110b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ / na ga ra ste sor mo rnams la dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen ma'o// ma ru ste mthe bong gnyis la 'khor lo sgyur ma'o//
110b7(rgyud 'bum): ku lu ta ste pus mo gnyis la brtson chen ma'o// sa'i khams ni 'bebs ma/ chu'i khams ni gsod ma/ me'i khams ni 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o//
111a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i drab ma'o// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/ tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni gar gyi dbang phyug/
111a2(rgyud 'bum): 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje chags pa/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje shrI he ru ka'o// mig ni gti mug rdo rje
111a3(rgyud 'bum): pani zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna ni phrag dog rdo rje/ ngag ni chags pa rdo rje/ lus ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ ling ni mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ ngag ni dpag med rdo rje/
111a4(rgyud 'bum): lus ni snang mdzad rdo rje/ 'di dag dgod par bya ba ni// ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba yin// sbyor ba 'di la gnas na ni// de yis thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur// dbang bskur
111a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod dang dam tshig dang / / sgom pa mnyam pa bcud du byed// de snying ye shes sems dpa' la// ye shes bdud rtsi bcud kyis mchod// lus ngag yid kyi dam tshig rnams//
111a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dang sems min legs par brtag/ bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog thams cad spangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal
111a7(rgyud 'bum): po mchog kyang bzla/ / oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI le tsu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI le badz+ra bar+N+Na nI ye huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ bstod dang ma dang yang dag sbyar// pU hUM phaT dang ldan pa yi// rab
111b1(rgyud 'bum): gtum ma sogs gsang sngags dag/ sbyar nas mchog gi bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i btung ba mchog kyang btung // chos rnams thams
111b2(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs mnyam pa'i/ / mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te// de bas de bsgoms rnam par dag/ sum cu bdun pa'i go 'phang mchog/ bdag med chos dang lam dang ni//
111b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog la rab tu bzhugs// shes rab pha rol rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor las ni ngal bsos nas// mtshan med go 'phang gnas nas su// mtshan med la ni
111b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par brten/ / chos rnams med cing mtshan ma med// chos min chos can dag kyang med// rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam// dngos po med cing mtshan ma med//
111b5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gzhi la 'dir gnas na// ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin// gnas sogs 'khor lo nges par yang // nyi zer rdul dang mnyam par mthong // skra yi rtse mo 'bum gshags
111b6(rgyud 'bum): papa'i/ / cha yang yongs su rtogs shing mthong // b+ha ga'i dbus na bzhugs pa yis// he ru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ 'khor lo sgyur ba rab sbyor ba// khwa gdong la sogs phyi rol
111b7(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / he ru ka dpal bdag po ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor// phan tshun bdag po bya ba ni// rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba ni// rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub//
112a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ khams gsum bdag po chen po ni// rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur// mi 'grub 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / khams gsum/
112a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur// grub na de na rnal 'byor che// srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob// de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// stobs kyis shi ba bza' bar bya// mtshams med
112a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni byed pa dag/ bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab// gzhan du dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'bras// phyugs bsad pa yi sbyor ba ni//
112a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya// lha bshos sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'o// ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu// mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te// gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu// dbang po gnyis ni
112a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba/ / mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya// phag mo ru ni bdag bsgoms te// lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhag nas ni//
112a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs// lha mo rab tu dang byas nas// sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang // snying po pad+ma phug nas ni// rnal 'byor ma ni brgyab tsam gyis// maskyes
112a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni btung bar bya/ / bsnun pa de yis zos na ni// sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gnas sgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i
112b1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i cho ga dang // rnal 'byor ma yi gnas 'byung ba// 'dus
112b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bdag gis bshad par bya/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// bla ma'i bka' las gzhan du min// thams cad mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// nges par legs pa stsol bar 'gyur//
112b3(rgyud 'bum): re'u mig dgu pa dbus su ste// phyi rol du ni bcu drug bri// re'u mig dbus kyi dkyil du yang // shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bri// sna tshogs pad+ma brgyad pa ste// lte ba dang ni ge ser bcas//
112b4(rgyud 'bum): dedabus zla ba bltar byas te// a la sogs pa rnam par sbyar// A li kA li mnyam byas te// hUM ni nang du chud par bya// rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom//
112b5(rgyud 'bum): zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa ste// phag mo yis ni yongs su brgyan// dkar zhing sngo la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu ser po steng du ste// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas
112b6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ / 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid// shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba dbu rgyun can// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pas mdzes//
112b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rdo rje cong pan can// ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbul 'ching // phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing // srul rdo rje rgyan gyis spud// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// bde ba chen po
113a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba mchog/ rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te// thong pa kha nA tshangs pa'i mgo/ dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o// g.yas
113a2(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yon gyi phyag la ni/ / na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs// zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni// phag mo yis mi ba sbyar byas// de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs
113a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste// stag gi pags pa gos su man pas// dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can// drag po'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// thugs rje'i chags
113a4(rgyud 'bum): pas rnam par myos/ / shar gyi 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma// byang du lA ma mkha' 'gro ma// nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma// gnag dang
113a5(rgyud 'bum): sngo bsangs dmar ser skya/ / phyogs kyi gos 'chang g.yas brkyang bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skra grol gnyis su med pa ste// zur gyi tshan thams cad du//
113a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag/ thod pa kha T+wAM dril bu dang // cang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs// zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur// drag po chags pa'i chags
113a7(rgyud 'bum): pas myos/ / bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni// bde ba che la rjes su chags// mgo bo'i do shal 'chang ba yis// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// 'di ltar re'u mig
113b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus dkyil du/ / mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya// de yi shar gyi re'u mig la// pul+lI ra ma la la mthong ba'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste ser po'o// byang du dzA lan+ta
113b2(rgyud 'bum): ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste sngon po'o// nub tu aur+ya na na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste dkar po'o// lho ru ar pu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /
113b3(rgyud 'bum): sna chen ma ste ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su go da ba ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmar po'o// bden bral du rA me shA ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste pad+ma'i
113b4(rgyud 'bum): mdog can no/ / rlung phyogs su da bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste dud kha sngon po'o// dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ljang khu dang /
113b5(rgyud 'bum): mu tig lta bu'o// phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o// de la re'u mig gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma ste dmar po'o// byang du o tre na
113b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste ljang khu'o// nub tu tri sha ku ne na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste sngon po'o// lce phyogs su ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad deng /
113b7(rgyud 'bum): chang 'thung ma ste dkar po'o// me'i phyogs su ka ling ka na rab bza' dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam mkha' ser skya'o// bden bral du laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste
114a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar po'o/ / rlung gi phyogs su kA po tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste ser po'o// dbang ldan du nyi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste
114a2(rgyud 'bum): sngon po'o/ / pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o// re'u mig gsum pa'i shar du pre ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste nam mkha' dang ser skya'o//
114a3(rgyud 'bum): byang du gri ha de ba tA na rdo rje 'od dang / dum skyes ma ste ser po'o// nub tu sau raSh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang 'tsheng ma ste dmar po'o// lho phyogs su su bar+Na dI pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang /
114a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i go cha me ste sngon po'o// me'i phyogs su na ga ran dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste dud pa'i mdog can no// bden bral du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
114a5(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen ma ste ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma ste sngon po'o// dbang ldan du ku lu tan rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus
114a6(rgyud 'bum): chen mo ste dkar po'o/ / 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o// gzhan yang thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa/ phyag
114a7(rgyud 'bum): drug pa/ zhal gsum pa ste/ zhal ni man ngag gi rjes su 'brang bas bstan/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa
114b1(rgyud 'bum): gos su mnabs/ / mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i cod pan can// rdo rje 'phreng nga 'bang 'khor lo// ji lta'i rim pas dpral bar brgyan// lha mo
114b2(rgyud 'bum): skra grol gcer bu ste/ / byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
114b3(rgyud 'bum): rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i gzugs can la bkod nas// ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag
114b4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi/ / de la sgo srungs rnams kyang dgod// mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams// mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste// cho ga du ma thos nas ni// 'bad pas gcig tu
114b5(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa yin/ / shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni// bya rog chu skyar zhal yin te// mi'u thung la mi sdug zhal//
114b6(rgyud 'bum): byangago sgor ni 'ug gu dang // 'ug pa byil rnam mdzes te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong gi/ lce bskyong 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma// nub tu b+ha ba gi zhes pa// khyi da sa
