114b7(rgyud 'bum): ge'i gdong pa can/ / g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa yi// lce bskyong shin tu mdzes pa'o// lce phyogs sa 'dzin lha mo ni// phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal
115a1(rgyud 'bum): gdong ni/ / zab cing drag la 'jigs pa'o// thog ma khwa gdong zhes bya ba// gnyis pa 'ug pa de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la// bzhi pa dag ni
115a2(rgyud 'bum): phag nyid do/ / sngo dang dung kha dkar po'i gdong // ljang khu ser po dmar po ste// ser zhing dmar la sngo ba'i zhal// dkar dang sngo dang ljang khu'i mdog/ dang po me nas dbang ldan par//
115a3(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo// gshin rje mche ba 'joms pa nyid// dmar dang ser dang ljang khu dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang khu dang // dud kha ser dang ljang khu dang // dkar dang
115a4(rgyud 'bum): ser dang ljang khu ste/ / de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// spyan gsum g.yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyang // dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste//
115a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing // 'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang // yi dgas steng du rnam par bzhugs// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs//
115a6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ zhags pa lcags kyu cang te'u dang // mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos//
115a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni// 'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur ba'o// de nas gshin rje sreg sogs sgo// kha gdong la sogs mtshams su ste// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par
115b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni// 'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang // ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang // mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de
115b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / ji bzhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin// ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor sgom// bum pa sna tshogs sbyor
115b3(rgyud 'bum): pab yis/ / thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan// 'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni// bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya// phyi rol yongs su bskor ba ste// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa//
115b4(rgyud 'bum): glu dang gar ni nyid ldan pas// sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste// sna tshogs dam tshig ro yi zas// sna tshogs
115b5(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba chang gis mchod/ / dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa// phyi rol yi dgas kyis yongs bskor// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom// bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin du// /
115b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje ba bskor 'khor le ni// zur bzhi par ni rab tu gnas// mtshams su rdo rje phyed pas mtshan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun dbus su// re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya// sna tshogs pa
115b7(rgyud 'bum): yi cho ga mchog/ gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya// khams dang phung po de bzhin te// skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod// ye shes rdo rje rnam par sgom// sku gsung thugs su
116a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na// ar+g+haM zhabs bsil dag gis mchod// dam tshig sna tshogs mchog dam pa// sna tshogs pa yi khyad par
116a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / mAM sa rak+ta dag gis mchod// go cha gnyis po sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya ye shes mchog dam pa// ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni// ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgom//
116a3(rgyud 'bum): reg pa yi ni khyad par gyis// mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar// bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don// mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba
116a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / dam tshig gsum gyi mchog gis bza'// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa'i sgom pa rnam par sgom// dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can// gnas sbyor
116a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas bsrung bar bya/ / sa steng du ni mthong ba kun// thams cad he ru ka dpal gzugs// 'gro ba drug po'i srid pa sbyangs// sems can don ni gzhal med byas//
116a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhugs te bzhugs sbyor bas// 'dis ni thams cad gzhug par bya// 'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste// nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dung chen 'phreng ba dag
116a7(rgyud 'bum): gis ni/ / dam tshig mchog gis bzlas pa bya// tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags mchog bzla// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM DA ki ni dz+wa la saM ba raM hu
116b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrI ha ha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT+Ta swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ phag mo
116b2(rgyud 'bum): / snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM ka ra ka ra khaN+Da ka pA li huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kaM ka la huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tsaN+DA k+ShI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/
116b3(rgyud 'bum): / oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kaM ka la huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tra sa ya trA sa ya di ka Ta daMSh+NI Na huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se hu hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha yak+Sho byA ya su ra bai ri Na huM hUM phaT/
116b4(rgyud 'bum): oM bI ri ma tI ye phuM hUM phaT/ oM hrauM hriM a mi tA b+hA hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM hA hri badz+ra pra b+hA huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ka shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM badz+rA de ha huM hUM phaT/
116b5(rgyud 'bum): dru mun+te ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT aM ku ri ke huM hUM phaT/ oM ai ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha badz+ra dza Ta la huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa ma hA bi ra hu
116b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badz+ra hUM ka ra ba sa ru d+hi ra an+ta mA lA ba laM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na su b+ha dra sap+ta pA tA la ga taM b+hu dzaM ga
116b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM shwa ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya badz+ra b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre hu~M hUM phaT/ oM hrIM hU~M ma hA b+hai ra ba huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/
117a1(rgyud 'bum): a d+hidz+nyo bi rU mAk+Sha tsu hUM phaT/ oM kha gA nanen huM hUM phaT/ oMk+ShAM k+ShA ma hA ba le huM hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra be ge ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM ha ha rat+na badz+rany+tsahUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da
117a2(rgyud 'bum): huM hUM phaT/ oM hau hau ha ya grI ba hu~M hUM phaT/ oM shauN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM AM kA sha gar+b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmi NI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM kI li ki li he ru ka huM hUM phaT/ oM
117a3(rgyud 'bum): su b+h+r-i ra hu~M hUM phaT/ oM sho la~M shi l-i pad+ma neH shwa ri hu~M hUM baT+Te/ oM ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hi li hi la~M bai ro tsa nA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakrA brti ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+ha li d+hi li badz+rA
117a4(rgyud 'bum): satwa huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM DA kau nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM
117a5(rgyud 'bum): u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA T+Ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma
117a6(rgyud 'bum): tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis// rdo rje bkug cing gnas nas su// 'khrug cing rab tu g.yo ba ste// lus las 'od 'bar 'god pa dang // de yi
117a7(rgyud 'bum): mig ni 'bar ba dang / / tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang // rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyi// rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang // sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlas nas ni//
117b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas// srog dang rtsol ba bsdam byas te// gsal byed hUM ni brjod nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya// sems can kun la phan pa dang //
117b2(rgyud 'bum): gdul dka' ba dag gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro// khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas// khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya// lus ngag yid la
117b3(rgyud 'bum): bcug nas kyang / / sa steng du ni spyod pa spyad// mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rjes brlan pa nyid kyis ni// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// srid pa
117b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum po he ru ka/ sngags pa ci dang ci za ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang // thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas// dam tshig
117b5(rgyud 'bum): can ni langs dus su/ / bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas// byang chub sems kyi chus khrus byas// yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas// khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor
117b6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang mkha' 'gro ma'i/ / go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas// yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad// mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la// smon lam dag ni bya ba yin//
117b7(rgyud 'bum): de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na// rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas// sems can rang bzhin dag pa ste// srid pa/
118a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu byas pa yin// rdo rje phag mo bla med pa// phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag/ mngon
118a2(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ re'u mig dgod pa dang gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// gnas dang
118a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa mchog yin pas/ / dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni// mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur// gnyis med blos ni mnyam gzhag ste// 'khor lo gsum mdog ldan
118a4(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog/ de yi dbus su pad+ma che// sna tshogs pad+ma legs par mdzes// 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar
118a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / ge sar dag gis nye bar mdzes// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// 'phreng ba dang ni 'phreng phyed brgyan// mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag
118a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// A li kA li zhu gyur las// ye shes lnga ni rnam par sgom// de yi yongs su 'phel 'gyur bas//
118a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje he ru ka rnam sgom// dus mtha'i me chen 'chol ba yis// gdul dka' thams cad rab tu bsreg/ 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing /
118b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs// sku lus dag ni sngon po las// sngo zhing 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan
118b2(rgyud 'bum): can/ / sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlab// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes// zhal drug dpa' bo mi sdug pa// sgeg pa dang ni bzhad pa dang /
118b3(rgyud 'bum): drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing // sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud// phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan// byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'byung //
118b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing // g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ha ha mdzad cing huM hUM mdzad// hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can// huM hUM mdzad cing phaT phaT
118b5(rgyud 'bum): can/ / a Ta Ta yi sgra chen sgra// sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po de bzhin te// steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che// zas su gdug pa longs spyod cing // rdo rje dril
118b6(rgyud 'bum): bu mnyam ldan pas/ / lha mo dag ni nu ma 'tshir// drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing // khrag rlon 'dzag pa rab gsol te// thod pa dang mi kha T+wAM 'dzin// mdung dang gri
118b7(rgyud 'bum): gug lcags kyu dang / / zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gdug pa gtun shing cang te'u dang // mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can// 'brel pa dag tu rnam par mdzes// de lta'i
119a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag dang sku mdog bzhugs/ / dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste// 'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par sgom// dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing // phag mo yang ni
119a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'drar sgom/ / rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas ni// thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis// sems can don gyi phyir byung ste// snying
119a3(rgyud 'bum): rje chen pos brlan pa yi/ / nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis// thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas// 'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas// sems can don ni mchog nyid mdzad//
119a4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing // rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la// rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra// thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas ni//
119a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa// snying nge ye shes dam tshig ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas// zla ba'i rdo rje sa bon ni// de 'dir
119a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po bsgom bya ste/ / bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor dag tu brtag/ mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis// pad+ma dag ni dgod par bya// shar du mkha' 'gro dgod par bya// byang du de
119a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lA ma ste/ / nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma// sngo dang ldang dang dmar ba dang // ser te de bzhin bzhi po ni// bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing spyan gsum
119b1(rgyud 'bum): gdug/ skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi dpung pa la
119b2(rgyud 'bum): brten cing / / cang te'u gri gug mgo bo ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog/ byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i// thod pa bum pa'i steng du gzhag/ 'khor lo dgod par
119b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni/ / sngon du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// byin gyis brlab sogs rim pa yis// shar phyogs byang gi rim pa ste// pul+lI ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma sde
119b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' ser skya'o/ / dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma sde mdog ser po'o// or+ya na na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste mdog ljang khu'o// ar pu da
119b5(rgyud 'bum): na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste mdog nam mkha' ser skya'o// go dA ba ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste mdog ser po/ rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang
119b6(rgyud 'bum): mi'u thung ma ste mdog ljang khu/ / de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste nam mkha' ser skya// mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste mdog ser po/ kA na
119b7(rgyud 'bum): rUrlub na myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma ste mdog ljang lu// o tren rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste nam mkha' dang ser skya/ tri sha ku ne na 'jigs byed chen po dang
120a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi shugs can ma ste mdog ser/ ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste mdog ljang khu ka ling ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam
120a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ser skya/ laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzang mo ste mdog ser/ kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste mdog ljang khu/ hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang /
120a3(rgyud 'bum): bya gdong ma ste nam mkha' ser skya// pre ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste mdog ser/ gr-i ha de ba tA na rdo rje ren chen dang / dum skyes ma ste mdog ljang khu'o//
120a4(rgyud 'bum): sau raSh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang 'tsheng ma ste nam mkha' ser skya'o// su bar+Na dI pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste mdog ser/ na ga ra na he ru ka dang / rab
120a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo ste mdog ljang khu/ sid+d+h+ya na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste nam mkha' ser skya/ ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma ste mdog ser
120a6(rgyud 'bum): ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste mdog ljang khu/ yang nar+m+ma gsung thugs kyi ni// ji ltar mdog ni dbye bar bya// g.yon gyi rim pa ji lta bar//
120a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag ni bya ba ste// shar du khwa gdong ma/ byang du 'ug gdong ma/ nub tu khyi gdong ma/ lho ru phag gdong ma/ sngo ba dang / ljang khu dang / dmar ba dang / ser po'i
120b1(rgyud 'bum): mdog can no/ / me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma mdog dmar po/ bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rje pho nya mo mdog sngon po/ rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma dung kha'am char
120b2(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi mdog lta bu dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar po ser skya'o/ / thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar
120b3(rgyud 'bum): gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ lha mo'i zhabs
120b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'khyud pa/ gcer bu mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas dpral ba brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'khyud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i
120b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dang ldan pa/ lha mo'i nu ma 'tshor ba/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ cang te'u 'chang ba/ yang na rigs gsum dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thams cad phyogs
120b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gos 'chang zhing / / lha mo skra grol gdug pa mo// khA ga la sogs lha mo rnams// skra grol phyogs kyi gos can la// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum
120b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la zhal rnams bsgyur/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i se ral brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga yang 'chang // 'dod pa'i chags pas rab tu myos/
121a1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu// mi g.yo ba dang de bzhin sbyor// lto ba 'phyang zhing lag pa 'phyang // sku lus 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur// rab
121a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs nyi ma pad+ma yi/ / steng du sgrub par rab gnas nas// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rjes su chags pas zhal nyid ni// de lta bu yi bsam pa yis// rnal 'byor
121a3(rgyud 'bum): pas ni bsgom par bya/ / thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // cang te'u gri gug mgo bo 'chang // dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun// yi dgas la ni bzhugs par sgom// mkha' 'gro'i
121a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ / nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor te// dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ sen mo dang so dag ni thod pa'i dum bu'o//
121a5(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang spu dag ni keng rus chen po'o// pags pa dang dri ma dag ni keng rus can no// sha ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o// rtsa rgyus ni lha dgra'o// rus pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//
121a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhal ma dag ni rdo rje 'od do// snying ni rdo rje sku'o// mig ni rdo rje myu gu can no// mkhris pa ni rdo rje ral pa can no// glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o// rgyu ma ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do// gnyem
121a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu bzanga' po'o/ / lto ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o// lgang ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'o// sgra mtshams ni mig mi bzang ngo // bad kan ni stobs po che'o// rnag ni rin chen rdo rje'o//
121b1(rgyud 'bum): / khrag ni rta mgrin no// rdul ni nam mkha'i snying po'o// tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o// mchi ma ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go// mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad do// sngabs ni rdo rje sems
121b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'o/ / pul+lI ra ma la ya ste mgo bor ni rab tu gtum ma'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// oMr+yan te rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o// a ra pu da ste spyi bo'i
121b3(rgyud 'bum): / rgyab tu sna chen ma ste gnas pa'o// go dA pa ri ste rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// rA me shwa ra ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de bi ko Ta ste mig tu ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//
121b4(rgyud 'bum): mA la ba ste phrag pa gnyis su ni shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so// kA ma rU pa ste mchan khung dag tu ni sa srungs ma'o// o tre ste nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo // tri sha ku
121b5(rgyud 'bum): niste lte bar ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ / ko sa la ste sna rtser ni chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka ling ka ste khar ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// laM pA ka ste mgrin par ni shin tu bzang mo ste
121b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa can no/ / kAny+tsi ste snying khar ni rta rna ma'o// hi ma la ya ste mdoms su ni bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// pre ta pu ri ste mtshan ma la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//
121b7(rgyud 'bum): gri ha da ba tA ste bshang ba'i lam la ni dum skyes ma ste 'dus pa can no// sau raSh+Ta ste brla gnyis su chang 'tshong ma'o// su bar+Na dI pa ste byin pa gnyis la 'khor le'i go cha ma ste nye ba'i
122a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa can no/ / na ga ra ste sor mo rnams la ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la ni stobs chen ma ste 'di dag ni dur khrod do// ma ru ste mthe
122a2(rgyud 'bum): bong dag la ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ / ku lu ta ste bus mo gnyis la ni brtson 'grus ma chen mo ste 'di dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do// sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni
122a3(rgyud 'bum): gsod byed ma'o/ / me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam
122a4(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad / / tsher ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go// 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems
122a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dpal he ru ka'o// mig gnyis ni gauta mug rdo rje'o// rna ba gnyis ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna gnyis ni ser sna rdo rje'o// kha ni
122a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ ngag ni dpag med rdo rje/ lus ni rdo rje rnam snang ngo //
122a7(rgyud 'bum): dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin// rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas su// de dag sprul cing bkod nas ni// ji lta'i rim pas dbang yang bskur/
122b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs par gyur nas bcing bar bya// dgyes pas rjes su chags pas sbyor// rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas// de la go cha gnyis po dgod// oM ha snying kha la rdo rje sems dpa'//
122b2(rgyud 'bum): / na ma hi mgo bo la rnam par snang mdzad/ swa ha hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ bau Sha Ta he phrag pa gnyis la he ru ka/ hUM hUM hoHmig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma/ phaT haM lus thams
122b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi go cha ste rta mchog go/ / oM baM lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o// rba yoM snying kha la ya mi ni'o// hU~M mau kha la rmongs byed ma'o// ho hU~M mgo la skyod byed ma'o// hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag
122b4(rgyud 'bum): byed ma'o/ / phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar// de ni dpral ba'i dbus
122b5(rgyud 'bum): su rab gzhag nas/ / bskor cing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya// rkang pa byed mnan steng du blta// gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrog cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i//
122b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug/ dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang // bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// mkha'
122b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil yongs su gang mthong nas/ / ye shes chu yi bdud rtsi yis// gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni// lag pa de la dbang bskur bya// glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis// dbang bskur
123a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni dbul bar bya/ / de la sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a g+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye tsu r+m+mA/ glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba 'am/ yang na mkha' 'gro ma
123a2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang rab tu dgyes par 'gyur te/ dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po/
123a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// a la la ho/ mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen
123a4(rgyud 'bum): po/ a la la ho/ bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni// dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs// ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni// ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin sgom//
123a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang // tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs btags// rdo rje phag mo'i sngags
123a6(rgyud 'bum): gang yin/ / mgul nas mgul du rnam par brgyan// lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni// 'phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing // gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis// nor bu rnacha
123a7(rgyud 'bum): legs mdzes shing / / sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma// pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyi// ska rags rgyan du byas pa yin//
123b1(rgyud 'bum): go cha drug po ngag gis ni// phyag rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes// 'khor lo kun rnal 'byor ma// sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yi// rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gi/ thod pas spyi
123b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug rgyan du byas/ / dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag/ de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te// tsham rngam sngags kyis legs par srung // tshangs
123b3(rgyud 'bum): par spyod pa brtag gyur nas/ / rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam// spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes sgom//
123b4(rgyud 'bum): snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po// rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las// khams gsum du ni spro bar bya// rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar// spro bya nam
123b5(rgyud 'bum): mkhar thig le las/ / rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pas// ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar// khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor
123b6(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin/ / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o//
123b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum mig ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul
124a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/ / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' bo'i blo gros can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u byu
124a2(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//
124a3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting
124a4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/ / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//
124a5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor
124a6(rgyud 'bum): lo'i go cha ma'o/ / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa mi 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag
124a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ngag ni dpa' bo chen mo'o/ / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni bya rog gi gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba ni 'ug pa'i gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong can ma'o//
124b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje sreg ma'o// dge ba'i
124b2(rgyud 'bum): chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o/ / mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin
124b3(rgyud 'bum): / rje'ajoms ma'o// dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o// de nas dam tshig 'khor lo dag/ mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas par bya// ha ha/ hUM hUM/ hi hi/ phaT hu~M hUM
124b4(rgyud 'bum): a a/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ oM hrIHha hA hu hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra ba ro tsa nI ye huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+hA DAka
124b5(rgyud 'bum): d+hI ye badz+ra bar+d+ha nI me chu hUM phaH swAt+ma/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI li huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM lA me hu hU~M phaT sahA/ oM ban+d+ha ro he su b+hA Ta swAhA/ oM rU ba~M k+Shi e hU~M hUM baT sahA/
124b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM khaN+Da ka pA li ni ka ra ka ra hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kaM ka la ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+Da k+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kaM ka la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/
124b7(rgyud 'bum): saM bi ka Ta daSh+Ti Na trA sa ya trA sa ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM su rA bai ri Ni k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI ye huM phU phaT/ oM a mai tA b+ha hr-i hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye
125a1(rgyud 'bum): huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pra b+hA hrahraHhuM hUM phaT/ oM l-i ke shA rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra da ha the ba hu hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM a d+ha ri ka phaT phaT tsurdzu phaT/
125a2(rgyud 'bum): oM e ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dza Ti la da ha da ha huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba yai huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra pa tsa pa tsa huM hU~M phaT/ oM bA yu bai ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra hUM ka ra b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru
125a3(rgyud 'bum): d+hi ra an+ta mA lA ba laM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha dra A kaD+D+h+ya
125a4(rgyud 'bum): A kaD+D+h+ya hu~M hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM me hA b+hai ra ba hr-i hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM bi rU pAk+Sha dz+nyo dz+r-IM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la k+ShAM k+ShaM huM hUM phaT/
125a5(rgyud 'bum): oM tsakra bi ge huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ra hA hA huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya gr-I ba hU~M hU~M hu hUM phaT/ oM shoN+Ti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmi
125a6(rgyud 'bum): NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka ki li ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra bI rI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma nad+he sha ri so l-i si li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM bai ro tsa na he li hi li huM hUM phaT/
125a7(rgyud 'bum): oM tsakra brti nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra satwa d+hi li d+hi li tsu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI r+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye suM s+phu phaT/ oM su lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+yai ts+tsha
125b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA nI ye hu hUM phaT/ oM lam drud+d+hi le tsu hU phaT/ oM ya ma pad+hUN+DI me cu hUM Ta/ oM la ma mtha nI ya huM hUM phaT/ 'di dag rdzi lha'i rim pa yis// dung chen
125b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba blangs nas su/ / lag g.yon mthe bong srin lag gis// gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya// dus bzhir ji ltar 'dod pa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya//
125b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste// dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor// bza' ba bzlas pa bsdus nas su// cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde bar// gcer
125b4(rgyud 'bum): bu skra grol 'dug pa yis/ / brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin// rkang pa g.yas brkyang gnas nas su// mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya bcing // mdzub mo mdud byas gu
125b5(rgyud 'bum): monges par sbyar/ / mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar// dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab bzhag nas// gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do// oM A ra l+li hoHdzaHhUM ba
125b6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya stA dr-i sh+ya hoH/ 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni// lnga yi bar du brjod par bya// skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis// rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas langs// lho
125b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yis/ / mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas//
126a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod// oM la ba khA hi khAhi/ sarba lak+Sha sa rak+Sha sa/ b+hU ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tsa/ un mA da/ a ba skAr/ DA kaR+Sha kiH
126a2(rgyud 'bum): da yaHi maM ba laM grih+Na tu sa ma ya rak+Sha rU/ ma ma sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+da/ ya thai baM/ ya thaiSh+Ta/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha/ dzaM g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma thA/ ma ma sarbA kA ra ta ya/ sata
126a3(rgyud 'bum): su kha bi shud+d+ha le/ sa ha ya~M ka b+ha bcu hu hU~M phaT swA hA/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// bde chen mtshan gyis gar mdzad cing // bcom ldan su gsung thugs la bzhugs/
126a4(rgyud 'bum): A li kA li mnyam byas te// de ni re pha'i sbyor ba yis// steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni// 'og tu 'dzag par byed pa yin// 'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni// 'chi med thigs
126a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ baspu dang bsgrubs pa yang dag sngo// ye shes me la las kyi rlung // rab tu bskyod par byas pa yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor drud pa 'byung // 'od zer dag ni 'bar bar
126a6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / dam tshig 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag bsregs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste/ thabs des lan gsum
126a7(rgyud 'bum): du bskor ba byas nas/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la
126b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te/ spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo dzA lan+d+ha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas/ longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs
126b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / des skra'i rtse mo 'bum du gshegs pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang 'jug pa ma mthong
126b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so/ / rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag/ bsam pa med la bsam pa ste// sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min//
126b4(rgyud 'bum): babasam du med pa'i sgom pa yis// dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin// sems kyi bsam pa'i sems de ni// rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya// kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku// Da ma ru sgra
126b5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab yin/ / nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste// mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad// dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni// phag mo dag gi gzugs su bstan// shrI ni gnyis med so
126b6(rgyud 'bum): shes te/ / he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs// ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba// ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bsos la// mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin//
126b7(rgyud 'bum): rdal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe// he rug sogs dpa' rnal 'byor// lag na me tog sna tshogs bsdams// sna tshogs rgyal mtshan pa dan can// sna tshogs rol mo sna sgrog cing /
127a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis
127a2(rgyud 'bum): su med pa'i sbyor ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma mo'i bsgom pa dbye bar bya// gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba//
127a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun la khyab// mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste// sems can kun gyi snying la
127a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / oM aM AM/ oM I/ uM U/ e au/ oM au/ aM AHhUM/ 'di ni bcom ldan de nyid kyi// he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog/ mkha' la dri med zla ba yi// lte ba'i
127a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bsgom par bya/ / r-i r-I l-i l-I/ mkha' 'gro ma ni bad 'dab bzhugs// kaM khaM gaM g+haM ngaM/ rtse tshwa rje dz+nyAH/ TA Da~M D+ha NaM/ ti tha da d+ha naM/ paM phaM baM b+haM maM/ de yi thod pa'i dum sogs
127a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// mar la waM/ naM Sha ma hu~Mk+Sh+Na/ de yi kha gdong la sogs
127a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi'o// yi ge k+Sha yi bdag nyid ni// bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas
127b1(rgyud 'bum): yin zhing / / kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong // brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus// 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs// rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu// 'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa
127b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin// 'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing // shu kra'i gzugs kyi bde chen gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi
127b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su dgod/ / 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te// gang la yang ni bstan mi bya// sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang // go cha yang ni de bzhin te// sngar bshad bzhin du
127b4(rgyud 'bum): bkod nas kyang / / phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid// byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// sngar
127b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod/ / thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la// 'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug dgod// dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod// rnal 'byor ma yang so sor
127b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ / gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin// dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang // gnyis su med par gnas pa yin// mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong
127b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas// de ni rdo rje snying po'o// rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos zhus nas ni// bcom ldan
128a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa yin/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor
128a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams bsgoms pas bskyed pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa//
128a3(rgyud 'bum): cig car du ni bskyed pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig la// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag
128a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan/ / rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang // zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnapas// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par
128a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing // de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor// phag mos kyang ni rnam par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag gi gnas// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam
128a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'khyud/ / thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis// phyogs su bsdigs shing skra grol la// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams//
128a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste// phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyor// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// sgom pa mchog gi sgom
128b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ni// sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che// pad+ma'i dbus su sgom pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang /
128b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par ni// dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// dmar ba'i mdog can cher 'bar ba/
128b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste// sku mdog gnyis su rnam par sgom// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// zla ba ser skya legs brgyan pas// de la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar//
128b4(rgyud 'bum): ci 'dod gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// khwa gdong la sogs kun ljang khu// gshin rje sreg sogs kun dud kha// de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis// sgom pa'i mchog gis shes
128b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mkha' 'gro mthong kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gar gyi rnam par bzhugs// thams cad dbu skra grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos can bzhad pa'i zhal// thugs kyi 'khor
128b6(rgyud 'bum): / lo'i dpa' bo rnams// rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// rnal 'byor ma ni thong rdo rje// sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams//
128b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dril bus rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma ni thod pad+ma// sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig pas// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// 'khor lo dril bu rab tu 'bar// rnal 'byor
129a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'khor sdigs mdzub can/ / thod pa rkang gis gang ba'o// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas/
129a2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni// cang te'u mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas// dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas
129a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi byin pas 'khril// gnyis su med par mnyam ldan pa// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba che// ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas// bde ba'i bde ba
129a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'gyur/ / chos kyi ro las yang dag 'byung // rang min sa bon dang bcas pa// 'phreng ba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar// gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas su// rmu
129a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis phaT dang yang dag sbyar/ / dpa' bo'i gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad// rang gi ming gi sa bon dbus// gsal byed dang ni mnyam par ldan//
129a6(rgyud 'bum): huMhUM phaT kyang de bzhin te// sngags pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya// dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje skye// gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla// oM shrI he badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM
129a7(rgyud 'bum): hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bA rA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI le huM hUM phaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// dus bzhi dag tu cho ga bzhin/
129b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas pa bya// mdun du ba spu'i khung bu las// chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par
129b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / 'gro ba rigs drug grol nas ni// bla med gnas su 'jog par byed// sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyor ba// rigs lnga rnams kyi dbus su yang // gang gis rigs
129b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dbus khyab pa/ / khams gsum gyi ni bdag po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las//
129b4(rgyud 'bum): las dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste// phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga
129b5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / dbang po bar ma rnam par sgom// cig car bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa dag ni rnam par sgom// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste//
129b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon// sgyu lus mi mgo'i do shal can// thod pa'i dbu rgyan mchog can te// zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa
129b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mtshan// phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs// sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa ste// sngo zhing ljang khu dmar po ste// steng gi zhal gdong rnam par sgom//
130a1(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang // rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku rtsa 'chir ba ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnapas/
130a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// skra grol dum bu'i ska rags can// de phyag zhal dang mdog gis mtshan// mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la ser// lA ma ljang dang ser po ste// dus skyes
130a3(rgyud 'bum): sani dmar la ljang / / gzugs can ma ni ser la dmar// thod pa dang mi ban+d+ha 'dzin// gri gug mgo ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ cang te'u sgra ni du ma sgrog/ gcer bu s+yA ni grol ba ste/
130a4(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dag gis cod pan byas// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i zhal// rang gi mdog dang phyag de bzhin// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar can te// bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang // 'dod
130a5(rgyud 'bum): bas lta zhing rtog pa ste/ / thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// sngo dang ser bar rnam par sgom// de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'ang // dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par sgom// thod pa dang ni khaT+Ta
130a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// cang te'u yi ni sna tshogs sgra// rdo rje sgra ni yongs su rdzogs// thod pa dang ni sdigs mdzub dang // gri gug dang ni mi thong 'dzin// lha mo
130a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rnams de bzhin te/ / byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs pa chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i cod pan byas//
130b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rdo rjes mtshan ma'o// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo gang // dmar zhing gnag la 'jigs pa ste// pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab// rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste// pad+ma'i
130b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ / ljang dang dkar ba'i sku lus can// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang // ser dang ldang ba'i sku lus can// 'khor los dpa' bo yongs su khyab// 'khor
130b3(rgyud 'bum): lo sgyur ba'ang ster bar byed/ / 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// dkar dmar dang ni yid 'phrog pa'o// rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba//
130b4(rgyud 'bum): khwakhAkhwa gdong sogs bzhi mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog can yi 'phrog pa'o// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin// gshin rje sreg byed sogs lha mo//
130b5(rgyud 'bum): du kha dmar po de bzhin no// gshin rje dbyig to gri gug mgo/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'gro ma// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs//
130b6(rgyud 'bum): byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// mkha' 'gro ma ni dgyes pa che// skra grol phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin
130b7(rgyud 'bum): cing / / dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor// spyan gsum drag po rnam bsgyur ba// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol// chags pa'i mig gis rnam par blta// sngar bshad cho ga'i
131a1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa bzhin/ / gsang sngags rang min sa bon dang // dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di
131a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / gsang sngags mchog kyang de bzhin no// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA rA hi baM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/

131a4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par bya// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo tshegs mchog spros nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mthong ba na// sku gsung thugs
131a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rim pa yis/ / dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya// 'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin//
131a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po bar ma'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje snying po'i
131a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba ste/ / gang yang de nyid rim pa dag/ sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dag/ sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya// /
131b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// lam gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya// mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan
131b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal/ / g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon// na ra'i pags pa gos su

131b7(rgyud 'bum): sku gsum dang / / thams cad 'khor sogs mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas
132a1(rgyud 'bum): @bzhugs/ / yi dgas gdan la brtan par gnas// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar sngo dmar// lA ma ljang khu sngo la
132a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar/ / dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo// gzugs can ma ni ser sngo dmar// 'di dag ni spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dgas kyi steng du g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs
132a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / cang te'u bsnams pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams

132b3(rgyud 'bum): / mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba'o// me'i phyogs su rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste ldang ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// bden bral

132b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// lce phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su khrag 'thung dang / rab
133a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo ste ljang khu dang / ser po dang / dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o//
133a2(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma ste ldang ba dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste nam
133a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor kha gdong ma ste sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// byang ngu 'ug gdong ma ste ljang khu dang

133a5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje sreg ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste dung

134a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang / / ye shes chu sogs ar+g+ha dang // dam tshig mchog gi mchod par bya// mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur// mchod nas thim par byas nas ni//

134a4(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ / shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin// rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'// mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol/
134a5(rgyud 'bum): oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ oM au/ oM aHhUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/

134a7(rgyud 'bum): oM baN+Daro la hu hU~M phaT/ oM chub ste mi tsuH skr-i Ta/ oM ka ra ka ra ka hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pra tsats+tsha tsu hU phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ka tsu gru phaT/ oM tsin+Da k+Shi ye mu~M hU~M pheMT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+haka ts+yai hU~M phaH
134b1(rgyud 'bum): oM pra b+hA ba tI ye tsu hrulaT/ oM tra sa sa trA sa la badz+rar+m+ma pAT+Ta/ oM ma stanA me chu pU phaT/ oM k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho d+hA ya sa sum+b+ha phaT/ oM bI rA ma tI le hud+d+hA Ta/ ar+tha dz+nyA mA rba phU /
134b2(rgyud 'bum): oM kharbe rI ya~M huM hUM phaT/ oM hraHhriHbaM huM hU~M phaT/ oM lo ke sha rA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT oM huM hUM phaT/ oM ai ra ba tI ye tsu
134b3(rgyud 'bum): / hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha baM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa ma hu hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA baM laM bi nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
134b4(rgyud 'bum): su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dza~M ga sarbaM bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya paM huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/
134b5(rgyud 'bum): oM hr-i hriM mi hu~M hUM phaT+Ta/ oM ha ya kar+b+he hu~MhU~M phaT/ oM dz+nyo trA~M bi hu~M phaT/ oM khaM gA na ni hu hU~M phaT/ oM s+thAk+Sh+ma sa~M hu hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra be ge phu~M hU~M phaT/ oM r+g+ha hA~M drA chu hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ri tsits+tsha
134b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ oM hrIM hAM hA hUM hU phaT/ oM shoN+Da nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hU r+m+ma ma hu hUM phaT/ oM tsakra ba rma NAM mi hu~M hUM phaT/ a ki li ki li ha huM hU~M phaT/ oM su bI re hu hUM phaT/ oM si li
134b7(rgyud 'bum): lo bsu phrul/ oM mo hA ba le tsu mul/ mtsho la ti la bcu stsal / oM tsakra brta ni le hu pU ba Ta/ ma ng+ga la d+hi li bcu phaT/ oM ma hA bAh+ya pra hru Ta/ oM kA ka s+ye su rdus/
135a1(rgyud 'bum): oM u lU kA s+ye hu hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye chu hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM pU phaT/ oM ya ma dAn+ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daSh+TI ni ye huM
135a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas dang bsgom pa byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi bsgom byas nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas//
135a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa/ de nas mchog gi
135a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa bshad/ / mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa mchog/ cig car 'jug pa mthong nas su// rdo rje sems
135a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bsgoms nas spro/ / A li kA li las byung ba// he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas// ser dang sngo dang ljang khu ste// steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o// dbu rgya mthong ba'i cod pan can
135a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste/ / phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// drag po gdul dka'
135a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dul mdzad cing / / bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba phyed dang ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon// sku la phyag rgya drug gis mtshan// phyag rgya
135b1(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa mchog yin te/ / stag gi pags bgos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste// gcer pu sgra ni grol ba yin// de yi sku dang zhal
135b2(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan/ / byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mchu dang mtshun pi di dam// g.yer kha yi ni ska rags can// rigs kyi dga' bas
135b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par myos/ / rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku rtsa 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang
135b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / mgo bo'i steng du phyag gis 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni snyan pa dag/ chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gengs// g.yon dang g.yas kyi thad du ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi po rnam par sgom//
135b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas phyogs mkha' 'gro ma lngas// byang du dum skyes gzugs can ma// sngo dang ngur smrig dkar la ser// spyan gsum rnam bsgyur drag po dang // dkar sngo lnga'adamar ngur smrig
135b6(rgyud 'bum): de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o/ / g.yas pa'i phyogs su bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// g.yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ldang // dkar po steng gi
135b7(rgyud 'bum): zhal de bzhin/ / ljang dang dmar po ser po ste// steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'chang ba dang // skra grol ba ni
136a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa ste/ / mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnan// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
136a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dung ni phyag na bsnams// na ra'i pags pa gos su man pas// dril bu cang te'u de bzhin te// mgo bo'i gri gug phyag na bsnams// g.yer ka'i skra rags sgra sgrog pa// rkang
136a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra/ / sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te// gdan gcig la ni rnam par bzhugs// snying la dam tshig ye shes ni// de mdog

136b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa/ / mar me lnga yang bza' bar bya// rtag tu dur khrod nang du sgom// nub bdun gyi ni sbyor ba yis// mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub// mthong bar byed

148a1(rgyud 'bum): med dbang phyug zhal/ / dpa' bo thams cad g.yas brkyang gnas// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam

150a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa la/ / zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i

150a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ni/ / rgyal ba'i pags pa rnam par spangs// phag mo'i rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las// cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan// bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus// pad+ma 'dab

150b1(rgyud 'bum): / thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang // ljang khu steng gi zhal dkar po// ser zhing sngo la ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar// dmar dang sngo dang

153b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing / / yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin// phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa// bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing // rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil
153b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kun/ / bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// khams gsum pa yang mthong
153b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de// de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin// bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med// 'phreng ba med cing
153b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyang med/ / gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med// rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med// rdo rje
153b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po dngos 'dzin pa/ / rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa// 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni// lte ba'i dbus su
154a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni// de yi dbus su rnam par bsam// sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can// de yi
154a2(rgyud 'bum): lus las 'das gyur te/ / sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med// chags pa med cing chags bral med// chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa// snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni// brtags pas legs/
154a3(rgyud 'bum): par rnyed pa ni// yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste// rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed brgyan// ye shes sems ni bsams pa ni//
154a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog ste spyad par bya ba med// bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bad pa yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni// 'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te// sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas
154a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yi// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang // stegs ngan gzhung lugs legs pa'i blo gros de
154a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
154a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa// de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing // gang
154b1(rgyud 'bum): gis su la'ang mi bstan to/ / de nyid mchog gi sgom pa bzung // rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas// gsang ba bstan par sba bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya// dur khrod gnas
154b2(rgyud 'bum): ni yid 'ong ba/ / sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya// de yis khyab par
154b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid ni/ / sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin// A li kA li las rang 'byung // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste//
154b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// 'dzam bu mdog can mnyam pas khyab// 'od zer 'phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
154b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal// sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na med// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang // thod pa dang
154b6(rgyud 'bum): ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ / g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni// rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang //
154b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa// kha nA ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi
155a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs grol/ / gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun// 'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad// gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spod / khra ba phyeng bzhi pa
155a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan// rdo rje 'phreng bas dpral ba mdzes// rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni//
155a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can// yi ge bruM las byung bar sgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo snying kha ru/
155a4(rgyud 'bum): ru ka ni rnam par sgom// gsung gi 'khor lo kha la sgom// sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin// sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang // phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par
155a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang // rang gi lus dang yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil
155a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu/ / yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sdom
155a7(rgyud 'bum): ba gsum gyi mchog dam pa/ / mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni
155b1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog ser/ / lAm pa la sha yi mdog/ dum skyes ma ni ston po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar// thod pa dang mi kha T+wA~M 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnams
155b2(rgyud 'bum): su ni lha mo bzhi/ / khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu drag po'i gzugs can no// mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs// rab 'jigs
155b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la skra grol
155b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// me long ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste// sa bcu dag ni rim
155b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// mgo la bin dus mnan pa ste// gsal
155b6(rgyud 'bum): byed hUM gnyis dang yang sbyar/ / mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming // mthar ni tsu hUM
155b7(rgyud 'bum): phaT yin te/ / 'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro sa// sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// hUM AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// pad+ma'i 'dab la mkha' 'gro sa/
156a1(rgyud 'bum): gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa// hUM ni gnyis pa nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// khwa gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni// ya ral wa/ gsal byed
156a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni bcas pa ste/ / mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar// gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa// sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang // phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su sangs
156a3(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas thod pa yi// gsang sngags de bzhi rjes su dran// oM aM AM/ oM I/ u U/ e ai/ aM aHSha swA hA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// go cha dang ni sbyar bar bya// ye shes
156a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya// mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams// rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar// sangs rgyas
156a5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa las byung ba/ / rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste// thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar// 'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor/
156a6(rgyud 'bum): lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su// dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi
156a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kun/ / sangs rgyas thod ba mchog yin te// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing // ye shes 'chi med lnga
156b1(rgyud 'bum): yi mchog/ yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya// sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya// oM shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li bruM AHhUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma/
156b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ye shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la// sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa// rnal 'byor ma yi dbang yang bskur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang
156b3(rgyud 'bum): nang gi chus khrus bya/ / yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang // bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod
156b4(rgyud 'bum): cig/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi// des ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod
156b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka'
156b6(rgyud 'bum): pabapa/ gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyid med rnam par
156b7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// a yi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// phyag rgya che dang
157a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbul mtshan// thong pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas
157a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rin
157a3(rgyud 'bum): chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin/ / dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnamathar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa' snying kha ru// 'khor
157a4(rgyud 'bum): lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom/ / hUM las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang // AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o// oM las sku yi
157a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo ste/ / de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor// sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med// raM las phyag rgya chen po ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam//
157a6(rgyud 'bum): i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// u ni snying khar bsam pa ste// e ni mgo la rnam par dgod// A ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod// oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// oM ni go
157a7(rgyud 'bum): char byas nas su/ / a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o// l-i las lha mo spyan yin te// r-i las dam tshig sgrol ma yin// l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo// r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung //
157b1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron// dkar zhing ba la sha yi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog/ zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos// thams cad
157b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gos can te/ / rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang // pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral
157b3(rgyud 'bum): gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ / gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thod pa yi ni cod pan can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i
157b4(rgyud 'bum): / skyil mo krung du bzhugs// de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste// dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan// zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//
157b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len// chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad
157b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs/ / skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs// lag pa snyam pa'i thal me yis// mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni// 'di lta'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen// A li de nyid dri ma
157b7(rgyud 'bum): med/ / gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag/ sku gsu 'thugs su yang dag sbyar// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra sa twa A/ a hUM n+da ki na
158a1(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la sha ba ra~M swAhA/ a sid+d+hi lo tsa ni la~M AHhUM swA hA/ oM sa mA ya tA re tAt+tA tu re ra~M AHhUM swAhA/ oM bad+mo d+ha we pAN+Da ra ba si ni si lA~M AHb+hu swA hA/ oM rat+na ku la ke ka rAH/
158a2(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa li nI r-I AHhUM swA hA/ oM rU ba badz+rI bruM/ oM sha b+da badz+rI hUM/ oM gan+d+ha badz+rI khaM/ oM rA sa badz+rI hrIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par sgom// A li
158a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsang ba ste/ / sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba// de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par
158a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bya/ / som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag
158a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu bstims nas su/ / spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu// 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi dus
158a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum po/ / de ltar sems can gsum po la// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i
158a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni// maM gyi yi ge/
158b1(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste// sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan// mi
158b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ / thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba phyed pa zhi pa 'dzin// ral pa'i thor tsugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang khu de
158b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste// lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri bo ti 'dzin pa ste// ut+pal dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes lus can
158b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par skem// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar// gsang sngags 'di ni
