158b6(rgyud 'bum): gis dbang bskur byas nas ni/ / brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang
158b7(rgyud 'bum): gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
159a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dgu pa sgrub pa ste// k+Sha yi yi ge las byung ba// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing // rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam
159a2(rgyud 'bum): stong pa las byung ba/ / nam mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing // zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bsgyur// gdug pa'i
159a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud ni za byed cing / / 'jigs byed dang ni 'dzegs byed mo// kha spub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs// stag gi pags pa gos su mnapas// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
159a4(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs
159a5(rgyud 'bum): byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing / / sngo dang dud la ljang khu dang // dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la/
159a6(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // pang du rdo rje phag mo ni// de mdog steng zhal phag mo ste// gnyis su med par
159a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par ldan/ / skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i pags pa
159b1(rgyud 'bum): mnabs pa ste/ / rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang // gri gug zhags pa mgo bo dang // phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste// drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa// snying khar ye shes mkha' 'gro na//
159b2(rgyud 'bum): khwa gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab// 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod // mkha' 'gro mchog ni dgod par bya// yaM
159b3(rgyud 'bum): raM laM wa/ shaM ShaM saM haM/ ye shes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod// zhag bdun par du bsgoms nas ni// gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim// chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du// bsgoms pas
159b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub nges par rnyed/ / 'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing // gang du las ni ci 'dod pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med// sngo dang ba la sha
159b5(rgyud 'bum): yi mdog/ dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang sngo dang dud kha ste// zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes//
159b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal// skra grol ba la phyogs gos can// khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal// 'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin// bzhi
159b7(rgyud 'bum): ba phag gi zhal gdong ste/ / g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni// drag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni// g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin/
160a1(rgyud 'bum): thug ri rnga mo rta dang ni// seng ge ra dang glang ma he// gzhan yang dom gyi zhal yin te// thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu
160a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag na bsnams/ / dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs// mi'u thung la skye gnas
160a3(rgyud 'bum): ring / / mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM AHoM/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad
160a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dbus// ye shes mkha' 'gro snying kha ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi ge 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod cing thim par rnam par sgom// mnyam par
160a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag nas yi ge rnams/ / srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla// rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro// oM shrI k+Sha DA ki nI dzA la saM pa ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ thog mar
160a6(rgyud 'bum): gsal byed ming dang hUM/ / mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar// mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi
160a7(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te/ / rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
160b1(rgyud 'bum): bla ma las/ k+Sha'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// A li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste// A li ye shes las byung ba// A/
160b2(rgyud 'bum): li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//
160b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed pa ral par 'ching // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan// dpral ba bzhi rdo rje 'phreng // stag gi pags pa gos su mnapas// phyag rgya drug gis sku
160b4(rgyud 'bum): la brgyan/ / rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid// sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs kyi mgo
160b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'phreng ba can/ / sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes// dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa phra// lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can// sngo zhing ser la dud kha dang // g.yas pa'i zhal yang de
160b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / ljal bu dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes// steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi// chags shing rjes su chags pas blta// thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzog/
160b7(rgyud 'bum): sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can// mA li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku// phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbul brgyan// skra grol ba yis nas par myos// spyan gsum na/
161a1(rgyud 'bum): po 'jigs pa can// de yi mdog can sku rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan//
161a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshor ba'o// ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la// khyab 'jug lpags pa mnabs pa yin// thod pa dang
161a3(rgyud 'bum): nimekha T+wAM 'dzin/ / ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum bcang te'u nyid// dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying
161a4(rgyud 'bum): khar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ / 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang
161a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya de bzhin te/ / shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge i'i rig pas byung ba'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung ste bzhugs
161a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lce phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ai las yang dag par bzhugs
161a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste// thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du
161b1(rgyud 'bum): drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o/ / rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog/
161b2(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru// dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa// yi ge r-i las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'
161b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-i las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge r-I las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-I las gtum pa'i mchog ces
161b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// thams cad spyan gsum rnam bsgyur zhal// sku lus dkar ba thams
161b5(rgyud 'bum): cad zhal/ / sngo dang ljang khu gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas// skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/
161b6(rgyud 'bum): / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u dang gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun// sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams// ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing // thugs rje'i ro ni
161b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs/ / phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad zong ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// thams cad a la la yi sgra// oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// AHni gsung du
162a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba yin/ / a ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste/
162a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// gcig pu chos kyi ro yang sgom// ye shes
162a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// 'khor lo mchog gi tshegs dang spro// mchog de mthong nas slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcu
162a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mchog dam pa/ / sa ni bcu gnyis dag yin te// rdo rjes ni bcu gsum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba// sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song
162a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mi g.yo ba/ / legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po// 'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod// dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog
162a6(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dbus su'o/ / 'khor lo sogs pa kun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed hUM byas te// de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni//
162a7(rgyud 'bum): rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas// gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya// bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang // mnyam par
162b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag ste mi smra bzla/ / rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas ni// blo ldan srog stsol bzlas pa bya// oM shrI A li DA ka a a DA ki nI dza la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun// dngos/
162b2(rgyud 'bum): po med pa'i rang bzhin te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams// sems can khams ni cha gnas pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing
162b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / mnyam par ma gzhag sems kyis ni// bsgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de// chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin// chos rnams bdag med nyid
162b4(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni// rjes su brtag par bya ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba a li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum
162b5(rgyud 'bum): cu tham pa'o/ / / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che// dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba// bskyed
162b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// siM oM daM las rdo rje 'byung // de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de// gsal byed mkha' 'gro
162b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gyur pa/ / sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/ thams cad rim gyi mchog dam pa// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin//
163a1(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng bas sprad pa ste// sna tshogs rdo rje dbul 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis spru la mtshan// lha yi rgyan gyis sprad pa ste// skal
163a2(rgyud 'bum): ngan mu stegs can rnams ni/ / zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu yan// lta ba lnga yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// skyil krung phyeng ba'i gar skabs can// zhabs drug gis ni rnam
163a3(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / khyab 'jug gi ni lpags pa mnapas// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa ste// rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// skra grol ba la spyan gsum can//
163a4(rgyud 'bum): mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'chir zhing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshar zhing // byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde// tshangs
163a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i pags pa'i yan lag ni/ / phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang // cang te'u
163a6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa lcags kyu bsdams/ / dkar dang spro dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dung kha ngur smrig ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// bi la dang ni nye ba la// mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar
163a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// yi ge dI las yang dag 'byung // g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya// yi ge sau las nges byung ba// rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya bas
163b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni/ / sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o// zhal hA
163b2(rgyud 'bum): ba la phyag bcu pa/ / spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis rab tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi// phyag rgya lnga
163b3(rgyud 'bum): yis rnam par brgyan/ / phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i ska rags can// rkang gdub g.yer ka'i sil skra can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba'i
163b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa// rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub kyis// gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan// thod pa gnyis med rnam brgyan te// zhags

163b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi thabs kyang sgom/ / moM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni// rang gi snying khar de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim

164a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da gsum// gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te// mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro//
164a5(rgyud 'bum): sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni// gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// de na nga rgyal rnam spangs nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis//
164a6(rgyud 'bum): debazhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA maM sa mnyam ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon
164a7(rgyud 'bum): bsngags te/ / bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya// 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med// yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med// longs spong min pas longs spyod la// 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza'
164b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten// longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sgrom yang btung // gzhan du gang yang btung ba yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor
164b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas/ / rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro bi la ba// rnal 'byor ma ni nye bi la// thabs ni bi la bar shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i bi la ba// grong khyer
164b3(rgyud 'bum): mthar ni pi la nyid/ / grong gi mtha' ni nye ba la// zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// bi la dang ni nye ba'i yin// skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba// dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs du ma ldan
164b4(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shra thams cad bza' bya zhing // lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin sgrug// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas// dus la mthun pa 'dus byas nas//
164b5(rgyud 'bum): / glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang // 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i rdzas las/ gsal
164b6(rgyud 'bum): byed mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshod bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha' 'gro mdang
164b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sbyor/ / dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yi// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog
165a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ dam pa// de yi dbus su 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes// sA li kA li mnyam par ldan// sum cu
165a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las bskyed de// yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar
165a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jigs/ / zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i
165a4(rgyud 'bum): mthar yang 'khrug pa ste/ / ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phre 'bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa yis//

165a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad tshar yang gcod/ / keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// sna tshogs
165a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ / phyag rgya drug pa zhal lnga pa// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po zhi ba ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo
165b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ni sku lus khyab/ / lha chen pags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // bla re'i tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// drug pa na ni cang te'u dang // zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan//
165b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de// zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mo de mdog can// skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa'i 'phreng
165b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbu rgyan can/ / dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgul bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste// de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang
165b4(rgyud 'bum): te'u mchog kyang 'dzin/ / drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod// shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste// byang du las kyi
165b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro yin/ / nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang khu dang ni ser po'o// 'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan/
165b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ljang khu ser po dmar po spro// dkar po steng bltas dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud// g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs/
165b7(rgyud 'bum): dmar po ser dang ljang khu dang // dkar po yang ni de bzhin no// pad+ma dril bu snyoms 'jug cing // lha mo'i num 'chir ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po kha dog ste/
166a1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do// me dang bden bral rlung
166a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba//
166a3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
166a4(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mda' la sogs pas brgyan// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing // thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i
166a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas rnam par myos/ / cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can// dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste// de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab// du ma'i gzugs dang
166a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sdug ma/ / rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma// rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong // rdo rje drag po snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen// rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kam po ci yang de bzhin te//
166a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te// dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs// rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/
166b1(rgyud 'bum): // 'phrul la ma grags ngas// rnam nga sa smras// dam ng+yas pas / khyes ca // dkyil 'bar grub pa pas sa
166b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun/ / spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//
166b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gsang mchog ste// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid
166b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog pa/ / thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing // dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog/ zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste/
166b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i stsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing // sgrub pa po kun rjes su chags/
166b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba drug gis sgrub pa bo// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yi// dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang // mkha' la spyod
166b7(rgyud 'bum): par the tshom med/ / nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas// sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri// snam
167a1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni/ / lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing // mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu
167a2(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ sgro rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang // sgro dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams
167a3(rgyud 'bum): su/ rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du re'u mig dgu// sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// dra ba'i
167a4(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa stong pa ste/ / byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbus sus ni bcu gsum ste/ phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang nye du tho/
167a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par// sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la// cho ga
167a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ / ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste// gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// byed dang phyed du rnam par dgod// mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam tshig
167a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor 'byung ba che/ / ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya// ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag ni rnam par sgom// bdag med
167b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi ro kun gyis/ / dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum smos nas// sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ mtha' 'gro ru na
167b2(rgyud 'bum): rab gnas bya/ / 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni// byin brlabs gnas su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg chen
167b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs// sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster// dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom// lugs
167b4(rgyud 'bum): su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ / 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro// ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du// bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa khro
167b5(rgyud 'bum): bopo rnam par sgom/ / ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu// sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i sbyor ba yis// mi sgra rdo rje brtul zhugs che// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang /
167b6(rgyud 'bum): mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang // 'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// de ltar bsgom
167b7(rgyud 'bum): pa byas nas ni/ / las 'dir the tshom med pa yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgoms dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni// thogs pa med par tshes
168a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / 'di ltar ngag gi tsho gas bzlas// sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug/ der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mkhas pas bsgom mchod bzlas pa bya//
168a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// oM shrI badz+ra DA ki ni AHhUM hUM DA ka nI dz+wa la shaM bai raM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ki ni AHb+hU hU DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI kar+m+ma DA ka a khaM
168a3(rgyud 'bum): pUDA ki nI dzA la shaM bar hu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI ped+ma DA ka a hrI trUM DA kau nI dzA le she ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rat+na nA kA a oM hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la she ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hU~M/ mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dab
168a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / / dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs// phyag

168a7(rgyud 'bum): haT swA hA/ oM shrI karma DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shri rat+na DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ sgo ru mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster//

168b6(rgyud 'bum): kha ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti hu~MhUM phaT/ oM bi shA rU bi hu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kAdz+nyAn hu~M hUM phaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can

169a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ / de'i sngags bshad pa/ shar du/ oM shrI badz+ra pa~M ga le tshaHhuM hUM phaT/ g+ho ru/ oM shrI nA la ra ka huM hUM phaT/
169a2(rgyud 'bum): nub tu/ oM shrI badz+ra kuN+Da li baM baM huM hUM phaT/ byang du/ oM shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bi ho huM hUM phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni// shrI ni sbyar zhing cho ga rim bzhin// sngags pas de ltar bzlas na

169a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma grub cing / / rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par gyur// gzhan gyis lus su 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin

169b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya// dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro// shes
169b2(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin dmigs na/ / rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub// cig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnams bsgyur//
169b3(rgyud 'bum): gtum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam
169b4(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// baM hUM/ badz+ra las byung sku lus can// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// skyil krung
169b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pas legs par gnas/ / spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa// bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan// spyong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog
169b6(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa kun gyi thong ba'i 'phreng / / dus mtha' las byung do shal can// gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon// nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang // sred pa gti mug phrag dog/
169b7(rgyud 'bum): dus mtshan ngo ni khas phul la// gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can// thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon// nam mkha' dang ni skye ba dang // dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang // ldang
170a1(rgyud 'bum): khu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ / rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud// kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig
170a2(rgyud 'bum): tu/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba// dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo 'khar gsil dang // lhung bzed mdung
170a3(rgyud 'bum): dang nags pa dang / / lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis// na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas bsnams// shar du ma tang gi dang rau b+hi ka/ dza ra ki dang

170a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ dmar dang ldeng dang dud kha'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no// sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba// khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang // rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni// rdo rje 'jigs
170a6(rgyud 'bum): dadrag mo ste/ / gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing // thal ba sprin mdog ljang khu dang // dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyad pa'i dbus su chos 'khar gsil/
170a7(rgyud 'bum): dbacang te'u gri gug ste// phrag ba'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa// chos kyi 'khar gsil cang te'u// zhal gcig pa la phyag
170b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa/ / yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyis mi len dang cog bu pa// gzhi ji bzhin dang ldan
170b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa/ / bla gab med dang shing drung ba// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod pa// khrod pa dang ni phying ba po'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag sgom// ye shes

171a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad 'di yi bde// 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyis// mchog gi go/

172a3(rgyud 'bum): / shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM nAM nA ga ba ra ShA pa ya hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di dag bsgoms te khri tsam bzla// dus bzhi dag tu stong du'o// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // sa rnam

172a6(rgyud 'bum): dgang / / me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su// 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin// oM aM A nan+dA ya hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM baM bA su ke hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM taM tak+Sha ka hUM nAM hUM swA hA/
172a7(rgyud 'bum): oM baM pad+ma hUM nAM hUMH/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM shaM shaM ba pA la hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM kaM karko Ta hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM oM A nan+ta tap+ta hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM hU~M ba~M ba ru NA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA gaM ban+d+ha
172b1(rgyud 'bum): pa la spun sbrusahA/ 'di bzlas khro ba dang bcas pa// kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsas bya// 'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'// dbang po thul cing myongs mi smra// bri gzugs spangs pa
172b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du/ / khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur// mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing // smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te// 'di la the tsom ma byed cig/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni//
172b3(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu 'gram gyis spras pa
172b4(rgyud 'bum): las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te/ mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te// de nas chu bo'i nang du gzhug go/ de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing / 'dzam bu'i gling du char
172b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs 'gyur/ / sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing // nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed// sems can thams cad bde reg nas// phan tshun khro ba'i gzugs can ni// bdag
172b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ / gang gi snying kha kho nar ni// he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yis// char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs
172b7(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ / cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na ma mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed do// zod pa la yongs
173a1(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do/ / dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do// kha T+wAM ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do// gri gug la yongs su bzlas na
173a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do/ / mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do// rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dril bu la
173a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do/ / glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar
173a4(rgyud 'bum): ldog go/ / phyag rgya drug la yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sa steng du ni kun spyod cing // ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla
173a5(rgyud 'bum): ma las/ char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba mchog ni mdor bsdus nas// skad cig gis ni dag sgom
173a6(rgyud 'bum): papa/ he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya// sde zhing drag po rnam bsgyur ba// drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog/ zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la// thod pa'i 'phreng
173a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbu rgyan can/ / rdo rje 'phreng bas dbu rgyan can// skul mgo bo'i ngo shal can// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phag mo yis ni sku la brgyam
173b1(rgyud 'bum): zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ / g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/ g.yon pa dmar la ljang khu'o// steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste// dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril
173b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par ldan/ / lha mo'i chu ni 'chir ba ste// rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su mnabs// mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mtshon gyis brgyan pa ste//
173b3(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis ngag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang //
173b4(rgyud 'bum): zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par sgom// glang po'i gdong dang byi'u'i gdong // seng ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum
173b5(rgyud 'bum): phag gi gdong yin te/ / bzhi pa khra yi gdong yin no// gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// thams
173b6(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang // de bzhin sgom zhing rnam sgom ste// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// mngon
173b7(rgyud 'bum): ra brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub pa ste/
174a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sgom zhing rnam par sgom// sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi// sku lus sin dur 'dra mi g.yo// me tog ban du ka lta bu// zhal
174a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ / rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//
174a3(rgyud 'bum): dbu ska mdzes par 'khril ba ste// thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing // mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste// rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu
174a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis 'gugs pa ste/ / pad+ma dmar mo'i dbus bzhugs shing // 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung // steng gi zhal
174a5(rgyud 'bum): ni phag rgod gdong / / drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi// shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid
174a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog/ bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma// dbang ldan
174a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma/ / sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma// rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste// rdo rje khro bo mche ma dang // rdo rje mche ba mchog/ lha mo de dag thams cad kyang // dmar ba'i
174b1(rgyud 'bum): mdog can zhal gsum pa/ / phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing // rdo rje dril
174b2(rgyud 'bum): bu mnyam ldan pas/ / rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril// zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// grwa bzhi dag tu mnga' gzhu dag/ yongs su 'gengs pa gnas
174b3(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag/ sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang // zhags
174b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ / gzhan yang ba tshun dag tu yang // ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal// de snying ye shes lha mo ni// sku gsung thugs dang bcas par sgom// ye shes dkyil
174b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sbyor ba yis/ / chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim// ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni// cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla ba'i de nyid 'grub/
174b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA hi A baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra gu h+ya ud+d+ha me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra sa ma ya ur+d+ha me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra te dzot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM
174b7(rgyud 'bum): shrI badz+ra rat+no t+ta me huM hUM phaT swAh+ma/ oM shrI badz+ra dz+nyA not+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra bid+ya uSh+Ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sad+d+hot+ta me hu~M hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra b+has+phot+ta me huM hUM phaT
175a1(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra dz+wA lo t+ta me dzaHhu hUM phaT swAd+d+ha/ oM shrI badz+ra sa mr-i tod+d+hi me hU huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra kro d+hot+ta me ba huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra raSh+Tot+ta
175a2(rgyud 'bum): huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bsgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya// bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni// chos rnams kun dang chos can no// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag/
175a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu
175a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag med chos ni chos yin te/ / chos las chos ni yod ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste
175a5(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa drug pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim// pad+ma 'dab lta bris nas ni// lte ba ge sar khyab par ni// de la
175a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su phag mo ni/ / dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes// spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
175a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ skyil krung phyed pa gar dang bcas// phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing // mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang //
175b1(rgyud 'bum): dus mtshan kha sbub byas pa la// zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags
175b2(rgyud 'bum): pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ / mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// snying khar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung // shar
175b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs lha mo ya mi ni/ / g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod// rmongs byed ma dang skyod byed ma// skrag byed ma dang tsaN+Di ka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi
175b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang // ljang khu dung pa'i mdog can te// thod pa dang mi kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgyal
175b5(rgyud 'bum): yis rnam par brgyan/ / phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog/ mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'chang // thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba ste// gnyis
175b6(rgyud 'bum): med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan/ / rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid// phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems// ya mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad// rmongs byed ma dang pad+ma'i gar// skyong byed ma dang khrag
175b7(rgyud 'bum): 'thung ste/ / skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang // tsaN+Di ka dang rta mchog ste// rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste// rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin// pad+ma gar dbang dmar po ste// he ru ka dpal sngon po
176a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste// rta mchog dag ni ljang khu'o// yang na so sor bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa// phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa
176a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// rdo rje dril bu thod kha T+wAM// ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang // na ra'i pags mnapas gar dang bcas// rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun/
176a3(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM dang // cang te'u dril bus mtshan pa'i mchog/ yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis// zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya// de dag gsang
176a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di yin te/ / oM shrI oM baM baM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hA~M yoM yaM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hU~M moM ma~M huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hreM hriM saM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hUM hUM saM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI
176a5(rgyud 'bum): phaT phaT ts+yai huM hUM phaT swA hA/ de dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so// oM haHba hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na maHhi b+hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sa he hu hriM hu~M hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM bo ShaT he ha~M hu laH
176a6(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM hUM hU~M ho traM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM phaT haM hUM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags// bzlas pa dang ni bsgoms tsam gyis// 'khor lo drug ni mchog grub cing // 'khor
176a7(rgyud 'bum): lo sgyur ba thob pa ste/ / 'khor lo sgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur// mi 'pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs// stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag mtshan drug la rtag mchod cing // cho ga
176b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mngon bsngags na/ / de ni myur du grub nas ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po mchog kyang thob// mi snang la sogs grub nas ni// khams gsum ngag tu rnam par dpyod// 'gro ba drug gi/
176b2(rgyud 'bum): / sems can grol// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs// yang na 'khor lo zung drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba dag
176b3(rgyud 'bum): popo ni/ / gur kum gyi ni mdog lta bu// gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can te// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i// g.yas
176b4(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'khyud/ / ral gri po ti kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang // ut+pa la dang cang te'u// gur kum mdog dang sngo ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu steng zhal
176b5(rgyud 'bum): dkar/ / chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che// sems can khams ni rab grol byed// shar sogs g.yon skor dgod pa ni// rta mchog rtsa ba'i ka dang bcas// de dag de ru dgod byas pas//
176b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nyid grub// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ldang // yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas// rdo rje sems
176b7(rgyud 'bum): dang phag mo dang / / rnam snang mdzad dang ya mi ni// pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed bcas// khrag 'thung dang ni skyod byed ma// rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma// ljang dang dud pa'i mdog can te// de lta'i
177a1(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog rnam par sgrosgom/ / zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o// thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi phyag
177a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gnyis med sbyor/ / dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan// cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// thod pa'i
177a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ / mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs// dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan dag/ lha mo byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril// skra grol

177a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod/ / gsang ba gsum ni snying khar gnas// khA gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs// thams
177a6(rgyud 'bum): cad gcer bu rnam par sgom/ / sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te/ yi dgas gdan la yang dag bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// drag po skra ni grol ba ste//
177a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas
177b1(rgyud 'bum): pabya/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tsho gas spros nas// 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya// nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa'is
177b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzlas/ / de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig/ dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// huM hUM phaT ni mtha' ru ste// 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya// rnal
177b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ / dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya// oM shrI many+dzu badz+ra AHhuM maM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha badz+ra satwa huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM baM badz+ra bA ra hi huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na maHhi badz+ra bai ro
177b4(rgyud 'bum): can huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM haM yo ya mi na~M huM hUM phaT swAH/ oM swA hA hu bad+mA na rte shwa ra hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M moM mo hi na huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM go wa he he ru ru ka~M hu~M pU phaT swA hA/ oM hreM hriM sany+tsa la ni
177b5(rgyud 'bum): huMhUMhUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM ho badz+ra sUr+ya huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM saM trA sa ni huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT hi ba ra mA sha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/

177b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyis su// go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// the tshom med par las byas na//
178a1(rgyud 'bum): nges par dngos grub gzhan du min// yang na mgon po sa bcu'i dbang / pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan
178a2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab drug pa ste/ / thabs dang sdebs dang smon lam dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyangs dka' ba dang
178a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon du gyur/ / ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// 'di yis rnam par dag bsgom// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par

178a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang / / bla ma'i rim pa legs par brlabs// 'di ltar cho ga gnyis med pa// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu// rnal 'byor
178a7(rgyud 'bum): mthugs gsang ba che/ / las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun
178b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// badzin mchog tu gsang ba ste// brda ni yongs su mi shes par// sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste// 'di ni nges par
178b2(rgyud 'bum): shes pa na/ / dngos grub 'grub par the tsom med// dA zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad// di zhes bya ba bud med yin// pu zhes bya ba gnod pa yin// su zhes bya ba za ba nyid// ma zhes bya
178b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ma ru bshad/ / ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid// b+hi zhes bya ba sring me yin// b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad// lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin// sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad// so ni zhi ba'i
178b4(rgyud 'bum): btung ba yin/ / be zhes bya ba thug pa ste// bi zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ ba zhes bya ba za ba yin// b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin// ba zhes bya ba dur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba ro yin no//
178b5(rgyud 'bum): TInI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma// gA zhes bya ba lA ma min// tI zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma// ha ni khaN+Da ro nyid ma// dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis// ba zhes
178b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba gsong por smra/ / swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin// mi zhes bya ba nya yin la// byo zhes bya ba bza' ba min// byo zhes bya ba btung ba min// ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin//
178b7(rgyud 'bum): ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro// ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo// na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma// sa zhes
179a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dam tshig can/ / a zhes bya ba dam tshig med// I zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin// na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin// so zhes bya ba chags pa yin// 'di dag mi
179a2(rgyud 'bum): ge'i brda yin te/ / dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya// dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // dam tshig can
179a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dam tshig dus/ / dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste sum cu
179a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshar bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob// bud
179a5(rgyud 'bum): med pang rtsa ltar dkar zhing / / pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig/ rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'// tsan dan gsar ba'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// de rigs
179a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung shes par bya/ / bud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing // dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// thams cad
179a7(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ / dri dang gos ni sngo la dga'// ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa// de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bud med pa dkar 'dra mdog gang // rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i
179b1(rgyud 'bum): dri/ de yang de bzhin dpa' bo'i blo// dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la ki dang ut+pal dri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing
179b2(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba'i bud med gang / / gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang // mgo la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de mdog can gyi gos
179b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang zhing / / rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing // rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// /
179b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan// rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang // kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin// rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang // rang rig las byung tshig tu smra// g.yon las 'gro ba'i
179b5(rgyud 'bum): bud med gang / / rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la brtag/ lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang // g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta// lha mo rnams dang gang smra ba// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad//
179b6(rgyud 'bum): bud med gang byas de nyan cing // rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra// rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste// rang gi bstan bshad mi 'dor la// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad//
179b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba// g.yon pa'i lus kyi rtag tu 'dud// lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba// de ni nges par bde bar 'gro// mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing //
180a1(rgyud 'bum): mgo ni sprug par byed pa dang // zur gyis blta zhing lag pa ston// sgrub pa po la khyad par du// de yis rang rig dran pa dang // 'khur ba'am ko sko dag dang ni// sna dag tu
180a2(rgyud 'bum): ni thal mo ston/ / zur gyis blta zhing lan cig bsngags// zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta// bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nges par dam tshig can yin no// de nas rnyed dka' rnal
180a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung // ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma// 'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma// kun tu spyod pa ba su ra// rnal
180a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma ni rnam pa bdun/ / mdor bsdus rang mtshan bshad pa yin// gzugs can ma dang tsum pa ki/ lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog e hi ka lha mo// mkha' 'gro ma ni
180a5(rgyud 'bum): bdun du bshad/ / mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang // smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing // sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la// phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag/ gzugs can ma ni
180a6(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya// sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa// byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na// de ni tsum pa kar shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yis
180a7(rgyud 'bum): zas mi lta bar zur du blta/ / khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang // smin ma bsgyur zhing sngags mdzub dang // 'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/
180b1(rgyud 'bum): lA ma yin par bstan// phag dang dred dang byi la dang // ce spyang ri dgas rta dag dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa// yongs su gyur par de bshad de// shin tu dga' bas dgod pa
180b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / song nas slar yang mi ldog la// rjes su chags pas gsal bar dgod// dum skyes mar ni de bshad do// yid ni kun tu skyo ba dang // rkang pa lag pas bong ba'am// gos mtha' ma
180b3(rgyud 'bum): yang na shing dag gis/ / des reg pa ni 'tshe mi 'gyur// mi ldog par ni shes bya ste// sgrub man par ni de bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya// dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma blta/
180b4(rgyud 'bum): / thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin// rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang // rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i
180b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis// mkha' 'gro
180b6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ / dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang // pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong // lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang // zhen pas blta ba'i rjes 'gro ba// bud med gang gi sen mo
180b7(rgyud 'bum): dmar/ / mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang // khyim du pad+ma 'dri ba ni// pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin// smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod// lus ni sngo bsangs skye ba dang // rtag tu rdo rje rig
181a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa/ / gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi// mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni// he ru ka yi rigs byung yin// gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni//
181a2(rgyud 'bum): mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing // mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang // de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang // mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni// de yi khyim du
181a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes mtshan/ / rtag tu gang zhing mchod byed pa// shrI he ru ka'i rigs 'byung ba// mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za// 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am// lag par yang ni snang 'gyur/
181a4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ sprin skyon dag dang 'dra ba ni// rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa// skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing // mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang // khyim du 'khor lo 'dri byed cing /
181a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu de la mchod byed pa// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs// gang zhig mig sman gnag 'dra zhing // so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang // rtag tu
181a6(rgyud 'bum): gdug par gyur pa dang / / sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang // rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang // mang du smra bar mi byed cing // khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang // rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa//
181a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba// stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin// ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar snang // mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser// rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am// lag par yang ni snga
181b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas// snyems shing bden par smra ba dang // sa li ka yi dri 'byung zhing // gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni// rtag tu 'dri zhing cher mchod pa// dum skye ma yi rig
181b2(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'// skem zhing mig sman gnag pa'i mdog/ dbu la mdung rtse lta bu yod// gang zhig gdug pa'i las la dgag
181b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ / 'jigs pa med cing brtse med de// gang gis dpral bar thig le dang // khyim du thod pa 'dri zhing mchod// dpal ldan he ru ka de yi// mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba
181b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing // rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'// g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang // de yi khyim du dgra sta ni// 'dri zhing
181b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mchod byed pa/ / rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro mar ni the tsom med// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag/ shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung // sgrub pa po la phan pa'i
181b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / mtshan nyid yang dag bshad ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang
181b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ba/ / sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi// mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang // yan lag tshogs ni shes bya ba'o// gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu zlum por sdang 'gyur zhing // kha yi sgra
182a1(rgyud 'bum): ra rtag tu yod/ / spu dang smin ma ring ba dang // gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang // mi 'khrug bden par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'// dpa' bo'i
182a2(rgyud 'bum): sring mor de shes bya/ / pad+ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba// yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya// pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid// phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya// de ni tshes bcu'i res ngag la// khyim du
182a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur/ / lA ma li ni bud med kyi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gsus pa rlo zhing mig dkyus ring // mig ni dmar zhing ser spyir gnas// phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon
182a4(rgyud 'bum): tan/ / ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang // shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min// sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'// dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing // mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas/ rgod
182a5(rgyud 'bum): cing dga' ba nyid dag dang / / lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas// g.yul du mchi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'// de lha'i rab dregs mthong na ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan
182a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi// bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya// g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad ni//
182a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi dus tshigs yin par bshad// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang // bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gang gi mabur/
182b1(rgyud 'bum): chos dag tu ni// khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing // de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser// mig ni ljang ser dag tu sdang // swa ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang // mgo dang dpral bar ngar bcings
182b2(rgyud 'bum): snang / / ri mo gcig pa rab tu gnas// de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang // rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing // dgod cing glu ni len pa nyid// lan 'ga' zhig ni khro ba dang // sems
182b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam par g.yo ba dang / / rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste// 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par
182b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// thung zhing byin pa sgom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing // phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'phyang // de 'dra'i
182b5(rgyud 'bum): bud med mthong na ni/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing // 'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang // dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/
182b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te// de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dra// shrI he ru ka lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa de dag yin// lus kun la ni ba spu yod// mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang // sbom zhing rnam bsgyur
182b7(rgyud 'bum): mi bzang ba/ / bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la// ma mchu rlo zhing kha dog gnag/ mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang // rtag tu glu ni mkhas pa dang // sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa// 'di 'dra
183a1(rgyud 'bum): rab dregs mthong na ni/ / klu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag
183a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ / tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus// khyim du mche ba 'dri bar byed// rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
183a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma las/ lA ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te// gang zhig spun dang
183a4(rgyud 'bum): sring mo ru/ / yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni// gsong por smra ba ston pa yin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni// gsong por smra ba'i lan gyur yin//
183a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig lto ba rdebs pa ni// bdag ni bkres par ston pa yin// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o// gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud// zos zin
183a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni smra ba yin/ / gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa dag/ za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig pus mo la reg pa// ngal lo zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig sor mo'i rtse la reg/ ngal sos
183a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni smra ba yin/ / gang zhig so ni 'cha' byed pa// sha za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// lag pa g.yas pa ston pa la// 'di ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni//
183b1(rgyud 'bum): bcings so zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni// grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni// de la pa ta te bstan bya// gang zhig sgra ni ston pa la//
