183b5(rgyud 'bum): nyen dag srungs shig pa ru bshad// gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzums pa// de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin// gang zhig tshigs la reg byed pa// bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin// pho nya ma ni gang
183b6(rgyud 'bum): yang rung / / de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas yan lag phyag rgya
183b7(rgyud 'bum): yi/ mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya// bung gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa// mgo bo de la bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni// de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya// gang zhig
184a1(rgyud 'bum): so ni ston pa la/ / de la lce ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa// de la dpung pa bstan par bya// gang zhig rked rgyab ston byed pa// de la sa ni bstan
184a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa// de la ko sko bstan par bya// gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa// de la lte ba bstan par bya// gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa// de la ling ka bstan par bya//
184a3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa// de la 'og ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa// de la byin pa bstan par bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa// de la rkang mthil bstan par bya//
184a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sor tshig sngon byed pa// de la sen mo bstan par bya// gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa// de la nam mkha' bstan par bya// gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa// de la nyi ma bstan
184a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gang zhig chu bo ston byed pa// de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum
184a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// yan lag ji bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang zhig shes pas spun nam ni// sring mor the tsom med 'gyur ro// sor
184a7(rgyud 'bum): mo gcig ni ston pa yis/ / legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis// legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// yan lag phyag
184b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyar rab tu bshad/ / mdzub mo gnyis bkug mig gi rgyu// sngags pas gang la de bstan te// de mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar// dbang du 'gyur bar the tsom med// gang zhig gung mo
184b2(rgyud 'bum): ston byed pa/ / de la mdzub mo bstan par bya// gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa// de la lce ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pa nas ston pa// de la mdun ni bstan par bya// gang zhig
184b3(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo ston byed pa/ / de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa// de la mkha' ni bstan par bya// gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa// de la mtshams ni bstan
184b4(rgyud 'bum): popor bya/ / gang zhig so ni ston byed pa// de la mchu ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa// de la kha ni bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa// de la lte ba bstan
184b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin// 'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa// yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla
184b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid do//
184b7(rgyud 'bum): gang gis ring nas dpa' bo dang // dpa' mo sring mor shes 'gyur ba'o// dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa// rnal 'byor longs spyod sa gzhi yin// gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su
185a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod/ / go bzlog pa yis blta ba ni// bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g.yo// sna tshogs myur du shes bya
185a2(rgyud 'bum): pab/ de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o// rnam bsgyur 'khyil bar shes bya ste// ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum// mkha' 'gro ma rnams nges 'gro ba'i// de yi mtshan ma shes par
185a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ gal te ldog par gyur na ni// sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur// de yi dngos ni 'jig gyur pa// rdo rje lta bus gsal ba yin// sgra ni khu byug skad lta bur// gsal ba de ni
185a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gyur/ / 'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni// rdo rje lta bu me long bcas// ral gri 'dra ba'i me long bcas// phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung // de gsal me long yin zhes bya//
185a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs dag ni// mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa// de ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// mchog yin par ni shes par bya// bo taM gi zhes bya ba ni gsong por smra ba'o//
185a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ti taM gi zhes bya ba ni gsong por smra ba'i lan no// ga mu zhes bya ba ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no// lu baM zhes bya ba ni 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no// de hi zhes bya ba ni zas shes bya ba yin no//
185a7(rgyud 'bum): gri ha na zhes bya ba ni bram ze zhes smra ba yin no// bi ra Na zhes bya ba ni snying nyid do// mar+tha zhes bya ba ni sgra ngan no// g+han+ta zhes bya ba ni kar ni ka'o// shi re ni brdzun no// kar ni lto ba'o//
185b1(rgyud 'bum): bar ni sgra'o// sha ra ma Ne ni rna pa'o// a smr-i ta sA ni bsrubs pa'o// sa ma ga ma ni mi'o// ti la ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// na ra ka ni dkyil 'khor ro// a mo ka ni dur khrod do/ ka li ka ni g+ha'o// shwa sa ni bram ze'i rig so// pa'i d+hi ni rgyal rigra se/ bi ri'i
185b2(rgyud 'bum): ji gro'o/ / klu ming sa sa rig go la 'i sdig cam mo/ shu lig ni khyis mo// zhug ni srang mo'o / me la bag ni mug grib pa ni don mu gtola'o// so la reg pa ni 'ogra la ljon pa'o khri shA ni dris bsgo ba'o// ku ta ni gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o//
185b3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra na ni me tog go// tu mu la ni rgod pa'o// tar+tha ni char dbab pa bzlog pa'o// trip+ta ni zhu ba'o// dUr d+yo ni shes pa'o// ne ga ni sprin no// rU ba ni bdug pa'o// sa nu ni bo'o//
185b4(rgyud 'bum): sa ri ta ni chu bo'o// a gu li ni yan lag go// ba da nini gdong ngo // dza ti ki ni lce'o// an+ta na ni so'o// pak+Shi ni rgyal mtshan no// tshan do ni 'phreng ba'o// tsa la ni rlung ngo // pa shu ni ri dgas so/
185b5(rgyud 'bum): yan+ta ni dkyil 'khor ro// sha nam ni bzhi mdo'o// phal ku shaM ni skye ba'o// ma hA k+Sha ra ba ni phyugs chen po'o// ga ni ra skyes so// na ni mi'o// go ni khyu mchog go/ ma ni ma he'o// b+ha ni bza
185b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / ha ni rnam grangs so// a d+hu ni rgyal po'o// kha la reg pa ni zos so zhes pa'o// lce la reg pa ni ngoms so zhes pa'o// nista ni snying po'o// hri ni ngo tsha'o// mthun ni gyis shig
185b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / brlal reg pa ni stong pa'o// steng du gcig go// 'og tu med pa'o// phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan no// dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla
186a1(rgyud 'bum): ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni// rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad/
186a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'am bud med g.yon nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa// shin tu ring la'o shes par 'gyur// he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med//
186a3(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni// rgyud 'di ru ni bsgrub pa'o// legs par gyur pa nyid yin te// brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya// nus pa yis ni mchod par bya// pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni//
186a4(rgyud 'bum): mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu// dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba'o// lha mo gzhan dag kun sbyor ba'i// 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang // gnyis su
186a5(rgyud 'bum): med dang thogs med dang / / dam tshig spyad par spyad pa dang // bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor// tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin bzhi// khro med rgyan gyi kun tu spyod// 'di brgyad dam tshig
186a6(rgyud 'bum): kun spyod yin/ / bsgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi// sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya// rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste// rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya// dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi// mig dang
186a7(rgyud 'bum): lag pas ma yin no/ / gsang ba 'di ni mi ldan cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par no// pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas// ngag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/
186b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas// mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o// yul yul du ni dka' thub can// pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag/ pho nya ral
186b2(rgyud 'bum): gri so 'dra zhing / / dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin// de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas// sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob// bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang // myur ba nyid du 'grub
186b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos// mched pa nyid la rab tu 'jug/ 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de// de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin// pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang // sgrub pa po ni dngos
186b4(rgyud 'bum): / grub brtson// rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// zas la rtag tu spyad par bya// sgrub po yi ni legs pa ru// mnyam par gzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni// kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing // bza' min
186b5(rgyud 'bum): par ni mi brtag go/ / 'di nyid du ni de dbyer med// pho nya mo yi sgrub po gnyis// dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe// pho nya gcig po kho na yin// byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni// sgrub pa dag dang nye ba
186b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i// dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan// pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad// phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul dang // chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang // ye shes
186b7(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes yang ngag rdzogs/ / sems kyi bdag nyid nang par langs// lus kyi bya ba kun byas te// lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni// lus la gnas par kun tu spyad// dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu sngags
187a1(rgyud 'bum): ni brjod par bya/ / rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing // mtshon cha rnams ni bsgom mi bya// dam tshig can la khro ma bya// mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya// de dang lhan cig bde bar
187a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ bdag gi don dang gzhan don du// dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya// 'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya// mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos// gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya// srog chags yan lag
187a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung gyon/ / bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur// mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang // shrI he ru kas byin brlabs pas// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// dus kun tu ni yang dag gnas// rigs
187a4(rgyud 'bum): dang rigs min ngor mi blta/ / spyi gtsug la sogs bcing ba spyang // pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin// gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod// zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid// gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad//
187a5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas// gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na// dngos grub gang la 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang // de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs// gsang ba'i
187a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las yang dag bshad/ / de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub// de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni// sngags pas
187a7(rgyud 'bum): skad cig gis 'grub 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang // gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad// bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang // sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po// stong phrag gcig pa'i
187b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal min par/ / kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus// dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che// rngam ngag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung ba// dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin// reg
187b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni smras pas kyang / / sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi// gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi// mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni// rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi//
187b3(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur// skye zhing skye bar de bzhin gshegs// rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas// dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin// de nas mchod pa
187b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag pas/ / mya ngan 'das las byung dpa' bo// de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang // sangs rgyas kun tshegs sras bcas dang // dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang
187b5(rgyud 'bum): spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa/ / zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi// spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu// bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba// sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // ye shes de ni bstan mi
187b6(rgyud 'bum): dag byed zas la spyod pa mi/ / rtag tu ngam tshig spyod byas 'gyur// gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya// man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya// dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par// man ngag rnams
187b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang sbyin par bya/ / pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la// 'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed// rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba// mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya// skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa// bsnyen bkur
188a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni bya ba min/ / ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma po nyamo nyid gnas// 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la// dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur// mchog dang tha ma lhan cig
188a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs/ / de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin// rnal 'byor pa rtag g.yon nas spyod// rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor// lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur// g.yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed// lus ni
188a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon ni rnam par gnon/ / g.yon pa yis ni tshim dang za// brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs// sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson// dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // lhan cig zas la spyod
188a4(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i// rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags// rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i// rnal 'byor sgrub la rab tu mchod// ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang sna tshog pas//
188a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas// sngags pas phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi// nyer spyod bstan
188a6(rgyud 'bum): bcos kun la brtag/ rtag tu de dag gzung zhing srung // las rnams dag ni thams cad la// bgegs med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar// 'di ni gzhan dag 'gyur ma yin// 'di ni pho nya mchog bzang
188a7(rgyud 'bum): bopo brtson zhing lhan cig ldan pa yin/ / ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs// rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam dbye nyid// bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing // de yi don ni mchog mtshungs pa'o//
188b1(rgyud 'bum): spun dang yang na pa dang ni// bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong // lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la// rtsub cing spun ni dmar ser yin// dngos grub kun gyi thun mong du// bzlas dang brtul zhugs la/
188b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag dga'// dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan// pho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas// mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed
188b3(rgyud 'bum): paba'i/ / rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba// gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan//
188b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni// lus can rnams la byin mi rlob// ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag/ shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// rnal 'byor pa la
188b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sdang / / khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skye ste// sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur// dper na la la mar 'dod pas// 'bad pas tshun bsrubs gyur kyang // mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi//
188b6(rgyud 'bum): lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad// 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni// 'tshe ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor gzhan la rten pa ni// gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur// rnal 'byor
188b7(rgyud 'bum): / tshe mchog dpa' bo ni// yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa// rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang // yul de yongs su brtags pa yin// sems can rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur// de rung ni rtag tu
189a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las pho nya'i grags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
189a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog/ dpa' bo rnams kyi khyad par ni// gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing // rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni// yang dag dngos grub
189a3(rgyud 'bum): / rim gyis ster// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sngags chen bklags pas grub
189a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / 'dod pa thams cad grub pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dum skyes ma dang lA ma'ang de// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las rnams
189a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub// gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo kun gyi snying po mchog/ gsang
189a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags de dag mchog dam pa/ / 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// dpa' bo'i sdom pa mchog yin no// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// 'di ni sngags su grags
189a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / sa 'og dang ni mtho ris dang // ji ltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te// gang yang ji bzhin las rnams kyis// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// de yis thams cad grub nas ni// gsang sngags mchog
189b1(rgyud 'bum): nibla med pas/ / 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// gang gis bla na med pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'grub// mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo kun// mdor bsdus rgyas par ma yin no// ri bo mdzes par bris nas ni//
189b2(rgyud 'bum): / sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan// de yi steng du dkyil 'khor sgom// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyes ma// dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo nyid// ha ha he he zhes bzhad pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa'
189b3(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rigs/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' bo'i mchog/ dpa' bo'i mchog ni thams cad nyid// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams// de yis 'gro ba grangs med khyab//
189b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te// 'khor lo'i gnas su rnam par blta// las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing // 'khor lor bzhugs
189b5(rgyud 'bum): la rtag tu mchod/ / legs par mnyam gzhag 'dod pa 'grub// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing // mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// bsams pas 'khor lo chen po yi// dngos grub kyang ni
189b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub/ / sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni re re la// 'khor gyi grangs kyang bye ba ste// rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma ni khyad par du// dngos grub
189b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed pa dge/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i zas kyi rim pa sgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun
190a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sku gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni// dung chen dag ni kho na las// mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/
190a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// yan lag dang ni nying lag mchog/ mos pa'i yid ni sngon 'gro ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni gzung zhing sgrub// dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang // shru krar bcas
190a3(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod par byed/ / nar dpa' chen bdug spos ni// dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste// bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub// de nas bdag nyid mchod byas te// 'dod pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing //
190a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i bu med rnyed par 'gyur// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas// lag pa'i mchod pa rab tu bya// pags chen ri mo bris nas ni// sgrub pa po yis mnyam bzhag na// zhag bdun gyis ni 'grub
190a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / the tsom med par rnam par spyod// rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod// mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin skye// des ni bde ba rnyed nas kyang // las ni rtag tu byed par 'gyur// rtag tu bla ma mchod nas
190a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi dngos grub myur du 'grub/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni sgrub pa yis// glang po'i bags la sku gzugs bri// rnal 'byor ma la sgrub pa yis// ba lang lpags la rim bri// mkha' spyod dag ni
190a7(rgyud 'bum): / sgrub pa yis// rta yi pags la ri mo bri// sa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis// ma he'i pags la ri mo bri// sa 'og spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis// phag gi pags la ri mo bri// gnod sbyin mo ni sgrub pa yis/
190b1(rgyud 'bum): shing spang leb la sku gzugs bri// lha yi bu mo sgrub pa yis// tsam pa'i spang leb sku gzugs bri// klu mo sgrub pa dag gis ni// klu shing spang leb ri mo bri// mi ni sgrub par 'dod pa yis// dur khrod gos
190b2(rgyud 'bum): la sku gzugs bri/ / pha rol blta ba'i sgrub pa dag/ bong bu'i bags la sku gzugs bri// nor rnams sgrub par 'dod pa yis// byi ba'i pags la sku gzugs bri// chang ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// spre'u'i
190b3(rgyud 'bum): pags la sku gzugs bri/ / khrag ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thod pa la ni sku gzugs bri// sa bon 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// phug ron lpags la sku gzugs bri// lha ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis//
190b4(rgyud 'bum): thang shing spang leb sku gzugs bri// grong khyer 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// ce spyang lpags la sku gzugs bri// zhi ba'i las la bram ze'o// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri// des na zhi bar gyur pa yin//
190b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa rgyal rigs mo yi ni// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bris// dbang la rje'u rigs mo yi ni// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri// mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs kyi// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri//
190b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyal bar bya ba dag la ni// rgyal mtshan gos la ri mo bri// rengs par bya ba rdo leb ste// dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i pags// dgug pa la ni seng ge'o// las kun la ni bya yi bags// yang na lcags ni kho
190b7(rgyud 'bum): na'o/ / gzhan du sna tshogs las rnams ni// dran pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub// bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir// ri bong lpags pa dag la bri// bgegs ni ldang bar byed pa la// shi ba'i pags pa
191a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams la bri/ / gser dang dngul la sogs pa la// zangs dang shel dang thang shing dang // rdo rje las ni bya ba ste// dngos grub mchog mi khyang par yin// tsan dan dang ni thang shing dang //
191a2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dmar po tsam pa ka/ a sho ka ni grub pa'o// shrI bri kA nor sbyin 'gyur// an gur dang staka shing // 'o ma shing gi bye brag dang // stag pa'i shing la sogs pa rnams// grub pa yi ni dngos grub
191a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sbal ba'i rus pa las byas dang // klu shing ngag gi bye brag dang // rus sbal rus pa glang po'i so// khyad par du ni char yang 'bebs// bram ze'i rus bzhi pa ste// glang po'i rus ba rgyas
191a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / dbang la rta yi rus pa ste// gsang pal ni ma he'i rus// dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i rus// spang la rta dang ma he'o// rengs par bya la khyi yi rus// dgug pa la ni seng ge'i rus// sa yi
191a5(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu 'gro ba la/ / phag gi rus pa dag la bya// sa dkar dag las byas pa ni// rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyas pa la ni ser ba yin// dbang la dmar po'i sa yin la// gsod pa la ni sa nag/
191a6(rgyud 'bum): ste// 'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga'o// dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag/ mig sman chen po de bzhin te// mi yi rus pa brdar ba yi// mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas kyang // rang byung me tog sa bon dang /
191a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang // gdol ba ma dang g.yung mo dang // khrus mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo yi ni bye brag gi/ 'di dag drug du blangs nas su// shu kra rak+ta'i khyad
191b1(rgyud 'bum): par dag/ sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas kyang // cho ga bzhin du sku gzugs bri// grog ma bar gyi ni sa dag la// shi ba'i skra dang rus pa yi// pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya// thig skud shi ba'i srung
191b2(rgyud 'bum): ba lis/ / sku gzugs thig srung mchog yin no// yi dgas 'phreng sogs bsnyen nas ni// bsas kyang ni mar me bya// dpa' bo chen po'i 'dug spos dang // rkang gis lha bshos bya ba ste// dri chen
191b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chu yi dri/ / thong ba dag gi bum pa ste// arka'i snod ni thod pa'o// arga rus pa'i sU Na ste// 'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no// ji ltar nus pa dag tu spyad// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/
191b4(rgyud 'bum): / thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni// sku gzugs yang ni ri mo 'am// gzhan yang mkhas pas cho ga bya// ji lta'i las kyi rjes mthun par// de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang zhing // gcer bu skra ni grol
191b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur nas kyang // gtso bo dang ni rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon yang ni de bzhin te// phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su// dri chen chu dang dpa' bo bza'// mnyam
191b6(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag nas bzlas pa bya/ / rnam po du ma bye brag gi/ glu dang gar ni rnam pa dang // bza' btung mchog ni spyad par bya// de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste// de 'di cho ga'i rim pa'o// rab tu gnas pa'i
191b7(rgyud 'bum): dus dag tu/ / nyis 'gyur tshogs kyis spel ba ste// gdu bu dang ni kang ka dang // dpung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang // sor gdub dang ni mchod phyir thogs// rkang rgyan dang ni thong pa dang // gdugs dang
192a1(rgyud 'bum): rnga lab de bzhin te/ / sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin zhing dbul// sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam pa// myos byed btung ba'i bye brag rnams// dam tshig cho ga mchog rnams dang /
192a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang // sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang // lha mo mchog gi lus rnams dang // rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // slob dpon phyag rgyar sbyor ba dang // slob ma'i
192a3(rgyud 'bum): tshegs kyi khyad par rnams/ / bza' ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod// bdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni// sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bdug pa dang // khyad par du ni mar me'i 'phreng // gdugs dang bla re
192a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / me long dang ni rnga yab dang // dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang // chun po dag gis rnam par brgyan// bum pa ras dang ldan pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// rin chen lnga dang sman dang ni//
192a5(rgyud 'bum): dri yi bye brag dag gis ni// ar+g+ha'i snod ni khyad par du// tsu ta pa la ba lnga dang // aM bu dzaM pu ka dam pa// bi pa bI dza pu ras dgang // ba la mo ta kri tan dza// ke dri ka ri kang ldan pa// e ka bI ra sa ha de//
192a6(rgyud 'bum): sman rnams kun ces bya ba la// lnga po de dag shes bya ste// mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya// gser dang dzA ti pha la dang // gla gor zho sha de bzhin no// gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni// phyag rgya
192a7(rgyud 'bum): drug gis rnam par brgyan/ / sgrub pa po kun gcer bu yis// bkra shis glu yi glu len cing // rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni// dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du//
192b1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rgya che'i mchod par bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan
192b2(rgyud 'bum): yang bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// mngon mtho he ru ka zhes bya// dkyil 'khor snying pos bsdus pa yin// shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos// dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya// dam tshig
192b3(rgyud 'bum): nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ / dbang bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas// dmar dang tsan dan sbyor ba ni// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni// thams cad bcud kyis
192b4(rgyud 'bum): len du gnas/ / thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin// sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rim pas rtag tu spyad// zhi ba'i btung bas bzhin myangs na// dngos grub rtag tu thob par
192b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin// mchod bzhi de bzhin dpa' bo ni// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi// snyoms par 'jug pa'i de nyid 'dzin//
192b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla// 'khor lo'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas shing // rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla// gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya// bka' bzhin 'khor le bri bya zhing //
192b7(rgyud 'bum): mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gis ni// dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod par bya// sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa// der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sa ni yongs su sbyang bar bya// brdung zhing legs par brdungs
193a1(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / mnyam zhing zug rngu rnam par spang // sa la ma lhung lci ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug/ dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas pa yis/
193a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te// der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam// dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing // ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yi// slob dpon legs par mnyam
193a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag ste/ / dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing // yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags
193a4(rgyud 'bum): shes/ / khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang // sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro// thod pas spyi bor rgyan byas shing // yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang // gug kyeng dag gis lus brgyan cing // rus
193a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng rus par yang dag gnas/ / dum gcig spyi bor rgyan pa dang // rus pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas// bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni// byas nas de yi 'og tu ni//
193a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya// 'khor lo 'di yi snying khar dgod// de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas// ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod// 'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i bdag
193a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bkod nas ni/ / steng du mda' yi dra ba dang // bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba bya// de ltar go bgos sum cu ni// ca gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus// de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shig /
193b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// de nas sems med brang su la// ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan// dpal ldan khrag
193b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thung grong mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya// khru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa// sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa// sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam spyod cing // mkha' 'gro drab
193b3(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog bzlas/ / de yi dbus su bzhag pa ni// 'dab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas// ge sar yang dag ldan pa yi// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// lte bar bkod bya dpa' bo ni//
193b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la// mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar// ha ha zhes byar sgra cher bzhad// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan// bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'//
193b5(rgyud 'bum): glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos// smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byas// phyag na kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing // brgya phyed 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rje phag
193b6(rgyud 'bum): mo zhes bya ba/ / rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya// ka pA la ni an+d+ras bkang // kha nas ru d+hir 'dzag cing // lha dang lha min mir bcas
193b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub cing // mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi// phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni// 'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya//
194a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang // 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod// sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod// gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya// de nas bum pa bya ba ni//
194a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba nag po la sogs med// mu tig gser dang rin chen dang // byu ru dngul dang zangs ma ste// bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i// snod ni steng du gzhag par bya// mgrin pa srad bus
194a3(rgyud 'bum): dkri ba dang / / kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya// gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa// brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod// gos zung gis ni dkris pa yi// bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag
194a4(rgyud 'bum): gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ / mu tig rnams ni mdzes par bya// dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang // gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spyad// grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni//
194a5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa nyid du the tsom med// bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun// dri yi chu yis legs par bsad// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i mkha'
194a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma rnams ni/ / yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod// sa stengs mkha' 'gro ma gang yin// dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya// gang yang sa 'og rnams su dgod// ma mo thams cad
194a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang ni/ / phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dri dang me tog bdug spos dang // mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing // dpal ldam khrag 'thung
194b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gnas/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser// dkar dang gnag dang ser skya dang // de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang // me tog 'phreng ba dum dang /
194b2(rgyud 'bum): bla re dag dang dar bcas pa'i// mda' ni shin tu mdzes pa dang // de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis// rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod par bya// de nas sgrub pos dngos grub kyis// dang por slob dpon
194b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par bya/ / grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// ci nus par ni bla ma mchod// dril dpyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan// shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol// sgrub pa po yis rnga brdungs
194b4(rgyud 'bum): shing / / ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor// 'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni// de yi bu sdug gdong la ni// dar gyis legs par bkab nas su// me tog
194b5(rgyud 'bum): gis bkang thal mo dag/ pad+mas gtor nas bskor ba ni// g.yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// dngos grub sras po
194b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / thal mo me tog gtor nas ni// gang du babs pa'i bsam pa ni// bskor ba dag kyang byas nas su// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug/ de nas
194b7(rgyud 'bum): yon thogs grong khyer du/ / g.yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni// snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor// dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs// de yi rigs ni bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon
195a1(rgyud 'bum): legs par ni/ / rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod// de nas slob ma gnyis pa la// mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yi// de la thig le bya ba yin// de nas slob ma'i
195a2(rgyud 'bum): gdeng phye la/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin// der de yang dag bstan par bya// slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu// rab tu btud pa byas nas ni// g.yon
195a3(rgyud 'bum): nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis/ / de nas bskor ba rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la// ji bzhin chogs phyag bya'o// de nas bla ma dag la yon// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa
195a4(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram// rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul gdub
195a5(rgyud 'bum): sor gdub dam pa dang / / gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid// bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams// phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya// deng nas brtsams te bran
195a6(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ / khyod la bdag ni dbul lags zhes// blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya// de ltar nges par bya ba ni// sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas// de nas de la mkha'
195a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig/ de dang rnam sbyong 'gro ba kun// sgrub pa
195b1(rgyud 'bum): po ni de dag gi/ ci bgyi byed par the tsom med// rnal 'byor 'di ni grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing // mi snang phug dang gnas mkha' rgyu// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis lem//
195b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis// rtag par rgyun du skyed par 'gyur// gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par bya// nges gnon 'gro ba thams
195b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang / / lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis// skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed// sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar// gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod// mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang //
195b4(rgyud 'bum): smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa// de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro// de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am//
195b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'ang rdo rje 'jigs byed las// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung // de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas// mngon
195b6(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan//
195b7(rgyud 'bum): chu med pa ni mtshams yin te// gos pa med cing chags spangs pa// mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa// de ni sems can thams cad de// mtshams ni srid bdag pa ste// dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid
196a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms shing bzla// gcig cing 'byung bar snang ba ste// du dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan
196a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste/ / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste// spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba'o// he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan//
196a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa// thun bzhi ru ni bya ba'o// dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang // lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus// lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid//
196a4(rgyud 'bum): dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes// dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi// gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te// gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa// bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab// phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas
196a5(rgyud 'bum): palhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog/ sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams su ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya// sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor le yin//
196a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gog pa longs spyod 'khor le ste// lam ni bde ba chen po yin// de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas// rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams//
196a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis// yongs su dag par rim par sbyor// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//
196b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba yi dgas pa da dbus su// skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin// dges pa'i nyams kyis mos pa ste// dus dag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na// sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin// dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni//
196b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang // don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te// de dag rtag tu bsres nas su// rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dod// gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang // he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong
196b3(rgyud 'bum): / mchog/ oM shrI he ru kA ya byi d+ya ma bad+yA rA dza ya d+hIHma he taM no bI rA pra dze da ya AH/ rtag tu mtshams ni rnams bsgoms na// dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya// dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de/
196b4(rgyud 'bum): las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// don ni sngags pas rtag tu smra// dngos grub 'di ni rab
196b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'grub/ / de ma thag tu grub chen bcas// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// sgrub po'i dbang pos rnams bsgoms te// khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas// zhag gsum brtul zhugs
196b6(rgyud 'bum): la gnas na/ / lha yi gnas 'gro ba yin// lha yi ye shes thob nas ni// lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin// ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing // thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su// rga dang
196b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ / sangs rgyas lha yis bstan pa ste// srid par sangs rgyas rol bar mdzad// nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang // phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung ba spyad// mthong nas sring mo yang dag
197a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas/ / rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha// thams cad kyang ni 'byor par 'gyur// pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni// de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang
197a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya/ / sgrub pos 'dod la dga' bas ni// mod la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen// gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste// khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing // sgrub pa po
197a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe mchog tu 'gyur/ / 'di ni dpa' chen dpa' bo ste// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis// sa gzhi ska rags kyis bskor ba// lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang //
197a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi// mong la dbang du gyur pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan
197a5(rgyud 'bum): yang bshad bya ba/ / yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste// yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che// phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing //
197a6(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan// A li kA li las byung gtso// phag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan// stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// na ra'i pags pa gos
197a7(rgyud 'bum): su mnabs/ / thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // g.yas pa'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa
197b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang / / zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug gtsang // phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// sna tshogs pad+ma nyid la
197b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / 'khor lo drug gi dbus su bzhugs// rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyang // myur du dngos grub stsol ba yin// dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste// gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/
197b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te// bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo// lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya// lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing // spyan gsum
197b4(rgyud 'bum): dbu skra grol ba ste/ / phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin// thams cad yi dgas nyi stang bzhugs// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // dmar dang dung kha de bzhin dkar// cang te'u dang dril bu 'dzin//
197b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad na ri'i pags pa 'dzin// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// yi ge drug las yang dag byung // lha mo gzigs pa mtshan pa yin// ji
197b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar mgon po'i mdog bzhin du/ / phag mo yang ni de bzhin te// phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no// sngo dang ser dang ldang ba dang // stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// lha mo'i byin par mnyam par 'khril
197b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos/ / oM hriHha ha huM hUM phaT/ yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma// yan lag drug pa rnam par sgom// bdun pa dbus su dgod pa ni// yi ge hUM las he ru ka/ dbus su dran pa yang dag
198a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi yan lag ste bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje he ru ka ma'o// brtsom 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
198a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o/ / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni
198a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje drag mo'o/ / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun sgom// ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing sgom// gsang sngags gzhal med pa
198a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas shing / / khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste// bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang // zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste// rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni// zhag bdun gyis ni the tsom med// dpyid bla tha
198a5(rgyud 'bum): chu nya la ni/ / sring mo bu mo tsha mo dang // shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgom byas pas// tho rangs dpal khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
198a6(rgyud 'bum): bla ma las/ / nye ba'i snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// gzhan yang snying po bshad bya ba// sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// gi yi ge las
198a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / bde ba chen po de las byung // sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste// zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs// spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug/ mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i
198b1(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan can/ / zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i 'jigs pa ni// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnom//
198b2(rgyud 'bum): dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang // g.yon bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnon// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsha 'tshir// tshangs lpags bshus nas rgyan du 'dzin// mdung rtse
198b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang dgra snga dang / / kha T+wAM cang te'u gri gug mchog/ brgyad pa la ni lcags kyu thogs// g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog
198b4(rgyud 'bum): tho ba sdigs mdzub dam pa ste/ / shrI yi ye shes yang dag rdzogs// phang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te// drag cing dmar la dkar ba yin// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// skra grol ba la
198b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum pa/ / thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi zhal dang phyag tu gnas// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyogs kyis gos can chags pas
198b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / rkeng pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che// sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar// ser zhing ljang la du kha ste// du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog/ de 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su gnas// lha mo mnga'
198b7(rgyud 'bum): ngang gzhu 'dzin cing / / tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs// 'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par// phyi yi dkyil
199a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnam par sgom/ / pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod// oM ni shar gyi 'dab ma la// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod// ban
199a2(rgyud 'bum): byang gi 'dab la ste/ / rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod// dz+wa ni rdo rje drag mo ste// mkha' 'gro nub tu dgod par bya// he ru lce phyogs 'dab la dgod// gser gyi mdog can mkha' 'gro ma//
199a3(rgyud 'bum): ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar// zhal gsum rnam bsgyur drag po ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms// zod
199a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'phreng ba drag po ste/ / pad+ma sbom po'i 'dab ma la// chags pa can gyi gzugs shing bzhes// thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba yin// mnga' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste// zhags pa lcags kyu
199a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams// cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrog/ ser dang ljang khu sngo ba dang // sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang // dkar dang ljang khu sngo ba dang // dmar dang sngo pa
199a6(rgyud 'bum): ltung ba ste/ / 'di ltar mdog mi byed per gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par bya// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ byang chub sems kyis gang bar gzhag/ shar gyi phyogs su he yan te/ ming
199a7(rgyud 'bum): ni ha li ka zhes bya/ / byang gi phyogs su ru yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni ru tsa ki/ nub kyi phyogs su ru yin te// ru tsa ka ma li zhes bya// lho yi phyogs su ka yin te// keng rus ma zhes grags pa'i ma
199b1(rgyud 'bum): me yi phyogs su hUM mdzad ma/ / bden bral phyogs su phaT mdzad ma// rlung gi phyogs su Da ma ri// dba' ldan ki li ki la ste// de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/
199b2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du// de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur ba yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos can g.yas/
199b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan can te// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan// drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs pa'i// thams cad ro yi sdeng
199b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs sgom/ / spyan gsum pa la chags pas myos// dbang ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba// rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste// bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'chang ma
199b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba/ / me yi phyogs la sha pa ri zhes bya ba ste// ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang // dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te// bzhi pa rdo rje mdung
199b6(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol// bzang mo ldo ba 'phyang ma ste// skye gnas ring la rgyu yang che// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag/ skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i
199b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ / rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spung ba'o// shar sgor baM las gtum ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / lho'i sgor raM las rol gtum mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
200a1(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do// byang gi sgor ha las 'greng ba rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang dkar ser nyid yin te/
200a2(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams te// gri gug mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang // dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // zhags pa dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // sdigs
200a3(rgyud 'bum): mjung gri gug mgo bo 'dzin/ / dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu ste// lcags sgrog cang te'u gri gug dang / thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mgo bo dang ni sdigs mjug mchog/ ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa dang // ser dang dmar
200a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhal mchog yin/ / del du cang te'u mi zug dang // kha thA ga dang thod pa dang // mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub byag/ sgra grol ba la gdug pa cha// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// zhal gdangs
200a5(rgyud 'bum): ljags ni bskyod pa ste/ / g.yas brkyang g.yon bsgyus tshul gyis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'greng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// r-i dang bad+ma'i ti dbus bzugs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas
200a6(rgyud 'bum): napar brgyan/ / thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // mgo bo'i dri shal rnams kyis brgyan// mi bskyed pa yi cod pan 'ching // rnam bsgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste// li ge nyi shu gnyis las byung // snying pa ra
200a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni bsgom par bya/ / 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM trA DA ki nI dA la shaM bai ra tsu hUM baT swAhA/ yi ge re re dgod pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi
200b1(rgyud 'bum): snying de bzhin/ hUM shI lha dang lha mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// dbusu rnam dag bcom ldan 'das// skom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs// gzugs su lta bstod
200b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su lta ba'ang stong pa yin// sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste// rnam shes
200b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin// 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o// 'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog/
200b4(rgyud 'bum): par lta ba stong pa yin// phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste// nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
200b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
200b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du// phag mo yang
200b7(rgyud 'bum): ni de bzhin te/ / gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das// he ru ka dpal rnam par shes// phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o// lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// don
202a1(rgyud 'bum): yang so so yang dag rig/ rta gdong ma gang yin pa'o// chos rnams so so yang dag rig/ rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma// nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ gser mdog can gyi mkha'
202a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / spobs pa so so yang dag rig lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus// rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni// he li ka ni don la rton pa ste// ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin// ru tsa ka me le ni ye shes rton// keng
202a3(rgyud 'bum): rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin/ / shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la// chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod// hUM ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//
202a4(rgyud 'bum): Da ma ri ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// ki li ki li ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o// me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun// lha mo yis ni rnam par dag/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos
202a5(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ut+pa la sngon po ma'o/ / chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni dran pa'i mchog go// nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsus pa
202a6(rgyud 'bum): raphyang ma'o/ / zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri ma'o// mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni// 'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag/ sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni// gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i
202a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'o/ / rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// 'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ni bcom ldan 'das
202b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni// 'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan ma// rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snyi
202b2(rgyud 'bum): po bsgom pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag pa// 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te// rnam par snang mdzad thig
202b3(rgyud 'bum): / tu grags/ b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes// dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes// mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin// pul+lI ra ma pad+ma'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra thugs 'khor lo//
202b4(rgyud 'bum): oM r+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste// ar bu da ni sku'i 'khor lo// go dA ba ri zur bzhi'o// rA me shwa ra me phyogs so// de bi ko Ta bden bral yin// mA la ba ni rlung gi zur// dbang ldan kA ma rU pa ste// grA ba ni
202b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pa ni/ / 'di la the tshom med pa yin// o dre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o// tri sha ku ne lho phyogs sgo// ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o// ka ling ka ni byang sgo ste// shar gyi rta babs laM bA ka/ kAny+tsi lte yi rta
202b6(rgyud 'bum): babs yin/ hi ma la ya nub phyogs so// pre ta pu ri byang yin te// gri ha de ba lha snam bu// sau raSh+Ta ni rin chen sa// su bar+Na dI pa dra ba phyed// na ga ra ni rnga yab dang // dril bu rgyal mtshan pa dan no// sin d+hu
202b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thig zlum po/ / ma ru ta ni sgo khyud do// ku lu ta ni rdo rje dang // rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi// thig ni bla na med pa yin// bur bzhi pa la sgo bani pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed/
203a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyan cing // dar dang 'breng bas rnams par brgyan// bur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyung mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // sku yi 'khor lo'i
203a2(rgyud 'bum): sku nyid ni/ don yod grub pa rnam par spyod// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od dpag med// thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa// pad+ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin// phye yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni// rnam par snang
203a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad rnam par sgom/ / tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste// 'dus shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de// rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za// ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa// de yis rnam
203a4(rgyud 'bum): dag rang bzhin can/ / sa dang ri mo thams cad kun// dpa' bos yongs su dag par sgom// ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag/ 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag/ lte bar phag mo'i
203a5(rgyud 'bum): sa bon k+Sha/ rA he ru ka dpal mchog yin no// 'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag/ dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na// dkyil
203a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang po yi ge ste/ / dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin// gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste// lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin// drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid
203a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ / pad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa// thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa// sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba// zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba// ring du song ba sgo bzhi
203b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thig/ chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rtag tu sgom zhing mchod par bya// dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// sdom
203b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ / dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni// he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog/ b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa// de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste
203b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no/ / dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin// bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin// lha yi de nyid de bzhin te// sngags kyi de nyid
203b4(rgyud 'bum): / phyag rgya yin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog/ yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing // rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs// phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing // de ni dkyil 'khor
203b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / chos rnams thams cad brtag tu med// chos dang chos min rnam par spyod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni// rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// chags dang chags med chag
203b6(rgyud 'bum): par mnyam/ rnga pad+ma rA ga chu mnyam byung // rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// yid ni khams rnams thams cad de// gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med//
203b7(rgyud 'bum): bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te// sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te/
204a1(rgyud 'bum): rmya ba dang ni mi rgyug/ sa 'ogs stengs blar khyag// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi smom pa bstan pa'i le'u sde lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//
204a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// sems can kun la phan stsol ba// A li kA li las byung ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/ dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam
204a3(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ de yis dbus su rdo rje che// zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas// thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
204a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa// lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste// nyi ma'i
204a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / hUM las he ru kar byas te// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'chir// stag
204a6(rgyud 'bum): gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ / phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// gdug pa kun gyi klad pa la// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis mnan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ brgyal zhing rnam par
204a7(rgyud 'bum): myos pa yi/ / klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan// gcer bu'o dod 'bod pa mnan// rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste// lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te// zod
204b1(rgyud 'bum): pa kha T+wAM ka yang 'dzin/ / gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug brgyan
204b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste/ / bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas// ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te// sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs// gzi byin mdang
204b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis mdzes pa ste/ / gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni// lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no// lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste// dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o// steng gi zhal ni dmar po
204b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni// ser zhing ldang ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// ma nyams dum bu'i
204b5(rgyud 'bum): ska rags can/ / pad+ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma// zur la bum pa thod pa ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis// shar
204b6(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub lho ru'o/ / sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do// zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// kha cig
204b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod/ / bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa// sngar gshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsgom par bya// gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkha' 'gro ma
205a1(rgyud 'bum): yi mdog bzhin dang / / phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin// gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin// gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgos
205a2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ / sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// A li kA li nang byung ba// bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par// sems can khams ni
205a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
205a4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba// A li kA
205a5(rgyud 'bum): li zur gsum gnas/ / pad+ma 'dab gsum rnam par sgom// rdo rje phag mo he ru ka/ lte ba la ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje mkha' 'gro lA ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ni dmar
205a6(rgyud 'bum): la sngon 'phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste/ / mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang // lA ma ljang la ser ba ste// dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// bcom ldan dgon po zhal bzhi pa//
205a7(rgyud 'bum): zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon// thod po'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang // mi 'jum
205b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching / / rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te// byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing // gcer bu dbu skra grol
205b2(rgyud 'bum): ba la rnga na spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril/ / 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// sku lus phyag rgya drug
205b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin cing rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / / thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon ljang khru// steng ni sngo skya sgyu lus dkar// gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag/
205b4(rgyud 'bum): / A li kA li b+ha ga'i mchog/ gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag tu// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par sgom// thug kyi 'khor le'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma dag tu rtag/ dbus su he ru ka phag mo//
205b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod// zur du thod pa dkar po dag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod// shar gyi zur la sku 'khor la// rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la// khwa gdong la sogs rnam
205b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad do/ rnga gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur// 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la// shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste// rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o// bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rdo rje he ru ka/ sngo zhing dkar po dud kha dang // sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin// rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan// gzhan du rang bdag mdog bzhin du// dpa' bo 'khor lo mdog de bzhin//
206a1(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma// dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam// dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la// gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa
206a2(rgyud 'bum): po dag/ sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po mdog/ dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor// kha gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs// gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid//
206a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu// dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar// mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang khu'o// sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams// de
206a4(rgyud 'bum): yang rigs kyi dbye bas so/ / thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod// tha
206a5(rgyud 'bum): cad rang rig cod pan can/ / ji lta ba yi rim pas sgom// mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis// ji lta'i rjes su rnams bsgoms nas// go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs
206a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rim pa dag/ sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa sgom// gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas su//
206a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu sgom// 'od ni su la'ang mi bstan te// de nyid su la'ang brjod mi bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/ rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig rtag
206b1(rgyud 'bum): tu bsrung bya zhing / / bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya// 'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu// 'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyang // gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa// sngags pas myur du 'grub par
206b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// gsang ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i
206b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog gyur pa/ / rig sngags gsang sngags rgya che ba'i// bsgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin// log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya// bla ma'i rim las ji
206b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar bstan/ / gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing // dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byar spyod tshul gnas pa yin// lkugs
206b5(rgyud 'bum): shing glen la sdig ngan can/ / byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa// de dag kun gyis mi shes te// mi shes mun
206b6(rgyud 'bum): pas khebs pa dang / / khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'// nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan// de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so// he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug
206b7(rgyud 'bum): / slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// myur du dngos grub bskyed byed de// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yin// cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya// srid pa gsum po ma lus
207a1(rgyud 'bum): ni de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes/ / mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba// de ltar de ni the tshom med// lha rnam
207a2(rgyud 'bum): bzlog ste bkod pa dang / / sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dag/ dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang // so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste// bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni// sgom pa gsang ba bzlog
207a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni// sems ni yongs su smin pa dag/ 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi/
207a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin// bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin// dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa// bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang // nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur//
207a5(rgyud 'bum): des na srung med bza' ba med// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med// mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin// bzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni//
207a6(rgyud 'bum): bla mas bstan las brtson las te// phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la// lam de shin tu ring ba nyid// rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa// ston pa'i mtshan nyid
207a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dang / / dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan pa yin// skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang
207b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags brjod/ / pus mo sa la bcugs nas su// bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni// go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa// 'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas/
207b2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni mi rgyu rol// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ci rigs bshad kyis legs par nyon// brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar bgyi// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par// gang
207b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid/ / dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad// de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur// de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che// thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad// rdo rje can ni der zhugs
207b4(rgyud 'bum): papacha med cha ni rnam spangs pa/ / lus can rnams kyi nang na rol// lus las 'das shing gos pa med// la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// la lar sna dang ngag dag dang // la lar rna bar sgra
207b5(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / la lar dri chen rdo rje chu// la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems// la lar skom dang la lar bkres// la lar khro dang la lar ni// la lar bde la rnam par gzigs// la lar bud med
207b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags te/ / la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste// la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas// la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur// la lar srog tu rnam par gnas//
207b7(rgyud 'bum): la lar sa dang chu dang me// la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga// la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis// bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang sring mo ru// la lar chung ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang
208a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan dang / / khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid// la lar zla ba skar ma bcas// la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur// la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun// byed pa po dang ma
208a2(rgyud 'bum): zad rgyal/ / la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum// mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal// la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid//
208a3(rgyud 'bum): lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o// la lar nad chen gyis zin pa// la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// la lar sngo dang le brgan dang // la lar dkar dang ser ba'o// la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad//
208a4(rgyud 'bum): la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo// la lar spyan dang mA ma kI// la lar dkar bzlog zhi ba mo// la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid// la lar klu dang sbrul chen po/
208a5(rgyud 'bum): la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni// la lar rmi lom mthong ba dang // la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas// la lar rlung drang mkhris pa dang // la lar khrag dang pags par 'gyur// la lar mya ngan du ba dang //
208a6(rgyud 'bum): la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin// la lar mtho ris skye ba ste// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu// thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la// lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i// de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o//
208a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa min pa rdo rje can// gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang // lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che// bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par// yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas// kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin// de
208b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus rtag tu gsang ba che/ / 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o// de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha// de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes// mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang
208b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na/ / thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am// mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa// sgra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha// mchog gi gzugs
208b3(rgyud 'bum): can bsam pa ste/ / stong pa ma yin dmigs su med// yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med// gos pa med cing sa bon med// gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste// rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni//
208b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes ye shes dag tu bzung // thams cad gsal byed sgron ma ni// dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta// gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag/ dkar po'i 'od kyi
208b5(rgyud 'bum): tshul can ni/ / phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te// nyon mongs 'byin pa gsung ba yin// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod ni// bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan//
208b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni// phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin// drug pa gzugs med ye shes te// bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings// brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du// sangs rgyas
208b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu bdag yin no/ / sbas pa lha dang lag pa dang // 'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs// dgu pa bla ma bla ma ste// thams cad 'dir
209a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bstan pa yin/ / rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyid thams cad khyab byed de// lus kun la ni
209a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gnas/ / de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te// he ru ka dpal yin par bshad// skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid// phra ba'i snying bro'ang 'dzin pa yin// ye shes dag tu 'byung de la// gang
209a3(rgyud 'bum): zhig sa la gnas rnams dang / / bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang // rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu// de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rig byed grub pa'i
209a4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' rnams la/ / 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad// 'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin/
209a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// de nyid du ni kun skyes pa// 'byin dang sdud pa byed pa yin// a A/ i I/ u U/ ri r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/
209a6(rgyud 'bum): / aM aH/ ka kha ga g+hu da/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ TaTha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ oM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan lce de yin// mchog nyid lhag par gnas
209a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang // bsgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas// don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te// brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi theg pa ste// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na// des ni 'di ni nges rgyal
209b1(rgyud 'bum): sa / sa sa b+hU swA ts+tsha// smye pe gang ga/ skye na yi / gru ga pa na h
209b2(rgyud 'bum): U~M di ni 'dri byed pa/ / chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin// A la~M kA li mdun bsams nas// rnal 'byor chen po ngal sos te// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de// sems kyang bcam
209b3(rgyud 'bum): par mi bya'o/ / sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste// des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba// khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin// 'di ni 'bad pas swa bya ste/
209b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom// rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob// srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba
209b5(rgyud 'bum): yin na bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni/ / bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad// gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing // sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor// sems ni rnam 'khor rnam
209b6(rgyud 'bum): par mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo / / ji ltar bung med kyis gtam rjes yi rang // kun smra bstan pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed// lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// nas 'byor
209b7(rgyud 'bum): lal pa de dang 'dra bar bshad/ / he ru ka dpal sgra'i yan la// sku gran brtan g.yo bdan nyid ca// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin te gnas dri sa med// ming ni 'od byed shes
210a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// bdun pa mngon du 'gyur ba nyid// nye ba'i bdun pa sbyang dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye ba'i 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/
210a2(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa// 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad//
210a3(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag/ thogs medo dus su gang bstan pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa
210a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ / kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal// kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub
210a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya ba/ / bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyi te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste//
210a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin// gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li kA li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin//
210a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba// go cha chen pos yang dag srung // sngags rnams
210b1(rgyud 'bum): / kun gyis mchod pa yin// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
210b2(rgyud 'bum): sa thob cing / / skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// de ltar cho ga ldan byas na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// zla ba nya la sa steng du// 'di ltar
210b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ / de yis bsod nams gyur pa yin// lha klu mi la sogs pa kun// de yi bsod nams gang gyur des// bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan
210b4(rgyud 'bum): sems pa tsam gyis sam/ / klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba thob// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal ldan
210b5(rgyud 'bum): khrag 'thung sogs na rang 'gro/ / lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan pa ldan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yi mchod pas mchod// 'chi ba
210b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ / mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa stengs su ni rnyed par dka'// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// gsang
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btug// gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/
211a1(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas sa ni bsnyams nas su// bshad ci yis ni byug par bya// ma hA rak+ta byugs nas kyang // bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// rigs ngan shan pa mo blangs nas// me
211a2(rgyud 'bum): tog la sogs gdab par bya/ / dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul// zhag la sogs pa'i mar me sbar// cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya// glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha yi rol mo'i
211a3(rgyud 'bum): bye brag dang / / phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan// A li kA li mnyam byas te// sde mtshan la ni thim par bya// bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la// thub pa'i
211a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis rgyas par bya/ / der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang
211a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // sum cu pa ni yang dag blung // nyi
211a6(rgyud 'bum): shu drug pa nyid dang ni/ / de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang // de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang /
211a7(rgyud 'bum): dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang //
211b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // dang po yi ni dang po dang // de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin/
211b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang // uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo // dang

217a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su/ / mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na// dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal//
217b1(rgyud 'bum): bklags pas grub pa don yod pa// oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya// hUM hUM phaT ni mthar sbyar ba// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// grub pa thams cad grung byed yin// de nas rang nyid bdag nyid kyi// dpa
217b2(rgyud 'bum): / bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' bgro ma ni dra ba yin// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod// oM shri badz+ra he he ru ru ka hUM hUM phaT// DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ hA sA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Ta pha
217b3(rgyud 'bum): / hUM hUM kaM ru ru he he dz+ra ba shrI au/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// ma 'byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// Ta pa hUM hUM ha ha hrIHoM/ yi ge baM dang yau dang ni// yi ge mau dang hri nyid dang // hUM dang phaT ces bshad
