217b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / oM baM badz+ra bA rA hi/ haM yo ya mi nI/ dz+rIM ma~M mu hAn+ti/ hreM hU~M sa tsa la nI/ ts+tsha ts+tsha sa tra sa ni/ padz+ra phaT tsaN+Di ka/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bsgrags// re'u mig drug la rnam par sgom/
217b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha'i snying po bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// snying po bla med bshad par bya/
217b6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsum pa ni dag nyid dge/ pad+mo dbus su phag mo ste// 'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni// lha mo'i
217b7(rgyud 'bum): snying po rnam par sgom/ / oM las byung ba'i rta gdong dang // rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang // mi 'phro ma dang dri med ma// hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo// sreg lugs ma dang
218a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed ma/ / rang byung ma dang bcu gnyis te// ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa// sngo dang ser dang dmar
218a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / ljang khu steng zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod 'phreng can// gsus pa sbom zhing skra grol ba//
218a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste// rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas// 'jigs byed tsa muN+Di 'jigs mos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdung dang gri
218a4(rgyud 'bum): gug cang te'u dang / / rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang // lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang // na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang // ska rags dang ni dpung brgyan
218a5(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste// 'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste// ser dang dmar
218a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldang ba dang / / lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te// me phyogs dmar la dud la ste// sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang // dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag
218a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan na/ skyil krung byed pas legs pas bzhugs// thod pa li ni dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam bsgyur// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// thugs rje'i chags pas
218b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par myos/ / rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing // thod pa rak+tas bkang ba dang // dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrog/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin// sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// dbang
218b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs/ / g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu skra mdzes// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste// thod
218b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams// thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang // thams cad mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan// sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste// ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog
218b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa/ / gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste// bcu gsum pa ni rnam par sgom// snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin// 'dod pa thams
218b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu stsol/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha dang lha mo'i snying po bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba
218b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rnyed dka' dgod pa ste/ / gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub 'grub pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong // tsan dan gyis ni nye bar bsku// dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni// me tog sim
218b7(rgyud 'bum): ma gcal bkram zhim/ / spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya// bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing // phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te// re'u mig bzhin dgu zlum la// yi ge'i
219a1(rgyud 'bum): phyi mo dgod par bya/ / der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa// dbyangs dang yi ge grub pos so// thub pa de
219a2(rgyud 'bum): lha'i grangs 'gyur la/ / re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang // gsum
219a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni khyad par dbye/ / de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang // re'u mig
219a4(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga la yir ldan/ / lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa//
219a5(rgyud 'bum): me yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye// ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid//
219a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// de nas rang 'byung blangs nas su// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// don
219a7(rgyud 'bum): kun grub byed ces bya ba'i/ / tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te//
219b1(rgyud 'bum): re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni//
219b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste btu// de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung // re'u mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis
219b3(rgyud 'bum): pa gzung / / bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re'u mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu
219b4(rgyud 'bum): drug pa dang / / sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang // re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rim bzlog pa sgrub pos blang // re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u
219b5(rgyud 'bum): mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ / gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan// steng du thig les brgyan par bya// de nas chu yis sa bon bzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dbye//
219b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o// oM ni sku la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rigs rgyal 'khor lo
219b7(rgyud 'bum): sgyur ba'i sngags/ / 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru/
220a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du ni// 'dug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// sha chen bdag gi thams cad
220a2(rgyud 'bum): kun/ rdo rje yang ni med par bshad// rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT// oM gr-ih+Na grih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa la grih+Na
220a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do// nam mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus
220a4(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs//
220a5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thams cad kun gyi rnam par spyad// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drug po thugs rje'i nyams// g.yas
220a6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ / dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon// u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon// khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// sku la mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbu la
220a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings/ / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te// lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs ka dpral ba phyag rgya ste/
220b1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste// mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang // na ra'i pags pa'i steng du ste// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no//
220b2(rgyud 'bum): stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang // dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po
220b3(rgyud 'bum): skye sa spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan/ / khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje
220b4(rgyud 'bum): ste sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / / dud la ngur smrig bsres pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni//
220b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste// rang gi rig dang gnyis med
220b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud/ / khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing // dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis// khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin//
220b7(rgyud 'bum): stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste// tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni// ral gri dril bu de bzhin te// yang na rdo rje dril bu dang // thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro//
221a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub
221a2(rgyud 'bum): / mchog dam pa// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM
221a3(rgyud 'bum): A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas// thams cad bskyed par rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor chen po sbyor ba ste// kha sbyar lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil
221a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor yin/ / snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha// zangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa
221a5(rgyud 'bum): med grub cing / / rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyu las byung yin na// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' de//
221a6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas// dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad// khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba zhal bzhi
221a7(rgyud 'bum): bar byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde mtshan brgyad ni
221b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam sgom pa/ / mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i dbus gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par sgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhug/
221b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// drag po zla bo phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// ral pa'i cod pan
221b3(rgyud 'bum): 'ching ba ste/ / phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// rig pa gnyis mang bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod rlon do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par
221b4(rgyud 'bum): mos/ dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs// sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // dud pa yi ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril bus
221b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam ldan pas/ / rang gi rig dang yang dag 'khril// tshangs pa bshus nas mnabs par mdzad// rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang /
221b6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste// bcom ldan paM hUM nges 'byung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar 'dab lha mor dgod pa ste// ji srid lho phyogs de
221b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin// a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// Ta yi mkha'
222a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma dag ste/ / dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so// dmar dang dud kha ljang khu dang // ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' 'gro sa dang
222a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma// sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa// de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po
222a3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon// rnam bsgyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin/
222a4(rgyud 'bum): drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// 'gro ba thams cad smon byed de// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa// sde
222a5(rgyud 'bum): tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/ / 'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis sgom// yang na phag mo dgod bya ste// bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dag po ste// mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom
222a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/ oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub/
222a7(rgyud 'bum): sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga dbus su bsgom par bya// a sha/ ka kaM/ tsarma tsa/ TaM ta paM ka/ te pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza yaM ma b+ha ha tsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar
222b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa ni/ / rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'// rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa// zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// de
222b2(rgyud 'bum): rnyed na yang sA lus bya/ / skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing // phyugs ni zas sa rta spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i
222b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor mchog gi ga da ba// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor
222b4(rgyud 'bum): ma/ rnam mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni// kar da wa yi gzugs su bya// phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang // zhal ni kar da wa ru bya// sngar
222b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad gnas dang byad mtshan dang / / zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs// thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun// mkha'
222b6(rgyud 'bum): lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can/ / gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong // sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong // khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang // khA yi zhal gdong de bzhin te// zur la gshin rje sreg sogs
222b7(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / ma he'i ri dgas zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang // spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa// sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed//
223a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang // ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster// ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas//
223a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum// de kun de ma thag tu mthong // sngar bshad dpa'
223a3(rgyud 'bum): bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ / gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhin no// sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing // rtag tu dngos
223a4(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad 'thob/ / rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni// gar da'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul
223a5(rgyud 'bum): po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ / nad yod pa yang med par 'gyur// long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang // khyi dang ba lang glang
223a6(rgyud 'bum): po ma/ / rnga mo ce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po'ang mnyam pas mchog yin no// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'// dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas/
223a7(rgyud 'bum): yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing // rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par// bza' ba yang ni bza
223b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bshad/ / 'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te// btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
223b2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgom
223b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rigs las brgyad pa'i cho ga yi// gdan dang phyag mtshon sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o// nga nya Na na ma zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa// nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/
223b4(rgyud 'bum): / nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// na ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal
223b5(rgyud 'bum): dang/ / chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis// 'dod las grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin// sngo dang dkar ba nyid
223b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / ser dang dmar po ljang khu dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin// glang po seng ge rta dang ni//
223b7(rgyud 'bum): rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang // dbang phyug che dbang po yang de// rang rigs yan lag dang bcas pa// gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni//
224a1(rgyud 'bum): @byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas// lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/
224a2(rgyud 'bum): rma ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o// lho dang nub dang de bzhin te// byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang na dbus su zla ba ste// shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan// de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste// 'di
224a3(rgyud 'bum): lhalta ste/ / rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang / bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o// rdo rje zla ba dang /
224a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ seng ge'i gdan khri'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha rA dang
224a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ rta'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang / rdo rje dril bral dang // de dag ni pad+ma'i
224a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o//
224a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// mche ba rnam par
224b1(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u s+tha hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i
224b2(rgyud 'bum): shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang khu/ nub dmar po
224b3(rgyud 'bum): ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen
224b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang khu/ byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang khu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lnga'i rim pa yis/
224b5(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen 'phreng ba yi// chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya// grwa bzhir ma mo bzhi sgom ste// ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni// ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te// chags pa
224b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ni ma mo dang / / phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te// me yi phyogs la sogs par dgod// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang // skra grol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur// spyan gsum pa la gcer bu ste/
224b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// dbang chen me dang chu dang ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas// rigs kyi gdan la
225a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa yin/ / 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang // ral gri thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug kyang ni phyag na 'chang // ma ning las byung lha mo sgom// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba can// skyil
225a2(rgyud 'bum): mo krung ni phyed pa'o/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang // rdo rje rta mchog ste/
225a3(rgyud 'bum): khro ze'i rgyal po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po// dmar dang sngo dang dud kha dkar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu thod pa la T+wAM ga
225a4(rgyud 'bum): cang te'u yang ni de bzhin de/ / thod pa dbyug tog mdung dang ni// dgra sta thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/
225a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba 'chang // mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan// nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis
225a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam bsgyur zhal// spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can// rang gi rig dang gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams
225a7(rgyud 'bum): can te/ / phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM// mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya// sngar bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya//
225b1(rgyud 'bum): phung po khams dang skye mched dang // lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis// rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// mdung dang
225b2(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu thod pa dang / / kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang // cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang // na ra'i pags pa 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang khu// dud kha dang ni dkar ba dang // dkar dang sngo
225b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ser dmar dang / / ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o// ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu pad+ma'i mdog/ dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang // ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i
225b4(rgyud 'bum): mdog/ ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/ de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgom// 'phreng ba'i
225b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags ming dang bcas/ / mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so// mthar ni huM hUM phaT dang sbyar// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra DA ka hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM ShA
225b6(rgyud 'bum): ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA su kha rat+na rA ka tra nA kI nI dz+wA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su la pad+ma DA ka hrI~M DA ki ni dz+wa la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA su kha Te shAR+Sha
225b7(rgyud 'bum): khaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM pa ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badz+ra DA ka daM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT/
226a1(rgyud 'bum): oM rat+na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ka maM hUM phaT/ ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa// mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su// dam tshig gis ni legs
226a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur/ / sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur// sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin khyud dang tsum
226a3(rgyud 'bum): ba na/ / b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba dag/ ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug/ rnam par blta zhing nges par brtag/ dga' ba dang po shes rab ste// mchog tu
226a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba mnyam par sbyor/ / bde bar dga' bar grub pa che// lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin// sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor// sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor// de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o// thig lnga'i
226a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhung gi sbyor shes na/ / phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob// cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis
226a6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / 'di ni nges pa kho na'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
226a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbugs gnas par// ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom// a yi yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//
226b1(rgyud 'bum): ba kun da'i mdog lta bu// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla dbus bzhugs// stong pa'i ye shes las
226b2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / zla ba phyed pa ral par 'ching // thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas// snying rje chags
226b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mngon gyur pa/ / dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'tshir te// rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga
226b4(rgyud 'bum): / dang thod pa 'dzin// yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// i las rdo rje zla ba ste// I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo// e las chos kyi rdo rje ste// e las sna tshogs
226b5(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul ma/ / lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o// skra grol ba la mig po che// snying rje chags pas rnam par myos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
226b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / sna tshogs yi dgas steng du sgom// gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan//
226b7(rgyud 'bum): mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo bzhi
227a1(rgyud 'bum): yi kha sbyar gsang / / snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha'
227a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro sa yi snying po mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shwa dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying khar spros pa ste// U ni mgo bor de bzhin no// oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste// oM na
227a3(rgyud 'bum): mig tu dgod par bya/ / aM ni go char dgod pa ste// aHni mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas// ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis//
227a4(rgyud 'bum): bla med mchog dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin// dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste// gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub pa// dam tshig
227a5(rgyud 'bum): thun mtshams bzhin du ste/ / dus bzhi dag tu rnam par sgom// kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam// snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing // cha med par ni rnam par sgom//
227a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste// shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor// bdag nyid rdo rje drag po yin// bzang du med pa'i rus pa yin// yi ge bzlas pa yin par
227a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / bzlas pa ye shes bsgom pa ste// sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// u o o u/ AM a.oM AHa A
227b1(rgyud 'bum): i I/ u u/ e e/ oM oM/ oM ArahUM swAhA/ dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa
227b2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing // dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste// rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi//
227b3(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba// lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin// mngon par brjod
227b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba la sbyor gyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// ma rung
227b5(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang nang 'joms pa/ / nam mkha' stong pa lta bu las// yi ge k+Sha las mngon byung zhing // mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs
227b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhal/ / g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa la/ kar rungs bdud kyi dgra gagon cing // phya ga rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas// thod pa dril bu sa yang dag 'khyud// thod pa'i dum bus yid 'ong ba'i// rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan//
227b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// lag pa g.yas par gzhag nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la// phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam gcig shing // spyi gtsug
228a1(rgyud 'bum): thod pas rgyan du byas/ / sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan// zla ba phyed pa ral bar 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed sgom pa yin// danas
228a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos/ / rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas khyad par med par byed// byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas// 'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs
228a3(rgyud 'bum): par bslabs pa'i bdag/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na// ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrog par byed// pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed// gzhan
228a4(rgyud 'bum): yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du sgrub/ / yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang // 'di la phyag brgyad rnam par sgom// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po// zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa
228a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / mdung dang rdo rje ladz+rag/ cang ti'i man ba gri gug thogs// sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags// hAh+Na hU~M hU~M d+hU phaTaparba ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing // dpa' bo gcig
228a6(rgyud 'bum): pu 'jigs mdzad pas/ / gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro ba'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro// bsam gtan dga' ba sgrub pa'i phyir/
228a7(rgyud 'bum): rdordzo bo yi ni sku ru sgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas pa bya// dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla// mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su// chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya// oM
228b1(rgyud 'bum): ak+Sha hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing // mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing // srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed// sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam
228b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bklags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub// gdug cing gnod byed sems can dang // ma rungs las la chags pa dang // log par lha dang bcas pa las// 'di dag nges par bza'
228b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro// khams gsum dag ni grol bar byed// sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla// oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha
228b4(rgyud 'bum): ya phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni// mAM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang // skra grol ro la mnan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga
228b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni/ / khri phrag stong du bzla zhing sgom// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni
228b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bsam/ / bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i// khro bo snying du gzhug par bya// snying dang rgyu ma rkang dang rus// sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing // mtshams med lnga rnams
228b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / / gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya// mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag bdun gyis ni phengs
229a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni// gdug pa bdag gis bos par 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang // las 'di dag la 'jug par bya// gcer bu
229a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra grol byas pa yis/ / gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te// khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// me yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya// hUM phaT raM raM raM/ mtshams med pa 'di zhes bya ba//
229a3(rgyud 'bum): raM r-i raM hUM phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis// nyin zhag bcu pa dag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang // 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med// gal te sdig can slar log na// 'di la
229a4(rgyud 'bum): / zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas// 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// oM swA hA a A baM a mu ka pA ba bI ra to b+ha bi Sh+ya na ti ta sa s+yai shIn+ta b+ha ban+d+ha/ baM aM a oM swA hA/
229a5(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon// zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go// bya rog khyi dang byi la dang // na ku la yi sha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te//
229a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po la sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o//
229a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun// sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// pa shu'i nang na rgyal po
229b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro// skra yi myu gu de bzhin ring // mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung // lus las lha yi dri
229b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung zhing / / la yi dbugs ni ga pur dri// ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsi'i dri// tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang // lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam// ut+pa la yi dri dang
229b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol// lus kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur// gring bdun dang pa'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam pa can
229b4(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad // sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na// mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag
229b5(rgyud 'bum): gang yang rung ba za mi nus/ / de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste// mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog/ 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// mkhas
229b6(rgyud 'bum): pas blangs te ril bu bya/ / lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas// de 'di lag tu byin nas ni//
229b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin// de 'di de ma thag tu yang // mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed// 'di ni dben par khyer nas su// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya/
230a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub bsgrub pa'i mchog dam pa// de yi spyi bo'i sgra bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni// de bsres the gur byas nas su// gang gi mgul du bcings byas pas/
230a2(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin// da yi pakras pa blangs nas ni// de la he ru ka dpal bri// dngon sum khro ba'i dngos grub ni// he ru ka dpal byed pa yin//
230a3(rgyud 'bum): rkang lag lpags pa blangs nas ni// 'byung ba'i skra dang bcas bsres nas// phye ma'i ril bur byas nas su// mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags
230a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ / lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te// mthe bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na// de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs// rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis
230a5(rgyud 'bum): blangs/ / rang skra zhags pa blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// the gu lnga yis rnam par dkris// phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba yi// de yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya//
230a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas// sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod// oM dz+wa la paM a paM hUM ho ba ra ha ra to// khe tsa ri dzi hri swA hA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yid la gang 'dod ci yang
230a7(rgyud 'bum): rung / / de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs// khyim na gang bar yongs su mthong // mAM sa dag ni zos nas su// lha yi lus su gyur pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des ni shi
230b1(rgyud 'bum): pab dbang du 'gyur/ / chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// sgra dang bsres nas de bsgril te// the gu cho ga bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi
230b2(rgyud 'bum): ming ga bzlas brjod kyis/ / zhags pa btab nas de ma thab// lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas// de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor
230b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ni/ / ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas// gzhan yang rgyun du byas pa dang // rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya// chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs// de ru brdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug
230b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i brtul zhubs 'dzin pa ni/ / mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa til mar chen po yi// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhab gis
230b5(rgyud 'bum): bskus na ni/ / mtshan me'ang zin par lta bur 'gyur// rnal 'byor rkang dang zos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing // yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel
230b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin// rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma la yang skam// gang gi mgo la bzhag pa na// de ma thag
230b7(rgyud 'bum): tu dbang du 'gugs/ / sngags pas glo ba zos na ni// de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sa bsnun na// char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas skam/
231a1(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phye mar byas nas su// bud med gang la byin na ni// 'dod pas gdungs pa'i bud med gang // dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed//
231a2(rgyud 'bum): pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dzi hA zos na ni// ngag gi dngos grub dag
231a3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor hrid zos na ni// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag/ stong 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang // bung ba yi ni gshog pa dang // tshub ma'i
231a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma rdul dang ni/ / rdul 'dis bsgrub pa byas na ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs// rtswa rnams phye mar byas pa yis// bud med thams cad bskam par 'gyur// rang byung me tog ro tsa na//
231a5(rgyud 'bum): a lag ta dang gur kum gyis// thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis// pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur//
231a6(rgyud 'bum): nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs// rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos tsam gyis// bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs// rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes// gang gis
231a7(rgyud 'bum): gang gi mgo la gtor/ / grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin// pha dang bu ni yin na yang // rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur// mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha ni gnon par 'gyur
231b1(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur// mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te// la yi drung du mngon bzlas
231b2(rgyud 'bum): na/ lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis// rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin// thod pa kha ni sbub pa yis// gnod par bya ba kho na yin// in+d+ra ba ru ro tsa na//
231b3(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas// gang la thig le gcig gyur na// dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang myang spras dag/ lhan cig tu ni byug pa yis// thub pa med
231b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i stobs 'gyur te/ / pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur// pu tran dz+wa li ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyir byas nas// bud med gang la phyes gtor na// de ni 'dod pas myos gyur nas//
231b5(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas// ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis// lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis// byung po kun dang byung mo rnams// ci bgyi zhes ni smra bzhin du// de yi drung du 'khod par
231b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mi 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang dzi ban ti// lhan cig tu ni phyir byas te// shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar// bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni// 'tsho bar yang ni
231b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba yin/ / chu srin lag ni ro can// lhan cig tu ni phyir byas nas// nA ga mdo lhan cig tu// dril bu dag tu byas nas kyang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas// mig gi sman ni byas
232a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / nor skyong gi ni glang po yang // mngon pasum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag gis don na ni// glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang // gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur
232a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ pha rol sde ni 'joms byed cing // gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i// ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur// 'dram ma daN+Di ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis// rig byed rgod pa med par
232a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu// ril bu dag tu bsgrub byas nas// rma bya'i mjug mas bcings na no// bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// lha rnams
232a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing / / rig pa 'dzin pa 'ong bar 'gyur// de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi gzhal med khang 'phrog cing // lha yi bu mo'ang
232a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par 'gyur/ / 'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing // mi 'dod sems can don yang byed// mjug mthur bltas byas na ni// gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur// blangs pas sbyin
232a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i pha rol phyin/ / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la// mjug ma bskor bar byas na ni// sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya// lha min bu mo lhan cig rol//
232a7(rgyud 'bum): lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len// 'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te// 'dod pa'i lha yi gzugs su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro// de nas
232b1(rgyud 'bum): yan lag lnga pa yis/ / cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang pags pa sha dang ni// rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su// dri chen chu dang shu kra dang // mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// ril bu byas
232b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bsgrub par bya/ / lhubs gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// kha yi nang du sbas nas ni// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal cher
232b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
232b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi chos kyi yig sgom pa// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med chos ni yang dag sgom// rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba// chos kyi sku lus rang byung yin// yi ge he las nges 'byung/
232b5(rgyud 'bum): pa// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// mi
232b6(rgyud 'bum): / bskyod pa ni rnam par skem// baM gyi yi ge las bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// oM b+hU aM b+h+rUM las byung ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// aM dzA raM swa las byung ba/
232b7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hU~M hU~M a las nges byung ba// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// kha~M haM ho haM las byung ba// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// DA las mkha'
233a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma nyid de/ / yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// bruM las lha mos la spyod// baM las mkha' la spyod pa yin// baM las ma mo nyid yin te// dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan/
233a2(rgyud 'bum): thugs ma// he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste// ru las ngag ni byung ba yin// ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste// yig gsum las byung he ru ka/ maM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste// saM las kun tu bzang po
233a3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / lo las 'jig rten mgon po ste// k+ShaM las sa yi snying po'o// baM las phyag na rdo rje ste// mo las byams pa nyid yin te// khaM las nam mkha' snying por grags// gaM las nam mkha'
233a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod yin no/ / sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// ga las spos kyi glang po yin// dz+nyA las ye shes tog kyang yin// a las blo gros mi zad pa// pra las spobs pa brtsegs pa ste// sa
233a5(rgyud 'bum): las ngan song kun 'dren pa/ / sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las dra ba can gyi 'od// tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// sU las nyi ma'i 'od yin no// ba las
233a6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje 'od kyang yin/ / sa las mthu chen thob pa ste/ su ni su d+ha na yin no// bA las bzang skyong nyid yin te// sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten
233a7(rgyud 'bum): mthon pos snying po/ / phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang // nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid yin te// mi zad pa dang ye shes to/
233b1(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te// mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra ba zla ba rin chen dang // nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su d+ha na dang rin chen thob// rgya mtsho
233b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni bzang skyed de/ / de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig tu bshad de// dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol// rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang // skul
233b3(rgyud 'bum): byed dang ni rin chen sgron/ / rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma// kaM pau dzi dang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin// ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jig ma// ye shes
233b4(rgyud 'bum): sgron dang rgyal byed ma/ / sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma kI mchog dang // rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang // rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma// lu gu rgyud dang phyir bzlog ma// lha ma
233b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor rdor 'jig ma/ / sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsal byed ming dang bcas pa ra ni// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// tha mar swA hA mnyam
233b6(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar/ / sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
233b7(rgyud 'bum): byed yin/ / 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che// brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste// khro bo chen po sngon grub pa// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo/
234a1(rgyud 'bum): khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te// khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyar bar
234a2(rgyud 'bum): bya gsal byed oM ni kun tu yang / / mthar ni hUM phaT swA hAr sbyar// gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni// mthar ni phaT dang swA hAr sbyar// gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang // dri dang ro yi lha mo ste//
234a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma// reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyis su med par yang dag gnas// dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni// lha mo'i reg pas bde bar
234a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med bzhugs// rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes
234a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o// de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol// che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sbyor brgyud kyi rjes 'drang ba/
234a6(rgyud 'bum): bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig/ sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya
234a7(rgyud 'bum): mtsho rgyud yin no/ / nges brjod rlung ni bla med pa// 'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur// 'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/
234b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ji ltar ming gi rjes 'thun par//
234b2(rgyud 'bum): nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dang/ rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te// gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid// theg pa chen po'i dam
234b3(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog/ dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya// gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba// bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom bya//
234b4(rgyud 'bum): sku lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa zla phyed
234b5(rgyud 'bum): dbu la bcings/ / sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin
234b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar/ / ljang khu steng zhal sngo ba'o// bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeb pa dang // rngam dang zhi dang drag po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i pag
234b7(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog kyang 'dzin/ / bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og
235a1(rgyud 'bum): gnon/ / reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang // dkar ba'i mdangasaljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang // dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi
235a2(rgyud 'bum): zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs/ / skra grol ba ni rnam par myos// seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can// byin pa gnyis ni legs par 'khril// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// spyar gsum
235a3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dmar ba ste/ / rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan// mdung dang kha T+wAM phyag na bsnams// chags pa chen po me yi 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams/
235a4(rgyud 'bum): gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang // sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs//
235a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis gnon pa rnam par sgom// 'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum pa// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te// rigs
235a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs/ / rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni// dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag/ thod pa zla ba yongs su gang //
235b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams su ni sgo spangs te// ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'ob gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thugs rje'o
235b2(rgyud 'bum): bas rnam par myos/ / dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni// 'khor sogs
235b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog kyang dgod par bya/ / rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sla// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/
235b4(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin no// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sa bcu pa yi
235b5(rgyud 'bum): pachog 'gubs/ / pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don// 'di ni dri med sgom pa mchog/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge/
235b6(rgyud 'bum): las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim// mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/
235b7(rgyud 'bum): lha me sbrel ma gos dkar me// 'od zer zan dang dzam+b+ha la// lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum pa la g.yas
236a1(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bzhugs/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa// rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste// phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan//
236a2(rgyud 'bum): skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas blta zhing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shes mchog las byung // so sor yang dag
236a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni// dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang // gos pa med par nyams pa yi
236a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag po sgom pa nyid yin no/ / mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// snying kha'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs
236a5(rgyud 'bum): brtse can/ / 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'os thams cad mchod
236a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchog pa yis// yid 'dod rnams
236a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi lus la 'dod/ / mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med gzhi la dgod pa yis//
236b1(rgyud 'bum): lha yi gzugs su sgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yis// bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni
236b2(rgyud 'bum): don dam ma yin te/ / don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// skyo
236b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid can gyis min/ / gal te de nyid med gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams//
236b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te// bsam gtan las
236b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan bde med phyir/ / de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yis khams rnams zad par 'gyur// bde bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas
236b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas par bya/ / dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de bas dgyes pas dngos
236b7(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyod pa yi//
237a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spong la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya// gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas la// rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can// bsam gtan zas mchog
237a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhol 'gyur bas/ / smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min// gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par
237a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma'i mchog
237a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong na/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar// ngang pa'i tsho gas 'dus ji bzhin no// mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gre kun don ni byed
237a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems
237a6(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ / gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni snying khar dgod// snying
237a7(rgyud 'bum): khar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor/ / thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag/ rang gis na mkhar sbyor nas su// gzi brjid gzugs
237b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dzin par sgom/ / rang gi chos kyi yig dgod pa// rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med// rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom// ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yis// gzhan
237b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la/ / yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma bsgom par bya// ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// mngon par brjod
237b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes
237b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ / rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// legs so bya ba rnams
237b5(rgyud 'bum): byin nas/ / rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las// legs so legs so ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mchog gi mchog/ legs so rdo rje tshul drag po// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab/
237b6(rgyud 'bum): legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor// 'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni// legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa
237b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po bstan pa 'di/ / gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni// man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste// legs so rdo rje bla ma kun// de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma// legs so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la/
238a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub bla na med pa byin// rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
238a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla
238a3(rgyud 'bum): ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang bas bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tsom med par de kho na bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / / mngon par brjod pa'i
238a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po pad+ma ka ra shI dz+nyA na dang /
238a5(rgyud 'bum): bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bskur cing zhus te gtani la bab pa/ byis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo tsa ba khyung po ches kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o// phyis pa
238a6(rgyud 'bum): ta A nan+ta dang / lo chung gis lhag chad rnams bsabs nas bu dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// @rgya gar skad du
238a7(rgyud 'bum): shrI badz+ra DA ka nA ma sa hA tan+t+ra na dza/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
238b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa
238b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ni lha gcig nyid/ / 'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas// 'dod chags ma
238b3(rgyud 'bum): yin chags bral min/ / dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di ni gnyis med ye shes mchog/ rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par
238b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni// sna tshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
238b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub// de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dang // kun tu gzugs brnyan yin gyis ni// lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min// byang
238b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems chen rnal 'byor gang / / rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso// byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis//
238b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sna tshogs tshul gyis mchod par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin te//
239a1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe
239a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//
239a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro ba dmigs su med
239a4(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / mthong ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos// thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no// gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba// 'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum
239a5(rgyud 'bum): ma lus bza' bar bya/ / gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni// ma tshang mar me lta bur 'da'// gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang ste// 'du
239a6(rgyud 'bum): byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ / rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// 'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin no// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes par grags// yang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha// bde ba thams cad 'ab ster
239a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ / chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad// sa khams lhung byed ma yin te// de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o// me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te// de bzhin
239b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni gar dbang ngo / / nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu mche// rang nyid mkha' 'gro zhes byar bshad// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin
239b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas// mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad// nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod// sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs// lus ni phrag dog rdo rje
239b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid// stong pa'i tshul gyis mig gis ni// dogs pa med par bsgom pa'i mchog
239b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta/ / nam mkha'i tshul gyis sems kyis ni// der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos// dogs pa med pa'i sgom par ldan// rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes// rdo rje
239b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces
239b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkha' mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i bar// de srid sems can mtshungs med don//
239b7(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad// de ltar sems can dam pa rnams// srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// mi skyo bar ni brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad//
240a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i gnas kyi mthar thug par// smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing // sems can don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad// rtag tu 'dod
240a2(rgyud 'bum): chags myos pa yis/ / lha yi 'di rnams dang ni ci// gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir// 'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad// bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir// rtog pa rgyas par
240a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / / thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rtog pa dang po bde ba chen// der ni rdo rje sems chen gyi// lhag pa
240a4(rgyud 'bum): ni lha gcig bzhugs/ / 'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// sems can kun don 'byung bya'i phyir// glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar// srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur// sems can
240a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'byung ba yi/ / dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa nga // de nas sems can skye 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te// des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su// yi ge las byung
240a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam spangs shing / / nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par// dag pa nyid du de nas son// de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi// bla med don ni nus med pa'i// stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs
240a7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ 'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni// thams cad dmyal bar ltung mthong ste// slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la// mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur// de nas 'jig rten khams kun na//
240b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te// myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul// oM ma hA su khA badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ 'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang // dag pa'i bde ba kun ster
240b2(rgyud 'bum): brda'adod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing / / 'gro kun bde ba bskyed par gyur// nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog
240b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor 'phrog cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas
240b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi thugs chen yin/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi
240b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar 'grub// dkyil 'khor
240b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ / de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad bri// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya// zla ba'i mdog can 'dzum dang bcas// 'od zer dmar
240b7(rgyud 'bum): bo 'khrugs pa las/ / sangs rgyas 'phreng bas mdzes pa ste// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum dang // ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan cing // lha mo bzhi dang
241a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan// rtsa zhal zhi zhing g.yas dkar min// de bzhin zhal yang g.yon pa dmar// rgyab zhal ser po gser bsregs 'dra/
241a2(rgyud 'bum): thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje dang ni ral gri dang // dril bu thod pa bsnams pa nyid// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los gang // skyob pa sna tshogs
241a3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde mchog ces// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang /
241a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nye du mo rnams ni// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas chags par bya// ba glang sha dang rta sha sogs// dog pa med par bza' bar bya// 'jig rten la rtag g.yon
241a5(rgyud 'bum): la spyod/ / bstan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun g.yon las byung bas ni// g.yon gyis bza' zhing g.yon mchod bya// pho nya ma gtogs gzhan rnams la// 'dod la rmongs pa bgrod mi bya// pho1
241a6(rgyud 'bum): mo rtag zhen thar par/ / 'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med// sgrub pos mchog tu 'bad byas te// brtul zhugs min spangs brtul zhugs rdzogs// dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // tsa ru'i bza' ba
241a7(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig bya/ / rigs lnga la ni kun spyod par// rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya// sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar byas la// rdo rje chu dang bsres pa ni// dngos grub
241b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sgrub byed pa'i/ / de dag bdud rtsi lngar ni 'gyur// mthe bong srin lag sbyar ba yis// rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu bza'// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// dngos grub rtag par thob
241b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / 'di dag dam tshig dam pa ste// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// las rnams kun la thabs bcas shing // dogs pa med par gang spyod dang // rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni//
241b3(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ las rnams kun la kun tu ni// rnam par mi rtog sgom byed cing // dogs pa med par kun tu spyod// de ni dka' thub rnams kyi mchog/ the tshom med pa'i
241b4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis ni/ / sgra zla la sogs rjes dngos kyi// yul rnams ma lus ston byed pa'i// dka' thub shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gang yang las rnams thams cad la// shes rab dang ni sbyar byas te//
241b5(rgyud 'bum): de yang stong pa'i gnas su sbyar// de 'dir bdag chen dka' thub yin// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// shes rab dang ni mtshungs gzugs la// dogs med spyod pa'i kun spyod pa//
241b6(rgyud 'bum): de ni bdag chen dka' thub yin// shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par// gang tshe byams gzhan mi g.yon// de tshe byang chub chen po na// nges par ster ba nyid du bshad// rnam par mi rtog rjes
241b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug la/ / rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par brtson// de ni thams cad 'byung ba yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin// gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis su//
242a1(rgyud 'bum): me long lta bur rab shes pa// de ni shes rab sten pa yin// glog dang chu bur ltar min mthong // gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni// gang gis ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba/ de ni
242a2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab sten pa yin/ / me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang // rmi las sgyu ma dri za'i grong // mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong // de ni gtso bo yin par rjod// de ni gang du'ang mngon
242a3(rgyud 'bum): zhen dang / / gang du'ang gnas pa yod ma yin// de ltar yang dag 'byung mod kyi// sgyu ma lta bus dngos dag ni// longs spyod khyad 'phags skye 'gyur ba// bde ba yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas//
242a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu khyad 'phags thob 'gyur bar// ci yi phyir na 'dod mi bya// brtan g.yo'i dngos po yod min te// 'on kyang snang ba tsam mtshan nyid// sgom pa khyad par can gang zhig goms pa'i
242a5(rgyud 'bum): stobs ni rdzogs pa na/ / yid 'ong bde ba'i 'bras bu ni// bla med gsal ba'i blo yi mthu// 'bras bu don gnyer rgyu bsgrubs na// der ni lha mo su zhig 'gog/ de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/
242a6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'gro ba mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pas// lus ni skams shing sdug bsngal 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs na// g.yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur//
242a7(rgyud 'bum): lus dang sems ni brtan gyur nas// bde ba thams cad brtan par 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo gyur pas// shin tu 'gog par 'gro bar 'gyur// des na lus dang ngag sems rnams// brtan
242b1(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas byang chub 'thob/ / gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems
242b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba dang
242b3(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la btsun mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gang gis de bzhin gshegs
242b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dral ba'i lha la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang / skye bo gdug pa can gzhan dag kyang gdul ba dang / 'joms pa dang / zhum par byed pa dang / ltung ba dang / zhi
242b5(rgyud 'bum): bar byas te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms pa lha yis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
242b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos glur blangs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang por rnam par snang mdzad gnas// der ni sde tshan rnams kyi mtha'// ta dang po yi d+ha b+ha'i mtha'/
242b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyi ra brgyan pa'i// sa yi mtha' ni rang gis blta// sa ya'i dbus kyi stan bzhugs pa'i// sa yi mtha' ni sbyar bar bya// mda' gnyis kyis ni rnam par sbyang // a stan
243a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa sa yi mtha'/ / slar yang sa mtha' mda' lnga stan// zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan// sa la'i dbus gnas sa bon ni// 'da' bcu yis ni yongs su sbyangs//
243a2(rgyud 'bum): sha dang sa yi dbus nas la// zhal gsum gyis ni brgyan pa dang // rlung gi phyogs gnas sa bon la// ru tra yis ni rnam par brgyan// hUM hUM ha ni bzung nas su// dbyangs kyi dgu pas yang dag dgang //
243a3(rgyud 'bum): phaT ces bya ba dgod par bya// lhag ma ha yi rkang pa gang // lnga pa'i dbus gnas de nyid de// de la ha dzo zhes bya'o// ra stan la gnas sa yi mtha'// i zhes bya ba'i mda' dang sbyor// slar yang
243a4(rgyud 'bum): pabapa zhes bya ba'i mtha'/ / mda' ni sar pas yongs su sbyang // sa mtha' der nir yi ge gzhon// e zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i rgyan// mi dbyang rdza dras rig les brgyan// le ge don sa yis pang // slar yangs sapar sme lngar ldan// zla dum
243a5(rgyud 'bum): thig les cod pan brgyan/ / slar yang de nyid mgon po bzla// rin chen mtha' ma phaT kyis brgyan// rnam par snang mdzad sna tshogs kyis// tshig rnams kun la dgang bya zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
243a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dkyil la// der ni hUM las byung ba yi// las kyi rdo rje'i
243a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus gnas par/ / hUM gi de nyid rnam sgom pa'o// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshigs spro ba'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa'i// sku mdog dmar mo
243b1(rgyud 'bum): drag chen mo/ / gdung gi dbyibs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// spyan dmar kham skra gyen du brdzes// lang tsho phun sum tshogs par ldan// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can// ljags 'dril bas ni
243b2(rgyud 'bum): cher 'jigs te/ / 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab grags zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo
243b3(rgyud 'bum): rje can gyis gsungs/ / sngon bsags las ni mthar byed pa// me dang bcas te lan gnyis bzla// ku ru ku ru sems dpa' bral// ral pa gya gyur b+han d+ha gsal// de ni slar yang bzlas par bya//
243b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gzugs dang bral ba yi// tra sa ya zhes bya ste brdzun// dam pa de ni lan gnyis bzla// ka Sha zhes bya o sbar ldan// glon b+ha ya yang dag gnas// de yang slar ni bzlas par bya//
243b5(rgyud 'bum): sa yi mtha' ni nyi stan gnas// mda' bcu zla dum thig les dgang // de yang slar ni brjod par bya// 'od byed sbyangs pa'i sa yi mtha'// gshegs su gsol ba glo na gnas// nyis 'gyur du
243b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bya ba yin/ / rma zhon thig gsal phro zhes bya// de yang slar ni bzlas par bya// phaT ces bya ba bsgyings te bsgrags// rnam par rtog pa kun gyi shing // da ha da ha mkha' 'gro'i sdom// lnga
243b7(rgyud 'bum): sde'i thog ma gnyis dang ldan/ / sde gtso de ni slar bzlas bya// b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes bya dang // ba sa ru d+hi ra an+d+ra// mA lA ba la bi ne dang // grih+Na sap+ta ste// pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga/ sarba bA tA
244a1(rgyud 'bum): dza ya nyis 'gyur bya/ / A dang ka yi yi ge dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum par sbyar// bzhi pa dang ni rlung la gnas// lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya// sa yi mtha' ni nyi
244a2(rgyud 'bum): mar gnas/ / yi ge bzhi pas dgang bar bya// slar yang de ni lan gnyis bzla// lnga sde mtha' yi stan bzhugs pa/ ka Sha a dang thig ler ldan// sa bon de ni gnyis bzlas bya// sa mtha' mda'
244a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang ldan pa/ / slar yang sa mtha' mda' gsum sbyar// de bzhin sa mtha' mda' lnga'i stan// de kun zla ba'i dum bu dang // thig le yis ni cod pan brgyan// de dag yang yang bsgyur bar bya//
244a4(rgyud 'bum): ka sa tsa dang d+ha rnams ni// i sgra yi ni mchog gis bzung // li yi mtha' ni re rer sbyar// de dag kyang ni yang yang bsgyur// u sgra la zhon sa yi mtha'// slar yang zla dum thig les sbyangs// phaT
244a5(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i rin chen sgrub/ / cha dang cha min sna tshogs pa'i// me tog mang pos yang dag zin// de dag lha mo sgyu ma che// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o// 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang //
244a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams kun g.yos gyur cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun skrag nas// slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub tu ni mngon sangs rgyas// ri bo thams cad 'dar zhing gas// ma mo'i
244a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ / gdod dang rims dang dbyig dug dang // gnod sbyin srin po log 'dren sogs// snang ba thams cad btul zhing bcom// zhi 'gyur bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su
244b1(rgyud 'bum): bcug ste dam tshig gis/ / bcings nas kyang ni dbang du mdzad// dmyal ba pa yi sdig pa kun// dral te nges bcom bsnyil lo zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
244b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo skyong dang ni yang dag ldan// de dbus pad+ma bri bya ba// 'od zer dmar chen gsal ba'i mdangs// phyi rol ri mo zlum
244b3(rgyud 'bum): bopor skor/ / de yi dbus su bcom ldan 'das// khro bo chen po zhal bzhis brgyan// zhal ni mche ba cung zad gtsigs// khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba ste// g.yon
244b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa/ / rgyab ni 'od zer sen mo'i mdog/ phyag bzhi yis ni brgyan pa ste// dpa' bo g.yon na kha T+wAM dang // de bzhin du ni thod pa rnams// g.yas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang // khyad
244b5(rgyud 'bum): par du ni gshor gyis brgyan/ / rigs pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan// dpa' bo'i shes rab dga' mdzes ma// mda' dang gzhu ni bsnams pa ste// sems
244b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i dngos/ / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can// dur khrod me ltar gsang mtho zhing // 'jigs pa yi ni dus ltar drag/ me ltar 'bar ba'i sgra la ni// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan
244b7(rgyud 'bum): bcings/ / ro langs dang ni lhan cig rol// he ru ka yi gar gyis spyod// ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// sa yi dbang phyug rol par mdzad// thams cad du ni thams cad kyis// kun tu thams
245a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kun bdag nyid/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog bsam gtan bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// dus
245a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ru ni rab sbyor bas/ / bde mchog bla ma bsgoms byas te// rdo rje chen po 'bum bzlas na// khro bo'i rgyal po mtshungs par 'gyur// rdo rje che 'dzin tshe dang ni// mdog dang na so stobs dang rtsal//
245a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rdzu 'phrul chen por ldan// mi zad 'gro don byed mthur ldan// yang na ma bsgrubs par yang sngags pas lan gcig bzlas pas las brgya tham pa byed par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang mi rgyu ba
