245a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nges par gnon pa dang / ltung ba dang / bskyod pa dang / skrag pa dang / rgya gdab pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bzlog pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgas pa dang /

245a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid brdungs pa dang / gsod du gzhug pa dang / long bar bya ba dang / sa bon brlag par bya ba dang / rims dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis gzung ba dang / sa g.yo ba dang / dmyal bar gtang ba dang / byol
245a7(rgyud 'bum): song gi mngal du spro ba dang / skyes bu bud med du bya ba dang / mngal na gnas pa dbyung ba dang / chu bsgag pa dang / ma ning du bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa dang / gsad pa dang / gzhan gyis gsod
245b1(rgyud 'bum): du gzhug pa dang / mtshon bcing ba dang / gcer bur bya ba dang / b+ha ga dang bshang ba'i lcags sgrog pa dang / b+ha ga dang bshang ba'i smra ba dang / rgod du gzhug pa dang / khrag dang khu ba dbab pa'i nad dang / gzhom pa
245b2(rgyud 'bum): dang khrag dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad bskyed pa dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / btag pa dang / bcing ba rnams dang / dum bu dum bur bya ba dang / lus thams cad phye mar bya ba dang / gzer ba dang /

245b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyig dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dgrol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dgas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i skyo ba bsal ba'o// las
245b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad sgrub byed par/ / 'di de lha mo bshad pa yin// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di nyid ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes// sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab grags pa//
246a1(rgyud 'bum): @rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thams cad kyi cho ga la sgyu ma chen pos
246a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngags kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// sgyu ma kun gyis mnyamo sbyor bas//
246a3(rgyud 'bum): las rnams thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// sgyu ma kun gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis// dbang phyug thams cad rab sgrub cing // 'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che// gang gis sdud cing spro byed pa'o// hi ma ban+d+ha s+ya ut+ta
246a4(rgyud 'bum): re Na b+ha ban+ti bo na ma/ ma hA ma so// so ba i a d+ha ma/ si haM be hi ma se hi ma se hi ba ti budz+dza i/ i so nI dau kum+b+ha kaN+Tha/ san+ni d+ho swa ga re/ sa sa d+ya/ pa Da be si na san+ni daM ban+d+ha mi/ ku ru ra sa swa
246a5(rgyud 'bum): bi Da ya sa tud+d+hA ban+d+ha mi/ dzA ba su ra u da ni/ dza ba ra di/ pa d+ha a d+hi a ta to bar+d+ha a nu ba de na/ sad+ha nA/ ma ma ri a/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi na swA hA/ zhes/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom
246a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ / sngags 'di lan bdun mngon par bzlas te/ khang thog tu gzhug na khyim gyi mi rnams dran pa med par 'gyur ro// pa sa ha do la i/ mi dz+nyA a/ ba sa pa dza na mo ha i/
246a7(rgyud 'bum): e sa badz+dzi tsa ha i/ na ma na ta i/ aM d+han/ ha a bA i/ dza be na dit+ta Ni d+ha taM pi ha/ ma hA swa ba a ne na/ pra to si/ rA dzA ku la laN+Da/ Da Ni Da/ dze bA i bad+d+ha/ ta d+hi Na ta Na/ na maHsid+d+ha
246b1(rgyud 'bum): nad na maHbu pa tsa dza dza / bA da na/ ba glang gi gdong zhes bya ba'o// ma sar pa Ne/ tad+ya da re/ ma hA daN+Ded ha he dun he he swA hA/ sngags 'di bye ma la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te zhing la gtor na/
246b2(rgyud 'bum): dgas la sogs pa'i srog chags thams cad kyis za bar mi 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi bka' tsam gyis sprin bzlog par 'gyur ro// rat+na ra ti/ oM a li la/ ba ra tsu li la/ tsor bag b+ha kan dA/ sa bA
246b3(rgyud 'bum): mu ha/ b+han d+ha mi swA hA/ sngags 'di shing sor bzhi pa la lan bdun bsngags te/ rna gong g.yas par btsugs na/ tsA ra ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// i da si a ti Ni dza ha a/ ka li lo hi di/
246b4(rgyud 'bum): paM ga li ma/ me ga b+ha na i/ a haM si la u sa ri mi/ a ba ra b+ha na i/ a haM bA da u sa ra mi/ a ba ra/ b+ha Na mi/ a haM/ du ha mi b+hi to dza dza pa/ mi lo lo kA li/ lo hi di/ bi gi li hUM Ta/ byA
246b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi rwa gong du chags pa'i sa sa la ma lhung ba blangs te sngags 'di lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na/ bas mtha' dang 'brog dgon pa'i lam dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang 'tshe ba thams cad 'byung bar
246b6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / ba glang gi gdong gi cho ga la'ang 'di nyid do// ka ra bI ra'i lcags ma la sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga 'dis rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba bzlog par 'gyur ro// oM dza bi li a/ bi dz+re
246b7(rgyud 'bum): / dzasu ti tha da si i su b+ha de oM/ sa Na o/ a tsa la hi/ su N+Da ba da ne/ hi si la ba da/ baR+Sha ba/ dza he swA hA/ zhib ma'i nang du chu blugs la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te rlung phyogs su nam mkha'
247a1(rgyud 'bum): la gtor na/ rlung dang / char dang / ser ba la sogs pa bzlog par 'gyur ro// na ya mo d+he/ b+ha ga ba te/ ki b+hi ku re Na sha tra ya/ tha ma ke ha tha ka ra lA pA ke ni ta saM ru bi ti bi b+ha du ya/
247a2(rgyud 'bum): ru tsha re Ta ra ma/ Ta ku ke to li Ta ku ke to li Ta lu ya/ lu daM hiSh+Ta le ka si ra le lo ta gra le b+hi Shi Sha le Na si mu le kha/ a ya the sarba ha de sra na b+hu dza ku b+ha na su the ra Sha ya/ na pa la ra ti Shu d+ha ya na sho pa d+ya ti ta ka
247a3(rgyud 'bum): su se la ka kha se Ta~M g+he g+ha se d+ha mA ri sa Ne sa b+hA ha b+ha b+ha dzi sen g+ham pa sa ra/ g+ha d+ha se ra sa a ha/ a oM ha bi ru ga aM bra la an+d+ra k+Sha ka a rahUM hUM hUM pa pha pu Ta Sha ya/ zla tshes thig ler ldan pa'i os// rkang pa brgya
247a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mdzes par bya/ / swA hA zhes byas brgyan pa ste// mtha' dang mthar ni phaT mchog bya// 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // klu rnams skrag cing brgyal bar gyur// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'di
247a5(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / sngags pa bdag nyid rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'dam skyes sngon po lta bu'i mdog can sangs rgyas lnga'i me tog gi 'phreng bas dbu brgyan pa/
247a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba/ yan lag gi cha shas thams cad nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma spro zhing // zhal bzhi nas hUM bzhi sgrobs par mdzad par bsgom par bya'o// de nas las por gnyis bzung ste/ kham phor
247a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po re ba blas rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor rang gi mtshan mas mtsham cing 'bar ba la/ klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu par bris te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su klu lhag ma can/ mgo la gdengs ka bdun
247b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan pa/ cung zad bskum pa'i phyed krung can du bri/ de'i brla g.yon pa gnas par klu mo gdengs ka gsum pa dang ldan pa g.yon gyis 'khyud par bri/ de ltar phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su mtha' yas la
247b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa bris la/ gdengs ka rnams la hUM dang spel ba'i phu bkod/ de thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas na ral gri thogs pa'o// dpral ba rnams su'ang hUM phu hUM/ rkang mthil rnams la dza bris/ rkang pa
247b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang klu gzhan gyis bcings pa ste/ de dag gi gdengs ka la'ang hUM phu hUM bri'o// de nas oM d+hI a ni la ta ra be ga di thi bi ba ra She She ya hi ru sarba nA ga ku la bya na yang phu/ sa ma ye du pe Sha ya phu/
247b4(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba na sA d+ha ya phuHphuHphu/ zhes bya ba 'dis dkyil 'khor bskor la/ yang sngags 'di dang / phyag rgyas so so'i lus la bkug ste gzhug par bya'o// phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ mthe bong kha sbyar te
247b5(rgyud 'bum): bcings la phyi rol du bzhag ste/ sor mo lhag ma rnams gdeng sa ka ltar bya ba'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba sngags kyi mthar bzla zhing dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nas kham phor de
247b6(rgyud 'bum): mar nag tsha bas bkang ste/ sdong bu la me sbar la/ lam phor gzhan gyis bkab la/ kham por de ri rab tu bsgoms nas/ de'i steng du hUM gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la/ rdo rje hUM mdzad
247b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas kham por gyi steng du bsgoms pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs pa'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lus kyi gzar bu las byung ba'i chu rdo rje nyi
248a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'thor bar bsams la/ bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas zhal bzhi nas hUM bzhi sgrogs shing / rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse
248a2(rgyud 'bum): mor hUM gnyis bsgoms te/ de las byung ba'i me lce'i 'phreng bas sprin rnams bzlog par bsams te/ dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyang rung ba bzla'o// sbyor ba 'dis ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khru brgyad
248a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bar du char bzlog par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dri bar bya// de yi dbus gyur pad+ma ni// kha dog dkar po mdzes pa la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
248a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / ye shes sa bon bsgom par bya// rlung dang me yi dbus gnas par// chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms
248a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom bya ba// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// glang chen stan la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// spyan gsum sgra ni grol bas brgyan// gzugs
248a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par klubs// kha dog dmar po gsal ba'i mdangs// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'bar ba'i ral gri thod pa dang // mda'
248a7(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhu ni 'gengs pa ste/ / khrag la dgyes pa'i hrIHlas byung // 'od zer dmar po'i 'phreng 'khrugs shing // 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa'i// mkha'
248b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgom/ / bla re dam pa bres pa dang // rlung bskyod pa ngan bsgrangs nas ni// sna tshogs gos ni rnam dpyangs par// dur khrod so phag la sogs pa'i// tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga yis ni//
248b2(rgyud 'bum): khrugru bzhi pa yi tshad tsam du// dkyil 'khor dge ba'i las tsam sogs// de nas rdzing bu bya ba ni// tshon rtsi sngon pos gcal bkram ste// rba rlabs chu gnyer la sogs bri// tshon chen gyis ni gang ba'i
248b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / nya dang nya ming la sogs pa'i// srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs bri// phyi rol bya rog sogs par brgyan// de nas cho ga 'di yis ni// rig pa che dang klu brgyad dgod// sgo bzhir mdo
248b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bsnol ba la/ / mjug mas zla bzhir dkris nas su// shar du klu rgyal mtha' yas ni// 'dam skyes sngon po lta bu'i mdog/ gdengs ka bdun ni bsgyings pa la// klu mo dang ni bcas par dgod//
248b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang du nor rgyas ser po ste// nub tu 'jog po dmar po yin// lho ru stobs rgyu ldang skya ste// dbang ldan du ni dung skyong yin// rlung mtshams pad+ma bden bral du// pad+ma
248b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po dgod par bya/ / me mtshams su ni rigs ldan te// cho ga snga mas bri bar bya// klu ni brgyad po thams cad kyang // rin chen cod pan blta sdug ldan// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs//
248b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos ka'i nor bu'i 'od kyis ni// mun pa thams cad sel byed pa// thal mo sbyar zhing skraganas su// gdengs ka las ni chu rgyun 'bebs// sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po rnams// phyogs
249a1(rgyud 'bum): @brgyad nas ni dgug par bya/ / sgra grag dang ni chug pa dang // drag po 'gugs byed de bzhin no// rgyal ba bzang po dpal dga' mo// char 'bebs dang ni sdug ma dang // myur ba dang
249a2(rgyud 'bum): ni dbyangs can ma/ / gtum dang 'bebs dang gang dang g.yo// 'di dag smin rgyal brgyad po zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
249a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ bud med gnyis kyi thod pa ming dang ldan pa la go ro tsa na dang khrag gis me'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bris te/ me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su yi ge k+ShaM dang hri bkod la/ dbus su bsgru bya'i
249a4(rgyud 'bum): bu mo'i ming bris te/ / ri mo gsum gyis bskor nas/ mo dza'i sa bon nam re phas dkyil 'khor sum rim du bskor te/ thod pa'i steng 'og gi bye brag shes par byas la/ seng ldeng gi ma la dus gsum du
249a5(rgyud 'bum): bsros na phyi de nyin par 'ong ba 'am bskams par 'gyur ro/ / gnas dben pa'i sa phyogs su bla gab med par rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs mar nag tsha bas byugs te shing sngags mdzes pa la bzhag la khrus
249a6(rgyud 'bum): chang gsol nas bskams te/ sgrub pa'i grogs dang bcas par char dbab par dmigs nas kha shar stod du bltas la sngags bzlas na brgya byin gyis char 'bebs so// min na dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sngags
249a7(rgyud 'bum): dang spel te bzlas na rgyun mi 'chad pa 'bab po/ / yang na kham phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha dang khrag gis snga ma ltar bris te me lces ma reg par nam mkha' la bzhag la char 'bab pa la sngags bzlas na 'bab par/
249b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro// char gcod par 'dod na rdo rje can la phul ba'i me tog gi bdug pa khang steng du gnas te/ gcer bur byung la sprin la bdugs shing sngag bzlas na bzlog par 'gyur ro// lam phor so ma btang ba la dug la sogs
249b2(rgyud 'bum): pas rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum bris te/ de'i sa bon las gyur par bsams la chu'i steng du'ang pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris nas lte ba la/ hUM gnyis kyis gzir ba'i hUM bri/ 'dab ma brgyad la'ang klu
249b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyi snying po gzir ba bris la/ stobs po che'i sngags dang / hUM dgus cho ga bzhin du mtsho skyes bskor te/ sngags bzlas shing ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa byas la/ kham phor kha sbyar te klu'i
249b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas su bcug na/ klu thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gal de des sdang ba'i klu rnams char mi 'bebs na der sbyor ba 'di ltar bya ste/ gtum po'i sa bon la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlos la
249b5(rgyud 'bum): klu'i mtshor sbyin sreg byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gal te des kyang char 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe yungs kar dang / tsha ba'i mar nag dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kA ra bI ra'i me tog rnams lhan cig
249b6(rgyud 'bum): phye mar byas te ril bu byas la/ de nyid la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ klu'i mtshor bcug na 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te klu rnams sdang bas char mi 'bebs na mgo 'gas par
249b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te yang mi 'bab na dur khrod kyi thal ba bzung ste/ rtsa bas skyur por spangs nas sngags bzlas te mtshor bcug na/ klu rnams myos shing char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// ji ste des kyang
250a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bab na pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ba bla dang / zangs kyi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / ba la sha rnams las ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru dgu tsam byas
250a2(rgyud 'bum): lan ril bu re re zhing lan bdun bdun mngon par bsngags te/ ji srid char ma 'bab kyi bar du ril bu rnams mtshor bskur na nyin mo bye brag med pa'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
250a3(rgyud 'bum): / 'dzin pa chen pos sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs te/ oM na mo nI lAm+ba ra d+ha rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ a ne ka gaM gA na dI bA lu ko sa ma bud+d+ha ko Ti/ sha ta sa ha sra pa ri brid+d+ha ya/
250a4(rgyud 'bum): bi ki ta daSh+Ta/ kA la rU pA ya/ na yA na yA/ dza la ti/ ging sa swa ya/ b+hI ma na dA ya/ ba su ki nA ga rA dzA/ bi b+hU Shi ta/ ka ra tsa ra Na ya/ kriSh+Na d+hu dzaM gA ya/ yadz+nyo pa wI tA ya/ dz+wa li ta b+hU dza ma Ni ma ku TA ya/ pu ri
250a5(rgyud 'bum): tai Ta ba/ bA da nA ya/ saM kru tsi tA b+hu la tA ya da sha na Sha NA ro Sha ShA ya/ kri ta N+Da rU pa ya bi d+yu dza hA ya/ ma ho rA ga b+ha k+Sha NA ya/ ka ra s+pho Ta tra sa na ka ra rA ya/ su par+Na ka na ka ra dza me khe lA ya/ hUM kA ra nA da tra sa
250a6(rgyud 'bum): na ka rA ya/ a shI ti yo dza nA sA hA/ sra gam+b+hi ra/ sA ga ra dza mu ma na da lA ya/ tsakra di t+ya kaM d+ha b+ha ha na ya/ daM Sh+Ta ka ra lA ha si twA D+hA D+hA/ hA sa na da nA dA ya/ ma hA saM k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya/ kA la ru pA ya/ trai lokya
250a7(rgyud 'bum): b+hak+Sha Na ka ra NA ya/ nA gA nAM mr-i t+yu kA lA ya/ i maM gaM gA ni ba le ka sa me bud+d+he b+ha ga ba da bi b+hu Shi taM/ man+ta ma bA tra yi Sh+yA mi/ b+ho b+he paM n+d+he gA d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lam+ba ra d+ha ra sha r-I badz+ra pA Ni hri dA ya/ las mA ti
250b1(rgyud 'bum): kra marba/ sA ku lo ta sA da ni b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha/ sa tsA la lo ka pA li nI dza ha ra dza ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ sarba nA gAnA/ tshin+danA ga hrid ya ni b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA gA marmA Ni bi shin+dan+tu/ nA ga
250b2(rgyud 'bum): hr-ihrid yA ne/ s+pho Ta ya sA Ta ya/ nA ga nA ya nA ni/ bi shA r+ya tu/ nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ tad+ya thA/ hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ nA ga tshin+da nA ya phaT/ nI la ba sa na ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa ra kra mA ya
250b3(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ kri tAn+tA ya phaT/ kri tAn+d+ha rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ kuSh+maN+Dot+pa da na ka ra ya phaT/ pre ta phi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a ba smA ra bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya
250b4(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba ba g+hI bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lam+ba ra d+ha ro badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas zin pa la ni chu la bzlas te gtor na 'grol bar 'gyur ro//
250b5(rgyud 'bum): char bzlog pa la ni thal ba la bzlas nas sprin la bltas te gtor bar bya'o// chu la bzlas te gtor na ni/ char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rims la ni skud pa sngon po la bzlas te lag pa la btags na grol
250b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su go ro tsa na la lan stong mngon par bzlas te/ dpral bar thig ler byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// don la dmigs te gtsang ba'i gos gyon la nyin
250b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du kun tu ru bsregs te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ rmi lam du dge sdig thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// sa la lan bdun bzlas te chom po la bltas nas bus na chom po pas mi mthong zhing
251a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlog par 'gyur ro/ / me tog gam 'bras bu la lan bdun bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
251a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ klu thams cad dgug pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum
251a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis/ slar yang mchod pas mchod cing phyag gsum byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// las thams cad kyi tshogs bcom ldan
251a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das lha yis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'dir dgur du bzhes te bka' stsal pa/ b+hi li g+hi li bad+hU dza ba ri ba shas pa ang i ni sha ba ri sha pa a/ hU~M hUM b+h+rUM/ ho ha ha
251a5(rgyud 'bum): sa tha/ bu sa tha/ bu sa tha/ ha sa ha sa/ ha ha/ oM ni zla phyed thig les brgyan// de ni chu 'dzin brgyad la gnas// mkha' 'gro ma yi rig sngags te// sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin no// 'di ni gsungs ma
251a6(rgyud 'bum): / thag tu yang // klu rnams thams cad brgyal 'gyur zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// na maHsh+ma sA na bA si ni/ ma hA kA la/ a na ts+tsha ya/ tad+ya thA/
251a7(rgyud 'bum): oM tsa le pra tsa le/ la lA la ya/ de ba l-i ga swA hA/ sngags 'di bsnyen pa khri byas te mtshan phyed na ling ga'i drung du ji srid 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas te gong bu dgug pa'i cho ga'o// oM tsa muN+De d+hu ma ke shi
251b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i d+ha dze he/ b+he ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ de ba rat+na mA ra ya swA hA/ rang gi rkang mthil g.yon par sen rtsis ri rab bris la/ de'i nang rol gyi grwa bzhir yi ge hrIHba'i bris/ dbus su sngags kyi tshig
251b2(rgyud 'bum): bris la/ rdog pas mnan te bzlas na khugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro// skyes bu'i byin pa g.yon pa'i rus pa'i thur ma la steng gi char tshogs kyi dbang phyug phyag bzhi pa zhal 'og tu gzigs pa/ lag pa
251b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa dang / g.yon par tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / zhag pa dang / mdung rtse gsum bsnams pa byas la/ dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / lce myang tshar bcas pa'i mar nag gi nang da phur bu
251b4(rgyud 'bum): de btsos te/ stobs po che'i sngags bzlas la gang gi khyim sgor sbas pa de la gcong nad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur la/ bton na thar par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa/ bi d+haM sa ya
251b5(rgyud 'bum): ut+pA dA ya mA ra hUM phaT/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang ba'i rnam lngar bcas pas klu bA su ki'i gzugs brnyan mtho gang tsam pa byas te/ ka ra bI ri'i lcags mas bkab la gu gul bdug pa rgyun mi 'chad par
251b6(rgyud 'bum): bdug cing / dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin la/ ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas rgyun mi chad par chu gtor bzlas na/ zhag bdun gyis char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do// ji ste bab par ma gyur na nyi ma bdun pa
251b7(rgyud 'bum): la dum bur byas te/ bum pa'i nang du blugs la/ hUM bzhi pa'i sngags zlos shing chu bo chen por bskur na nges par 'babs par 'gyur ro// oM ga ga a ri ga gA swA hA/ sngags 'di nang par sngar gdong
252a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bkrus par/ rde'u la lan bdun bzlas te gang yang rung ba'i bu gar bcug la che ge mo'i kha chings shig ces brjod na 'chings par 'gyur ro// mu kha tiSh+Tha ti mu ka gats+tsha ti/ mu kha NAta/
252a2(rgyud 'bum): laM ga laM mu ka na mu dra bu ri Sha// de ba dat+ta s+ya mu kha bi d+hA mi swA hA/ glang gi lci ba sa la ma lung ba byi ba'i khang bu sgo gnam du bltas pa'i nang du bcug la/ bzlas shing kha chings shig ces brjod na rgyal po'i pho
252a3(rgyud 'bum): brang la sogs pa dang / shags 'gyed pa la bzlas pa tsam gyis kha bcings par 'gyur ro// a kA ro mu khang thog mar sbyar/ sarba d+harmA NAM de mthar// rab tu sbyar te slar yang ni// A d+ya nud pan+na tad ces bya//
252a4(rgyud 'bum): sngon du gsungs pa'i sbyor ba yang // blo gros chen mo mdun gnas te// sngags 'di bdun ni brjod byas na// mkhar gnas rnams kyis nges par ni// chu ni rab tu mang po 'bebs// sde tshan mtha' ma ra
252a5(rgyud 'bum): stan la gnas pa la/ dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang thig les brgyan te/ tsan dan dmar pos nyal ba'i sngas kyi sa bzhi la byugs te/ der rang gi khrag gis snying po la ming bris la nyal ba'i dus su me tog dmar pos
252a6(rgyud 'bum): gtor zhing bdug pas bdugs na/ rang gi bud med chags pas mi phyed par 'gyur ro// snying khar nyi ma la hUM bsgoms te bdag nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs par bsgoms/ rdo rje so can
252a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi khrag gis shing dza ti'i lcug ma'i smyug gus ras sam gro ga la rlung gi sa bon gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang bskul tshig tu bcas pa/ tsU Ta k+ki zhes bya ba'i sa bon gnyis kyi dbus su bris la/ lcags
252b1(rgyud 'bum): kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas te/ so phag gi dbus su bcug la skud pa dmar pos dkris nas rlung mtshams su g.yon brkyang gi rkang pas mnan te/ bzlas na rgya mtsho la thug gi sa
252b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi thams cad du 'khyam par 'gyur ro/ / bton nas 'o mas bkrus na grol bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no// bdag nyid mi dmar po las bud med kyi gzugs su bskyed de/ oM dmar po spyi bor yang
252b3(rgyud 'bum): bsams la/ bu mo'i kha nas bdag gi khar sngags kyi 'phreng ba cho ga bzhin du zhugs par bsams na dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi gci ba'i shul gyi sa dang / rang gi gci ba'i shul gyi sa las mo mtshan gyi
252b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs byas te/ de'i steng du rang gi mtshan ma bzhag la sngags lan bdun bzlas nas der gci ba'i las byas la/ nyi ma bdun du dus gsum du sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya byin gyi chung ma'ang 'od
252b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur na gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ skye bo'i thod par go ro tsa na dang sen rtsis bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris te/ snying khar ming dang spel ba'i sngags bris la/ dri'i chus byugs nas thod pa gnyis
252b6(rgyud 'bum): kha sbyar cing ro'i skud pas kun tu dkris te/ spra tshil gyis byugs la ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i me la ji srid smra tshil zhu bar ma gyur gyi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zlos shing gdung na/ las kyi cho ga de
252b7(rgyud 'bum): lta bus lha'i 'jig rten yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / dug can gyi thod par gnod sbyin smyon pa'i lce bcug la/ rta'i rmig pa'i ser khar bcug ste/ gang gi khyim sgor sbas pa nyi ma bdun gyis bskur par
253a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang na las kyi dus su kha zas kyi chang bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khro ba dang bcas pas bsgrub byar gzhug ste/ nyi ma bdun gyis bskrad par 'gyur ro//
253a2(rgyud 'bum): lci ba sa la ma ltung ba la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor bcu drug pa'am/ phyed dang bcu gsum pa byas la/ ras ma'i dum bu la de'i ming bris te lhor bcug la/ bka zan gyis de'i kha bkang ste ro'i
253a3(rgyud 'bum): sgras dkris la/ gtun shing la sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ khro ba dang bcas pas de'i gdong btsogs na bcings par 'gyur ro// dpa' bo g.yul du bsad pa'i ras la bu mo'i gzugs
253a4(rgyud 'bum): brnyan ri mor bris te/ ba glang gi rdul dang / shing pu pa ta la'i rtsa ba'i bdug pas bdugs na bu mo de 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ras sam/ gro ga 'am/ spang leb bam/ rtsig ngos la khro bo gshin rje
253a5(rgyud 'bum): gshed kyi gzugs kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa g.yas na thob/ g.yon na sbrul zhags 'dzin cing / khro gnyer dang / sprin ma bcum pa/ mche ba gtsigs
253a6(rgyud 'bum): shing spun dmar ba/ skra gyen du 'greng zhing sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'od 'bar ba dang bcas pa bris la/ sbrul zhags kyi lhor dur khrod kyi sol bas dgra'i tshogs kyi ming sngags dang spel ba bris te bdag
253a7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid gnas kyi bar du dgra rnams bcings par 'gyur te/ tha na yid kyis kyang cung zad tsam yang gnod par sems par mi 'gyur te/ gal te gnod par sems na 'byung po dang / rims dang /
253b1(rgyud 'bum): sha za dang / mkha' 'gro mas nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyis kyang gtor bar 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi tshig spel na dpung bcings par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shing lo la sogs
253b2(rgyud 'bum): pal sngags 'phreng gnyis su bris te 'phreng gnyis pa'i mthar bsgrub bya'i ming yi ge dang spel te bris nas bcings la/ kham por du bzhag ste/ der bshang ba btang la/ ba glang gi lci skam gyi thal
253b3(rgyud 'bum): bas bskang ste/ kham phor kha sbyar la dbugs nang du rngub cing sa 'og tu sbas nas sas 'thug pa kho nar bkab na/ dgra bcings par 'gyur ba las gzhan du ma yin no// rat+na badz+ra zhes byas nas//
253b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas oM dang badz+ra brjod// hI dang phaT ni mthar sbyar ba// sngags 'di dpung ni 'ching byed yin// sa nag po la lha mo tsa muN+Da'i gdong byas la/ go ro tsa nas bsgrub bya du yod pa'i mong dang spel ba'i
253b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags bris te de'i khar bcug la/ de'i khar mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing / khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhag la nyin gcig bzhin du mchod par byas na kha bcings shing dbang du 'gyur ro// khas phor
253b6(rgyud 'bum): la ldong ros kyis bud med kyi gzugs brnyan bris la/ de b+ha gar mdzub mo bcug ste/ zla ba gzas zin nas ji srid grol gyi bar du sngags bzla ba'am/ yang na bud med dngos kyi b+ha gar yang rung ste/ de
253b7(rgyud 'bum): ltar bsgrubs pa'i mdzub mos des mdzub lugs tsam gyis bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / nim pa'i lo ma la dug dang / rang gi khrag dang / da du ra'i khu bas yi ge phu bri/ de'i dbus su bsgrub bya'i
254a1(rgyud 'bum): ming bris la/ bag zan nam phan gya ril bu'i nang du bcug ste/ dgongs mo bya rog tshang du 'gro kha ma la zar bcug na nges par 'gyur ro// rtsig ngos sam spang le ba la yi ge
254a2(rgyud 'bum): ta bri/ de'i nang du dbyangs kyi yi ges 'khor bar bri/ de'i nang du pha bris/ de'i nang du ha bri/ ha'i nang du ka/ de'i bsgrub bya'i ming bris la/ de kha bcad de bzhag na dbang du 'gyur zhing bcing bas bcing
254a3(rgyud 'bum): pabapar 'gyur ro/ / lte ba'i pad+ma'i dbus su ming gi yi ge 'am/ a bsgoms te/ pad+ma'i bsdu ba byas la/ snying gi zhags pas bcings na/ srung bar 'gyur te/ a ni sems can thams cad kyi// rang gi
254a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rtag sa bon/ / srog srung la sogs don gyi phyir// stobs kyis yang dag bcing bar bya// yang na rdo rje lte ba kha sbyor gyi nang du gangs kyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge a bsams la/ de'i mtha' gnyis su snying gi
254a5(rgyud 'bum): zhags pas bcings na'ang srung ba'i dam par 'gyur ro/ / snying ka'i pad+ma la gnas par yi ge ba kha thur du bltas pa bsams la/ lte ba'i pad+mar yi ge a nas kyi 'bru tshod tsam ste/ ba las 'ong ba'i 'o ma'i
254a6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyun lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pas a la khrus chab gsol ba rtag tu bsams na/ pad+ma kha sbyor gyi bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba 'dis ni lus brtan par 'gyur ba dang / srog srung ba la snying khar dbang
254a7(rgyud 'bum): bskur zhing rgyas pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / shing ta la'i 'dab ma la bsgrub bya ba'i ming gi yi ge ga dang spel ba/ thog ma dang tha mar o la sbyar ba'i ri mo 'bris la/ ri mo de dur khrod kyi sol bas bkang
254b1(rgyud 'bum): nas bum pa la sogs pa'i nang du bcug ste/ sma tshil la sogs pas la bcad la dbugs nang du rngub cing mi gtsang ba'i phung po'i nang du bcug na rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// shing a ga'i rtsa
254b2(rgyud 'bum): ba la tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi dang ldan pa byas te/ sa bon dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig sbyin pa la sogs pa byas nas/ lan tshwa dang / ma ri tsi dang / bca' lga dang / sngon po dang /
254b3(rgyud 'bum): ske tshe dang / spun pa dang / chu rnams kyis legs par byugs te/ nyi ma phyed na khyim gyi chu'i nang du lte ba man chad kha lhor bstan te bcug la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ sngags pas 'di skad ces brjod
254b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / khyod kyis bdag la sogs pa'i las 'di zhes bya ba byas na/ de nas ci nus pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i mchod pa khyod la sbyin no zhes brjod la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bya'o// de nas bya ba byas pa dang
254b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bton la'o mas bkru zhing ci nus pa'i mchod pa byin la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/ / bum pa dri'i chus bkang ste/ rin po che dang / sman dang / 'bru dang ldan par byas shing / stobs po che'i
254b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ maN+Dal gru bzhi par byas pa'i steng du skyes bu'i gtso bo bzhag ste/ bus pa des khrus byas la sngags de gro ga la gor tsa nas bris nas gtsug pud la btags te/ bayul du
254b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs na pha rol gyi dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod kyi ras sam/ a ba d+hU tI'i ras la dug dang / khrag dang / nim pa'i lo ma'i khu ba rnams kyis/ sngags kyi yi ge re re zhing bsgrub bya'i
255a1(rgyud 'bum): ming dang spel ba lugs las bzlog ste/ bris la bcings nas nya phor gyi nang du bcug ste/ sha za'i shing gi rtsa ba'i rlung mtshams su sbas na ni bskrad par 'gyur la/ me mtsham
255a2(rgyud 'bum): su bzhag na ni phan tshun sdang bar 'gyur la/ bden bral gyi mtshams su gsang ste sbas na ni gsod par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis rnal 'byor pas g.yul du bzhugs na dpung bcings par 'gyur ro//
255a3(rgyud 'bum): slar ldog pa la ni bton la 'o ma bkru zhing skyes bu'i ming dang spel ba'i sngags su 'byung bar bzlas so// ldong ros kyis rang gi lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil la bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la me mar gyi rtse mo la
255a4(rgyud 'bum): bsros na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / maN+Dal byugs te/ zan gyi chang bu la ming dang sngags bzlas nas dgongs mo tshang du 'gro kha ma'i bya rog la byin na'ang bskrad par 'gyur ro// bgegs nas bsad pa'i
255a5(rgyud 'bum): ro'i thig gu blangs la/ dum bu gsum du byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i shing phyed tshig pa blangs la bsrub shing byas nas/ dur khrod du shing gi khri 'phrog cing / sna dang bcas pa 'dug ste/ thag gu des
255a6(rgyud 'bum): bsrub shing la btags nas/ ro'i bum par bcug ste/ des bsrubs shing sngags bzlas na gang gi ming nas bzung ste/ bzlas pas de 'ong bar 'gyur ro// yang tha mal pa'i rdo 'am/ brdar rdo la
255a7(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po gdengs ka gsum dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la rdza ma nag po'i nang du bzhag ste/ sbrang rtsi dang 'bras yos kyi bo ga ling dang / dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / 'o thug la sogs
255b1(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod la snod de nyid kyi nang du bzhug ste/ ras gsar pas bkab la bcings nas rgya btab ste/ de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas shin tu gsang ste/ grong khyer gyi dbus su sbas na/
255b2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid ma bton gyi bar du grong khyer de gnas par 'gyur ro// grong khyer ba 'bros pa rnams dgug par 'dod na de nyid du mchod cing dus gsum du sngags bzlas na 'ong bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer ba 'bros par
255b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsom pa la ni bu ram la bzlas te bza' bar byin na mi 'bros so/ / grong brtan par bya ba'i sbyor ba gzhan yang rdza mkhan gyi lag pa phyis pa'i 'jim pa la snod byas la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ dbug
255b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'byin par chu'i nang du bzhag na brtan par 'gyur ro/ / ji ste dgra gsad par 'dod na spra tshil lam/ bag zan las gzugs brnyan byas la/ chos gos kyi ras kyis gzugs brnyan gyi gdong nas
255b5(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te rkang pa'i mthar thug par bkris la legs par sbas te/ de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la ming dang spel ba'i sngags stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bzlas nas lha mchod pa'i khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu
255b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste/ snying khar seng ldeng gi phur bu btab la/ phur bu'i steng du dus gsum du chu tshan blugs shing yongs su bzlas na brlag par 'gyur ro// nyi shu'i phyed kyi rdzas dang / kha cher sbyar la rnal 'byor
255b7(rgyud 'bum): bas thig le byas na skye bo skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ / rdzas de dag ma la ya skyes dang bcas pas yan lag thams cad byugs te/ gang la reg pa re shi'ang mi gtong ngo // rdzas de dag nyid dmar po dang /
256a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la sha dang / sbrang rtsi dang / nad kyi dbang po dang / 'tshong byed dang lhan cig tu bsres te byas na rtag tu sa stengs pa rnams byams shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang /
256a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa thams cad du srung bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do// rtsa sngags 'bum du bzlas nas su// de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba

256a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thams cad kyi tshogs rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o//
256a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas mkha' dbyings dbus gyur pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam bya ba// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nam mkha' la// dpag med rigs kyis yongs gang ba'o// mkha' dbyings nyi ma de
256a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su/ / rang gi sa bon mtshan ma ni// nyi ma stong pas lhag pa yi// 'od zer rnon po 'bar zhing 'khrug/ me stag 'phro bas bdud de sreg/ gong bur de bsdus sbyor ba yis// zhu ba las
256a7(rgyud 'bum): ni skur bzhengs pa/ / sku mdog sngon po drag chen po// 'od zer bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs// 'bar ba'i lus dang sgra chen gyis// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// lhag ger
256b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan chen tshems kyi 'od/ / lha mo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun chags kyi// 'khor lo bla re mthar gnas shing // slar yang 'od ldan phyag bzhi bzhi// thong ka sgyu ma chen mos mdzes// rgyal ba rnam grol
256b2(rgyud 'bum): dri med rgyun/ / kha ba mchog gi zer tshogs 'khrug/ nyis 'gyur du ni byung bsags la// rin chen la bzhugs zhabs gnyis bskyod// grong khyer gsum brtsegs la sogs pa'i// mthar thug
256b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pas rab mdzes pa/ / rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyun 'jug cing // 'byung 'jug dbugs ni yongs gang ba'i// sgra yi tshogs kyis 'joms byed pa// sa gsum po ni rab tu g.yo// mtshon cha
256b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'phangs pas khyab/ / mun pa'i tshogs kyis gtibs pa bzhin// thams cad du ni 'jigs par mdzad// gnam la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang // 'byung po'i bdag po tshangs sogs
256b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang / rkang pa'i grib ma'i mtha' tsam yang // nye bar bzod par nus ma yin// bgegs kyi tshogs gzhan sgyu can dang // srin po la sogs lha gzhan gyis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyi rol gyi// dpag
256b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad 'bum gyi mthar yang ni/ / nye bar bzod par nus ma yin// yod med de ni lha yi phyogs// cung zad 'od kyi lus can yang // rdul lam du ba lta bur g.yo// pad+ma rA ga lta bu yi// g.yon zhal 'od zer//
256b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis ni// thams cad ma lus sreg snyam sems// ban du ka yi me tog gi/ phung po spungs 'dra'i 'od kyis ni// rigs gsum las byung kun nas ni// lhags pa thams cad ngo mtshar gyur//
257a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od gzugs des ni sreg snyam sems// nyi ma stong pas lhag 'od kyis// bskul zhing byang chub thob par mdzad// pharda sgra chen pos bsad mdzad cing // rab tu bsgyings pas
257a2(rgyud 'bum): lha kun sreg/ g.yas zhal dkar po'i 'od zer ni// gangs kyi snying po spungs pa dang // shel dang bai DUr rdo dang ni// ngang pa kun da zla 'dra ba'i// dri med 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa//
257a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyog pa med pa'i gdengs ka'i bar// rang gi chu rgyun 'bab pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i rig kun gsal bar mdzad// nu ba ni ser po gser bcas 'dra// ku suM dza yi me tog dang // me 'bar sol ba spungs 'dra zhing // nyi ma
257a4(rgyud 'bum): 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ / spyan zur bgrad pas 'jigs par mdzad// shin tu drag po'i gzugs chen las// sa gzhi rnams ni ma lus par// skar mda'i 'od ltar lding zhing 'khrug/ blta
257a5(rgyud 'bum): ba ra dka' zhing gzung bar dka'/ / me lce 'khyil ba lta bur 'bar// dpag tshad stong phrag du ma ru// yangs pa'i rdo rje mda' yi ni// dra ba chen pos 'khor lo bcings// khwa gdong la sogs so so yi//
257a6(rgyud 'bum): ba spu re re'i khung nas kyang // ri rab du ma'i rdul mtshungs pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin rnams// spro bas nam mkha' gsal mdzad pa// phyag brgyad spyan
257a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyen smra 'bar/ / mkha' 'gro nyi shu ba'i phyed bskor// de ltar sngags pas rnam bsam bya// g.yas dang po na rdo rje sngon po 'bar zhing rno ba gdengs pa la rigs ldan gyis dkris pa bsnams pa'o//
257b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa na pad+mas bcings pa'i mda'i mchog go// gsum pa na pad+ma chen pos yu ba bkris pa'i ral gri'o// bzhi pa na dung skyong gi zhags pas bkris pa'i lcags kyu'o// g.yon gyi dang po na mtha'
257b2(rgyud 'bum): yas kyi ba dan btags pa'i kha T+wAM kha sgreng ba'o/ / gnyis pa na nor rgyas kyi bu yis rgyud byas pa'i gzhu'i mchog go// gsum pa na 'jog po'i zhags pa dang sdigs 'dzub bo// bzhi pa na tshangs pa'i
257b3(rgyud 'bum): mgo khrag 'dzag pa stobs kyi rgyus bcings pa bsnams pa'o/ / klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang mche ba gtsigs shing lce 'dril ba/ blta ba'i dug can gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i
257b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo thams cad gsal ba'o/ / khwa gdong ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang sbrul gyi rgyan gyis klubs shing spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du 'bar ba/ phyag na zangs gri dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / thod pa

257b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs skrag pas kha sbub tu 'gyel bar bsams na nam mkha' la gnas te char gyi rgyun gtong bas sa gzhi skad cig gis gang bar byed do zhes/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// mkha'
257b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// yang na rta phra mo zhingab tu btags la ras kyis g.yogs te li waM dang bsres la/
258a1(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsis smras te/ mgo bdun pa'i klu'i gzugs sor bcu gnyis pa byas la/ de'i khang pa sor bcu drug yangs par byas nas/ khang pa de gru bzhi la gdong bzhi byas te/ gru
258a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa ni rta'i gdong pa/ gnyis pa la seng ge'i gdong pa/ gsum pa la spre'u'i gdod pa/ bzhi pa la nya'i gdong pa byas te/ de'i nang du klu'i rgyal po ras kha dog sna tshogs pas g.yogs te bzhag
258a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / de nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas btab ste/ yid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa bsams te byin la/ yungs
258a4(rgyud 'bum): kar la lan bdun bsngags te/ klu'i steng du gtor te/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin na/ des klu'i rgyal po rnams mdza' bor gyur nas/ klu thams cad kyis than pa byung ba'i
258a5(rgyud 'bum): dus su nyi ma bdun du char phab pas 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad gang bar byed do/ / char mi 'bab pa'i dus su de ltar byas na gdon mi za bar char 'bab bo// ji ste gdug pa can yin na yang rlung grang
258a6(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / rdo char dang / glog dang / ser ba 'bebs te/ de bzlog par 'dod na rig pa 'dzin pas thal ba dang yungs kar zho gnyis tsam la lan nyi shu'i bar du bzlas te/ ji srid 'dod pa'i
258a7(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs su mtshams bcings la/ yang de nyid la lan bdun bzlas te/ klu'i mgor bsnun cing yid kyis ji skad 'dod par phyogs bcings pa byas te/ phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu
258b1(rgyud 'bum): gtor na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ / ji ste dgra thams cad dang / 'gran zla dang / sdang ba'i grogs po dang / sdang ba'i phyogs byed pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi 'khor lo 'jigs

259a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sgra chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i klu'i sngags mi 'tshal na bka' drin
259a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mtshan nyid skal ba chen po'i lha mo nyon cig/ gshin rje'i mche ba ma nyid ni// rus sbal gyi ni stan la bzhugs/
259a3(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma yi ni ba ma nyid// slar yang bzhi pa la gnas pa// gshin rje'i phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa// bzang po yis ni steng du brgyan// slar yang gshin rje'i mche ba can// rus sbal gyis ni
259a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brgyan/ / oM b+ha zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ldan// dang po ru ni rus sbal gyi// stan bzhugs mgon po ri mo dang // rtses brgyan lan gnyis bsgyur bar bya// mgon po phan phan tshig gis
259a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / ka khi mu khi/ mu ka ke si/ nag gi/ in d+hu b+ha ga gi/ ko ti sa dz+nyA/ pi hi ba di hi/ a pa ri 'o si'o// ka ha ka hi dz+ha'i/ kasma da thaM/ dza'i i na da b+ha ma bid thu ma he sa ro pa tsak+Sha bi sarba ba la
259a6(rgyud 'bum): h+ya bi ho ba Ne san ta ha Na se'i/ ka ki tsi ya ya pa ri san gri yo zhes/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan

259b1(rgyud 'bum): bral la ni sme bas brgyan// 'bar ba dbugs pas rnams par klubs// byang phyogs kyi ni dang po dang // khyu mchog steng na gnas pa yi// gshin rje phyogs kyi mthar gnas dang // rlung ni yugs
259b2(rgyud 'bum): sa mo yis brgyan/ / bden bral la ni gnas pa yi// gshin rje yi ni mche ba can// gti mug rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gshin rje 'joms ma gti mug klubs// klu yi phyag rgya 'di yis ni//
259b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma kun dga' mgur 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen po bcu drug 'di// yi ge re rer kun nas zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni bde pa'i mchog/ rdo rje
259b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dang po rus sbal gzung bar bya// bzang po'i steng du gnas pa yi// byang gi dang por gnyis par ldan// gshin
259b5(rgyud 'bum): / rje pho nya chu lhar bzhugs// yi ge ra ni gti mug brgyan// slar yang ka Sha zhes byar brjod// gshin rje mche can bzang pos brgyan// slar yang mche can bden bral bzhugs// gti mug
259b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni lhan cig ldan/ / der ni sa mtha' zhes bya ba// gti mug gis ni lhan cig brgyan// lha mo bstan pa 'di yis ni// bu mo rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/ shar phyogs nas ni brgyad gzung
259b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing / bzhi par ldan pa'i dbus ma'i mtha'i// lugs sa mo yis spyi bor brgyan// slar yang dbu ma'i mtha' ma gzung // dbugs pa dang ni ldan par bya// gshin rje 'joms ma gzungs nas su//
260a1(rgyud 'bum): yugs sa so yi rnam bya// mthar ni sAhA yongs su brgyan// rig byed kyis ni mnyer bar bya// thod pa'i dbus nas rgyal bar 'gyur// mu oM Ni ka kA saM wi i ka mu ka na
260a2(rgyud 'bum): ru ba te/ sa ga mi/ ka mu pin+ni aN+Do ha pa tha la ha/ lA rI ga Ni le a hi/ mu pha ka te/ s+ya in+ni a ri/ mu tau/ ka graM s+ya ha/ a mu ka han+na ha kA tha ki/ ba yaM d+ha thA mi su sA khaM hA phaT/ klu'i phyag
260a3(rgyud 'bum): / rgya 'di yis ni// bcing ba dang ni bskrad par 'gyur// oM i de na/ ha da b+ha ha a dza me na u/ bi da a dzi ha hra dA bA ha~M/ daM de na ta dzi a shu la re Na shU li a swA hA/ oM dzam+b+hi ni dzismA hi/ oM stam+b+ha naM
260a4(rgyud 'bum): suM swam+b+ha hi/ oM mo ha nI mo ha hi/ oM A kaR+Sha ni A kaR+She hi/ oM dza b+ha thaM b+ha/ ma harba b+ha hA mu kaM thAM b+ha ya swAhA/ de la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi cho ga bzhin las bstan pa'o// oM na mo b+ha ge ba ni tsi s+yan d+he shu la mra
260a5(rgyud 'bum): / khiShu ka ka kaN+De badz+rod ri/ a mu ka s+ya mu khaM/ b+haM d+ha d+hA d+hA/ ha na ha na/ ha da ha da/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM phaT swA hA/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems
260a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dpa' bo 'dod chags phyogs su bltas pa'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa dang / ma nad dang / nyan pa dang / mig sman dang / rdo dang /
260a7(rgyud 'bum): dmar po rnams mi'i thag dang btags la/ slar yang can dang dbar po dang lan mang du sbal te/ a mra'i rim sur gyur pa dang / dbus su lib bu mig bcug ste/ grib ma la bskams nas nyis dang / rdzab
260b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / sreg byed kyi dbus su ril bu bcug la/ slar yang skar ma rgyal la lhag par gnas par byed/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i zhal du bcug la ji srid mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sbrul gyi
260b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnyed pa dang / ri mo dkar nag dum bu so sor phye la dkar gnas so sor shes par byas pa de dang / shang ka puSh+pa dang / a ka ru nag po la stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sngags bzlas
260b3(rgyud 'bum): kha/ phyis kyang brgyad brgya bzlas te 'dug par bya'o// skar ma rgyal gsum la snam bu byas te zla ba yar ngo la dum bu dkar pos bdug go// mar ngo la ni dum bu nag pos 'dug go// de nas de gyon
260b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lus kyi lan khri bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs la so sor gyon pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / gang la 'dod pa de
260b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ / de la'i bu gar lig bu mig bcug ste/ du ba med par bsregs la/ de tshig pa dang mtshan mo zhib mor btags te/ mig la byugs na khyim gyi me tog mchog ltar gsal la rang gi
260b6(rgyud 'bum): lha'i sngags bzlas na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / lto 'phya'i rgyal po sa bum mam/ kham por gyi nang du bcug ste gter du sbas la/ de nas rul zhing zags pa dang bton te/ de'i thod pa'i rus pa brdar
260b7(rgyud 'bum): te thig ler byas na grib ma'ang med par byed do/ / de zags pa'i sas lus la byugs na dug sna tshogs zhi bar byed do// gang gi rdul gyi dri rtag tu zhim zhing / sgra g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / yid du 'ong zhi
261a1(rgyud 'bum): grib ma bdun dang ldan la/ lus la rma med cing bden par smra ba dang / yun ring du mig mi 'dzums pa de ni lha mo dngos grub byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha'i dbugs drizhi
261a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing rtag tu skyed de bar gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ltar sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong bas sgrub pa po rnams bskyab pa'i phyir mi ro'i gzugs kyis gnas te/ sems can rnams byin gyis
261a3(rgyud 'bum): brlab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs ltar phan par nye bar gnas pa mdun du bdar ba dang yang dag par ldan pa yin no// lha mo de ni dngos grub kyi yon tan thams
261a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas lci spyang dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog la sogs pa sha ban thams cad kyis kyang bskor te gnas la/ yang dbang po'i tshul gyis gzugs de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po
261a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha dang / yi dgas la sogs pas kun nas bskor te gnas pa sgrub pa po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas cho ga de ltar shes par byas nas/ de'i snying kha na ro tsa na yod pa blangs te/ rang gi
261a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po bzlas pas thig le byas na/ steng du dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag gi bar du 'gro zhing slar yang 'od la/ rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs mthong zhing mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang dga' mgur rtse zhing
261a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i sha zos pa tsam gyis khams gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur zhing / rlung gyi shugs kyis dpag tshad brgyar 'gro la lha'i lus can du 'gyur te/ gang dang gang
261b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de dang de ster bar 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha' lding dang / b+hi la dang / 'ug pa'i zhag la mi ro'i ras kyis sdong bu byas te/ se mar btang na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur zhing / sha ba dang 'byung
261b2(rgyud 'bum): po gang dag yib pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
261b3(rgyud 'bum): rje can gyis gsungs/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ klu'i sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya'i
261b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid ni/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang zhig spyi btsug 'phreng reg pa// de la mgo bo bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba bston byed pa// de la khur chos bstan par bya// bang zhig sa
261b5(rgyud 'bum): ni ston byed pa/ / de la lce ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mchu la reg byed pa// de la kos sgo bstan par bya// gang zhib lto ba ston byed pa// de la lte ba bstan par bya// gang zhig rkub chos ston byed

262a3(rgyud 'bum): zhig steng du lta byed pa/ / de la dpral ba bstan par bya// gang zhig mig ni ston byed pa// de la so ni bstan par bya// gang zhig lta ba ston byed pa// de la mchu ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mchu ni
262a4(rgyud 'bum): ston byed pa/ / de la mche ba bstan par bya// gang zhib lce ni ston byed pa// de la lto ba bstan par bya// gang zhig byin pa ston byed pa// de la brla ni bstan par bya// gang zhig brla ni ston byed

262a6(rgyud 'bum): la khrag gi gnas bstan bya/ / gang zhig mdung ni ston byed pa// de la sha ka ti bstan par bya// gang zhig rtsed mo ston byed pa// de la lta ba bstan par bya// gang zhig phyogs ni ston byed pa//

262b1(rgyud 'bum): dpral dbus su/ / mdung dang sna la shag ti yed// smin ma bcum sde bzlog cing blta// nu ma mtho ling lte ba yangs// rab byed smad ni rnam par 'gyur// ri mo gsus pa yongs su zlum// ma
262b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma ni nyer 'gro ba'i/ / mtshan nyid 'di dag shes par bya// song ba'i sa las slar mi ldog/ rgyu med par ni ngu ba dang // de bzhin don med par ni dgod// 'jam par smra zhing snying rje med//
262b3(rgyud 'bum): don med par ni mang du smra// sgyu ma che dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog/ mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa// mkha' 'gro'i mchog tu shes bya zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gsegs//

262b6(rgyud 'bum): lag ston byed pa/ / phyag 'tshal ba yi lar gyur yin// gang zhig lto ba la rdebs pa// ltogs so zhes ni ston pa yin// gang zhig sor mos sor mo sngon// bzla bar bya zhes ston pa yin// gang
262b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig byin pa la reb pa/ / bdag ni ngal bar ston pa yin// gang zhig sor mo la reg pa// bdag ni ngal sos zhes ston pa'o// gang zhig so ni sos 'cha' ba// sha za'o zhes ni ston pa yin//
263a1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig khro gnyer la reg pa// bdag ni bcings par ston pa yin// gang zhig mkha' lding la reg pa// bdag ni grol bar ston pa yin// gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston//
263a2(rgyud 'bum): de ring gtor ma bza' zhes ston// gang zhig lag g.yas ston byed pa// de ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig rna ba la rdeb pa// gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin// de nas ngag brda'i cho ga/
263a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad// po taM gi ni phyag 'tshal ba'o// pra ti po taM gi ni phyag gi lan no// ga muM gi ni 'gro ba'o// lu ba ni 'ong zhes bya ba'o// ni ga raM ni byin cig pa'o// tsa tu kaM ni long zhig pa'o// hri da ya ni

263a6(rgyud 'bum): li ka ni phyugs so/ / da ki ni ni sring mo'o// mu ta ka ni klu ma'o// lce so la reg pa ni bkres par ston pa'o// tri sna ni dris bsgo ba'o// a kaM ma na ni gang nas zhes pa'o// s+tha nad ni che ge mo nas zhes pa'o//
263a7(rgyud 'bum): ki ri no na me tog go// le bo dang dan da ni dgod pa'o// ni ro da ni char dbab pa'o// big nya pa ti ni tshim pa'o// d+hu ma pri ya na ni chu 'dzin no// sa nu ni ri bo'o// sa rod ni chu bo'o// a gu la ni cha
263b1(rgyud 'bum): shas so/ / ba da na ni gdong ba'o// ra dzI ka ni l+le'o// ad na ni so'o// paM ka te ni rgyal mtshan no// tshan do ni 'phreng ba'o// tsa la ni rlung ngo // srig pa ti ni byugs so// man da la ni mnyam pa'o// swa
263b2(rgyud 'bum): sa ni lam gyi bzhi mdo'o/ / phal gu shaM ni skye ba'o// ma hA kA ra ni phyugs chen po'o// tsha ni ra'o// na ni skyes bu'o// ba ni glang ngo // ma ni ma he'o// ba ni bza' ba'o// a bya ka ni rgyal po'i skyes bu'o//
263b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra ni gnas pa'o// kha la reg pa ni zos pa'o// so la reg pa ni ngoms pa'o// hri ka ni ngo tsha'o// stod pa la reg pa ni me thun las gyis shig pa'o// brla na reg pa ni de ltar gyis shig pa'o zhes
263b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'
263b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro las/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha mo thams cad yang dag par 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma
263b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen sdang ba thams cad 'dul ba'i 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba bskyed du

264a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / de ni bdag gis bshad kyis nyon// rigs ldan dang ni rta yis 'gros// gshin rje yi dgas de bzhin du// gzhan yang ro langs zung dang ni// srin po yi ni khyad par

266b6(rgyud 'bum): ka ra thig le zlas brgyan pa'i/ / rlung gi phyi rol slar yang bzung // nyi shu rtsa lnga cho ga bzhin// nyi shu drug par gnas pa ni// ma ka ra dang thig le brgyan// rlung gi phyi rol slar yang bzung // nyi shu/

267a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i bzhi pa bzung nas ni/ / der ni dang po gsum pa'ang sbyin// mkhas pas re'u mi gsum cu brgyan// dbu ma'i dbu ma bzung nas ni// gti mug gis ni mdzes byas pa/

273a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug go/ / bcu gcig pa ni 'phel ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gti mug go// dang po ni gti mug go// gnyis pa ni bzang po'o// gsum pa ni khyu mchog go// bzhi pa ni rus sbal lo// lnga pa ni chu srin to//
273a4(rgyud 'bum): drug pa ni yug+sa sa mo'o// bdun pa ni sme ba'o// brgyad pa ni 'bugs pa'o// dgu pa ni 'phyo ba'o// bcu pa ni rmi lam mo// bcu gcig pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go// bcu gnyis pa ni 'phel ba'o//
273a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel ba'i nyi ma la skyes pa'i byis pa ni/ nyi ma dgu pa 'am/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ lo dgun shi chad du ma gyur na/ byug cing skal ba bzang ba dang / sems gdug cing rtsu ba la ma drod chung zhing yul mtha'
273a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kyi gtso bor 'gyur la/ g.yem pa la dga' ba dang / thams cad du 'jam por smra zhing nor dang ldan zhing nad med pa dang / skyid pa la rtag par 'gyur te/ tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tsho ste/ sa'i dbang
273a7(rgyud 'bum): phyugs gi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / sa'i dbang phyug gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma brgyad pa 'am/ zla ba brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na nor dang 'bru rtag par 'gyur zhing bden par sprul mdza'
273b1(rgyud 'bum): bshes mang zhing chos shes pa dang / mkhas la tshangs par spyod cing sems can kun la phan pa byed la/ bzo shes pa dang / 'jam por smra zhing skal ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad rgyas par
273b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba la the tsom med de/ tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa brgyad 'tsho ste/ rmi lam gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ min na zla ba brgyad
273b3(rgyud 'bum): dad/ lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ des bla ma nyon mongs par byed pa dang / dpa' zhing rtul phod pas pha rol gnon pa dang / dgra thams cad 'joms shing skye bo dam pa dang mdza' ba dang /
273b4(rgyud 'bum): skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen byed cing thams cad du tshig rtsub smra la sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed pa dang / dbul zhing 'phyar ba dang / nad med cing rtag tu bza' ba rnyed pa dang / mthon po la brten
273b5(rgyud 'bum): pas 'tsho zhing rtag tu seng ge dang 'dra bar sems te/ tshe lo drug cu 'tsho zhing / 'phyo ba'i nyi ma la dgra'i mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba la the tsom med do// 'phyo ba'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni zla ba bzhi
273b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / drug pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa la gal te shi chang du ma gyur na/ de ni shes rab chung zhing blo dang me drod dman la/ sdang ba mang zhing bu cha mi 'chol 'khor mang ba dang / yo byad 'phel
273b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing sdug bsngal mang ba dang / gnyen 'dun thams cad dga' la/ ngan ngon la rtsi ba dang / nor dang phyugs mngal chung ma gsum len cing cung zad tsam gyis khro ba dang / nga rgyal che zhing dgra rnams
274a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs la khe spogs kyis 'tsho ste/ tshe la brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tsho zhing 'bugs pa'i nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'bugs pa'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa
274a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am zla ba gnyis pa 'am/ bzhi pa 'am/ lo brgyad pa 'am/ bcu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ de ni pha ma ltogs pa dang / nor chung zhing rmongs pa dang / sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
274a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing ngang tshul ngan la nad bu can du 'gyur ba dang / tshangs par spyod cing dpa' la sdug pa dang / ser sna dang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la/ sme ba'i nyi ma la rang gi khyim du 'chi bar
274a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sme ba'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni/ nyi ma gnyis pa'am/ lnga pa 'am/ zla ba gsum pa 'am/ dgu pa 'am/ lo dgu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ des ni rang gi rigs stong
274a5(rgyud 'bum): shing chog shes pa dang / bstan bcos phun sum tshogs shing bzo sna tshogs rig pa dang / dpa' la nga rgyal che ba dang / g.yo sgyu can yin la phrag dog dang ldan zhing nor nyung ba dang / gzugs bzang
274a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing bya ba thams cad yang ba yin te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa gsum du bde bar 'tsho la yugs sa mo'i nyi ma la chur 'chi bar gdon mi za'o// yugs sa mo'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa
274a7(rgyud 'bum): 'am bcu pa 'am/ zla ba gnyis pa'am/ brgyad pa 'am/ lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ de ni sdig pa'i blo dang ldan zhing sems can kun la 'khyal tshig smra zhing nor nyung la
274b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phyar ba dang / thams cad du nad kyis thebs la rgyal po'i chad pas gcod cing / bud med thams cad la skal ba bzang por 'gyur la bzod dang dor thabs thams cad kyi bzo la mkhas pa ste/
274b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'am/ yang na sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho la chu srin gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar the tsom med do// chu srin gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma bcu pa 'am/ zla ba gsum pa'am/ lnga pa
274b3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ lo dgu pa lam shi na bsod nams dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs shing / zhi des dang / bslab pa dang ldan zhing / nor dang / gzugs dang / skal ba phun sum tshogs la/ dpal dang
274b4(rgyud 'bum): / grags pa dang / bu dang / tsha bo 'phel la/ grong khyer gyi gtso bor 'gyur ba dang / 'khor dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / bzo dang dus kyi mtha' la mkhas pa dang / dgra thams
274b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rlag par byed do/ / tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga 'am/ yang na drug cu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la/ rus sbal gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rus sbal gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa dang /
274b6(rgyud 'bum): dgu pa dang / zla ba brgyad pa dang / lo dgu pa la ma shi na/ de ni rtag tu sems khral che ba dang / khro ba dang bcas shing cung zad kyis mgu ba dang / mang du smra zhing gnyen rnams byams pa
274b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rtag tu g.yem pa dang / phyugs la gtong phod che ba dang / bu dang chung ma gsod pa dang / sems chung zhing bsam pa ngan pa dang / zhing las kyis 'tsho zhing mdze nad kyis thebs te/
275a1(rgyud 'bum): @tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhi'am/ brgyad cu tham par 'chol khyu mchog gi nyi ma la rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// khyu mchog gi nyi ma la bcas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma dgu pa'am/ zla ba gnyis/
275a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / brgyad pa 'am/ lo brgyad pa dang / dgu pa la gal te ma shi na dpa' zhing rtul phod pas pha rol gnon la sgeg cing phyug pa dang / chung ma mang du len la gnyen 'dun thams cad dga' zhing pha'i tshe
275a3(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa dang / le spogs dang / g.yem pa la dga' zhing le lo dang / mu cor du smra ba dang / ngang tshul ngan pa dang / las gdug pa la dga' ste/ tshe lo drug cu'am/ nyi shur 'tsho la bzang po'i
275a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma la mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / bzang po'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma lnga pa 'am/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ lo bcu pa la ma shi na/ da ni dbul zhing chos la bden par smra ba dang / snyan
275a5(rgyud 'bum): par smra ba dang / chung ma gcig la dga' zhing rig pa'i bdag por 'gyur ba dang / bzo dang dus thams cad shes shing rang gi gnyen 'dun byams pa dang / rigs kyi 'chad pas 'tsho ba ste/ tshe lo brgyar
275a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho la/ gti mug gi nyi ma la chur 'chi bar 'gyur ba las gzhan du ma yin no// gti mug gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa 'am/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ lo dgu pa la gal te shi chad du ma
275a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur na mang du za zhing sems chung la rtag tu g.yem pa la dga' ba dang / rgyun du khro zhing brkam chags che la/ nad bu can du 'gyur ba dang / yid gzhungs shing gnyen bdun byams pa dang / rtag tu khro ba
275b1(rgyud 'bum): dang nga rgyal can du 'gyur ba dang / ngang tshul ngan zhing sdug spyod la tshig rtsub dang 'khrul pa la dga' ba dang / mtshon cha brdeg pa la dga' ste/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhir mtsho la/ 'phel ba'i nyi ma la yan
275b2(rgyud 'bum): lag gi zug rngu dang skrangs 'bur gyis 'chi bar 'gyur pa la the tsom med do/ / 'phel ba'i nyi ma la nad kyis thebs na shin tu bag bya dgos te/ gal te zhag bco lnga la ma shi na de ni nyi ma ldan 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
275b3(rgyud 'bum): sa'i dbang phyug la ni nyi ma gsum na ma shin de nas nyi ma bdun 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam la'ang nyi ma gsum na ma shi na de bzhin du nyi ma bdun 'tsho'o// 'phyo ba la ni nyi ma gsum mam/ lnga la 'tsho 'chi
275b4(rgyud 'bum): phyed do/ / 'bugs pa la ni nyi ma gsum mam/ bzhi pa la ma shi na nyi ma bcu na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sme ba la ni nyi ma gsum pa la 'chi ba 'am brgyad la 'tsho ste/ yun ring du nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur
275b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / yugs sa mo la ni nyi ma lnga lang chi ba'am/ dgu pa la ldang bar 'gyur la/ zhag bcu na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// chu srin la ni nyi ma brgyad pa la 'chi ba'am/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis
275b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chi 'tsho phyed par 'gyur ro/ / rus sbal la ni nyi ma brgyad pa la ma shi na de nas zhag bcu pa la nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// khyu mchog la ni nyi ma gsum pa 'am/ lnga pa la ma shi na nad cung zad bcas
275b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing brgyad pa la ldang ngo / / bzang po la ni nyi ma brgyad pa dang bcu pa la ma shi na de nas grol bar 'gyur ro// gti mug la ni nyi ma gsum pa 'am/ bdun pa la ma shi na de nas grol bar 'gyur ro//
276a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gi mche bas mngon min na// 'chi bdag dang ni mngon par 'grogs// dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba yis// de rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur zhing // tshe dang nad mad spel ba'i phyir//
276a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la cho ga ji ltar sbyar// bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun gyi nad rnams ni// gzhom zhing bskyang bar bya ba dang // shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// de
276a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams bsod nams che 'gyur ba/ / chu yi sbyin sreg cho ga ni// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ba// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sa yi cha ni yid 'ong la// kha dog dkar po dri yis byug/ me tog
276a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng dkar gyis brgyan cing / / rgyal mtshan bla res 'bar byas par// rtsa ba nag po ra ri med// bum pa chu yis bkang sogs pa// de dbus lha mo bsam pa ni// pad+ma'i stan la yang dag bzhugs//
276a5(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro// gangs dang
276a6(rgyud 'bum): kun da zla 'dra ba'i/ / bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa yis// dug gi mthu ni 'phrog par mdzad// lha mo'i sbyor ba 'di lta bus// bsams na dug ni 'joms par 'gyur// 'o ma nag por gyur gyi bar//
276a7(rgyud 'bum): mun pas ring du zil mnan pa// slar yang bdug pas bdug par bya// dpyid zla ra sogs rim bzhin du// nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni// rim gyis sbyar bar bya ba yi/
276b1(rgyud 'bum): nyin mo yi ni chu tshod dag/ mkhas pas bzhi dang bcu gnyis bsgyur// mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur// chu tshod mkhas pas brtsa bar bya// re'u mig dag ni gnyis pa la// dus la mkhas pas
276b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma bya/ / nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur// chu tshod kyi ni mtshan ma bya// bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni// mtshan so'i chu tshod du ni brtag/ brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag/ nyin mo
276b3(rgyud 'bum): ru ni brtag par bya/ / gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag/ chu tshod sum cu tham pa ni// dbus kyi bi shu gnyis dkar sbyar// gnyis dang bcu ni gsum po dag
276b4(rgyud 'bum): nyin mo'i chu tshod shes bya ste/ / brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag/ de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya// bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan mar ni// nyin mo yi ni chu tshod do// drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba//
276b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan pa bya// drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// nyin mo yir ni shes bya ste// bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags// de bzhin lhor ni 'gro ba
276b6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / dus shes pa ni bshad par bya// bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni// nyin mo yir ni bshad pa yin// drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// mtshan mo yi ni mtshan mor bya// gnyis dang
276b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu ni gisum bsgyur ba/ / de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin// brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// chu tshod mtshan gyir rab tu grags// bcu ni gsum du bsgyur ba dang // bi shu'i nyin mo'i chu
277a1(rgyud 'bum): chod de/ / de bzhin mtshan gyi chu tshod kyang // bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya// brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya// gnyis dang bcu ni
277a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsgyur ba/ / mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag/ drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin// bzhi dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod do//
277a3(rgyud 'bum): sum brgya drug cu'i 'bugs kyis ni// chu tshod kyi ni dus rnams bzla// chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan phrugs gcig tu ni brjod// zla ba'i go rim ji bzhin du// rim pa de
277a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mtshan ma bya/ / chu tshod dbugs ni rdzogs dang po// rim gyis 'phel zhing rim gyis 'bri// las dang las min bye brag bzhin// 'bugs ni rim gyis gzung bar bya// mkha'
277a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro gnyis dang dus tshigs dang / / bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya// gnyis po dag ni bcur bsgyur ba// de bzhin lo yi chu tshod do// de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis// nyin mtshan gyi ni
277a6(rgyud 'bum): dbugs su brtsi/ / ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par gzhag/ ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su// sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag/ a yi rim pa la
277a7(rgyud 'bum): bab na/ / dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing // nor rnyed par ni snang ba ste// skal ba bzang por gdon mi za// A yi re'u mig la bab na// rims dang nad kyis gzir ba dang //
277b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur bas// a zhes bya bas nges par ston// yi ge i la bab gyur na// rgyal po'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te// kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang // gang zhig bsams pa
277b2(rgyud 'bum): de 'grub 'gyur/ / yi ge I la bab gyur na// zla ba drug na 'chi ba dang // de bzhin dgras ni gzir ba dang // ma yis 'jigs par shes par bya// yi ge u la ba gyur na// dpal ldan grogs
277b3(rgyud 'bum): mo rnyed pa dang / / nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang // dpal rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur// U la gal te bar gyur na// de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar snang // bran gza' dang ni gnyen tshan rnams//
277b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur// yi ge e la bab gyur na// 'phral du skye ba skal can 'gyur// skyes pa bud med dag gis ni// mchod pa'i gnas 'di 'thob par 'gyur// ai yi
277b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma la lhung na/ / dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang // lus can rkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing // nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur// o yi mtshan ma la bab na// gnas kyi
277b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang por 'gyur ba dang / / nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing // yid 'ong rim pa de bzhin no// oM yi mtshan ma la bab na// 'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing // gnas las nyams dang
277b7(rgyud 'bum): brdeg btsog dang / / byas pa chung ni zos par 'gyur// yi ge aM la bab gyur na// bran bza' dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing // bu dang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te// de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur//
278a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa// de bzhin mtha' ma'ang gzung bar bya// drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su// snga ma de bzhin sum 'gyur bya// sum brgya drug cur bsres nas su// sa/
278a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhi ru ni bcad nas kyang // yi ge lhag ma bzung byas te// dge dang mi dge mtshon par bya// yang na ro mo kyag kyog bri// dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang // yang na me tog gtor nas ni// de bzhin
278a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ni mtshon par bya/ / yang na snga dro ro ha ta'i// dus su rtsib po yis blta// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rab rgyas pa'o// bcu gnyis kyi ni nas rab tu// sems ni bskyed pa'i cho ga bshad// ro ho ta'i
278a4(rgyud 'bum): dus bdag nyid bsam/ / sa dbang phyug la de bzhin khyim// rmi lam la ni spun gyi bsam// bya ku la la nye du ste// bi hri la ni bu yi bsam// sme ba la ni dgra yir bstan// ran+da la ni sbyar ba bsam// ma
278a5(rgyud 'bum): ka ra la gso dpyad don/ / rus sbal la ni chos kyi don// khyu mchog la ni drag po'i las// bzang po la ni nor shes bya// gti mug la ni kun tu 'khrug/ 'phel ba la ni reg byed na// don rnams 'grub
278a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / / nor dang 'bru dang phrad pa dang // grogs po sdug dang phrad par 'gyur// dus ni ring por mi sdod cing // myur du phrad 'gyur gdon mi za// sa dbang phyug la reg tsam gyis// lam
278a7(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ / kha zas sems dang bu dang nor// las kyi bsam pa ston par byed// rmi lam la ni nor rnyed cing // mchod pa thob cing grogs dang phrad// gnyen bshes yid ni dga' ba dang // zhi
278b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing dgos pa'ang 'grub par ston/ / bya ku la la mya ngan dang // khyad par can gyi don nyams shing // gnyen 'dun dang ni 'bral bar 'gyur// bi hri skyes ni ster ba dang // byams par smra ba rnyed 'gyur te/
278b2(rgyud 'bum): bu ni skye ba mthong bar 'gyur// mi ki ri la rtsod pa dang // ca cos kun tu nyon mongs shing // chos po bkra ni mi shis dang // gnyen 'dun nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// ran da la ni btung dang bza'//
278b3(rgyud 'bum): gos dang rgyan la sogs rnyed cing // stor ba slar yang rnyed pa dang // bud med sdug dang ldan par 'gyur// ma ka ra la sems khral dang // don gnyer 'bras bu med par 'gyur// yid 'ong nor dang 'bral
278b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / 'dod pa rnams dang phrad mi 'gyur// rus sbal la ni skal bzang zhing // zhi dang srung dang bkra shis 'gyur// stan dang nor dang btung ba rnyed// khyu mchog la ni las rnams la// rgyal
278b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i chad pas nges par 'jigs/ / mya ngan dang ni gnas su 'gro// bye bral dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// bzang po la ni longs spyod dang // don rnams thams cad nges par 'grub// mchod pa'i gnas
278b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur grogs dang ni/ / bkra shis dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gti mug la ni don rnams kun// snying po med pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs// gnas ni bcings nas lam gyi ni// 'du shes dag ni mthong bar
278b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// yan lag gi ni mtshan ma rnams// 'phel ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yon pa 'gul na/ pha dang ma skrag par 'gyur ro// sa'i dbang phyug la ni mdzes par snang ngo //
279a1(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam la ni gos rnyed do// 'phyo ba la ni nor rnyed do// 'bugs pa ni ma dang ba la nyes don 'byung ngo // sme ba la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro// lugs sa so la ni gnyen 'dun 'ong ngo //
279a2(rgyud 'bum): chu srin la ni bgo ba rnyed do// rus sbal la ni 'thab rtsod do// khyu mchog la ni byang phyogs nas 'gron po 'ong ngo // bzang po dang / gti mug la de bzhin du bgo ba'o// 'phel ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yas pa
279a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gul ba'i 'bras bu'ang snga ma bzhin no/ / sa'i dbang phyug la ni ci'i mtshan mar yang mi 'gyur ro// rmi lam la ni 'thab rtsod do// bya ku li la ni lam rings kyi gtam thos par 'gyur ro// 'bugs
279a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni nor nyams par 'gyur ro/ / sme ba la ni nor rnyed par 'gyur ro// yugs sa mo la ni ngu bar ston no// chu srin la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro// rus sbal la ni bgo ba rnyed do// khyu mchog
279a5(rgyud 'bum): la ni stor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / bzang po la ni 'gran po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gti mug la ni pho nya dang phrad do// yang ro hi ta'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yas pa du na bud med dang phrad do// sa'i dbang
279a6(rgyud 'bum): byug gis ni mdzes par 'gyur ro/ / rmi lam gyis ni mgu bar 'gyur ro// byA ku lis ni btung ba rnyed do// bi rdi sa ni cung zad skrag par 'gyur ro// mi ki ris kyang de bzhin no// ran das ni mya ngan
279a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'dzin no/ / ma ka ris ni mdzes par 'gyur ro// kur bas ni 'gron po 'ong ngo // bi Sha b+ha sa ni byams sdug tu 'gyur ro// bzang pos ni mnyes par 'gyur ro// gti mug gis ni cir
279b1(rgyud 'bum): yang mi 'gyur ro/ / ro ha ta'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yon pa dun bza' ba dang btung ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i dbang phyug gis ni dge bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyis ni sngon ma mthong ba cung zad mthong bar 'gyur
279b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bya ku li la bcings par 'gyur ro// bi Ti la 'thab rtsod 'byung ngo // mi ki ri la gzhan dag 'ong ngo // ran da la stor brlag thos par 'gyur ro// ma ka ra la shi chad thos par 'gyur ro// kur
279b3(rgyud 'bum): mal mya ngan gyis 'dzin no/ / bri sha b+ha la dge bar ston no// bzang pos ni gtam ngan thos par 'gyur ro// ro hi ta'i nyi ma la rkang pa g.ya' na mi chen po 'ong ngo // sa'i dbang phyug gis ni khyim dge
279b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rmi lam gyis ni su zhig 'ong bar ston no// bya ku lis ni mgo ba rnyed do// bi Tis ni sems khral skye'o// mi ki ris ni bde bar ston no// ran das ni skrag go// ma ka ras ni
279b5(rgyud 'bum): khyim 'phral lo/ / kur mas ni su zhig 'chi bar ston to// khyu mchog gis ni 'gron po 'ong bar ston to// bzang pos ni chom po 'ong bar ston to// gti mug gis ni khyim mdzes par ston to//
279b6(rgyud 'bum): ro hi ta'i nyi ma la lus thams cad g.yo na 'thab rtsod dang skyo sngogs 'byung ngo // sa'i dbang phyug gis ni nor rnyed do// rmi lam gyis ni 'jig par 'gyur ro// bya ku lis ni ma dang pha la nyes
279b7(rgyud 'bum): don 'byung ngo / / bi rdis ni las nye bar gnas par ston to// mi ki ri so ni pa ma skrag pa skye bar 'gyur ro// ran das ni lho phyogs nas 'gron po 'ong bar ston to// ma ka ras ni skya bseng 'ong ba
280a1(rgyud 'bum): ston to/ / kur mas ni 'tshon po blo bur 'ong ngo // bri Sha b+has ni mya ngan skye'o// bi rdzis ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo // gti mug gis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran no// ro tsa ta'iti
280a2(rgyud 'bum): ma la rkang pa'i sha 'gul na dge'o/ / sa'i dbang phyug kyang de bzhin no// rmi lam gyis ni gtam bdag 'ong ngo // byA ku lis ni 'thab rtsod do// bi Tis ni bdag po mdzes par 'gyur ro// mi ki ras
280a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'thab rtsod do/ / ran das ni 'thab rtsod dang skye sngogs su 'gyur ro// ma ka ras kyang de bzhin no// kur mas ni de nyid du su zhig 'chi bar ston to// bri Sha b+has ni gos rnyed do// pa tras ni nad dang
280a4(rgyud 'bum): phrad par 'gyur ro/ / mo hi ta sa ni mya ngan dang phrad par 'gyur ro// 'phel ba nor rgyas bu yin te// gti mug de bzhin 'jog po stobs kyis rgyu ba ste// khyu mchog pad+mar shes bya ste// rus sbal de bzhin
280a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma che/ / chu srin du ni dung skyong gsungs// yugs sa mo ni mtha' yas bzhed// rigs ldan sme bar shes par bya// 'bugs pa mgo brgya pa zhes bya// 'phyo ba yid kyis 'gro ba ste// rmi lam gtsigs
280a6(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya yin/ / sa yi dbang phyug char 'bebs so// lha mo bcu gnyis 'di dag ni// lo gnas rten 'brel bcu gnyis dngos// de ltar sa rnams shes byas nas// dge dang mi dge brtag pa bya//
280a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dus su bgrod pa ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// dga' ba skad cig nyid dang ni// 'bras bu'i yan lag bye brag rnams// sum 'gyur du ni bsgyur byas te// kun la rkang pa bzhi yis dgang //
280b1(rgyud 'bum): mdud pa bcad cing 'char ba yi// dus ni de ltar brjod pa yin// chad pa bgeg dang gza' rnams dang // mdung dang dgra rnams ltung ba dang // khyim sa yi nI dpyad dag la// lto 'phye'i lhor ni brko ba dang /
280b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro 'ong sbyor ba'i bye brag dang // tshe dang nad med spel ba dang // de bzhin sa bon gdab pa dang // phyug rnams ji ltar gdul ba dang // bral dang 'du dang rgyal srid dang // rnyed pa dag ni spang bya zhing // yid
280b3(rgyud 'bum): dang byung dang g.yul 'gyed dang / / ldong bu'i phung po de bzhin te// byis pa gso ba'i sgrub pa dang // mig sman khyad par de bzhin te// dus dang tshod la sogs pa nyid// nyin dang nyin gyis dbye bar bya//
280b4(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyis len dang rtsi rnam gnyis// las ni yongs su smin par bya// sems 'phel mnyam par 'jug pa yis// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de ltar rtsi dang bcud len sogs// blo dang 'bad pas
280b5(rgyud 'bum): shes bya zhes/ / dam tshig kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo
