280b7(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i dbang phyug ste/ / sems can thams cad gdul mdzad gnyen// dbang phyug thams cad byed pa po// 'di ni rig pa dam pa mchog/ ming can mchog tu rnyed dka' ba// dang po chos kyi 'byung gnas
281a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / de nas yi ge dgod par bya// dbyangs yig dang po thig ler bcas// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag gnas// rtag tu 'bugs kyi ngo ba ste// 'byung ba ru ni byed pa yin// 'bar
281a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'phreng bas mdzes pa'i mdog/ phyogs kun tu ni rnam par 'phro// sna tshogs mdud pa'i 'bar ba che// zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya// kun tu 'gro ba 'thob 'gyur zhing // 'di ni rnyed dka'i
281a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ / de nyid spangs pas yi ge med// 'gyur med rnyog pa med pa ste// dung dang zla 'dra dri med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya'o// rang gi dbus su gyur pa na// 'dab brgyad
281a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+mas shin tu brgyan/ / de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni// gangs dang 'dra bar 'dzag pa ste// mchog tu zhi ba'i hi la ni// dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar nas// thig les steng du brgyan pa yi// yi ge rgod
281a5(rgyud 'bum): pas dgod par bya/ / rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs pa'o// rang gi mgrin pa'i dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar po kun 'og mdzes// der ni thig le zla ba yis//
281a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'i dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa// pu lu ta zhes bya bar grags// mgo yi klad pa'i dbus gnas par// thig le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa// a ta sa yi me tog bzhin// 'og tu bltas shing
281a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phyang ba ste/ / nyin dang mtshan du bdud rtsi yi// tshul gyis 'bab pas yang dag gnas// dang po 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// dbyangs yig gis ni khyad par sbyar// rang gi phyag rgyar mngon ldan pas/
281b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster// de yi brtul zhugs pa bshad de// sbyin sreg las dang sngags rnams dang // bzung ba dang ni bgrang 'phreng dag/ gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur// sngags kyi
281b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbyibs chos dag/ sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste// dug med byas nas nan tan du// brten bya 'di ni brten byas nas// srid pa'i longs spyod dag 'gyur zhing // srid pas srid pa
281b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi bdag/ ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa 'di rtag tu rgyun goms byas// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam
281b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhes/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni//
281b5(rgyud 'bum): sngo zhing cung zad dmar ba'i 'od// 'od zer sngon po'i 'phreng 'khrugs las// 'dam skyes sngon po lta bu yi// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mgo skyes lam pa gyen 'greng zhing // rgyan
281b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ / rked pa stag gi pags pas dkris// phyag na lcags kyu zhags pa dag/ mda' dang gzhu ni mchog tu 'gengs// in+d+ra nI la lta bu ste// dang po'i yi ge las
281b7(rgyud 'bum): byung bsgom/ / gang gi rig pa rab sbyor bas// kun nas de ma thag tu 'grub// dmar po ru ni bsgoms nas su// de nas cho ga bzhin du bya// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par// srid pa gsum
282a1(rgyud 'bum): po bsgom par bya/ / 'bad pas bsgrub bya snang byas te// slar yang de nyid du ni bzhug/ des ni sa gsum ma lus pa// sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs dang phyab/
282a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug drag po dang // dbang po dang ni 'dod lha sogs// yi ge phan tshun bskul ba yis// chung ma dang ni bcas te 'gugs// bcom ldan de ni shes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar gyi gtso bo yin//
282a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas dbus ma'i mtha' dang ldan// thig le sgra yis yang dag ma// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas par// dngos po bsgom pas bsgom byas na// gong bu dgug pa'i dam pa yin// b+ha ga yi
282a4(rgyud 'bum): ni dbus gyur par/ / ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom byas la// yi ge mi 'gyur rdzogs pa las// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa// rdo rje dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams// dpa' bo spyi gtsug zla phyed brgyan
282a5(rgyud 'bum): gshor dang thod pa'ang bsnams pa ste/ / dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// rlung dang me ni yang dag ldan// chu dang dbang chen mnan pa sde// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// 'bad de bsgrub
282a6(rgyud 'bum): bya dmigs na ni/ / khu ba dgug pa'i dam pa yin// rtsi yi ye shes las byung ba// sku mdog ser po kun tu 'bar// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// mgor skyes thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan//
282a7(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa dang // ka pA la ni phyag g.yon na// g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba dang // de bzhin du ni lcags kyu'i mchog/ rta zhal tshul du byas nas ni// chang 'gugs pa yi dam
282b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / ra yi ye shes las byung ba// 'od zer dmar po drag chen po// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// rgyun kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// lce spyang gi ni
282b2(rgyud 'bum): gdong can te/ / kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang // rdo rje de bzhin ral gri bsnams// khrag gis gang ba'i lus can sgom// 'bad de bsgrub bya dmigs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro//
282b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phra mos phug nas su// 'jib pa nyid du rab bsgoms na// khrag dgug pa yi dam pa zhes// sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes grags pa// rdo rje sems dpa'

282b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas/ / go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// rang snying zla ba'i dbus su ni// de nyid thams cad bkod nas su// de yi 'od zer las byung ba// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mchod nas ni// phyag
282b7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni 'di skad brjod/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du// byang
283a1(rgyud 'bum): chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ / ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa// de bzhin bla med byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed
283a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bskyed sdom pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te mchog tu gzung // bslab pa yi ni
283a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims dang / / dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung // rdo rje rigs mtho chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //

285a1(rgyud 'bum): snying kha kha dang ni/ / dpral steng spyi gtsug 'khor lo ni// dang po sngags tshogs byin gyis brlab// lte ba snying khar rnal 'byor ma// lce gnyis dpa' bos byin gyis

285a4(rgyud 'bum): snang ba med/ / kun mkhyen 'bras bu ster ba'o// me tog la ni gnas bsams te// gang la byin de rgyas 'debs 'gyur// dung dang zla 'dra'i 'od mdzad pa// ltung byed ma yi sbyor ba bsam//

285a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsgrub bya'i snying sugs te/ / de yi snying ni rtsa nas dbyung // 'gugs ma'i sngags bzlas 'gug par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyi ni// rlung mdog bsgrub bya rlung nang bsam// slar
285b1(rgyud 'bum): yang bdag dang bsgrub byin brlab/ / gcig tu gyur te gar mdzad ma'i// sngags zlos shing ni gar byas na// gar byed du ni 'jug par 'gyur// mchod pa rdo rje rab sbyor gyis// de nas las rnams kun
285b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / snying kha nyid dang de bzhin kha// mgo dang spyi gtsug mtshon cha ste// lte ba snying kha rnams su ni// dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya// dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste// gnyis pa pad+ma
285b3(rgyud 'bum): gar dbang rgyal/ / gsum pa rnam par snang mdzad de// de bzhin bzhi pa rta mchog rgyal// lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste// drug pa he ru kar ni brjod// slar yang lte ba snying kha dang // de bzhin kha dang mgo dang
285b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid dag ste// rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma// de bzhin rmongs ma bskyod ma ste// skrag ma dang ni gtum mo rnams// drug po 'di dag rin po che// pha rol phyin pa rnam pa drug
285b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dbang bskur bsgoms nas ni/ / phyi nang mchod pa brtsam par bya// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya// dam tshig ye shes gcig gyur pas// des 'di rdo rje can du
285b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / rnal 'byor 'di ni mchod chen dang // de bzhin sngags kyi dgod pa ste// de nas dpa' bo mchod shes nas// las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// sngags pas rang dgar dbye bya ste// phyin ci log tu
285b7(rgyud 'bum): nges par sbyar/ / tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i// las kyi mdog tu rnam par sgom// de nyid dbye bas phye nas ni// rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la// dga' ba chen po
286a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bsgrub bya/ / cho ga 'di yis bsgrubs na ni// lha dang lha min mir bcas 'grub// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog

286a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mgo ni ma la ya yul te// spyi gtsug dzA lan+d+ha ra yin// oM R+Yan rna ba g.yas pa ste// ar bu da ni rgyab phyogs yin// gnas kyi ming can rnam bzhi'o// go da ba ri rna g.yon te// rA me
286a5(rgyud 'bum): shA ri dbus su gsung / / mig ni de bi ko Ti ste// dpung pa mA la pa zhes brjod// 'di dag nye ba'i gnas yin te// gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyi ni// mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lor gnas// kA ma
286a6(rgyud 'bum): ru mchan khung de bzhin du/ / mu ma o trer rab tu grags// de dag zhing ni lte ba ni// tri sha ku ni zhes bya yin// sna yi rtse mo ko sa la// de dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod// kha ni ka ling ka yin te// mgrin
286a7(rgyud 'bum): ba laM pa ka ru brjod/ / tshan do ha zhes bya bar grags// snying kha kany+tsi zhes bya ste// chu so hi ma la zhes bya// nye ba'i rol sar brjod pa yin// gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyis ni/ sa spyod gsung gi
286b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lor gnas/ / mtshan ni yi dgas gnas pa ste// gri ha de ba bshang ba'i lam// de dag 'dun sar brjod pa ste// brla ni sau rASh+Ta zhes bya// byin pa gnyis ni gser gling ste// nye ba'i
286b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dun sa nyid yin no/ / sor mo rnams ni na ga ra// rkang pa'i bo la ni sin+d+hu ste// dur khrod ces ni bya bar brjod// mthe bong ma ru zhes bya ste// pus mo ku lu tA zhes brjod// nye ba'i dur khrod sa
286b3(rgyud 'bum): 'og ni/ / sku yi 'khor lor yang dag gnas// rang lus skyes pa'i yul 'di dag/ mkha' spyod ma yi gnas su brjod// phyi dang nang dang yang dag gnas// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis//

286b5(rgyud 'bum): bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// slar yang bsdus te bshad bya ba// de ni bdag
286b6(rgyud 'bum): gis bshad kyis nyon/ / pul+lI ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum mo ste// so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o// dzA lan+d+ha rar keng rus chen mo dang gtum pa'i mig can ma ste// de ni sgra dang
286b7(rgyud 'bum): spu 'bab pa'o/ / o Di ya nar keng rus dang 'od ldan ma ste// pags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// ar bu dar mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste/ sha 'bab pa ste/ gnas so// gor
287a1(rgyud 'bum): b+hA rir lha'i dgra dang dpa' mo'i blo ma ste/ thams cad du ni rgyus pa 'bab pa'o// rA me shA rar 'od dpag med pa dang mi'u thung ma ste/ rus pa'i 'phreng ba 'bab pa'o// de bi ko tsAr
287a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa'o// mA la bar rdo rje'i lus dang ljon grib ma ste/ snying phrug 'bab pa ste/ nye ba'i gnas so// de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/

287a4(rgyud 'bum): byed chen mo ste/ mkhris pa 'bab par grags pa ste/ zhing ngo // tri sha ku nir dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o// ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ste/

287a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ma'i srubs 'bab pa'o// nye ba'i rol sa'o// gsung gi 'khor lo sa spyod do// snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas/ pre ta pu rir ni stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/

291b1(rgyud 'bum): bskor na/ de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i ro'i lam phor la ba bla dang yung ba'i khu bas gang gi ming bris pa de de'i mod la bcings par 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi ras sam
291b2(rgyud 'bum): zla mtshan gyi ras la shing a sho ka'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/ de'i dbus su sngags pas cho ga bzhin yi ge e dang spel ba bris na mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par thams cad dang /

292a2(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba rnam par 'phrog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin// nam mkha' thams cad g.yogs byed pa// rang gi lus las spro bar

292a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / phyi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng ba ni// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs bri// 'di ni srung ba chen po ste// thams cad srung ba bla na med// rims dang nad dang dug dang ni// mkha' 'gro ma
292a5(rgyud 'bum): yis 'tshe ba dang / / gdon dang bdud dang log 'dren dang // gang yang lus srul la sogs pa// grib ma yang ni mi 'gong na// de yi lus lta smos ci dgos// zla gzugs lta bu'i yi ge blta// phyogs
292a6(rgyud 'bum): bcur rnam par 'byer bar byed/ / dkar po yis ni zhi 'gyur te// nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod// dmar po yis ni dbang byed de// de gnyis kyis ni nges par 'gugs// ser po sra nges par
292a7(rgyud 'bum): 'ching 'gyur te/ / dmag gi dpung ni 'ching bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o// dka' yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni//

292b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo lta bu bsam/ / de dbus pad+ma bri bya ba// bcu drug 'dab mas rnam par brgyan// de dbus pad chen 'dab brgyad pa// rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi mchog/ 'od zer dkar pos shing tu mdzes/

292b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas rang gis bri/ / yi dgas gos sam ro yi ni// bum pa skam po dag la yang // yi dgas sen rtsi khrag dang ni// de bzhin tsan dan dmar pos bri// 'khor lo de yi steng gnas te//

292b7(rgyud 'bum): cha ba gsum gyis lus byugs nas// spra tshil gyis kyang byug par bya// sangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas dbug/ seng ldeng me ni du mod la// blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun pasro// sgrub pa pa/
293a1(rgyud 'bum): yis brgya bzlas na// rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par ni// myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin// gro ga yi ni 'dab ma la// ro yi san

293a3(rgyud 'bum): du gdung bar bya/ / bsgrub bya mngon par gdung tsam gyis// lha dang lha min 'ong 'gyur na// sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos// yi dgas sen rtsi skyes pa yi// khrag dang gi wang bcas pa yis//

298a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni/ / bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin// de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni// yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad// tsam pa ka dang bkul/

298b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ / me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang // de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang // gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog/ 'di dag
298b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa bud med kyi/ / stobs rnams skyed pa'i sman yin te// bza' dang btung dang bzhib pa dang // bldag pa dang ni mur ba dang // sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang // bkru ba dang ni dril phyis
298b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bza' dang btung sogs de dag ni// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog/ de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar// sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams// skyes pa dang ni
298b4(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyang / / chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs// re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod// nag po dkar po sde bsangs te// 'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o// dgra
298b5(rgyud 'bum): dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste/ / khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin// dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa// 'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum// lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi// bdud rtsi yi ni
298b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po lnga/ / dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste// bdun po yal ga 'dab sogs bcas// skam sa dang ni rlan can yul// mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni// rno dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin// rang skyur
298b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni yung ba dag/ cha mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste// nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni// sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa blug/ thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub// ro na bska ba rnams dang yang // lhong
300a1(rgyud 'bum): tsher dkar po'i skyo ma sbyin/ / dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog/ skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms// cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de// 'bras bus byed par 'gyur ba yi// sngon du
300a2(rgyud 'bum): gser shog blugs pa yi/ / rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin// de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang // thal ba'am rdul ni blugs par bya// dron mo blugs na skra dkar skye// glang chen mgo yi bcud blangs la/
300a3(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i tshad du btso bar bya// de nas slar ni phyung nas su// arga'i shing gi khu ba blugs// tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms// tsan+d+ra dang ni sa ra na// sgog skya dang ni kair sa dang // a
300a4(rgyud 'bum): tra pa ti'i ru pa dang / / de bzhin du ni me tog gzung // bya gri dang ni kun du ru// sa ri ba dang sen mo dang // nor bu zla 'od na ge sar// thigs pa'i rgyan dang ka tam pa// tsam pa ki ri so ba dang //
300a5(rgyud 'bum): shi shu bil ba ut+pa la// rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru// 'dzag dang dngul chu kha chos bya// phyung na sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur// khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing blugs// skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa
300a6(rgyud 'bum): 'joms/ / rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed// rnon po thal sman bcas pa yis// bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms// lho skyes ma brnyings rdzas kyi las// bcad dang bcud len
300a7(rgyud 'bum): mar zhag bsngags/ / shi ri shi yi rtsas kyang gzug/ mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso// gsos te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam// tshad las 'das na
300b1(rgyud 'bum): drug tu 'gyur/ / de nas pags pa shun pa dang // me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs// kha dang bska dang mngar ba dang // tshwa dang sbyar ba la sogs pas// khyad par du ni btso bya ba// kha med rdza ra ni btso bar
300b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste// tshar gcad pa dang mnan pa dang // kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs// 'od ma dang ni bya rog mchu// de dag btso ba'i zhi kha rdza// btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni// yi ba dang
300b3(rgyud 'bum): khros dang 'thor ba dang / / bzhi pa chu ru 'bros pa'o// shin tu tshos par gyur na ni// 'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang // khrol khrol sgra ni sgrogs pa yin// btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang // de bzhin du
300b4(rgyud 'bum): ni brdung ba'o/ / sbrang rtsi btso dang bu bar btso// glang chen btso dang seng ger btso// rnon por byas te btso bar bya// mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur// blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis// rim gyis
300b5(rgyud 'bum): rim gyis mnye bar bya/ / cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni// sbyar nas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la// gi ri kar ni'i phye ma ni// lugs las bzlog pa'i lam btsugs la/
300b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso// du ru ka dang ba li ka/ tsakra mar de'i sa bon dang // ba la ta shi kru yi 'bras// pa ri tsa ta ku su ma// ut+pal ma li ka sa bon// bar dar rus pa ka si dang // si ri

301a1(rgyud 'bum): @bcud ni drangs te thugs/ / 'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya// gzhan dunam yang ma yin no// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// lhang cher dngul
301a2(rgyud 'bum): chu shing chen ni/ / de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur// bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni// byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur// lha min rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yi bar// stobs ldan bzung ba
301a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'gyur/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad dang ldan// dngul chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang // sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal pa'i gzugs// chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi// sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang /
301a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin chang dang chang min dri// cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang // bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing // bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang // yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring // mig ni zangs ltar
301a5(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba ste/ / stobs ldan sngo bsangs nu ma med// rked pa'i 'khyud par sngar bshad dang // sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan// sgrub po dbang ba'i yon tan byed// de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te//
301a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag mkhrang // stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin// de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni// rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de// rnon po dang ni ljang tsher la// thun mong du ni brten nas su// !
301a7(rgyud 'bum): nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur/ / ro ni kha dang bska bar 'gyur// de nas rang sbyar nang du ni// lci bas btsos na nyes pa 'byang // de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang // phag gi zhag dang tshil dang khrag/
301b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byung // slar yang tsu ra dza ti nA// tshe dang dmar po nyid dang ni// pin dza ra dang tsam pa dang // smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu gcig/ de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu/
301b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyes na nyes pa zad par 'gyur// de nas ma he'i rmig par ni// char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la// zangs kyi phye dang sman phye ma// sman phye mar thad blugs shing btso// tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang
301b3(rgyud 'bum): du bzhug/ de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin// de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis// sbyangs nas snum zhing stobs ldan la// slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni// mnyes pas snum zhing rtsub par 'gyur//

301b7(rgyud 'bum): yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba/ / rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang // 'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang // mtshon cha ral gri'i shugs 'dra ba// kang+ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra// nyes pa tshar gcod pa la
302a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags/ / gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la// bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung // bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te// phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin// dngul chur rten
302a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dri ma ni/ / de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// sbyang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang // rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o// de nas lhang tsher rdul phye dang // bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs// pan du zhes
302a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'i phye ma ni/ / skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung // lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi// cho ga yis ni so sor bcing // de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya// bzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni// chu yi shing la

302b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ni ma smin dang / / ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching // nyes pa dag ni brgyar ldan pas// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'// sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin// de

302b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lam/ / nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste// de dang de nas sbyin par bya// de ltar yul dang dus dang ni// rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag/ yid gzhung la sogs 'phel byed yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang

302b7(rgyud 'bum): len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa po
303a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams nyon/ / bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab// ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// 'di ni
303a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la// brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul du gnas pa ma mo ste// sin d+hu dang ni na ga
303a3(rgyud 'bum): ra/ / rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no// lam pa ka dang sau raSh+Ta ra// gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin// kha ba'i ri dang kany+dzi na// gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya// pAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang /
303a4(rgyud 'bum): gri ha de ba tA dag na// lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas// ka ling ka dang ko sa lar// brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen pa// pra ta pu ri zhes bya dang // tri sha ku nir sbom dbang phyug/ khaN+Da ni ha zhes bya
303a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / pul+lI ra dang dzA lan+d+ha ra// tsaN+Da li yi bud med gnas// o tra dang ni kA ma ru'i// yul du bu mo mdzes ma ste// de bI ko Ta zhes bya dang // rA me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod// go dA ba ri ar bu dar//
303a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// oMrlan yang ni de bzhin no// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang // dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste// kun kyang 'dod pa'i
303a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can ma/ / yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad
303b1(rgyud 'bum): par dang / / zhing skyong 'jig pa chen po yi// ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni// gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang // gang du sgrub pa pos thos na// the tsom med par 'grub 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad mdor
303b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdus te/ / gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'o// gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka'
303b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa// legs so legs so lha mo che// sgyu ma chen por rang 'gro ba// bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// aT+TA he se'i yul gnas pa// zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags
303b4(rgyud 'bum): bste/ / rgyal po'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// ka te ba yi shing la rten// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la stobs po che/

303b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug gsol ba mo/ / zhing der gnas par grags pa ste// ta la'i shing la brten te gnas// gyen du 'bar sgra zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che// de bI ko Ti rin mo che// stobs po che yi sa gnas/
304a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung // lha mo lag na mdung can te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ gnas der lha mo drag chen mo// b+ha Ta'i shing la brten te gnas// k+She tra pA la lus chen po/

304a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de// stobs chen pha rol gnon po mo// glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i// zhing skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o// kha che'i yul du ba glang rna// gtum pa'i skye gnas las

305a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung / / lha mo dbyig pa shag ti thogs// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs

305a3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas/ / bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo che// shal ma li yi shing la gnas// bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po// tsa ri Da yi

305a6(rgyud 'bum): / sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i gzugs// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de// a sho ka yi shing rten gnas// dza lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni// zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung /
305a7(rgyud 'bum): lag na zangs kyi phyar he thogs// dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo// gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo// gser shing la ni brten te gnas// skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che// bdud rnams
305b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'jigs par byed/ / k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma// drag cing sngo la stobs chen la// ral gri lag thogs lha mo che// dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo// lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar// sa la'i
305b2(rgyud 'bum): shing la brten te gnas/ / lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// ma ya pu rer 'dod ma ste// 'jigs pa'i gdong gi skye gnas byung // rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs// sgrub po
305b3(rgyud 'bum): / rnams la stobs ster ba// gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste// 'byung ba'i shing la brten te gnas// der gnas 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// pu ta nar ni a ma ke/
305b4(rgyud 'bum): dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs// sems can thams cad dbang byed ma// da ru'i shing la brten te gnas// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed//
305b5(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// rgyal po'i khab tu dza nas// khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung // rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan// pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar
305b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// dzi li'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed// rna chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni// rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas// bod yul du ni lhan skyes te// rang byung gi ni skye
305b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas byung / / chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs// zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// brag gi khrim la brten te gnas// longs spyod ces bya'i dpa'
306a1(rgyud 'bum): bo che/ k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o// mo la ber ni dbang bskur ma// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya thogs// sgrub po la rtag tu brtse// grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster// zhing
306a2(rgyud 'bum): der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ / mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas// skyes bu'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i// zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod// zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang // dpa' bo rnams ni
306a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ster/ / rtag tu mtshan mo 'dus par byed// mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i// dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te// sgrub pa po yi las rnams ni// thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tsom
306a4(rgyud 'bum): med/ / de nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i// mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa de bzhin du// mar me dri yi khyad par dang // gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod// sha rlon dang ni nya la
306a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog/ g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te// g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri

306b1(rgyud 'bum): mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo// nag sboms dang ni rnal 'byor mo// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag tu ljang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/
306b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma// thod 'phreng 'phreng can kha T+wAM ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can// rdo rje
306b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzhu can ma/ / de nyid chen mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga// las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen

307a1(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer ri yi rtse mo ru// 'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par// 'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster// gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing // sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la//

307a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad/ / sgrub pa po 'is cho ga bzhin bya// me la gnas pa'i sa bon ni// rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba// spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la// sa yi steng du mchod par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par//

307b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas nges pa dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang // lha rnams thams cad

307b7(rgyud 'bum): dgas gtso/ / sreg byed bden bral rlung gi lha// rim pa gsum pa yi'o// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang // phur bu dang ni pa sangs dang // spen pa dang ni ra hU la//
308a1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa bzhi pa yi'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du// ru tre skem byed sgo bzhir ro// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung po chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro ma

308a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad/ / gar dang ldan zhing stag lpags bsnabs// spyan gsum shing tu gsal ba'i gzugs// rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum// khrag gang ba yi gshor dang bcas// mda' dang
308a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhu ni de bzhin te/ / g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyar// shar du mkha' 'gro ma bri ste// lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma// 'jib byed lha mo nub tu bri// byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o// lha mo phag mo

308b1(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // kha nAM Da ru de bzhin no// gzhon nu ma ni hi las byung // kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi pa// mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan

308b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar lag pa bzhi pa ste/ / pad+ma dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin gzhan ni mda' gzhu'o// tshogs kyi dbang mo gaM las byung // sngo bsangs mdog sde lag bzhi ma// mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang /

308b5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid// thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan pa ste// ro yi stan bzhugs

308b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ / mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan// mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog/ lho ru ru tra bri bya ste// du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi// rtse gsum
309a1(rgyud 'bum): mdung dang thod pa dang / / zhags pa dang ni wang 'phreng thogs// nub tu skem byed zi bya ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// shaka'i dang ni dbyug pa dang // dpa' bo'i thong pa
309a2(rgyud 'bum): bgrang 'phreng thogs/ / dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po blang chen zhon pa ste// mdog ser lag pa
309a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang ldan/ / rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// me ni lug gi stan la zhon// kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa// me thab nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o//
309a4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje ma he'i stan la zhon// kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa// dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// bden bral mi ro'i stan bzhugs pa// kha dog ljang ku lag bzhi pa//

309a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni sha ba'i stan la bzhugs// du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa// ba dan dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// lus ngan gter gyi stan la gnas// kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/
309a7(rgyud 'bum): / rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs// lag gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang // rang rang dam tshig las byung zhing // rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs chen po// rang rang stan la gnas
309b1(rgyud 'bum): par bsam/ / ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma// 'byung po'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi// pho nya'i sgrub thabs de nas bshad// so sor stobs kyis tshar gyis tshar bcad pa//
309b2(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// longs spyod la ga'i sgrub pa pos// pho nya'i las ni brtsam par bya// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms byas te// sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis//

310a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bsres nas su/ / steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yi dgas sen rtsi mar chen dang // sha chen gyis ni bdug par bya// de la dri yis

310a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni bdug par bya/ / sha dang nya shaM btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor mo sbyin// rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yi// mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/

310b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni ster 'gyur te/ / zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya// 'dod la dga' ba'i dga' byed ma// gal te grub par ma gyur na// drag mo yi ni sa bon gyis// gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya//
310b3(rgyud 'bum): sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis// mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gem// rtag tu sems can don brtson pas// 'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya// nyon cig lha mo shes rab che// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro

311a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gos ni gyon par bri/ / g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs bya
311a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis
