311b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po khyi ni du ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni
311b2(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar byed/ / bzhi par mdun du 'dug nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smras// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po
311b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ / de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gser srang byed phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis//
311b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig byed ma yi mgo 'gems so// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya// ba glang la sogs ko ba ni// brkyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'drir gzhug/ lus ni skal gyis brgyan pa ste/
311b5(rgyud 'bum): kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis brdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha ha ra dgod cing rnam par gtsigs// khrag gis
311b6(rgyud 'bum): maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ / dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal
311b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos/ / 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur to// bzhi pa la ni mdun du
312a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM krum phuMHphuHswA hA/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni brjod par
312a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'od
312a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod po ni khrid de shog/ gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong //
312a4(rgyud 'bum): lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung // ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes
312a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ru/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mnan te brgyar ni bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na//
312a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo'i dbus su bdug nas ni// dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// kra zhes bya dang gsod pa dang // hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub
312a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ / thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang // gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// ba la ka nag po yi shing // me sbar ba yi dbus su ni//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi ma'i phyed na hUM zhes pa// brjod de sbyin sreg byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur bas// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//
312b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas shang dkar sgrub pa'i thabs// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang // chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdor sgrub// dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// tshon gyis dkyil
312b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri bar bya/ / sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu// dpa' bo ya nI ras la bri// gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul du bya// sku mdog sngon po glang la non/
312b4(rgyud 'bum): lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// po mtshan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs// ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// zhal ba ni pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par klubs/
312b5(rgyud 'bum): d+h+r-i ga dang thod pa nyid// de bzhin gzhan ni gshor dang ldan// bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste// 'byeng po kun la gtor ma sbyin// sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su// 'bum
312b6(rgyud 'bum): dubazlas par bsgrub par bya/ / oM ka pA la mA la o l-i kri ta shri hUM hUM/ A gats+tsha A bats+tsha ru drA ya swA hA/ spyan drangs pa'i sngags so// oM UHru ra hUM hUM swA hA/ 'bum du bzlas pas
312b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / gal te grub par ma gyur na// de nas de ni bsreg par bya// grub nas bye ba thams cad ni// byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ de nas yang dag bshad
313a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / nor lha yi ni sgrub pa'i thabs// ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram// 'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu// sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bsgrub
313a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sor ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu// khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya// kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// 'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams// thod pa pad+ma daM
313a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ni/ / rin chen gyi ni cod pan dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bshang gci dang ni khu ba khrag/ mchod pa'i nyid du sbyin bya zhing // mi yi sha yis bdug byas na// dngos grub
313a4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed par 'gyur/ / oM AHbadz+ra nA rA ya Na hUM hUM swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM ma tsakra sA d+hA a sarba a su ra da ma na hUM swA hA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis// lha ma yin ni kun
313a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgor/ / 'jug pa'i chus dang ldan 'gyur zhing // sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing // rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur// cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid
313a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste// chu yi 'gram ni dben pa dang // khyad par pad+mo'i tshal du sgrub// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas//
313a7(rgyud 'bum): gi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par brgyan// pad+ma dang ni bzang 'phreng dang // dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams// sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis// bris sku dag ni
313b1(rgyud 'bum): dmigs nas su/ / yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni// gur kum tsan dan la sogs pa// dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing // rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis// mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim de dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus
313b2(rgyud 'bum): / su sbyin par bya// oM brah+ma gats+tsha hUM AHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM b+hur+N+Na bsta ta bi dru ba re Nu bArgo de ba si d+hi ma hi d+hi yo yon pra tso da ya ta/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// zhi ba dang
313b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyas pa dang / / dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // nor bskyod pa dang mngon spyod sogs// las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te// bzlas dang sbyin sreg kun gyis 'grub// khyed la yang dag bshad
313b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs// ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar// bsgom pa dag pa byas nas ni// blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas// 'bad
313b5(rgyud 'bum): de bris sku dmigs par bya/ / kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i thor tsugs dag dang ldan// 'od zer dmar po
313b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar zhing 'khrug/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par bri// dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang // mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te// kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang // khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang // de bzhin
313b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ral gri ste/ / gzhan yang sha chen thong ba bsnams// mu sun di dang ba dan gsum// shag ti dang ni bcu gnyis so// oM a maM lo g+ha sid+d+ha sar+b+ba r+tha ma sA d+ha ya hUM hUM dzaHdzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i
314a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / oM aHga hUM swA hA/ bzlas pa'i sngags so// stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te// de nas las ni brtsam par bya// lan cig bzlas nas thig le dag/ sngags pas
314a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na skal bzang 'gyur/ / rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste// dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang // 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar// 'gyur ba 'di
314a3(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med/ / cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis// ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod// oM sarba ti thi nak+Sha tra gra he mang+ga l+ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ gza'
314a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sngags so/ / oM zhes bya ba dang po ste// swA hA'i mtha' can byin brlabs ces// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
314a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//
314a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad par dang // lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags// de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te/
314a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa// rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso// bcu
314b1(rgyud 'bum): dang gnyis ni de bzhin du/ / dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de// yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis// nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni myur dang ring ba dag/ yan lag mtshan ma nyid dang ni// gang
314b2(rgyud 'bum): zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ / 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas// dbugs ni rnam par nor gyur na// lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi// snga dror si ta'i dus su// de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya// swa
314b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mig gi gnas dang ni/ / 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa// lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang // snying kha'i dra ba lte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// chu so dang ni
314b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dag dang / / mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing gyur pa yi// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru// 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni// 'khor los dus kyi bdag
314b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid brtsi/ / sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu// gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa// yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni// zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru// bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya//
314b6(rgyud 'bum): lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag/ dus kyi grangs su bstan pa dang // nyin zhag dag ni bco brgyad du// de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod// nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'// gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis dang ni
314b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing // de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni// rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// 'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no// gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis
315a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba bzhi dang ni/ / nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni// lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o// gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig
315a2(rgyud 'bum): tu/ / sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag/ lo gcig bzla ba dgu dang ni// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag las ni// mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyun ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni//
315a3(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin zhag ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tshe'o// gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma dgu
315a4(rgyud 'bum): las mi 'tsho zhes/ / mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de// lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni// nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las// 'tsho
315a5(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur de yi ni/ / tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin// gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun// lo gcig na ni gdon mi za// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas
315a6(rgyud 'bum): nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag/ de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag/ zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do// gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu na//
315a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas de yi ma tshad ni// zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni// bco brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar// gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyun ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nyin na ga nyi ma
315b1(rgyud 'bum): grangs su ni/ / de yi dbus ni bshar pa yin// gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru// dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag/ ji srid 'tsho ba bshad par bya// zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za//
315b2(rgyud 'bum): gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni// rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni// de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig/ nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba// zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o// /
315b3(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na// zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag ste// nyin zhag nyi shu gsum gyi bar// sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyun// zla ba bzhi dang
315b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma ni/ / dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang // zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni// bcu gcig dag las mi 'tshe'o// nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgyu na// zla ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o// de
315b5(rgyud 'bum): las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i/ / grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni// bar bar gyis ni bstan pa yin// cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du// bar bar nyi ma gsal bar
315b6(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus// shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa// khams snyoms pa yi lus la ni// de dag blta zhing yid
315b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes bya/ / sgon steng du 'bab pa yi// sna yi bar shaM chad gyur na// nyin sag bdun gyis the tsom med// cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas// de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las// mig gi chu ni chang gyur na/
316a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma ldan 'chi bar 'gyur// cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba// steng du bltas te 'gre ba las// rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi// ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni// nyi ma zhag gcig las
316a2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'tsho'o/ / cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi// gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chi// cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas//
316a3(rgyud 'bum): lce yi skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi// de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi// steng 'og tu ni 'thams gyur na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren//
316a4(rgyud 'bum): srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni// mgrin pa'i glo na gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyis// nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tshe'o// cha shas bco lnga
316a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ / steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la// brang gi dra ba zhos gyur na// zla phyed na ni gdon mi za// cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa// sen mo'i khrag ni
316a6(rgyud 'bum): med gyur na/ / nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal// slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni// gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhin// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za// cha shas bco
316a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad gnas pa yi/ / byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi// bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas// chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas//
316b1(rgyud 'bum): de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi// pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug/ mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni//
316b2(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyis 'tsho 'gyur the tsom med// re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la// bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag/ lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad
316b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / zla ba la sogs go rims bzhin// rim gyis rim gyis dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni// bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang
316b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor bar/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
316b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// / sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang // rtsa ni gang bar gnas pa yi// yon tan skyon
316b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs ji ltar blta/ / de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te// ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// bshad kyis lha mo mnyan
316b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyis/ / sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la// phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya// gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i// pad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/ slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste/
317a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa'o// cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang // go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nas ni// kun da zla 'dra rtag tu dag/ rnam
317a2(rgyud 'bum): shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni/ / lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog/ rten du gyur pa'i pad+ma gang // zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs// gong bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod//
317a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya// dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi// gzhan du na ni med par 'gyur// dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na// dug dang rim kyis tsha ba 'phrog
317a4(rgyud 'bum): bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na/ / sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur// 'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur// rnam shes dbrog pa'i cho ga dang // gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad
317a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya// gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi dbus su me yis ni// yang dang
317a6(rgyud 'bum): yang du dbye bar bya/ / A li kA lir ldan pa yi// sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du// 'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya// 'byung ba ye shes sa bon bya// bsnun dang
317a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bsam par byed/ / 'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la// me tog lta bur bsnun par bya// rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te// bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya// 'jug pa 'byung bar mtshon bya ste/
317b1(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas phyi rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste//
317b2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo cha shas ldan par bya// bsgrub bya'i snying khar zhugs nas ni// rlung dang me yis 'bar ba dag/ de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni// lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug/ bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus
317b3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / 'og gi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// ji srid zad par byas pa ru// de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang // rims la sogs pas
317b4(rgyud 'bum): ma phog par/ / gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no// de nas gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bcings
317b5(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya// khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni// rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste// rim gyis sbyor bas phye nas su// cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis// sngags pa gzhan gyi
317b6(rgyud 'bum): lus la 'jug/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// rang gis lus la sbyar bar 'dod// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis// mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang //
317b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod// gang gis ring nas thos gyur pa// de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi// bsam pa rjes su shes par bya// sgom dang
318a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ / sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur// gang gi lam nas bsams na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// 'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par// zhugs
318a2(rgyud 'bum): te nyan pa gnyis su ni/ / 'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni// me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor// rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni// shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na// zla drug tsam gyis nges
318a3(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes mig gis mthong gyur pa// shin tu ring na gnas pa yang // sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong //
318a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan dang ma bstan gang ci rang rung // de kun nga yis yang dag bshad// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang // gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba//
318a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha// thig ler gzugs can mtho ris te// steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni// myur du 'gro bar
318a6(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ / sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha// gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo las yi dgas te// de
318a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o/ / chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung // thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro// sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod
318b1(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi/ / sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya// de la 'og gi sgo ru ni// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu min sgo la ni// me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// dbugs
318b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bum pa can du sgom/ / lus ni rlung gi mdog tu sde// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can// rlung gi sa bon rtsa bar te// thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon
318b3(rgyud 'bum): drang bar bya/ / 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra dang sgra yis 'phul bar byed// dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur// lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni// dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// /
318b4(rgyud 'bum): de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ni// mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i// sngo chen bde ba phun sum tshogs// sgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la// steng gi rtsa ba
318b5(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya/ / chu dang skya reng ldan pa dang / g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la// zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste// dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog/ tshi ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// brnyings dang smin
318b6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'joms par byed/ / lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis// nam mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya// rlung dang me yi bye brag gis// rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te// yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas/
318b7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing // mkha' 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su// lha yi lus kyis kun tu rtse// ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar// de srid nam mkha' gnas par 'gyur// slar yang lugs
319a1(rgyud 'bum): las bzlog pa yis/ / kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bsam// bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar na ni// rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed// rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba// rlung gi dkyil
319a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khrug pa ltar/ / rang gi kha nas byung nas su// bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par bya// nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu// 'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin// rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi// lus
319a3(rgyud 'bum): la thim par gyur pa dang / / de yi sems ni bzung nas su// bdag la gzhug ste me la ni// bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas// de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur// tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan
319a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang // lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas gos
319a5(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur zhing / / srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro// ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi// pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba// de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni// ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro//
319a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rjen
319a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro las/ gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/
319b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag bshad par bya// g.yas kyi mdun la 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid do// sor mo lar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// g+ho b+h+ya/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog
319b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// gu g+hu/ mthe bong 'ching bar byed pa ni// 'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu b+hu/ lag par rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu g+hu/
319b3(rgyud 'bum): sna rtser sbyor mo rdeb pa ni// thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// daMSh+TA/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// gan d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa/
319b4(rgyud 'bum): yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yi sa lce ni 'tshir byed pa// 'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// b+hAk+She yo/ lag pa rtsal 'ju byed pa'o// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dri
319b5(rgyud 'bum): ra te/ lag pa snying khang med byed ni// da ni nga yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsa ba ta ba ta/ sna rtsa khu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shU n+ya tA/ lag pa brkyang ste lhor rdeb na// phun sum
319b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan par yod ces pa'o/ / tri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na// kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o// tsaN+Da li ka/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na// zhe gnag gtum la drag po'o// nI la dan ta ba
319b7(rgyud 'bum): ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni nga lnga ston// a naM ga yu ta/ lce ni 'grel bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya'o// dur ga ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// tshes grangs
320a1(rgyud 'bum): shes par 'dod pa'o/ / ta ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan du ni mdun du reg
320a2(rgyud 'bum): gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o// sa mtshal/ 'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor
320a3(rgyud 'bum): zas byin zhes bya ba'o/ / dzi rna ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// da ltar grogs la 'dong zhes pa'o// sal+la ta/ mthe bong gis ni srin lag gsal// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o// som/
320a4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong khro bo gza' la sogs// sUr+ya/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
320a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
320a6(rgyud 'bum): lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de// glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas// e baM si ta ya/ ru Na ni b+ha dza ni te ma d+hu ma/ ga ma a ga ma d+ha d+ha ma ya ni sa/ ni ga ma sA/ ri gA mi b+hu pa ti si re re sa ri
320a7(rgyud 'bum): dris ni sa ma d+h+ya ma sar sru nes ni/ ra b+ha ga ma ya/ d+ha mA d+ha mA/ sa ra pa pA ma a a pa pA ang+ga mi te/ mo zhes bya'o// shar du me'o// gshin rjer ni bre'o// nub tu ni ma'o// byang du ni ku'o//
320b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su d+ha sa'o// bden bral du ni ma ka'o// rlung mtshams su ni kun na'o// dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o// a ni rkur po'o// a ni zla ba la skyes pa'o// u ni lha'i bla ma'i'o// e ni pa wa sangs
320b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi'o/ / o ni nyi ma'i bu'i'o// a ni gza'i bdag po ri bong can no// a ni nyi ma'o// gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga las// zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya// zla ba ka ka ra la dbang // nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste//
320b3(rgyud 'bum): gara' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa// rA si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod// skad gshong 'khor lo khyed kyis bshad// skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi// bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol
320b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs pa// gang gis 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya// zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang // skar ma dang ni dus dang ldan// gdon dang nad ni de
320b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / sbrang gshong rA si tshad ma ni// gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod// pa tra yi ni nyi ma la// dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba yi// gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni// rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa// de ni
320b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'chi dus yin/ / sus kyang bskyab par mi nus so// khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la// lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang // smyo zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya// de bzhin
320b7(rgyud 'bum): dgun zla 'bring po yi/ / gza' lhag dang ni skar ma ldan// nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni// dgongs mo 'chi 'gyur the tsom med// dgun zla tha chung lha mo che// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni gza'
321a1(rgyud 'bum): lhag bcas pa la/ / 'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa// nyi ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni pa wa sangs
321a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzom zhing / / nyi ma snga dro'i dus la ni// karka thar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la// skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni spen par ldan pa la// seng ge'i mi ni 'chi
321a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la// skar ma nag par ldan pa dang // gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni// skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni// bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi
321a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ / skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang // gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni// srang gi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la// nag pa dang ni mig dmar la// sdig pa'i mi ni 'chi bar
321a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dbyar zla tha chung tshes dgu la// skar ma gro bzhin ldan pa dang // gzhu yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de dag nges par ldan gyur na// 'chi 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad// ston zla ra ba'i
321a6(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa la/ / skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sngon zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la// skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar
321a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa la/ / bum pa'i mi ni zad du 'gro// ston zla tha chung sgyu ma chen// nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la// skar ma nam gru ldan pa dang // bza' ni spen par bcas pa la// nya yi mi ni 'chi bar
321b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sngon du skye dus shes bya ste// phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya// gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag/ thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur// skye dus shin tu mnyam bzhag ste// zhi dang drag po dpyad
321b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / tshe dang 'tsho dus la sogs pa// de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// /
321b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum
321b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// A li kA li mnyam byas la// sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya// dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po
321b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / bltas te ming ni gzung bar bya// cha shas ldan la snying stobs can// de yi rigs ni shes par bya// mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang // nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'//
321b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams// de yi rigs su rab tu grags// lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni// sngags rnams thams cad de las skyes// skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma// des na ma
321b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar brjod/ / a yig dang ni de bzhin A// ka tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan// ta pa dang ni ya sha ste// sde dgu yi ni yi ge'o// i dang slar yang lha mo I// de bzhin gzhan yang kha tsha Tha/
322a1(rgyud 'bum): @tha ba dang ni ra Sha nyid// sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod// u dang lha mo de bzhin U// gA dza Da dang yang dag ldan// da ba dang ni la sa ste// de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin//
322a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge e dang de bzhin aM// de bzhin slar yang b+ha dz+nya D+ha// d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin// 'di dag sde tshan ban pa yin// oM yig dang ni oM yig dang // oM zhes bya dang tsheg drag bcas// slar
322a3(rgyud 'bum): yang nganya Na na ma/ / 'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin// kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang // lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya// de dag skye bo thams cad kyi// skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas// yi ge bcu
322a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sgyu 'phrul che/ / mtsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod// de dag rI sA zhes bya ba// skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis// de bzhin 'og dang steng du blta// brtan pa nyid
322a5(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yo ba nyid/ / gnyis po gnyis su brjod pa yin// brkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste// ring dang thung dang pham dang rgyal// de las stang gi rgyal ba ste// 'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya// rgyu
322a6(rgyud 'bum): par de ni 'gro ba yi/ / gza' dang rA si skar ma rnams// nyi ma la ni gnas ti 'char// rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod// dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan// thams cad rA sir shes par bya//
322a7(rgyud 'bum): karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra// de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang // cha shas drug dang yang dag ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang // khyu mchog dang ni bum par
322b1(rgyud 'bum): / bcas// cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// zhwa dang lug dang de bzhin du// gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dag/ cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// snga ma bzhin du
322b2(rgyud 'bum): 'char bar 'gyur/ / slar yang lhas dang bcas pa yi// gza' rnams 'char ba bshad par bya// 'bras bu'i ming dang ldan par bya// ltas chen 'byung ba mnyan par gyis// nag mo dang / gtsig
322b3(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / rga las 'das ma dang / log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag mo'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan
322b4(rgyud 'bum): kyigyis mi thub ma dang / nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang ba ma dang / sum cu'i dbang mo dang
322b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'jig byed ma dang / lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni// g+has chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ster// nyes 'gyur du ni byas nas su//
322b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan// lhas ni lhag ma bzung nas su// ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya// nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang // drag mo'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid// nag po ma dang
322b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ma dang / / drag mo sum cu'i dbang mo dang // 'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma// bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grags// bag ma len dang bkra shis dang // grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa dang //
323a1(rgyud 'bum): lam du spag dang 'thab mo dang // chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs// lhaltas de las ni 'bras med pas// dge ba'i las rnams mi bya ste// rigs de rnams la sgyu mche//
323a2(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya// dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na// drag mo'i las kyis smos ci dgos// lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni// phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste// phyi dang nang du bcas pa yi//
323a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur// gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya// dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang // rA si nyid du shes par bya// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin du// skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs
323a4(rgyud 'bum): su blta/ / phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par// 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// g.yo ba 'char la g.yo ba'i las// brtan pa la ni mi g.yo bar// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste// phyi dang nang du
323a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pas gsal/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
323a6(rgyud 'bum): po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gapa' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// da ni gza' dang skar ma ru// bcas pa'i rgyu ba
323a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad kyis nyon/ / nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni// thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la// bya ba ci yang mi 'grub bo// zla ba yi ni bzhi dang drug/ mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga// gza' lhag gnyis dang
323b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la/ / gdon mi za bar 'jom par 'gyur// bla mas dang po gsum pa la// 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// ngan spong gi ni gnyis pa dang // bdun pa la ni shes par bya// ngal ba yi ni dang
323b2(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed// rigs de dag gi 'chi ba yi// dus ni yongs su chad par bstan// de dag thun mong mtshan nyid de// rnal 'byor pa yis gzhan bshad nyon// lnga nas nyi shu lnga yi
323b3(rgyud 'bum): bar/ / 'di dag tu ni brjod bya ste// de las bcu gsum gyi bar du// re re spel bar bya// dgun zla tha chung nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug/ gsum zung zla lhag tshes phyogs mda' yon tan/
323b4(rgyud 'bum): thig le de dag gi ni 'tsho ba yang dag bshad pa yin// lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni// bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni// de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya// de nas
323b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos shes bya ba/ / gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya// zla ba gang la gnas pa yi// dang po skar ma bgrang bar bya// nyi ma yi ni chu tshod dag/ ji snyed 'das pa de snyed ni// zla bar gnas
323b6(rgyud 'bum): skabs rgyu ba'i phyir/ / de ni drug cur bsgyur bar bya// slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan// drug cu ru ni bsgyur bas na// mda' dang sreg byed ro ya ni// dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad// bcu gnyis
323b7(rgyud 'bum): dag gi nang nas ni/ / lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya// lhag ma'i cha shas de yi ni// sgyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis// lhag ma'i chu tshod du ni brjod//
324a1(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i zla ba'i bar gnas pa// de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur// gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste// gsum pa 'chi ste gsod par 'gyur// bzhi pa rgod de tshem par 'gyur//
324a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa nor te nyams par 'gyur// drug pa rims te lus 'jig 'gyur// bdun pa las ni dga' ba ste// tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur// brgyad pa 'jig rten rlag par 'gyur// zla ba dgu par gnas
324a3(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur// bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing // sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur// bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung // bcu gnyis pa ni longs
324a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod de/ / bde ba chen pos brgyal bar 'gyur// lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis// zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo
324a5(rgyud 'bum): rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
324a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// skad gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa// de rnams dbye ba ci 'dra dang // dus kyi grangs ni
324a7(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin gsungs/ / rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag/ 'di la bdag ni the tshom skyes// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dus kyi bgrang
324b1(rgyud 'bum): ba lus med cing / / thams cad du ni thams cad gnas// dngos po kun la khyab pa ste// lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye// dus nyid dus ni med pa dang // 'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min//
324b2(rgyud 'bum): bden pa dang ni brdzun pa min// lha mo khyod kyis sngar bshad pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid// gang zhig khyed kyis bshad pa de// don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba// lus las
324b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das shing dri med pa/ / rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs// skye bo kun la sman slad du// dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nad med rlung dang bral
324b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang // ran par za zhing chung bzhin rgyu// de yi mig ni btsums pa ste// mig btsums drug la cha shas ni// gcig ces bya bar brjod pa yin// yud tsam
324b5(rgyud 'bum): drug ni skad cig ste/ / skad cig drug ni thang cig yin// thang cig drug ni cung zad yin// dus kyi go rims bya ba 'dis// sum cu tham par bsgyur ba la// yi ge lci ba'i dus zhes brjod// yug cig lci ba
324b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu la ni/ / srog gcig ces bya'i dus su bshad// de ni bcu gsum bsgyur ba las// de yang gnyis su bsgyur ba ni// srang gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// srang ni drug cu tham pa la// chu tshod gcig tu
324b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhed pa yin/ / de brgyad thun cig ces bya'o// de bzhi las ni nyin gcig go// nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa la// mtshan mo'ang de dang mnyam par bshad// chu srin nas ni sbal ba'i bar// nyi ma 'phel
325a1(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa ste/ / lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyi// nyin re bzhin ni spel bar bya// chu srin las ni 'das nas su// mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'bri// tshad ma de dag
325a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i phyir/ / zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la// snod ni dbang du sor brgyad dang // rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa// legs pa nyid du brdung bar bya// gser ni 'ol sa sum cu las// sor drug pa
325a3(rgyud 'bum): yi tshad tsam du/ / thur ma legs par brdungs nas ni// thur ma de yis bu ga ni// zangs ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbug/ chu ni rnyog ma med pa las// srang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya// srang 'dis chu
325a4(rgyud 'bum): tshod tshad yin te/ / skye bo rnams la phan phyir bshad// chu tshod de ni yud tsam ste// thun phyed dang ni thun gcig dang // nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni// rim bzhin zla phyed zla bar spel// zla ba
325a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni dus yin te/ / de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod// nyi ma 'gro ldog gnyis la ni// lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
325a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug
325a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal// de bzhin du ni nab so dang // me bzhi lha mtshams de
325b1(rgyud 'bum): / bzhin du// nam gru sa ri gro bzhin bcas// lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin// snar ma gre dang chu stod dang // khrums stod dang ni bra nye dang // lag dang mgo dang chu smad dang // khrums smad mi yi
325b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs yin no/ / smin drug dang ni mchu dang ni// mon gru dang ni mon gre dang // skag dang nag pa snron dang ni// sa ga dang ni snabs rnams ni// srin po yi ni rigs yin par// bzhin mdzes ma ni
325b3(rgyud 'bum): khyod la bshad/ / smin drug rgyal ni ra yin te// mgo dang snar ma klu yin no// lag dang snrubs ni khyi yin te// lha mtshams nab so phag gi rigs// mchu dang gre ni bya ba'o// skag ni byi lar
325b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa ste/ / nag pa sa ka stag yin no// dbo dang khrums stong gnyis po ni// khyu mchog ces ni bshad pa ste// stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya// me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis// ma her
325b5(rgyud 'bum): shes bya stobs kyi mchog/ tha skar dang ni khrums smad gnyis// rta yi rigs ni bya bar grags// chu stod dang ni gro bzhin gnyis// spre'u rigs su brjod pa yin// pra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis//
325b6(rgyud 'bum): glang po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o// mon gru dang ni mon gre dag/ mi yi rigs su yang dag gsungs// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru// lha mo ngas ni bden par gshad// chu smad dang ni
325b7(rgyud 'bum): byin bzhin dag/ ne'u le'i rigs su grags pa yin// mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya// mdor bsdus pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni// bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos// skar
326a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mi yi srog yin te/ / gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do// skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dag/ bzung nu nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// lug dang srang dang karka rA// chu srin dag n+d+ha
326a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar brjod/ / sdig pa bum pa seng ge dang // khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste// nya dang gnyis sbyor gnu dang ni// bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o// lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang // mig dmar skyes pa
326a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs yin te/ / pa wa sangs dang sgra gcan dang // zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no// gza' log dang ni sman pa gnyis// ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste// nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas
326a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gza'/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po
326a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // tshes dang skar ma gza' 'char ba// rab tu bshad
326a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis lha mo nyen/ / ro hi ta yi tshes la ni// smin drug dang ni mig dmar la// 'gron po lam du 'jug par bzang // tshes de rnyed pa thob 'gyur ba'o// ma ka ra yi nyi ma la// mchu dang mig
326a7(rgyud 'bum): dmar ldan pa la/ / gzir dang 'joms sogs 'byung bas ni// tshes de yongs su spang bar bya// swa b+ha na yi nyi ma la// lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe// nag po nyid du shes bya bas// chos
326b1(rgyud 'bum): de'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ / mo tsa ta yi nyi ma la// mchu dang gza' lhag ldan pa la// bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed// raN+Da yi ni nyi ma la// lag dang gapa' lag bcas pa dag/ kun tu/
326b2(rgyud 'bum): 'joms par bshad pas na// mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang // sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni// bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan// de yang nag po'i dus shes bya// b+ha dra yi ni tshes dag la//
326b3(rgyud 'bum): gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan// tshes de rnyed pa byed pas na// sbyor ba po yis bsten par bya// mi ki rA yi tshes la ni// mon gru lha yi bla ma dag/ gal te na ni 'dzom gyur na// 'bru dang nor rnams
326b4(rgyud 'bum): pad byed par/ / gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// tshes ni bcu gsum dag la nI// skras dang lha yi bla ma dag/ gal te 'dzem na nag po bas// nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur// dri
326b5(rgyud 'bum): b+ha yi tshes la ni/ / stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang // gal te khrums stod 'dzom na ni// tshes de rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing // dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed// bri ti ka yi nyi ma ni// chu stod
326b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni pha wa sangs/ / gal te 'dzom na nad kyis ni// gdungs shing 'joms par the tsom med// 'byung po yi ni nyi ma la// bra nye dang ni ba wa sangs// 'dzom na gshin rje'i mche ba ste// tshes
326b7(rgyud 'bum): de yongs su spang bar bya/ / kur ma yi ni nyi ma la// smin drug dang ni spen pa ru// gal te 'dzom par gyur na ni// rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang // bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob// bya
327a1(rgyud 'bum): ku la yi nyi ma ni/ / skag dang sman par ji zhig ltar// 'dzom na gdung bar byed pas na// nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang // zla ba nya yi nyi ma la// mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na//
327a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas ni// tshes de shin tu spang bar bya// me yi mtshams su mir ki bri// gshin rje ru ni ran da ste// srin po ru ni kur ma bri// chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste// 'jigs byed
327a3(rgyud 'bum): du ni bya ku la/ / gter gyi phyogs su sba ba na// mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri// shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go/ zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis// de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad// pa tra nas ni
327a4(rgyud 'bum): raN+Da ra te/ / bya ku li dang bri Sha b+ha// 'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni// rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad// khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra// swa pa na dang kur ma ni// zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste// rim pa
327a5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar brjod pa yin/ / nya la me mtshams gnas pa ste// stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas// de ltar de dag dbus su ni// gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur// zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// ri mo
327a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam du blta bas na/ / des na shes rab can gyis spang // zhi dang sdig par blta bas na// blta ba'i chad pa 'byung ba ste// myur du gsod par byed pa yin// sgra gcan gyi ni rgyu ba yi// dus ni
327a7(rgyud 'bum): mdo ru bsdus pa yi/ / yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis// blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya// mkha' 'gro kun dang mo nyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
327b1(rgyud 'bum): / gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ tshes grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
327b2(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// lus can kun gyis rnam rol pa// lus can kun ni rnam shes te// lus las 'das shing dri ma med// lhun po dang ni tre sa dang // de bzhin du ni
327b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bigs byed sogs/ / shar gyi lus 'phags pa glang spyod// byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni// 'dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang // lan tshwa can dang 'o ma yi// rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang //
327b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og dang steng du gang gyur pa// khams gsum ma lus zad par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang // skye mched khams rnams zad par bya// 'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi//
327b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams kun zad bsams te// dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni// bdag nyid du ni bsgom par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams// mnyam nyid stong pa nyid du blta//
327b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nam mkha' thim nas ni// pa glang rmig par grong khyer sgom// rnal 'byor can gyis cho ga bzhin// sems ni me mar lta bur sgom// de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni// der ni mtshan
327b7(rgyud 'bum): ma brtag par bya/ / me mar lta bus zhi bar 'gyur// dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang na// chags pa'i las sogs 'grub par 'gyur// mtha' mar du ba'am
328a1(rgyud 'bum): gnag mthong na/ / mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin// rlung gi mdog ltar bar 'khrug na// de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur// 'od zer dkar po long long pos// blo ldan sngags
328a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub ni/ / rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub ces bya// bkra shis kyi ni lam ston pa// cho ga 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang // gzhan gyi gzugs su dbu ma rnams// de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed
328a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni// gang zhig stong nyid shes pa byas// sems ni myur du thar 'gyur ba// ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba rtag/ shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya// /
328a4(rgyud 'bum): pha dang ma nI bsad byas nga // bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas btsem na// mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor// rdo rje mkha'

328a6(rgyud 'bum): ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / / ye shes khyad par gang gis ni// ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag can ni ji lta bu// wA las rol mo mnyan par 'tshal// bcom

328b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba'i rang rig pa'i/ / sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro// srid pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas// de yi 'gro ba mi mthong ngo // 'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni// lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro//
328b2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta// lha min ye shes khro ba'o// yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non// byol song ye shes blun pa ste// brtan pa rnams ni
328b3(rgyud 'bum): sems med pa'o/ / rgyur ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga// g+ha na pa sa baspobs// glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang // byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang //
328b4(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i las ni sun 'byin pa// de dag kun gyis mi shes te// gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
328b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che// las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis// ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin// dman dang rab dman dman pa can//
328b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci// mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma// dmyal ba la sogs gang gyur dang // gsal ba'i gzugs su

329a1(rgyud 'bum): drag la sogs/ / thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pas// thams cad snang ste gzhan du na// ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sangs rgyas
329a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyis bskul bas/ / de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la// 'bad de dang po bskyed par bya// gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi// phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin par// rnal 'byor

329a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'phrul par 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su// rdo rje'i blos
329a6(rgyud 'bum): ni shes par bya/ / zhi dang rgyas dang sngon spyod kyi// rdo rje dag ni thams cad kyang // gser la sogs la legs par brdung // rdo rje kun gyis shin tu brgyan// cha gsum du ni bzung nas su//
329a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad ska rags legs par brgyan// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni// dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de// lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las
329b1(rgyud 'bum): ni byung ba yi/ / rtse mo pad+ma zla bar gnas// rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba ste// rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol// cha gsum gyi ni tshed dag la// dbus ma cung zad ring yang rung // 'di ni thun mong tshad yin no//
329b2(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo kun gyi dbus ma zlum// phyogs sogs rtse mo 'dud pas gnas// dbus ni zur brgyad dag tu bya// dbus kyi cha yi tshad ldan pa// gnas pa lte ba zhes bya'o// rin chen ma ra ga ta ltar// de
329b3(rgyud 'bum): yang cung zad zur brgyad bya/ / steng dang 'og dang dbus dag ni// so sor cha ni gsum gsum 'dod// steng gi pad+ma zla ba ni// drug cha kun nas zlum por bya// de dag la ni seng ge'i sna// nas phyed
329b4(rgyud 'bum): tsam du mtho bar bya/ / mche ba yi ni mthar gnas pa// de ni drug cha zhes byar grags// cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la// so so ru ni dgu dgur 'dod// cha gsum bla ma'i mtha' ma ni// steng gi cha
329b5(rgyud 'bum): ni gnyis spangs nas/ / dbus kyi mtha' yang de bzhin no// 'dab ma la ni gang gnas pa'i// chu srin cha gcig nyid yin te// de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod// rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas// chu dang
329b6(rgyud 'bum): zheng ni mnyam por bya/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de// gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa// cha lags pa yi sngon du ni// ji ltar bstan bzhin shes par
329b7(rgyud 'bum): byad/ pad+ma zla ba la gnas pa'i// chu srin gyi ni mche ba'i gzugs// 'og gi chu srin las byung ba// chu zheng ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// rtse mo shes rab rang bzhin 'byung // kun gyi dbus su rnam
330a1(rgyud 'bum): snang ste/ / shar phyogs su ni mi bskyod pa'o// lho ru rin chen bstan pa ste// 'od dpag med pa nub tu dgod// byang du don yod grub pa ste// rtse bzhi la sogs lha yin no// pad+ma
330a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub yan lag brgyad/ / sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya// phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang // mkha' snying kun tu bzang po dang // gnod sbyin dag dang 'jam pa'i dpal// sa snying sgrib sel de bzhin te//
330a3(rgyud 'bum): lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid// 'dab ma brgyad la ji bzhin brtag/ dbus su ye shes sems dpa' ni// bcu gsum gnas su thim par bya// gzhan yang 'dab brgyad lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gnas
330a4(rgyud 'bum): su sbyar bar bya/ / rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu nyid// lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di// phyogs kyi pad+mar yang dag gnas// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // slar yang de
330a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lha mo bzhi/ / skul byed rin chen 'gro ma dang // de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub ma// pad+ma'i 'dab ma kun la dgod// rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la// mkha' 'gro
330a6(rgyud 'bum): ma ni lnga nyid de/ / shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ba// lho ru de bzhin tsaN+Da lI// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ste// dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya// bdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste//
330a7(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo dag ni gdengs par bya// de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni// klu rnams skrag par byed pa'o// khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa ste// lhag ma rnams ni 'dul byed pa'o// zhi la zhi ba'i lha nyid de// rigs
330b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rim pa'i cho gas dbye/ / lam gyi cho ga mthong ba yis// bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do// cha lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa ni/
330b2(rgyud 'bum): spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar grags// rna cha cha drug tshad du bya// mgul do cha ni bzhi pa ste// snying khar cha lnga pa ni gzung // gsang ba dang ni lag par yang // cha drug par ni gzung bya ste// ji ltar
330b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par brtag par bya/ / rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes 'phel// cho ga'i bya ba 'di nyid kyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// de nas dril bu'i
330b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid kyi/ / chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya// rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang // rdo rje'i ska rags 'phreng gnyis bya// shel sgong dri ma med pa ltar// dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan//
330b5(rgyud 'bum): cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la// rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas brgyan// dbus kyi khog pa zab pa dang // thams cad dga' byed bcud kyis gnas// de nas pad+ma rin chen dang // ut+pal
330b6(rgyud 'bum): ku mu dA yis brgyan/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cha brgyad du// lha mo la sogs brgyad du grags// de yi steng du lha mo ni// sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya// shar phyogs su ni sgrol
330b7(rgyud 'bum): ma ste/ / de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo'o// nub tu bdag mo'i ming can te// lho ru sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya// mdog mdzes sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma// de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma'o// nam mkha'i
331a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi dbus su ni/ / gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang dag gnas// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bu'i dbyibs// gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs su ni// ye shes bdud rtsi bum pa
331a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / shes rab bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te// de yi dbus kyi stan la ni// steng du pad+ma rdo rje ni// rtse mo dgu par bsam par bya// dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te// thams cad spro zhing sdud pa mo//
331a3(rgyud 'bum): oM ltar mchog ni stsol bar 'grub// bya ba thams cad rab sgrub ma'o// ye shes rdo rje'i dril bu ni// rtse mo dgu pa de bzhin no// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du ni// rdo rje'i 'phreng ba ska rags byas// pad+ma
331a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi 'dab ma dang / / dra ba dra phyed pa yis brgyan// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// lha mo ya ni mtshan mas mdzes// shar gyi phyogs su pad+ma ni// kha dog dkar pos mdzes par bya//
331a5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rjer pad+ma sngon dmar te// nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma dmar// byang du ut+pa la ni bri// bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbus na ni// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa bri// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o// gzugs
331a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes bskor bas yang dag gnas/ / steng gi pad dang rdo rje ni// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyig pa ni// zur brgyad pas ni mdzes par bya// dril bu la ni lha mo che//
331a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs// de nas dpa' bo'i dril bu ste// rdo rje'i 'phreng ba'i ska rags ldan// de bzhin du ni shes rab dang // bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan// mtshan nyid thams cad
331b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs/ / dra badra phyed spang bar bya// sor dgu ru ni yangs pa ste// kha dog sor lnga'i tshad du bya// de las cung zad lhag bya min// rtse lnga pa 'am rtse dgu pa// skal ba bzang po thams
331b2(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / / dbang phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing // mkha' 'gro'i stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ster// de bzhin phun tshogs thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs/
331b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi// dngos grub mchog ni gsal bar ster// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi// dril bu'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// 'khar ba las byung sgra snyan byed// khong stong dang ni bum
331b4(rgyud 'bum): par ldan/ / rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri la sogs mtshan ma can// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// chu srin las ni byung ba yi// ye shes lnga yi rnam dag pas// rtse mo lnga dang bcas pa ste//
331b5(rgyud 'bum): ska rags gnyis kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba gnyis dang ldan// de bzhin ska rags gnyis dbus su// pad+ma la ni bad 'breng gnyis// rin chen la ni rin po che// de bzhin ska rags
331b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bya/ / don yod grub pa zhes bya la// ska rags gnyis dbus ral gris brgyan// kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas// dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur// kun la'ang 'bar ba'am
331b7(rgyud 'bum): yang na ni/ / lcags gsum las byung dril bu ste// cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya// rdo rje'i rigs las ba glang gdong // ska rags rdo rje'i 'phreng bas bskor// bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi//
332a1(rgyud 'bum): kha khyer cung zad gru bzhir bya// ba glang gdong ni myur ba ru// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed// nad med stobs ni rtag ster zhing // sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed//
332a2(rgyud 'bum): sngar bstan rjes su 'brang nas ni// rdo rje mtshan nyid mtshon par byed// rin chen dbang sogs thod pa dang // rang rang mtshan ma shes par bya// sor brgyad dam ni bcu drug gam// nyi shu las
332a3(rgyud 'bum): ni lhag mi bya/ / ji ltar nus shing rjes mthun par// bsgrub pa'i dbang pos de dag bya// kha yang cho ga'i rim pa yis// sor mo lnga las gzhan par spang // lha mo 'di ni dril bu yi// sgrub thabs
332a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher bstan pa ste/ / thun mong gi ni rgyud kun las// dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de
332a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gcig
332a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// dul zhing cha lugs mdzes pa dang // sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sngags dang
332a7(rgyud 'bum): / rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// rnal 'byor bzo yi cha la mkhas// thams cad du ni 'jam par smra// sems can kun la bu bzhin lha// rtag tu gtong la dga' ba dang // bsam gtan sbyor la mngon
332b1(rgyud 'bum): par brtson/ / snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed// rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pas// sems can kun gyi mgon skyob ste// sems can bsam pa'i phye/
332b2(rgyud 'bum): brag mkhas// mgon med rnams la gnyen ltar brtse// mdzes sdug gi ni legs pa ste// sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms// dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus// phyag rgya brda yi sbyor ba rig/ rnal
332b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la/ / brda yis sbyor ba ston pa dang // gnyis med sbyor ba mi phyed gnas// sngags kyi 'khor le spyod la gus// dbang bskur don gyi yon tan 'byung // gnas sogs
332b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i ngang tshul can/ / de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// 'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod// gsol pa/ de lta bu'i slob dpon la ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
332b5(rgyud 'bum): / rang bzhin sku// yan lag byang chub sems dpa' ste// ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom nyid// spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la
332b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / de ltar yon tan rang bzhin lus// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu blta// ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par// ye shes can gyis mtshan shes nas// de lta'i bla ma 'bad de bstan// gang
332b7(rgyud 'bum): yang khro dang sgyu can dang / / ngag ni shin tu rtsub pa dang // yon tan dag gis chog shes pa// de ni bla mar bsten mi bya// gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang // las kyi de nyid bshad kyis nyon// khre
333a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas shing rtog ger gus/ / na so dag ni yol ba dang // gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang // zhen dang chags pas bcings pa la// rin thang med pa'i rin chen ni// de la
333a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad par mi bya'o/ / gang yang nga rgyal med pa dang // rgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // de bzhin chos la mngon par dang // de la man ngag sbyin par bya// gzhan du na ni ltung bar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi
333a3(rgyud 'bum): ni gsang ba dang / / rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig sbyor// lha yi dam tshig spyod pa dang // gtor ma la sogs gsang sbyor ba// smod pa dag tu dbye byed pa// skrag pa kun dang bcas bzhin du// mnar
333a4(rgyud 'bum): med par ni myur bar lhung / / slob dpon gyi ni lam stan dang // lham dang gdugs dang na bza' sogs// nye ba'i longs spyod thams cad dang // grib ma 'gom par mi bya zhing // tse 'dri bar na
333a5(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ / gal te byas na dus kun tu// de ni kun tu gzir 'gyur zhing // don nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang bas gzir 'gyur te// mchod rten bshig dang sdig mtshungs pas//
333a6(rgyud 'bum): de bas grib ma 'gom mi bya// slob dpon smod byed gang yin pa// rmi lam du yang dngos grub med// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya'i
333a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor la sogs/ / de yi lam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// maN+Da la cho ga sogs rim pa yis// sngon du bslab pa sbyin par bya// dngos po rang bzhin med par ni// mthong ba byang chub rim pa ste//
333b1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams ni// ngo bo med la dngos mthong bas// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag sde// de ltar rnam
333b2(rgyud 'bum): bcur phye ba las/ / dkar po yis ni dkar 'gyur la// nag pos de bzhin 'bras gnag 'byin// de ni de dag spang bya ste// sems can rnams la tshig rtsub dang // tshig 'khyal smra ba spang bar
333b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / snying rje yi ni sems kyis su// 'tshe dang gnod pa spang bar bya// bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang bla'i// srog chags gsod pa de ltar min// rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor
333b4(rgyud 'bum): la reg mi bya/ / rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung zhing // bla ma'i dka' stsal thams cad bya// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor pa// brdzun du smra ba thams cad dang // sems can kun la
333b5(rgyud 'bum): skyon ldog min/ / gzhan gyi bud med spang bya zhing // log pas 'tsho dang rnyed la sogs// de bas thams cad spang bar bya// dga' ba dag la spyod pa dang // gtor ma dag gi dus sogs la/
333b6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig spyod par byed pa yang // bza' dang bca' sogs tshod zin bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams// sems can mgu las dngos grub 'byung // de la dang por re zhig slob
333b7(rgyud 'bum): mas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/
334a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma// theg pa gsum po thams cad dang // dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// bdag nyid chen mo rnams
334a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag par bdag ni skyabs su 'chi// oM pany+tsa DAk+ki nI pU dza u pa s+thA nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi hUM/ sarba A tsAr+ya pU dza u pas+thA nA ya At+ma naM ni rA ta yA mi hUM/
334a3(rgyud 'bum): sarba satwa pa ri drA NA thA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la/ slar yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ khro dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang // tshig rtsu bzhe gcod spang bar bgyi//
334a4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i grogs dang srog gcod dang // rku 'phrog dag ni spang bar bgyi// longs spyod rgya che spang bgyi zhing // nges dang bcas pas chog shes bgyi// gar dang gnas dang mtshungs pa yi// phyi
334a5(rgyud 'bum): rol bstan bcos spang bar bgyi/ / zhes so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sdom pa'i cho ga bla na med// dang po bla ma dam tshig ni// thob pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // bstan dang de bzhin
334a6(rgyud 'bum): nges par bstan/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// bstan pa dag ni longs spyod yin// nges par bstan pas mya ngan 'das// bshang gci la sogs bza' ba dang // rigs dang rigs min
334a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzhan/ / sngags rnams kyi ni man ngag gis// ming sogs cho ga bzhin dbang bskur// slob mas dngos po bsgoms nas su// mya ngan 'das pa bstan par bya// khyod kyis srog
334b1(rgyud 'bum): chags gsad bya zhing / / brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya// ma byin par ni blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing // glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya'o//
334b2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcings shing // sngags kyi yi ge bzlas mi bya// bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yi// thabs kyis rnal
334b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis rnyed/ / bdag nyid lus dang gzhan gyi lus// bdag nyid bde mchog byang grol te// bdag gi lus la ma chags shing // gzugs brnyan sogs 'dra'i lha ru brtag/ mkha' 'gro
334b4(rgyud 'bum): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje
334b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro las/ bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang // dam tshig dang / sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/
334b6(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams la ni rnam rol pa'i// sngags kyi 'byung bar rol pa ste// da ni yang dag bshad par bya// oM r+g+haM b+h+rU~M phaT phaT/ ka ra kA ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ btsa pa tsa/ tsA hAM/ hUM hUM/ da sAdA hA/ ku ru
334b7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru/ tA sa ya hA sa ya/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ hU~M d+h+r-i/ ki li ki li/ mas rba d+hi ra An tra sA lA pa lam zin/ oM N+Di min+ta/ k+Sho b+ha la sngo b+ha ya/ dza~Mdza/ A ka T+ya lA kar+b+he/ si mo tse la/ mi ma mi
335a1(rgyud 'bum): sa b+ha b+ha tra la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA/ tArdza ya trar+dz+dza ya/ N+yaiH/ pha/ tri tsI/ d+hi li d+hi li hu~M hUM phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI re shA ya ma hA kawa k+ki sin+ni b+hA ya/ dza nAm+b+ha ku Te d+hA rbAH/
335a2(rgyud 'bum): daMSh+Ta ka rA lo gro b+hU Sha Na mu khA ya/ sa ha sra b+hu dza b+ha su ra ya/ pa ra shu ba sho d+ya ya ta shu la la T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ni/ byAg+h+rA dzI nA mA ra d+ha rA ya/ ma hA d+hu mA nA ka ra/ wa pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa
335a3(rgyud 'bum): nI ye sUH/ oM hrIHhra ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM ha na ma tsi/ swAhA hUM/ gau raTahe/ huM hUM ho/ phaTahU~M swA hA/ oM hrI hU~M hU~M/ ho ho hA/ oM ba~M/ tsA oM/ dzI moM/ dz+dza hrIM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM sarba bud+d+ha badz+ra
335a4(rgyud 'bum): baN ni yai/ badz+ra DA ki nI yai s+t+waM hUM/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hu~M hUM phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA ba ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM A nA ya ho d+ha gra wan/ bi dwe rA dza~M hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra DA ka
335a5(rgyud 'bum): nI biR+Sha baR+Sha pa ya hUM b+hu swA hA/ oM g+hi li g+hi li/ baR+Sha baR+Sha pa ya hUM hUM hUM ho ho hi/ ThaTha Tha swA hA/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM ka ka k+Shi ka ka ru dri ka ka in+do pa ha ri Ni/ dzI bi taM a gats+tsha ka ki ya thA
335a6(rgyud 'bum): su khaM phaT/ oM sarba ti thi nak+Sha tra gra ha maM ga le bya b+haHswA hA/ oM mu ne ka si mu ni ha tha laM ga le he phaT Te'i a ma g+ha sa mu la ha tha ban d+hA mi swA hA/ oM rat+na badz+ra hrI phaT/ oM gra swA hA/ oM a Te ba Te na ku na Te Tha ke
335a7(rgyud 'bum): Na ke tha ra ke ta ru be na ka li li lu lu hi le mi lo ti le 'ale si li a the le na the a na pa ti dA na pa ti ta ka sa ka se g+ha se ma hA g+ha se ma hA g+ha sau swA hA/ oM pa~M ga lAk+ShA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT sA hA/ sngags 'di
335b1(rgyud 'bum): / yis ni sgrub pa'o// las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te// sngags kyi cho ga ji bzhin du// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra bA rA hi Ar+ya a pa rA dzi te trai lo rgyas rkye khyem pa'i ma
335b2(rgyud 'bum): sarba b+ha ta b+ha yA ba he/ sa hA badz+re badz+ra sa ne/ a dzi ta a pa rA dzi te ba sh+yaM ka ri ni tra b+hU ma Ni bi Sha sho Sha ni ro Sha ni ro Sha Ni kro d+ha ni ka rA li ni san+d+hu sa ni mA ra Ni swa pra b+he da ni pa rA dza ye bi dza ye dza b+ha ni saM da d+hA ni mo
335b3(rgyud 'bum): tsa ni/ badz+ra bA rA hi/ ma hA yo gi ni/ kA me shwa ri kha le/ tad+ya thA/ pro ti ge pro te ge/ ha na ha na/ prA NI ki ki Na kha~M khi ni/ d+hu na d+hu na badz+ra ha ste sho Sha ya sho Sha ya kha T+wAM ga ka ba la mA lA d+hA ri Ni ma hA pa si ta mAM
335b4(rgyud 'bum): sA sha ni mA nu Sha an+d+ra pra bri d+he sin+na d+h+ya na ra shi ro mA lA gri thi ta d+hA ra Ni/ suM b+ha ni suM b+he ha na ha na prA NI/ sarba pA pa sa twA nI sarba pa shU nI ma hA mAM sats+tshe da ni kro d+ha mUrti daMSh+Ta ka rA li ni ma hA mu dre shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya a
335b5(rgyud 'bum): za ma hi Shi sa hA sra bA ha be sha ta sa s+ya sra A na ne dz+wa la ta te dza s+ye dz+wa la mu Shi piM ka la lo tsa ne/ badz+ra sha rI re badz+rA A sa nI mi li mi li ti li ti mi li/ he he ha hu~M hU~M kha la/ d+hu d+hu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/
335b6(rgyud 'bum): a dwai te ma hA yo gi nI pa Shi ta sad+d+he dr-i d+haM dro d+haM graM graM/ he he ha ha/ b+hI me ha sa ha sa bI re ha ha ho he hUM hUM trai lo kya bi nA sha ni/ sha ta sa ha sra go Ti ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ra te huM hUM phaT/ si ha rU pa khaHga dza ru phe kaH
335b7(rgyud 'bum): trai lo kya u da re ma dra me la le pra sa huM hUM phaT/ bI rA dwe te hUM hUM hA hA ma hA ba shu mo ha ni yo ge shwa ri tr-i DA ki ni sarba lo kA nAM ban+d+ha ni sarbaHpra t+ya ya kA ri Ni hUM phaT/ b+hU ta trA sa ni mi hA bI re ba ra ma sid+d+he yo ke shwa ri phaT
336a1(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ d+hu ts+tshats+tsha paT sAhA/ a A/ i I/ u U/ ran+tAM/ l+r-i l-I/ e e/ o yo/ aM a/ ka la kab+ha ba/ tsam dzar+d+hanya/ TaShAT+Ta d+haNA/ ta thad d+ha na/ ba pa ba b+haH
336a2(rgyud 'bum): ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de nyid// lha rnams kun gyi mchog gi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad skyed byed pa// rgyud rnams kyang ni de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro kun dang
336a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
336a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya// de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar// sna tshogs
336a5(rgyud 'bum): lte bar mi shigs dge/ bris nas cho ga bzhin du sngags// chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// sde tshan la ni thim par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod
336a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don kun sgrub byed btu/ / ye shes longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // sprul pa thob gyur gdon mi za// 'og dang steng 'grub rtag tu ster// bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro// pho nya mo de grub kun ster//
336a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang // tsum pa ma dang rtag par 'khyud// sbyor ba'i gnas kyi khyad par nyid// ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni// thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad// bden pa
336b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sbyin bya ste/ / gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mor gnas la// gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa// rang gi cho ga de bzhin bya// thod pa yi ni dbu
336b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / / de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// pad+ma dpal gyi nags rtsa ba// brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin// dbang po gang dang gang lam nas// rang bzhin de dang de 'gro ba// mchog tu

343a2(rgyud 'bum): zla mtshan gyis ni byugs byas la/ sum sgril yang ni sum sgril du// gzhon nu ma yis 'bar de bkal// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis ni// bzlas shing mdud pa de tsam bya// mdud pa
343a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni thams cad kyang / / ma mo brgyad du brtag par bya// de ltar sngags brgyad byas pa yis// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su// so so re re dag la yang // brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas byas la/
343a4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon par btags na ni// mda' dang ral gri la sogs pa'i// mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur// sgyu ma chen mo'i rig pa 'di// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya// de nas cho ga
343a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan bshad pa/ / nags kyi shal ma la yi ni// bal ni skar ma rgyal la blang // bu mo yi ni gci ba yis// btags te de dang bsre bar bya// bu mo yis ni bkal bar bya// gza' dang skar ma dge
343a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / zla ba stobs can dag la na// mdud pa'i sbyor ba byas nas su// so so zhing ni re re la// sngar gyi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub// 'di yis bcings pa
343a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / sum cu gsum pas kyang mi 'ching // lus kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// mtshon cha thams cad 'ching 'gyur te// 'di ni ba glang lhas su bsgrub// su rag ta dang seng ldeng dang // nim pa
343b1(rgyud 'bum): / rang ni arga'ang rung // skar ma rgyal dang nyi ma la// shing bu de gnyis bzung nas ni// myos par byed pa'i rig pa che// rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste// lan brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// shing bu phan tshun drud
343b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / dgra bo nang ni 'thab par 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni chu dang ni// 'dzub mo'i khrag dang bcas pa la// myos par byed pa'i rig pa bzla// sngags kyi bzlas pa sngon 'gro bas// dpral bar thig
343b3(rgyud 'bum): la byas na ni/ / chom po dang ni rkun po dang // 'tshe bar byed pa gzhan yang rung // skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/
343b4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ stobs bskyed pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu
343b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // gang gi sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i// de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya// ras sngar gyis ni sa bon dag/ snye ma'i rtser gnas blang bar bya// sngon bzhin cho ga'i
343b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yi/ / 'byung po'i nyi ma gza' bzang la// gau rI la sogs mkha' 'gro mar// bcas pa'i he ru ka mgon mchod// bud med kyi ni me tog gis// yang dang yang du bsgo bar bya// bgegs
343b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am ni mtshon gyis bsad/ / spung ki la sogs ma bos pa'i// bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru// cho ga de yis bskyed par bya// de yang rnga mo dag gi ni// 'khrul 'khor la ni bskyon nas su//
344a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi rtse mo blang bar bya// sngags pas mchod pa byas nas ni// bu mor bsgoms shing de bskol ba'i// chu ni 'bad dang bcas te gtor// bud med ro bsregs sa dang ni// thal
344a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bcas pas de bkang la/ / ras ster gyi ni sa bon nyid// thod pa der ni bskyed par bya// bgegs dgra dang ni gshin gshed kyi// sngags ni mngon par bzlas pa yis// mchod dang gtor ma
344a3(rgyud 'bum): phul nas ni/ / ci rigs su ni bsrung bar bya// zhi ba'i tshigs cang sngags kyis ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i chus// der ni bcu ste bskyed par bya// gzhan du yi dgas 'tshe bar 'byung //
344a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bru la sogs pa bsrung ba dang // shing bskyed rig byed bzhin du bya// de ni 'bad de smin pa yi// ras bal dag ni bzung nas su// gzhon nu me yi khrag gis ri// bsgos la sngar gyi bu mo yis//
344a5(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang bcas pa bu mos bkal// skud pa de yis bcings gyur na// de ma thag tu skyes bu ni// 'dod chags gdungs pa'i bud med 'gyur// bkrol na slar yang rnal mar 'gyur/ bgegs
344a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ro yi khrag dang ni/ / zhag gis yungs kar yang yang bsre// gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru// tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal la ni// lam dang rigs mchog thod pa ni// ro bsregs sas bkang ro dang
344a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / nyi ma shis pa dag la gzugs// de ni shin tu smin pa blang // ci rigs 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i mar// bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// sa mtha' lnga
344b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag ldan/ / rlung gi sa bon las byung ba// de yi mod la bskad 'gyur te// bsgrub bya de ni slar me ldog bgegs nas bsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro// cho ga'i rim bzhin mchod bya sa la// sngar
344b2(rgyud 'bum): ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ / ar des yan lag kun tu byug/ he ru ka la spyod pa yis// sngags ni zlos shing shin tu gnas// sbyor chen des ni bgegs bskrad bya// sngags pa chen pos de dus su//
344b3(rgyud 'bum): bgegs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ro yi lus las byung mthong ste// de nas der ni de dus su// grub pa'i rdzas kyi bar chad byed// g.yog dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos// de tshe phyag rgya gcing bya ste// /
344b4(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas phyag rgya dpral ba yi// steng du bcings la bstan bya zhing // drag po yi ni gzugs kyis su// dpa' bo'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan// sha dang khrag tu bcas pa yi// gtor ma yi dgas
344b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la sbyin/ / de yi lus las 'dzags pa'i mar// blangs te ku ba la sogs blugs// de yis lus la byugs tsam gyis// nam mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang ral gri mig
344b6(rgyud 'bum): sman dang / / rtsi la sogs pa rab tu 'grub// khrag dang mi yi zhag gis ni// yungs kar la ni bsgos nas su// mi ro yi ni khar bcug la// bsrung ba la sogs 'bad de bya// de nas snga ma
344b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bskyed pa'i/ / yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi// bsgrub bya de ni rims nad kyis// 'dzin te de ma thag tu 'chi// so bya yi ni khrag dang ni// zhag gis snum ster bsgo byas la// de yi
345a1(rgyud 'bum): thod par ro bsregs pas/ / bkang ba ru ni bskyed par bya// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa// sngar bstan bzhin du ci rigs bya// smin pa'i 'bras bu kha ra bcug na//
345a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu bya yi gzugs su 'gyur// de ltar sa bon gzhan dag kyang // dog pa la gnas 'bras bu bzung // de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur te// kha las bton na sngon bzhin 'gyur// bya rnams
345a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni tshe dang mtshungs/ / glang po'i gzugs sogs de bzhin bya// bi di ra yi sa bon ni// mar ngo skar ma rgyal dang ni// gza' ni nyi ma dag la gzung // ma tu lung ga yar ngo la// mi ro'i zhag gis
345a4(rgyud 'bum): byugs nas su/ / zla ba bzas ni zin pa'i tshe// de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs// zin pa de yi gzugs su 'gyur// de yi rus pa rkang dang ni// sha la sogs pa bskyed par bya// de yi pags pa
345a5(rgyud 'bum): rus pa yi/ / phyag rgyas yan lag brgyan byas la// blo dang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin// mchod sogs byas te thal ba gtor// sngags dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni// mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bcug/
