345a6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshed kyi// sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu bzla// sha za la ni gtor ma sbyin// gzhan du ma ni bton te khyer// sa bon de ni smin pa bzung // lcug ma gsum gyis bkris
345a7(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / khar bcug na ni sbed 'gyur te// nyi ma zla ba sogs pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum 'dir mthong mi 'gyur// ma du lung ga gcig pu ni// khar bcug ma du lung gar 'gyur// gton na slar
345b1(rgyud 'bum): yang snang 'gyur te/ / 'bras skyed thun mong cho ga'o// de nas sngags kyi cho ga bshad// spyan ma'i sngags kyis gzugs par bya// mA ma kI yi sngags kyis bcu// sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bskyed par bya//
345b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gos dkar mas ni bsrung // 'di dag sa la sogs pa ste// thams cad 'dzin cing gso ba yin// de na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// spyan la sogs pas bsrung bar bya// de nas dgongs
345b3(rgyud 'bum): mo'i dus su ni/ / sku ba khan de'i sa bon dag/ mi yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la// bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyed// de yi dpral bar thig le bya// bza' dang bca' sogs rnam pa lnga// mthong
345b4(rgyud 'bum): btsam gyis kha bar 'gyur/ / de nas thig le phyis na ni// de yi mod la rnal mar 'gyur// 'ol ma se yi sa bon ni// bram ze yi ni thod pa ru// skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyed// de nas phyung ste slar
345b5(rgyud 'bum): yang ni/ / tha mkha skyes bu'i thod par bskyed// sa bon de ni grub 'gyur ni// kha ru bcug pas de gzugs 'gyur// skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs// bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du 'gyur// kha las bton na
345b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang ni/ / tha ma la gzugs 'gyur the tsom med// sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste// gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra// sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal po'i sman// gsal shing bsad pa'i thod par bskyed// zhag
345b7(rgyud 'bum): dang khrag gis gtor bar bya/ / de ye rtsa ba blangs nas su// srin lag gi ni khrag dang ni// zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya// spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur// lha la sogs pa dbang du byed// ba glang
346a1(rgyud 'bum): na ba'i lcags ni/ / rnyed nas de yis bon ni// smin pa bzung ste khar bcug nas// g.yul du zhugs na rgyal bar 'gyur// b+h+ring ga rA dza gzung nas su/ 'ban pa'i bu mo ldan
346a2(rgyud 'bum): mo yi/ / khrag gis za ba mar de la// yang yang byugs te sbyar bar bya// bgrang rna ba'i lcug dang ni// skyes pa'i thod par bskyed dang bcas// 'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i rtsa
346a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / 'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyed pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rlag byed par// sangs rgyas nges pa'i rgyud las gsungs// bsgrub par mi bya ba dang ni// 'grub par mi 'gyur ci yang med// /
346a4(rgyud 'bum): man ngag dag ni ma gtogs par// dngos grub snang bar mi 'gyur ro// ko ka na ta'i 'bras bu ni// sna chen gyi ni thod par bskyed// dur khrod skyes pa'i b+hung ga ni// thod par bskyed pa'i rtsa dang bcas// yar
346a5(rgyud 'bum): ngomar de'i bcu bzhi la/ / bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cig btag/ ril bu mdzes pa byas nas ni// grib ma la ni bskam par bya// de yi thig le byas nas ni// 'gro kun bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur// aM ba'i
346a6(rgyud 'bum): shing gi rus pa ni/ / mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang // de bzhin pa yi rnam lngas byug/ lag par khu ba byugs nas su// 'bras de gang la byin pa ni// de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du min// bal po sa
346a7(rgyud 'bum): 'u'i 'bras bu ni/ / khrag gis byugs te bud med kyi// thod par btsugs pa smin pa yi// 'bras bu de ni mi dbang la// rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur// sku ba khan da'i sa bon ni// nim pa la
346b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs 'bras bus byug/ ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yis// chags can lam phor sa bon bskyed// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung // mar ngo yi ni nyi ma la/ nyin phyed nyi ma tsha dus bsgrub// de
346b2(rgyud 'bum): ni blugs pa tsam gyis su/ / chang sogs rlag 'gyur the tsom med// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni// rtsa brgyad blangs nas zhag gis ni/ bsgos te legs par thum
346b3(rgyud 'bum): por bya/ / bud med ro yi lto bar gzhug/ nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung nas su// de yi mchin par bcas pa'i sas// de yi thod pa bkang bar bskyed// gtor ma dang ni bsrung ba dang // bdug pa dang ni
346b4(rgyud 'bum): chus bcu sogs/ / shin tu 'bad dang bcas pa yis// las rnams thams cad sngon bzhin bya// ji srid smin gyi bar du bskyed// de nas sngar bzhin 'bad pas blang // bud med kyi ni khrag gis byug/
346b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma dang ni sa bon sogs// de yi yan lag ci yang rung // bud med gang dang gang bsnun pa// de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'ol se'i sa bon 'bad de gzung // dmar ser thod par
346b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya/ / de yi lcug ma bzung nas su// blo dang ldan pas sgo nga bya// de yi nang du chang blugs na// snod der gnas pa'i rdzas rnams ni// ji srid ma zad par du ni// de ni gnas pa'ang zad mi
346b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhan sa// de bzhin thong bar chags pa'i sa// grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag dang // mtshan ma gcig pa'i sa rnams ni// bskyed pa kun la shin tu bsngags// gci pa'i
347a1(rgyud 'bum): shul gyis bzung la/ / sngags kyis mngon par byin gyis brlab khong bu'i gcin dang bcas pa las// mkhas pas mi yi gzugs brnyan bya// gser shing sngar bzhin sbyang
347a2(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / sngags pas de yi khar bskyed bya// de ya yan lag lnga bzung ste// ril bu dag ni mdzes par bya// las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te// khyad par du ni dbang du byed// yungs kar la sogs
347a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu ni/ / glang po che yi sha dang ni// khrag dang nus pa'i zhag la sogs// de yi thal ba sogs pas byug/ de yi thod par bskyed pa dag/ de yi kha ru bcug tsam gyis// glang po che yi gzugs
347a4(rgyud 'bum): su 'gyur/ / 'di ni thun mong cho ga ste// de bzhin rta dang ma he sogs// de bzhin stag dang ri bong sogs// cho ga de bzhin bskyed pa yis// khrag bcas bsgoms nas stag sogs 'gyur// sbyor
347a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga'i dus su ni/ / grub pa'i gza' la sogs dang sbyar// rtag tu bsgom dang bzlas la dga'// dam tshig spyod pa bsrung ba dag/ de yis rtag pa 'grub 'gyur te// gzhan du na ni 'bras bu
347a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'bras bu bcos ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rim par
347a7(rgyud 'bum): phye ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o/ / de nas A li kA li gnyis// de nyid las ni kun bskyed cing // spro zhing sdud par byed pa po// tha snyad kyi ni cho ga ste// sngags kyi mtshan nyid thun mong
347b1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / cho ga 'di dag ji bzhin nyon// a zhes bya ba mdog dmar ba// mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni// bsgrub bya'i snying kha mgo bo dang // gsang ba dang ni lte bar bsam// a zhes bya ba thig ler ldan//
347b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshal dang 'ol ma se dang ni// ku su ma ni lta bu'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i mgor ni bsam byas la// myos shing sems dang bral ba dang // lkugs shing rnam par nyams par bsams// de yi lus ni
347b3(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid kyi/ / sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs bsgoms na// ring por mi thogs dbang 'gyur te// rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur// i zhes bya ba skas lta bu// dbyangs yig gsum pa thung ngu ni//
347b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya'i snying kha lte ba dang // de bzhin du ni mgrin par bsgom// I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi// li khri yi ni mdog lta bu// bsgrub bya yi ni dpral bar dgod// gang gi lus la gsum
347b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / bzhi pa'i mchog ni bkod pa yis// myos shing cha lugs nyams pa dang // sems dang bral bar byas nas su// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// lkugs pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur//
347b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa yi// dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od// u zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi// mgrin par zhags pa lta bur bsam// glog dang mtshungs par 'bar ba yi// dbyangs
347b7(rgyud 'bum): yig mchog ni drug pa ste/ / U zhes bya ba bsgrub bya yi// snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya// lkugs shing myos par 'gyur ba dang // lus ni g.yo zhing sems dang bral// gang du sgrub pa po
348a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / 'khrugs bzhin du ni 'ong bar 'gyur// bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas// dbang du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ri zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/ dpral ba lus dang bral
348a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / dbyangs yig gi ni dam pa de// snying ga dang ni gsang bar bsgom// de nas r-I nI mun pa'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bo dang // de bzhin rkang pa mgrin pa ru// ring po de ni bsgom
348a3(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya/ / bdun pa dang ni brgyad pa 'dis// myur du skrod par byed pa ste// sems ni rmugs shing nyams gyur nas// sa gzhi ma lus rgyu 'gyur te// mthong ba yi ni tshe 'di la// slar yang ldog
348a4(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / l-i zhes bya ba srid pa sdom// bya rog gi ni gshog pa 'dra// sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i mig dang ni// mgrin pa dang ni gsang bar bsgom// dbyangs yig ring po l-I zhes pas//
348a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya ba dkris par bsam// bsgrub bya'i lus la bsgoms tsam gyis// sdang bar byed pa'i mchog yin te// sems can kun gyis smad pa dang // skye bo kun gyis brnyas pa dang // mar khu
348a6(rgyud 'bum): phyung ba'i 'ba' cha bzhin/ / skye bo kun gyis spong bar 'gyur// cog la ma yi mtshal dang ni// lham bu chu gnyer lta bu'i mdog/ e zhes bya ba dbyangs kyi rgyal// gsang dang lte ba snying khar dgod// aM
348a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ / li khri dang ni nyi ma'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i mig dang de bzhin du// kha dang mgrin par bsgom par bya// sgrub pa'i mchog gis yid la ni/ las 'di byas pa tsam gyis su//
348b1(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// mthe bo'i khyon tsam du ni mthong // gdong dang gdong ni mngon phyogs te// de yi yi ge'i cha shas kyi// dbugs kyi ri mo lcug mas dgug/ cha shas lcug ma'i dam tshig
348b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / a zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig ni// thig le dang ni zla phyed bcas// zla ba gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs rgyas pa'i
348b3(rgyud 'bum): mor yang dag gnas/ / 'di ltar A li kA li zhes// bcud len thams cad ces byar brjod// gtso bo la ni thim byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang sbyar// de yi 'og tu phyi nas ni// yi
348b4(rgyud 'bum): ge thams cad gzhug par bya/ / ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar// 'dis man srung ba byed par brjod// thig le zhes bya sems yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi// zla ba gnyis dang yang dag
348b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / mi 'gyur mchog gi phyag rgya'o// de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni// sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi// las ni lha dang lha min dang // mir bcas myur du dbang du byed// oM zhes bya ba nyi ma
348b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / 'od zer 'bar ba stong dang ldan// bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang // dpral ba khyad par snying khar bsgom// oM zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba// nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid can// bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun
348b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / khyab pa nyid du bsgom par bya// bskal pa yi ni me dpung ltar// dbyangs kyis khyab nas bsgom pa dang // dbyangs kyi me yis bsgrub bya yang // rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms byas nas// dgrabo
349a1(rgyud 'bum): lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / / de ma thag tu ltung bar 'gyur// a ni thams cad sdud pa ste// 'tshe ba zlog par byed pa'ang yin// a ni gshegs su gsol ba ste// ji ltar 'dod
349a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lha yang byed/ / bud med kun gyi mngal du ni// bsams na khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur// khyad par du ni gzhan dag la'ang // dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya// a la sogs dang yi ge rnams// lus
349a3(rgyud 'bum): la bkod na spyad mi dgos/ / de ltar dbyangs kyi las rnams ni// khyod la bdag gis gang bstan la// dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni// lus la go char bkod de bya// a zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dgod/
349a4(rgyud 'bum): A ni byin pa gnyis la bsam// i ni brla la dgod bya ste// I zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas// u ni lte ba'i rtsa ba ste// U zhes bya ba lte ba'i dbus// r-i ni lte ba'i steng du dgod// r-I zhes bya ba snying
349a5(rgyud 'bum): kha ra yin/ / l-i zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod// de bzhin l-I ni rkan la'o// e zhes bya ba kha la ste// de bzhin ai ni sna la'o// o ni rna ba dag la ste// oM zhes bya ba dpral bar ro// i ni mgo la dgod
349a6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / aHzhes bya ba rgyab tu dgod// dbang dang dgug la dmar por te// gsad la thams cad sngon por ro// du ba lta bur bsams na ni/ ba skrad pa nyid 'gyur the tsom med// dbyangs yig kun gyis
349a7(rgyud 'bum): byin brlabs 'di/ / bdag gi de nyid gsal ba yin// sgrub po bdag nyid dam pa yis// de ltar go cha bgos nas ni// sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yi// byi nas las rnams shin tu sbyar// de nas rig pa'i rna
349b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'byung / / lus rnams dag tu byas pa ste// ka nas ma yi mthar thug pa'i// las ni blo gros chen pos nyon// lha dang lha min mi dang bcas// gang gi sa sa gsum thams cad ni// sgrub po shin tu rgyas pa la//
349b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du de dag thams cad 'gyur// yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras ster ba// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams kyi// mdzes ma khyod la ngas bshad nas// da ni ka sogs yi ge
349b3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / las rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad// lha mo yi ge dang po ni// nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing // li khri spungs pa lta bu yi// thig ler ldan pa'i yi ge che// sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i snying ka dang
349b4(rgyud 'bum): lte ba dang ni mgo bor bsgom/ / de yis bsgrub bya'i lus kyi ni// nang du phug sde khyab par bsam// de yis lus ni 'khrugs nas su// rmongs shing sems dang bral ba dang // brgyal bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur//
349b5(rgyud 'bum): ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar// de srid dbang du 'gyur ba ste// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// bdag nyid nor dang bcas 'gyur la// kha zhes bya bang brtson chen ma// lham bu chu gsher lta bu dang // nyi ma 'char
349b6(rgyud 'bum): kha lta bu'i mdog/ thig ler bcas pa gzi brjid che// gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa ste// bsgrub bya ya na snying ka dang // mgo dang rkang pa kun tu dgod// de yis bsgrub bya phug nas ni// rmongs shing sems
349b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bral bar bsam/ / sgrub pa po yi mchog gis ni// de yi lus ni dkrugs pa dang // myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya// de yis shin tu brgyal 'gyur zhing // yi ge'i dbang pos che bas na// sgrub
350a1(rgyud 'bum): bo bdag nyid chen po yi/ / ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur// ga zhes bya ba'i sa bon che// rang gi lha yi sdom pa ste// tsheg drag bcas pa gzi brjid che//
350a2(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo char sprin lta bu'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang // khyad par du ni snying kar bsam// de yis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus// yi ges kun tu phu ga bsams na// lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas
350a3(rgyud 'bum): na/ / 'dar zhing de yi dbang du 'gyur// bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas// sdang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa/ khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni// ji srid nyi zla yod kyi bar// ma lus par ni 'joms par
350a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / g+ha zhes bya ba sgyu ma che// bskal pa'i me dang gzi brjid mtshungs// steng du thig les brgyan pa ste// ku su ma yi khu ba 'dra// bsgrub bya yi ni lte ba dang // gsang ba snying ka kha dang ni//
350a5(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo ru ni bsams tsam gyis// bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nas su// sems dang bral zhing nyams nas ni// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa ru// shin tu de yi dbang
350a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / nga zhes bya ba gzi brjid che// sde tshan gyi ni mtha' mar gnas// de ni 'dod pa'i mda' yin te// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// de ni bsgrub bya'i gsang bar bsam// khu ba dag ni 'dzag
350a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / gsang ba ru ni zhugs pa yis// thams cad du ni 'bigs par 'gyur// yan lag gi ni tshigs kun tu// de yis phug pas myos nas ni// nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ni// myur ba nyid du
350b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur/ / ji srid 'tshe yi bar du ni// de la chags dang bral mi 'gyur// yi ge lnga po kun gyis kyang // bdag nyid go cha bskon par bya// ka zhes bya ba snying khar dgod// kha zhes bya ba
350b2(rgyud 'bum): mgo la ste/ / ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu// g+ha zhes bya ba go char bya// nga zhes bya ba sgrub pa po'i// lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya// de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni// dgug dang gsad la sogs
350b3(rgyud 'bum): par sbyang / / cho ga de ltar byas na ni// dpyad mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur// tsa zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/ rlung gi gnas kyi yi ge ste// sgrub pos de yi snying kha dang // mgo dang rkang par bsam par
350b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / bsgrub bya rlung la gnas nas ni// kun tu 'phyo bar bsam pa dang // sems dang bral bar gyur nas su// nam mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du// rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// khyer ba ru ni
350b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang // bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pas na// ji srid 'tsho yi khyad du ni//
350b6(rgyud 'bum): slar la 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge che// gsal zhing mig sman nag po'i mdog/ cha gnyis pa dang yang dag ldan// bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bor bsam// de yi mgo la du ba yi//
350b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab// cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi// lus ni de yis bskor bar bsam// slar yang tsha ni tsheg drag bcas// lte ba ru ni sems nas su// lan gsum du ni
351a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na/ / yi ge 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog/ bsgrub bya rmongs shing sems dang bral// dgra bo mdangs ni nyams nas su// sa steng ma lus pa ru 'khyam// ji srid 'tshe
351a2(rgyud 'bum): yi bar du ni/ / slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro// dza zhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal// du ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// 'od zer ldan zhing shin tu 'bar// rdul phran dag ni stong du 'phro// bsgrub bya ya
351a3(rgyud 'bum): ni mgo bo dang / / gsang bar yi ge zhugs par bsgom// yan lag tshigs kun phug pa dang // sems dang bral ba bzhin du gnas// yi ges yongs su bkang bas na// de nas brgyal bar gyur
351a4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / nyin dang mtshan du rmongs pa dang // mi sad par ni bsgom par bya// sa stangs shing dang nags tshal bcas// thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur// bskrad pa'i cho ga 'di dag ni// dge
351a5(rgyud 'bum): ma khyod la nga yis bshad/ / ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni// slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// d+hA zhes bya ba stobs po che// bsgrub bya yi ni snying kha ru// nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba dang // 'od zer gsal
351a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnam par 'phro/ / thig le zla ba phyed pas brgyan// bsgrub bya'i mgo dang snying ka dang // lte ba'i steng du yi ge bsam// sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya'i lus// 'bar bas bcud dang phral bar
351a7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / de yis bsgrub bya ba rgyal 'gyur zhing // bskrad pa'am ni 'chi ba 'am// yang na smon pa nyid du 'gyur// yi ge yis ni ltung bas na// slar la 'ong bar mi 'gyur te// sa bzhi nags tshal
351b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa ru/ / spro zhing 'gro 'gyur the tsom med// dz+nyA zhes bya ba 'di yis ni// myur du bskrad 'gyur the tsom med// nya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sna tshogs pa yi mdog dang ldan// ba la sha yi
351b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi/ 'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba ste// chu rgyun stong ni 'bab pa yis// de yi lus la dbo bar bya// de yis nor dang bcas pa ru// brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang // rmongs shing
351b3(rgyud 'bum): myur du dbang du 'gyur/ / Ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog/ 'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis// yi ge 'bar dang ldan par bsam// bsgrub bya yi ni dpral
351b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / mgrin pa dang ni snying kar bsam// bsgrub bya'i steng du nam mkha' la// bdud rtsi sgo yi thig le ni// spyi bo'i steng du rtag tu bsam// cung zad glog ni g.yo 'dra ba'i// kha ba dag ni
351b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar bsam/ / sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya ni// yan lag tshigs kun g.yo ba dang // brgyal zhing rmongs la myos bsams na// ji srid nyi zla yod par du// nor dang bdag nyid bcas
351b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ru/ / de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de ltar Ta yi rgyal po yi// las ni khyod la nga yis bshad// de nas yi ge gnyis pa yi// las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya// Sha zhes bya ba'i yi
351b7(rgyud 'bum): kai ni/ / dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod// spyi bor bdud rtsi thig les brgyan// de bzhin glog dang 'brug gis brgyan// yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab pa yis//
352a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya'i lus la kun tu gatror// bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang // snying la ru ni gnas par bsam// bsgrub bya'i mgo ni phug pa dang // lus la kun tu khyab pa yis/
352a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya myos shing 'drar ba ru// sngags pas yi ges rtag tu bsgom// de nas ji srid 'tsho bar du// brgyal zhing rmongs pas dbang du 'gyur// de nas Da zhes bya ba ni// yi ge'i rgyal po gsum
352a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / de yi las kyi mchog rnams ni// rtse gcig yid kyis gus pa sa nyon// Da zhes bya ba thig ler bcas// rdo rje lnga bu'i dbyibs can yin// ut+pa la ltar ljang sar he// 'od zer
352a4(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba kun tu 'gro/ / bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bsams pa yis// bsgrub bya'i tshigs ni 'bugs shing 'byed// bsgrub bya mi g.yor bsgom byas na// lus ni kun tu g.yo bzhin du// ji srid 'tsho
352a5(rgyud 'bum): yi bar du ni/ / rmongs dang bcas pas dbang du 'gyur// de nas las kyi mchog gzhan ni// shin tu gnyer bar byed pa ste// D+ha zhes bya ba yi ge'i rgyal// shin tu rmad byung byed pa po// dbang
352a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog/ nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba ste// bsgrub bya'i snying dang lte ba dang // mgrin par yi ge bsams nas su// byang chub sems ni rab 'dzag pas// de yi lus la dgra
352a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de yi sa bzi zhing brgyal nas su// gnyid log par ni bsgom byas na// 'di yis ring por mi thogs par// rmongs shing sgrub po'i dbang du 'gyur// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis na//
352b1(rgyud 'bum): nam yang chags dang 'bral mi 'gyur// de nas D+ha mtha'i yi ge'i las// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'bad de nyon// Na zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/ cung zad 'bar zhing gsal ba ste// dri ma med pa'i
352b2(rgyud 'bum): du ba las/ / 'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro// bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la// de yis rnam par khyab byed cing // 'od zer glog stong 'khrug 'dra ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsgom//
352b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer brgya yis bkang bas na// myos nas su ni brgyal bar 'gyur// de yis ji srid 'tsho bar du// de ni de yi dbang du 'gyur// ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i mchog/ 'od zer glog ltar gsal ba ste//
352b4(rgyud 'bum): mdog ni rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra// yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi// snang dang mgrin pa gsang ba dang // lte bar bkod de 'bugs par bsam// yi ge de yis rmongs pas na// bsgrub bya sems dang
352b5(rgyud 'bum): bral ba dang / / rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur nas su// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// myos shing dbang 'gyur gzhan du min// de yi drung na gnas pa yi// tha zhes bya ba yi ge mchog/ mu men gyi ni
352b6(rgyud 'bum): mdog 'dra dang / / ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i 'od// bsgrub bya'i snying ka dpral ba dang // de bzhin du ni rkang par dgod// bsgrub bya'i lus la dbang po yi// mtshon cha bzhin du thim par
352b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / yi ge'i rgyal pos mnan pas na// bsgrub bya sems dang bral 'gyur zhing // sa 'dzin gyi ni dbang po bzhin// 'gro ba dag kyang bcings par 'gyur// reg bya mi shes dri mi shes/
353a1(rgyud 'bum): @sgra mi thos shing gzugs mi mthong // lce yis ro rnams mi myong zhing // dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas// gang dang gang gi steng du ni// nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsams/
353a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i rgyal po tha yis ni// skyes bu bcings 'gyur the tsom med// de nas gzhan yang da yis ni// sdong po'i las kyi cho ga nyon// da zhes bya ba mdog sngon ni// char sprin nag po'i 'od dang mtshungs/
353a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'bar ba rnam 'phro ba// bsgrub bya yi ni mgor bsams la// me stag 'phro ba bsgoms pa ni// phyogs kun tu ni bsam par bya// yi ge'i dbang phyug de yis ni// bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug
353a4(rgyud 'bum): par bsam/ / 'bar ba'i sprin ni stong phrag gis// de ni kun tu bskor bar bsam// de ni bkod pa tsam gyis su// sdong gog dang ni mtshungs par 'gyur// phyugs te shin tu bcings pas na// 'gro
353a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang mi g.yo bar ni 'gyur/ / ji srid sgrub po 'dod par du// sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas// slar yang sgrub pos bsams tsam gyis// rmongs pa las ni grol bar 'gyur// de nas yi ge
353a6(rgyud 'bum): d+ha yi ni/ / las ni rmad du gyur pa nyon// d+hA zhes bya ba gzhu yi dbyibs// kha dog ser po gser gyi mdog/ gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phro// bsgrub bya yi ni mgrin pa ru// zhags pa lta bur 'bar bar
353a7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya de// khrid de 'ong bar bsgoms byas na// sgrub pa po ni gar gnas par// rmongs dang bcas te 'ong bar 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni// phyugs te sems
353b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bral 'gyur zhing / / nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la ni// rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas yi ge na yi ni// las kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa nyon// mdog ni du ba'i phung po 'dra// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ju
353b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / bsgrub bya'i snying ka mgrin pa dang // lte ba dang ni rkang par sbyar// de yis dgra rnams rang yul las// bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de ni rmongs pas rang yul du// nam yang phyis
353b3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'ong mi 'gyur/ / de nas sde tshan lnga pa ni// yi ge rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog/ las ni shin tu grub pa ste// gzhan dang gzhan ni bshad par bya// pa zhes bya ba rlung gi gnas// char sprin gyi ni sprin
353b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis bskor/ / 'bar zhing du bas 'khrigs par ldan// bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang // mgrin pa snying ka rked pa dang // rkang pa dag tu bsams nas ni// pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge des// bsgrub bya'i lus
353b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dkri bar bya/ / bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang // khro bas brtan gnas gtso bo yang // yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis// skad cig gis ni bskrad 'gyur te// gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag la'ang // slar yang
353b6(rgyud 'bum): ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas yi ge pha yi ni// las mchog nga yis bshad kyis nyon// yi ge pad+ma'i mdog 'dra zhing // 'bar ba bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang // mgrin pa snying ka lte ba dang // gsang ba'i
353b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su bkod nas ni/ / ku su ma yi khu 'dra ba// 'dzag pa ru ni rnam bsams te// bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du// de yis gang bar bsgoms byas na// bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la/
354a1(rgyud 'bum): sems med lus ni 'dar gyur nas// rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni// dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni// gru bzhi pa la stobs po che// dung dang zla 'dra
354a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i mdog/ zla ba'i 'od can bsgrub bya ni// dbus su sgrub pos thim par bsam// de lus drug gis mi tshugs shing // nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur// rims dang bkres dang skom mi 'byung /
354a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na// tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru// lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na// rtag tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur//
354a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal po b+ha zhes pa'i// las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis// dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste// nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog/ bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo ru// rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsams la//
354a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi lus ni ma lus par// yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya// rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te// rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas// mche bas zin ltar skad cig la// lhung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur
354a6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur// dgra ni lo brgya 'tsho ba yang // skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas gzi brjid chen po yi// yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog/ de
354a7(rgyud 'bum): yi las ni ji bzhin nyon/ / tsam pa ka ltar ser ba'i mdog/ bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar// 'od ni glog ltar 'khrug pa bzhin// bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsams la// de yi 'od kyis
354b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya yi/ / steng dang 'og ni ma lus par// lus ni kun tu g.yogs bsams na// gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu// sha za dang ni srin po dang // khams gsum yi ge'i bdag po dang // lha dang lha min
354b2(rgyud 'bum): mi dang bcas/ / sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi// skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar// mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad// ya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ mun pa dang ni du ba'i mdog/ rlung gi dkyil
354b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas shing / / rlung gi gzugs can yi ge che// rlung bdun gyi ni gtso bo dang // gnas zhes bya bar brjod pa ste// zla phyed kyi ni dbyibs can la// ba dan brgya yis rnam par klubs//
354b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzhi yi rten gyur pa// phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste// ra zhes pa yi yi ge mchog/ 'bar ba bye ba stong dang ldan// de yi steng du bsam par bya// du ba yi ni 'phreng bas brgyan// bsgrub
354b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'i mgo bor bsgoms nas ni/ / dgra bo lo brgya 'tsho ba yang // sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa ltar// skad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni// bral zhing 'chi ba'i sgor gzhol 'gyur// lha sogs thams cad gang
354b6(rgyud 'bum): rung gi/ steng du yi ge 'di sbyar na// myur du ltung 'gyur dpyad mi dgos// gdon dang rims rnams thams cad ni// de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang // sbrul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab// de yis
354b7(rgyud 'bum): du 'chi 'gyur na/ / gnod pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// ya zhes pa dang ra zhes pa// rlung dang me yi gzugs can du// nam mkha' phyogs su bsams nas ni// nam mkha'i ngos ni g.yogs
355a1(rgyud 'bum): bsams na/ / nyi zla gza' skar sogs pa'ang rung // chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho yi// dbus su yi ge gnyis po dag/ bsams nas nyi ma brgyad pa la// rgya mtsho la sogs thams
355a2(rgyud 'bum): cad skam/ / zhing sa 'bru yi phung po dang // khyim la sogs pa'i gnas bsams na// phyi rol me lce'abar ba yis// thams cad yi ge thal bar byed// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te// rlung gis
355a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bskor ba ni/ / yi ge mchog ni gnyis bsams na// las ni kun tu nye bar gnas// de nas gzhan yang yi ge gnyis// stobs chen ldan pa bshad par bya// dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/
355a4(rgyud 'bum): las rnams thams cad byed pa po// la zhes bya ba sa yin te// sa zhes bya ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ dbang po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang // 'od zer glog ltar 'bar ba ste// kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ru// yi ge'i
355a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po sa la bsgom/ / de steng chu yi yi ge ni// bzhi pa legs par gnas pa ste// dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog/ kha ba'i rgyun ni 'bab pa ste// la yi steng du bkod nas su// shin tu bsil
355a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzag/ dbang chen gyis ni bskor ba yi// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// spyi bor thig le dang ni ldan// char pa'i rgyun ni stong phrag 'bebs// steng du sprin gyi phung po ni// glog
355a7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'brug la sogs pas brgyan/ / bdud rtsi char gyi rgyun 'bebs pa// nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ru// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus 'gyur ba// gang gi mgo yi steng bsgoms na// sgrub pa
355b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po yi/ / las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// gdengs ka gsum gyis mdzes pa yi// lhag ma can ni zhi gzugs bsam// de yi mig gnyis dbang po yi// mtshon chas brgyan
355b2(rgyud 'bum): paba'i dbus su ni/ / bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i i yig dgod// grong khyer gyi ni mtha' ma ru// bsgrub bya yi ni sdang du dbab// dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs// skad cig gis ni zhi bar
355b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / da ni sA dkar gzhom pa yi// cho ga bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni// de ltar rtag tu bsams gyur na// tshe thung ba yang ring 'gyur na// skra dkar la
355b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs smos ci dgos/ / bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni// 'bad pas yang dag g.yon bskor zhing // rang gi spyi bo'i steng du ni// lo gcig bar du bsgoms byas na// rga ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms/
355b5(rgyud 'bum): nad kyis gdung bar mi 'gyur te// gal te klu chen brgyad kyi ni// mche ba'i dug gis zin gyur kyang // dug ni dug med byas nas su// dug gis brgyal ba slong bar mdzad// 'gron po lam gyis
355b6(rgyud 'bum): dub pa dang / / gdon la sogs pas gzir ba rnams// kun las thar par 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi spyi bor bsams tsam gyis// skad cig gis ni bkres skom 'joms// nad rnams
355b7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis gdungs pa la/ / yi ge bkod pas grol bar 'gyur// de ltar las rnams sna tshogs ni// lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin// gtso ma bzhi yi rnam pa bzhi// las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste/
356a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang me dang bdud rtsi bcud// de bzhin drod kyi sde ba ste// gshin rje brtan ma phyag gnyis pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// lus ni me las byung ba ru// bskal
356a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i me lce lta bur bsam/ / 'og dang steng du wa yis brgyan// de yi phyogs kun thams cad du// 'bar ba gang gi snying kar bsam// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'phro// wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che/
356a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' khyab pas bcings 'gyur te// brtan ma yi ni 'khrul 'khor gyi// yi ge'i rgyal pos bcings pas na// sa 'dzin lta bur brtan par 'gyur// rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang // rkang bzhi la
356a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sems can gyi/ / lte ba ru ni bsgoms byas na// de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur// de yang bskal pa'i me lta bu'i// 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// wa ni steng du bsgom par bya// slar yang
356a5(rgyud 'bum): me yis 'bar bsams na/ / gang gi lag pa g.yon pa la// yi ge de ni dgod par bsam// ji srid lag tu bsam gyi bar// sa steng gi ni skye bo rnams// rang gi gnas ni de nyid nas// 'bebs shing
356a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni gshin rje brtan ma la// mos pa'i las rnams bshad pa yin// dbang po thams cad 'bebs pa yi// gshin rje'i pho nya'i las bshad bya// ut+pal sngon
356a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i mda' 'dra ba/ / mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab lta bu// gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na// skal pa bzang po 'joms par 'gyur// snying dang kha dang sna dang na// mig dang
356b1(rgyud 'bum): rna bar de bzhin du/ / yi ge dbu ma bkod na ni// dbang po thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te// gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos// dri mi tshor zhing stobs mi 'gyur// de bzhin lce yis ro mi myong // dug gis
356b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ / las rnams de dag thams cad la// yid kyis bzlog na grol bar 'gyur// gshin rje mche ba du ba'i mdog/ sreg pa'i skal pa lta bu ste// thams cad khyad par 'khyams
356b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / sna tshogs 'od can bsgom par bya// drod kyi sde pa'i yi ge sa// du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog/ snying dang lag pa rkang par dgod// khams gsum yang ni bskrad 'gyur na// sa stengs skye bo
356b4(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / thig ler bcas shing ha dang ni// bcas pa gang gi lce steng du// bsams na phur bu lta bur 'gyur// yi ge dge ba de nyid ni// rtag tu lce steng bsams na ni// lan cig bzlas pas
356b5(rgyud 'bum): zin 'gyur te/ / de ni snyan dngags mkhan por 'gyur// de ltar sa dang sa mtha' yi// yi ge'i cho ga bshad pa'o// 'jig rten gsum po 'joms byed ma// 'od zer dmar po gzi brjid che//
356b6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma bye ba lta bu'i 'od// bcung bad sngo ba 'jigs chen mo// ma he dang ni rta dag gi/ 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba kun la bsam// de yi yi ge'i rgyal po ni// gzi brjid chen po yi ge ha// de yi las ni sna
356b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mchog/ 'dod pa'i las ni bshad par bya// de ltar bdag lus rtag tu ni// yi ge lngar ni bsam byas na// 'gro ba rnams kyi bya ba ni// tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur// sa stengs lnga
357a1(rgyud 'bum): dang lha min dang / / mi dang bcas pa 'bebs byed cing // sgrub pa po ni dus min par// 'chi ba dag ni 'joms par byed// sgrub po yid la 'dod bzhin du// nad rnams thams cad
357a2(rgyud 'bum): gnon par byed/ / ngag tsam gyis ni dpung tshogs dang // chu dang rgya mtsho 'ching ba dang // gru dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang // rta dang glang po la sogs 'ching // shing chen sa la skyel ba dang // sem
357a3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams ni dbang du byed/ / las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// bya ba rnams ni 'dod bzhin byed// ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ mgo dang bral zhing thig les brgyan// de yi las rnams ma lus pa/
357a4(rgyud 'bum): phan pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste// kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa// shin tu stong dang stong pa che// de ni sems med gnyid log pa// sad pa dang ni bral ba ste// de
357a5(rgyud 'bum): ni cir yang snang mi 'gyur/ / lha dang lha min gnod sbyin min// mi 'am ci dang dri za min// klu rnams dang ni srin po dang // rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab min// chu bo'i shing dang nags tshal dang // de bzhin sa
357a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs ma yin te/ / 'jigs rung dmyal ba la sogs min// me dang du ba sogs min zhing // nyi ma zla ba gza' skar min// mi dang sha za la sogs min// mngal skyes dang ni drod las skyes// sgong
357a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rlan skyes min/ / thang la gnas dang chu gnas min// pad+ma las ni skyes pa dang // dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs// 'byung ba'i tshogs la sogs min te/
357b1(rgyud 'bum): / ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ rtag tu bsams na dmigs mi 'gyur// lo gcig bar du bsgoms gyur na// rga dang nad kun 'joms 'gyur te// de la dug kyang mi 'pho na// nad kyi 'jigs pa ga la zhig/
357b2(rgyud 'bum): dug ni khrur bu brgya zos kyang // de ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu stong nyid bsgoms na nI// de ni thar 'gyur the tsom med// mgo dang dpral bar ya~M ge k+Sha// de nyid mchog tu brim nas su// bsgom
357b3(rgyud 'bum): na skad cig mngon shes skye / / thig ler ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rkan dang sna sgo'i lam du ni// ri mo dag ni zhugs pa bsam// ri mo mar me'i rtse lta bu// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi gzi can bsam// rtag
357b4(rgyud 'bum): tu rkan ni phug ste gnas/ / rtag tu sbyor bar gnas pa yis// nyi ma bdun na mthong 'gyur te// 'di dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// bram ze gsod pa' nga nyin bdun gyi// rtse mo rgyas par mthong
357b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan gyi grong sogs 'dod bzhin 'gro// k+Sha yi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi// las ni bsam gyis mi khyab gnas// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos
357b6(rgyud 'bum): grub/ / brtul zhugs ma ni khyod la bshad// re re yi ni las rnams kyang // bstan pa ru ni nus ma yin// skye bo rang don byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin// yi ge sde tshan so so yi// yi
357b7(rgyud 'bum): ge dag ni so so zhing / / re re'ang sbyor ba bzhi bzhi ste// gcig kyang bzhi ru sbyor ba bzhin// A li kA li'i phyag rgya che// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par//
358a1(rgyud 'bum): go'aphang mchog ni thob mi 'gyur// sgyu mche dang mnyas sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can
358a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis gsungs/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ A li kA li'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//
358a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshal te slar gsol pa/ khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs// yi ge bcu drug rig pa che//
358a4(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog bla mar bshad pa dang // khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsa// 'byung gnas sla tshul nges 'gyur dang // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar dbye ba dag/ rnga ltar
358a5(rgyud 'bum): nang du yang dag gnas/ / de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs// bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sangs rgyas kun la'ang gsal ba ste// gzhan rnams
358a6(rgyud 'bum): lalta smos ci dgos/ / sgyu ma chen po bcu drug ni// ma mo nyid du rab tu bshad// de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du// gyur pa nyid du the tsom med// rnal 'byor pa yi bdud rtsi sbyor// bcu
358a7(rgyud 'bum): drug char yang mi yod do/ / slar yang bdud rtsi rdzas rnams ni// nga ni bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// ra ni dmar chen po yi khams// ha zhes bya ba ri las skyes// sa ni gan+da ba tra ste// ba ni
358b1(rgyud 'bum): bags par bstan pa yin/ / ra zhes bya ba dri ru gsungs// me zhes bya ba me tog ste// de bzhin ra ni chu yin no// me zhes bya ba pi si ta// sa ni kun tu ru nyid yin// rA ni sa ri zhes bya ste// at+ma
358b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya na la dza/ / ni zhes bya ba dri yi mar// sa ni so dang lag skyes yin// dA ni rgya mtsho las byung ba// s+thi ni kha ba'i snying po yin// ha zhes bya ba ga pur te// byang chub sems las byung ba yi//
358b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ye shes dam pa mchog/ rtsa rnams thams cad yang dag 'dus// de dag lha mo khyod la bstan// gsang sogs rnal 'byor pa yi rdzas// pa shang dang gci sogs lnga la bya// khams rnams
358b4(rgyud 'bum): / sdud pa'i sde tshan ni// de ltar bcud len bsten pa yin// mkha' 'gro kun dngos chags pa yi// sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba// pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// pad+ma gar dbang zhes bya ste// steng
358b5(rgyud 'bum): du gsal bar 'phro bas na/ / rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya la// 'di ni gsal zhing 'bar bas na// rnam snang mdzad chen thub pa'ang yin// rlung ni sna tshogs las byung ba// khyad par spyod pas rta mchog yin//
358b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// phan tshun gnyis med rang bzhin no// gnas der nyi ma nub pa yi// sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs kyi bdag/ lha dang mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas rnyog pa med
358b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / 'khor ba'i lam ni gcod pa po// spros pa thams cad nyer zhi ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ mkha' 'gro ma kun sma ru bshad// yang na mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgra ni rab tu gtum mo la
359a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa bya la/ dngos po ni rang bzhin te de rnams kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa'o// de nyid sems can gyi don la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa'i sgrar brjod de
359a2(rgyud 'bum): mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pas na ye shes nyid ni rdo rje'o/ / sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten no// bcud ni rgyu ba zhes bshad la// de bzhin snod ni brtan pa'o//
359a3(rgyud 'bum): re zhing yang gnyis gnyis te// skal ba bzang dang skal ngan no// sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ gzugs ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas// 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan de nyid de rang byung bas na rang byung bcom
359a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das so/ / rang byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so// yang na nyon
359a5(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa'i bdud bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das te/ rang byung bcom ldan 'das de nyid lhag pa'i lha ni gcig nyid de/ lha nyid yin zhing lhag pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i lha ste/ lhag pa'i lha yi
359a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrar gang sngar bstan pa'i khams rnams kyi nang na gtso bo dang dam par gyur pa ste/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par skyed par byed pa'i khu ba dang khrag go// mchog tu bde
359a7(rgyud 'bum): las skyes shing byung bas na 'byung gnas te/ nges 'byung ni sems skye ba'i bzhed gzhung gsungs pa'o// sgra ni dbyangs te shes rab kyi dbyangs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o// tshul ni slar brtags pa ste/
359b1(rgyud 'bum): de las byung ba'o// bsten cing bsnyen par bya bas na dam tshig ste/ yul can gyis yang dag par bzhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang ka don dam par dbyer med pas nye bar brtag
359b2(rgyud 'bum): nas yul can dbang po la'ang yul zhes bya'o/ / spyod pa ni dbang po bcu gnyis po de rnams kyi nye bar rgyu ba ste/ de rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems thob pa ni spyod yul lo// /
359b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gsum las rnyed par mi 'gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas pa'o// de la thog ma ni gsang
359b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ 'di skad ces bya ba sngar 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i rig pa'o// mtha' zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa ste thos pa zhes bya ba bsten par bya'o// dbus zhes bya ba ni mchog ste bdag gi zhes bya ba shin tu ma
359b5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa'o/ / yang dag gnas ni thams cad bdag nyid de dus gcig na zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo de nyid ngan par spyod pa ste/ lo brgyad pa dang rdo rje pad+mo sbyor bas byung ba'i
359b6(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang bcas pa'o/ / lha dang mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas rdo rje rdul gyi ni// bcu drug char yang mi phod pa ste/ de la bcu drug cha ni bud med kyi skud pa las byung ba'i khams rnams srud pra
359b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug dang lhan cig tu sgril ba ste/ chags pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o// de ltar skud pa bcu drug dang / sbrel ba'i cha shas bcu drug po// bsdus byas zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga'i snying
360a1(rgyud 'bum): kho'o/ / gong bur byas pa ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor bar gyur pa'o// dang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i don te sde tshan rnams kyis bsdus shing bstan pa'i khams gang dang gang yin
360a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i brlan de dang de sa bon dang bsgril te brtag par bya'o/ / lha'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni de bdud rtsi ltar yongs su smin pas rang gi sku rdo rjer gyur pa'i skad cig go/ mi'i yin pas na mi'i ste nges par
360a3(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i bde ba'o/ / de'ang dngos grub thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtag tu bde ba'i gsal bas mtshan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sems kyi rdo rje mngon du bya zhing bde ba bsten
360a4(rgyud 'bum): pa las bde ba nyid du skye bar 'gyur te/ ther zug tu bde ba ster bas so// de'ang dper na/ mngar pos bsgos pa'i sa bon ni// mngar po nyid ni bsten pa dang // gang phyir mngar pos bskyed
360a5(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / de yi ro ni mngar por 'gyur// de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i bde ba bsten na bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dang mnyam pa dngos po gang du'ang yod pa ma yin te cha shes
360a6(rgyud 'bum): kun dang mtshungs pa lta zhog/ de'i rdul phra rab kyi cha dang mtshungs pa'ang yod pa ma yin no// rdul phra rab ni rdo rje phra mo'i rang bzhin te/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa'o//
360a7(rgyud 'bum): mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa ste// de yi rang bzhin gtam dag ni// bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad// gang zhig phyi rol sbyor la dga'// bcu drug char yang
360b1(rgyud 'bum): mi phod do/ / sbyor ba'i mchog ni 'di mthong ngo // de dag 'a bus zos rtswa dang 'dra// da ni chu skyes chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste/ mi gsal brda yi
360b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi ni/ / gnas ni gsang ba zhes byar bshad// mi gsal ba yi dngos por ni// brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin// 'di ni rtog pa la rton nas// gnas ni gsang ba bshad par bya// dgon
360b3(rgyud 'bum): chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no/ / gzhan yang dgon chen zhes bya ba ni shes rab ste/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi shing gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nyid rang bzhin gyis
360b4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bdag nyid pas na sa phyogs so/ / rigs mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mang po'i tshig go// bdag dang sems can la sogs par rtog pa dang bral bar rnam par dben pa ste/ lta ba ngan pa rnam
360b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ri bo'o/ / 'jug par dka' ba'i phyir bor te/ zab cing rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi chu bo'i gnas su gyur pas rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam
360b6(rgyud 'bum): yan lag brgyad dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa grub pas gdod nas grub pa ste/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub 'dod chags kyi mes bsregs pas dur khrod do// de ltar na me
360b7(rgyud 'bum): long lta bu la sogs pa lnga rnam par dag pas gnas rnam pa lngar bsgrags so/ / chung ngu ni dang por lo bcu gcig ma'i pad+ma dang rol pas bcud kyis len bsgrub par bya'o// gnyis par lo bcu gnyis
361a1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang rol pas ni dam tshig don du gtor bar bya'o/ / gsum par lo bcu drug ma dang lhan cig tu dga' bas ni sngags rnams goms par bya'o// bzhi par lo nyi shu ma dang nam
361a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhar 'phur pa bsgrub par bya'o/ / lnga par lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de ltar na/ dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang // zhes bya ba gnas lnga po de dag dang rim pa
361a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de la rigs ldan rnams ni rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams dri'i chus mchod par bya ste/ bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu mo de'i me tog bzung la mkhas pas rang gi khu ba
361a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pas mchod do/ / rtag tu zhes bya ba ni thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par he/ dus kyi khyad par zhes bya ba snga dro'i dus su'o// gzhan yang lhan cig skyes grub ces bya ba thun mong gi dngos grub
361a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan zhing sgrub pa po la brtse ba ste/ thig le des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o// gzhan yang dgon pa chen po zhes bya ba ni bud med kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dod chags
361a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ / de nyid thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs na byang chub kyi lam ste/ yongs su sbyangs pa ni mthar thug par son pa'o// de'i d+harmod ya
361a7(rgyud 'bum): ni sa phyogs te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo bas na rnam par dben pa'o// de nyid bde ba chen pos mi g.yo bas na ri bo'o// sems
361b1(rgyud 'bum): can dman pas 'jug pa dka' bas na ri bor te phug dang ldan pas na tshang tshing ngo / / thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgya mtsho'i gnas pas rgya mtsho'i 'gram ste/ sems can thams cad
361b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud la mnyam par gnas pas na dur khrod do/ / gdod nas grub pa ni rtag tu grub pa ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing nam mkha' ltar yongs su grub pas rtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul
361b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o/ / ni zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa ste de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs zhes bya ba la sna tshogs ni rnam pa du ma ste/ pad+ma ri
361b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi tshig bla dkas so/ / ras ni gsal bar ma byas te/ g.yogs pa ni shin tu mi mngon par byas pa'o// stan ni rig pa nyid du gdan du byas pa ste dag pa ni 'jam pa'o// lha mo
361b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis pad+ma rang gi mtshan ma'i gos kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ / bzhag pa ni mchod par bya ba ste/ yang dang yang du 'dod pas mnyes par bya ba'o// sdom pa ni bde ba'i mchog go// pad+ma'i
361b6(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du khrag ni bcud kyis len pa ste/ khrag ni pad+ma yin pa bshad pa la sogs pa ni bcud kyis len no// des 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te/ khrag chen ga pur bcas
361b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / tsan ldan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// ra sa ya na bla na med// ces bya ba la khrag chen ni dus su 'bab pa'i zla mtshan du gyur pa'o// tsan dan dmar po ni
362a1(rgyud 'bum): sha sde de dang bcas pa'o/ / tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni dbang po thams cad las byung ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyi bcud ni ra sa ya na'o// bza' bar bya zhes bya ba la
362a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gang gis bza' bar bya zhe na/ sbom po 'am mtha' lhag ces bya ba la sbom po ni rdo rje'o// mtha' lhag ni b+ha ga ste/ A nA ma zhes bya ba ming gis bsnyad pa'i phyir ro// khar zhes bya ba ni de
362a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi khas rang gi lha'i khar ro/ / de yang / dang po bla mar dbul byas te// de nas sangs rgyas rnams la dbul// phyag rgya la ni byin nas su// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang // mchod pa bzhi
362a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni dus bzhir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i bdag nyid can ji srid stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal
362a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bzung ste/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du nges par byas pas mchod par bya'o// dpa' bo dang ni snyoms 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom
362a6(rgyud 'bum): ba po'i ste/ dus kyi nges pa med cing thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis rtag tu gnas pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhe na/ yid ni nang du chud pa'i ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyed ma
362a7(rgyud 'bum): mo'i shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam par sbyor ba dang ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba rnam par spro ste/ gnas pas tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de ltar mchod pas mchog dang bar ma ste/ tha ma na
362b1(rgyud 'bum): chags pa chen po'i tshul lo/ / de'ang rdo rje can gyis thams cad bsdus nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde ba can du spros la/ der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba ste/ gzhan gyi de kho na nyid ji bzhin
362b2(rgyud 'bum): du bstan pa'o/ / bar ma ni bdag gi de kho na nyid de/ rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor lo thams cad rang gi dbus su bsdus la/ rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin du byas pa cho ga des bsgoms pa ni mchog go// bud med kun
362b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgyu ma zhes bya ba la bud med kun ni gzugs la sogs pa'o/ / sgyu ma ni yon tan te rang bzhin gyis sku la sogs pas gnas pa'o// sgyu ma ste yon tan gyi rgyus ma lus pa sgyu ma'i don du gsungs so//
362b4(rgyud 'bum): ma lus pa ni cha shas te cha dang bcas pa'o// cha ni dngos por bstan pa ste// cha med yon tan zhes bya yin// yon tan yon tan can sbyar ba// yul dang dbang po rab tu dag/ A li kA le yon tan
362b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / mnyam pa dam tshig spyod yul yin// de nyid ni mtshan ma yin pas na phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa po'i blos mngon du byas pa'o// yon tan des rtag tu yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i
362b6(rgyud 'bum): ring po la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul nyid mchog ste/ bla na med cing dam par gyur pa'o// de'ang lugs ma la sogs pa gzhan dag las phul du byung bar rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin
362b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis grub pa ni 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar 'o ma la zho la sogs pa bzhin no// de bas na bcos ma las bye brag tu gyur pa'o// gzhan yang / ngan par spyod pa'ang
363a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis zhes bya ba la/ rnyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems rnyed pa ste/ de nyid dga' ba kun gyis khyad par du 'phel bas yin gyi/ slongs
363a2(rgyud 'bum): mos 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang / dka' thub kyi sbyor la sogs pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pas nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te spang bar bya'o// des zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i rdzas kyis te/ khyad
363a3(rgyud 'bum): par ji lta bu zhig ce na/ rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis sngags kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lha'i gzugs su yongs su brje ba ste/ sngags bzlas pa dang / rang gi
363a4(rgyud 'bum): sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rang bzhin yongs su brje ba'o/ / sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni khams kyi rang bzhin te// mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa bco brgyad du phye ba yin gyi/ b+hu ba la sogs pa'i khams ni ma
363a5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa zhes bya ba la/ nam mkha'i sgras na sems la bya ste/ ji ltar nam mkha'i khams la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa bzhin du thams cad kyi go skabs
363a6(rgyud 'bum): ster ba'i phyir ro/ / yang na nyan thos la sogs pa'i gnas bsregs pas na nam mkha' ste/ nam mkha' der bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu zhing spyod pas na de ni nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha'
363a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags zhes so/ / sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ste zhes bya ba la/ kun tu ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad do// sna tshogs ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste/ de'i phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor
363b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya thams cad do/ / des na sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin gyis zla ba dang dmar po'i grub pa'i rdzas de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rtag tu goms par bya bas stobs su gyur pa'o//
363b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs sdom pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba grub pa ste/ mkha' 'gro kun zhes bya ba khrag dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i cho gas sngags pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya bar grags pa ste/ rang nyid skyes par gyur pa'o//
363b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid med sems ni de kho na nyid kyi sems med pa ste/ phyin ci log gi sems kyis sbyor ba'o// lha la dmigs pa ni 'dod pa'i lhar bsgom pa'o// shin tu de nyid sems zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sems
363b4(rgyud 'bum): sa brgyan pa ste/ phyin ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid do// de'ang khrag la sogs pa'i khams sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gnas so// lugs ma la sogs pa'i
363b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ni de spangs nas bcos ma sgom par byed pa ste/ gang gi phyir gzugs brnyan ma yin pas so// des ni 'di skad bstan par gyur te/ ji ltar smin pa'i 'bras bu bor nas shing gi rtsa ba len par
363b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa bzhin du rnal ma bor te bcos ma la chags pa'ang blo gros dman zhing shin tu blun par ston to/ / des na de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis phun sum tshogs pas bdag nyid sbyor zhing rdzogs pa'i rim pas sangs
363b7(rgyud 'bum): sa kyi sku la dmigs pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ye shes de nyid ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro// des na gzhan yang gzugs brnyan dang
364a1(rgyud 'bum): lugs ma la sogs pa spangs te/ khams sna tshogs kyi shes pa nyid sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par brtag par bya'o// lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga
364a2(rgyud 'bum): nas zhes pa la/ ba spu ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor te bu ga ni nam mkha' 'o// rtse mo'i bar zhes bya ba ni yi ge bcu drug yongs su gyur pa'i khams rnams te/ spro ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor te// rnal 'byor
364a3(rgyud 'bum): bas ni rtag tu bsgoms/ / dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rang gi pad+ma'i lce dbus su// zla bar gnas pa'i hUM yin te// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni// phyogs bcu dag tu spro bar byed// theg
364a4(rgyud 'bum): le bcu drug thig skud kyi/ / sngags pas thig gis thig btab pa'i// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug par// a sogs k+Sha yi mthar thug pa// tha ma las ni sngags btu bya// phyi nas thig ler cha dang
364a5(rgyud 'bum): bral/ / bshang dang gci ba'i rang bzhin pas// 'di ru k+Sha ni spang bar bya// yi ge ha ni yongs gyur pas// yi ge thams cad yal ga 'dra// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag
364a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha/ / sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa yi// yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma// zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi man ngag go/ ka sogs yang dag gnas pa yi// yi ge lha yi gzugs yin te// a sogs
364a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs rnams thams cad kyi/ / sngags kyis sgeg cing brgyan pa yin// lhag pa'i lha ni yi ge hUM// lte ba'i dbus su bsam par bya// lte ba pad+ma zhes bya ste// bsam pa bsgom par bya ba yin//
364b1(rgyud 'bum): / sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa ni// rnam shes hUM gi gzugs nyid do// yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma// sla yi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o// gang phyir gzhan yang 'di dag ni// ji ltar sangs rgyas kun
364b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin/ / 'di ni rtag tu 'don pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// mgo dang thig le rnam spangs pa// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// rang gi dbus gnas rdo rje can// yi ge rnams kyis
364b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor/ / de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba la ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su shes pa'o// yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas shes pa'i ye shes te/ de nyid kyis
364b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do/ / bdag nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob yongs su shes pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do// de nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub bo// thabs gang gis
364b5(rgyud 'bum): / she na/ de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs
364b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga
364b7(rgyud 'bum): / ji bzhin bshad kyis lha mo nyon// rgyal srid phyir ni sngags pa yis// stong phrag bcur ni bzla bar bya// pho nyi'i steng du gnas nas ni// sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga ni bya// sha chen 'o ma la bsgres
365a1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa 'di yis bsregs na ni/ / dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgya yi bar// tshun chud pho brang rnyed par 'gyur// dpal ldan rgyal srid che grub pa// sus kyang gzhig par mi nus
365a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / mi dang ba glang lce spyang shas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mchog 'gyur te// chang dang 'o mar spags nas ni// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas ni// gling bdun la ni dbang ba yi// rgyal srid longs
365a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod dpal chen 'gyur/ / de nas mtshams med lnga byed pa// gang gis gzhom par 'dod pa des// dug dang khrag dang mar nag bcas// mi yi rus pa bsreg byas te// tsher ma can gyi shing dang
365a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / de bzhin phub ma mi sbyar bcas// shan pa yi ni me sbar la// gcer bu sma ni lhag pa yis// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// khro dang bcas pas nyin phyed na// sems mi g.yengs pas
365a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg pa 'am/ / yang na gos sngon gyon nas su// mtshan byed na ni bsreg par bya// sngags kyi mthar ni ming dang sbyar// dgra bo stobs dang ldan pa yang // dpung dang bcas par brlag 'gyur na//
365a6(rgyud 'bum): phal pa la lta ci zhig smos// de nas dgra bo stobs kyis ni// dregs pa bskrad pa'i cho ga bshad// khwa yi gshog pa zhag dang ni// nim pa'i khu bar bsres pa dag/ sha za'i shing la me sbar te//
365a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung du bltas te bsregs byas na// mtshan mo bdun ni tshun chad kyis// bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas dbye ba bshad par bya// smyo byed me ni 'bar ba la// nim pa yi ni lo ma dang //
365b1(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyi pags par bsres byas la// bya rog dang ni 'ug pa yi// tshang gi shing dang bcas pa dag/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na ni// mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun bcas pa dag/ skye bo thams
365b2(rgyud 'bum): cad sdang bar gyur/ / de nas dgug pa bshad bya ste// bsgrub bya shing gi stan la ni// rol par bcas shing g.yog dang bcas// rlung gis gdong ni steng du blta// li khri lta bu'i mdog tu bsam//
365b3(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi mthar ni ji bzlas te// bsgrub bya'i snying gi pad+ma dbug/ bud med yin na skye gnas dgug/ khams gsum 'grub par gdon mi za// de nas
365b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ / dgug pa la sogs ji bzhin 'byung // dum bu gcig po'i thod pa ni// gzugs mdzes ma chag ma gsal// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs bris te// 'dab ma rlon pa
365b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya la ni/ / khrag dang go ro tsa nar bcas// da d+hu ra yi smyug gu yis// sngags ni ming dang bcas par bri// thod pa'i nang du bzhag nas su// bsgrub bya dmar po'i ras kyis g.yogs// sngags
365b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi nga rgyal bsgyings nas su/ / 'dab ma re re bzung nas ni// go bzlog snying po'i gsang sngags ni// zlos shing 'drab ma thams cad sreg/ yid la bsams bzhin 'gugs par 'gyur// de
365b7(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhan yang tsan dan ni/ / dmar las bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la// rang khrag go ro tsa nar bcas// ming bris bsgrub bya'i snying khar gzhug/ tsha ba gsum gyis byugs nas su// snying ka
366a1(rgyud 'bum): / lte ba gsang ba'i gnas// zangs ma'i khab kyis dbug byas nas// mtshan phyed na ni 'dod bzhin 'gugs// gser btsag gis ni skye gnas kyi// gzugs bris de ya
366a2(rgyud 'bum): steng du ni/ / lag pa g.yon pa bzhag byas la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni// gang gis ming nas bzung gyur pa// de ni de mod 'ong bar 'gyur// rlung gis btsubs pa'i shing lo la// khA yi
366a3(rgyud 'bum): spro yi sbrug gu yis/ / ming dang bcas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// mchi ma las ni bris nas su// gyen du ldang ba'i tshub mar bskur// cho ga des ni bskrad par 'gyur// sde'u yi rus pa'i phyu
366a4(rgyud 'bum): bu ni/ / sor drug pa yi tshad du bya// sngags ni lan bdun bzlas nas su// gang gi khyim sgor sngas na ni// de yi rigs ni chad par 'gyur// ba glang rta dang glang chen dang // bong bu rnga mo ma he ya/
366a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas su sbas na rlag par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya rnga mo'i steng du bskyon// gcer bu mar khus byugs pa dang // skra grol kha ni lho ru bltas// skyabs med du
366a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing brgyal bar bsam/ / mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas su// rgyab nas khro bos rdeg byed cing // khams gsum gnon pa'i bsam pa yis// me yi mtshams su gdong bltas te// sngags
366a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mthar ni dza bzlas na/ / ji ltar 'dod bzhin grub par 'gyur// rta dang ma her zhon pa yi// dgra bo nang ni phan tshun du// mtshon cha thogs nas khros nas ni// phan tshun dpung dang bcas pa ru//
366b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'thab mo byed pa bsgom par bya// sngags pa g.yul dul bltas te// de yi ming dang spel ba yis// yi ge ra ni bri bar bya// gdong gi steng du bltas par bsam// sgrub po ro yi steng du ni// rdo rje skyil krung
366b2(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yor gnas/ / de yis bsgrub bya mnan nas su// lus dang ngag ni gzir bar bya// sngags ni ming dang spel ba ru// snga ma bzhin du bzlas par bya// bcing ba'i cho ga'o// mkha' 'gro kun dang
366b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las tham
366b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung ba dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par che bste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// da ni sbyin sreg cho ga gzhan// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// bgegs pa
366b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am ni gzhan yang rung / / rma med shin tu mdzes pa ni// 'byung po'i nyin zhag la rnyed pa// sgrub pos sngar bshad bzhin bsgrubs na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub// zla mtshan phyis pa'i ras ma
366b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / byi la'i rtug par bcas pa dag/ zhib tu brdungs pas bdug pa bya// bdug pa 'di yis sgrub pa po// shin tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // ma sha 'bras bu bcas pa
366b7(rgyud 'bum): las/ / 'o thug byas te ro yi khar// 'jigs pa med par sbyin sreg bya// de nas ro de langs nas ni// ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur te// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // rkang byug ral gri de bzhin
367a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ / gter dang dgra bo tshar gcad dang // gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len// gang bslangs gcig ni byin nas su// 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// dpa' bo rnams dang rtse
367a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra// de nas ro langs chen po yi// sgrub thabs gzhan ni bshad par bya// sngar bstan mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// ro ni mdzes pa bzung nas ni// rnal 'byor chen por
367a3(rgyud 'bum): legs gnas pa/ / mtshan phyed na ni bsgoms nas su// de yi sha ni dmar chen bcas// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis bskor gyur cing //
367a4(rgyud 'bum): ro langs srin po du mas bskor// ha ha ra bzhad pas 'jigs byed pa// der ni drung du 'ong bar 'gyur// ce spyang brgya phrag mang po ni// bskor nas 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs byed// de mthong 'jig
367a5(rgyud 'bum): par mi bya ste/ / sngags kyis bsgyings pa'i lus su bya// rdo rje brtul zhugs bdag nyid sems// kye ho dpa' bo chen po legs// lha mo de skad brjod nas ni// sgrub po yid la gang 'dod pa'i//
367a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub brgya yang ster bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma yis yongs bskor te// dpa' bo rang gi gnas su 'gro// de ni de yi mod la yang // lha yi lus su gyur nas ni// khams gsum kun tu rgyu bar
367a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dpa' bo 'dod pa'i gzugs can te// skal bzang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra// rtag tu nam mkhar 'phur ba dang // rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spong // sa gzhi kun tu rgyu 'gyur zhing /
367b1(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod bzhin dngos grub 'jug/ de nas nyon mongs zhi bya dang // ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas bya'i phyir// rang gi lha yi sbyor bar gnas// nang gi sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su
367b2(rgyud 'bum): / bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya// 'od zer 'phreng ba 'khrugs shing drag/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba can// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ni// stong gsum stong gi rdul mtshungs pa/
367b3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dkar la sogs bkug ste// lus mchog de la gzhug par bya// 'di ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg yin// rgyas la byang chub sems dpa' dgug/ rengs pa'i gzugs su lhag par mos// shin
367b4(rgyud 'bum): tu nyon mongs zad bya'i phyir/ / khyad par khro bo'i gzugs su bya// sna tshogs rjes su chags bya'i phyir// bud med kyi ni gzugs su bsam// 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg tu// sgrub po kun la bstan
367b5(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / phung po la sogs bud shing ni// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar ba// ye shes me la bsreg par bya// tshangs pa'i me ni rked par gnas// la la nA ni
367b6(rgyud 'bum): dgang gzar te/ / ra sa nA ni blugs gzar khA// dbyug pa rdo rje rin chen 'og/ rang gi rdo rje mtha' yi bar// thod pa bsreg rdzas snod yin te// rdzas rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// 'di
367b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bla med sbyin sreg gi/ go cha'i rim pa nyid yin te// lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin// de ltar byas na ting 'dzin ni// nyams par mi 'gyur brtan 'gyur bar// rgyud rnams kun las thun
368a1(rgyud 'bum): mong du/ / cho ga 'dis ni rab tu grags// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom
368a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ ro langs sgrub pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
368a3(rgyud 'bum): bgrang 'phreng tshe ga ji bzhin du// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'di ni grub 'gyur the tsom med// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // khams kun la sogs gzhan yang rung
368a4(rgyud 'bum): dung dang lung tang mu men ni/ / tshe dang nad med 'phel bar byed// gser dang de bzhin dngul dang ni// khyad par pad+ma'i sa bon dang // rin chen 'phreng ba mdzes pa na// mkhas pa yis ni bgrangs nas su//
368a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid phyir ni sngags bzlas na// dpal chen myur du thob par 'gyur// gur kum la sogs dri dang ni// khyad par du yang byu ru dang // tsan dan dmar po dngul la sogs// sgrub pa po yis ril bu
368a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / zhen cing rjes su chags pa mchog/ sgrub pa po la 'bras bu ster// ru rag lung tang sa bon dang // mi yi rus pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// khyad par du ni mngon spyod la'o// /
368a7(rgyud 'bum): zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// bo de cis ni las kun byed// sngags mnyes pa la lnga bcu ste// rjes su chags par de yi phyed// zhi ba la ni brgya yin te// rgyas la brgyad ni lhag par bya// mngon
368b1(rgyud 'bum): spyod la na drug cu ste/ / las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar// las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du// bgrang ba'i ba phreng ba rnams ni bya// gser gyi skud pas brgyu bar bya// las rnams kun byed dag pa yin// yang na ras
368b2(rgyud 'bum): bal skud pa ni/ / bu mo gzhon nu gzugs mdzes shing // yan lag shin tu rdzogs pa dang // blo gros ldan zhing ngag 'jam smra// de yis bkal ba'i skud pas rgyu// sngags kyi dngos grub grol bar 'gyur//
368b3(rgyud 'bum): ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom ste// steng ma mchod rten du ni brtag/ mchod rten chos kyi dbang po bas// chos kyi dbyibs ni dbus su bya// bskad la bya rog spu dang ni// bong bu rnga mo'i spu las bya// rta dang ma
368b4(rgyud 'bum): he'i spu yis ni/ / phan tshun sdang ba'i skud par bya// dur khrod skra yi skud pa dang // khyi yi spu dang bsres te bkal// drag po'i las la khyad par du// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// zhi ba la ni
368b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mor gzhag/ rgyas la gung mor dgal bar bya// dbang du bya ba srin lag gsungs// mtha' ma la ni mngon spyod bya// mthe bong lcags kyur byas nas ni// lha rnams thams cad dgug par bsam/
368b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyam bzhag sngags bzlas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mtha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
368b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bzlas pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas pad+mar rdo rje
369a1(rgyud 'bum): bcug pa bskyod cing gar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to// gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang dang // mchod rten dkyil 'khor grong khyer dang /
369a2(rgyud 'bum): khyim dang ldum ra la sogs pa// lto 'phye'i lto bar brko ba dang // slob ma sa gzhi gzung ba dang // bum pa sta gon gnas pa nyid// srung ba'i cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i// lha dang slob ma sta gon bcas// ye
369a3(rgyud 'bum): shes skud pa tshon rtsi rnams/ / mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol// slob ma yi ni cho ga dag/ ji bzhin bshad kyis lha mo nyon// sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // ye shes yongs su rdzogs
369a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lus/ / sems can don brtson sems kyis ni// dngos po kun gyis gsol ba gdab// slar yang dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// slob ma yis ni bla ma la// yang dang yang du gsol bar bya// gsol
369a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bla mas smra bya ste/ / yo byad thams cad 'byor ram ci// cung zad cig ni 'byor gyur la// kha cig dag ni ma 'byor ces// smra na slob dpon bdag chen gyis// de yis sems ni brtag par bya// brdan
369a6(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni brtan par te/ / g.yo ba la ni g.yo ba ru// 'dren ma la ni 'dren mar shes// slob ma yi ni rkang mthil du// gzhu 'dra'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam// lte bar ye shes me 'bar ba// de yi 'od
369a7(rgyud 'bum): zer snying khar 'bar/ / 'bar bas kun nas 'khrigs par bsgom// baM las byung ba'i mi sdug gzugs// sdig ni sna yi sgo nas dbyung // de nas khro bo'i gzugs bsgoms la// de ni kun nas za bar
369b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / oM badz+ra DA ki nI kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba pA paM da ha da ha b+ha smiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT/ bsgrub bya lha gzugs bskyed nas su// bsrung ba dag ni dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji bzhin du// brtag pa ru
369b2(rgyud 'bum): ni su yis nus/ / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dag ni brtags na 'grub// grong dang dur khrod tsheng dus dang // tshal dang lha khang grong khyer gyi// shar dang byang gi sa gzhi shis// lho
369b3(rgyud 'bum): dang nub phyogs de lta min/ / gtsug lag khang gi gnas khang dang // tshal dang rI rtse rdo leb dang // khang bzangs kyi ni steng phyogs dang // dur khrod dang ni lha yi khyim// sa yi cha ni ji snyed pa// rgyud
369b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun la bsngags pa yin/ / sa yi mtshan nyid shes par bya// yang na yid ni gar dga' bar// de rnams su ni dkyil 'khor bri// dman sogs dngos grub bye brag gis// pus mo chu so lte
369b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bar/ / brkos la phub ma rdo dang ni// gyo mo sol ba zug rngu dang // tsher ma la sogs bsal la bcag/ phyi nas mtho gang tshad du brko// de ni chu yis rab bkang la// shar du bltas te gom
369b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyar 'gro/ / slar log las ni brtag par bya// chu ni gang bar gnas na shis// bskams na sngags pas spang bar bya// sngon du 'bru la sogs pa gzhug/ de ltar sa yi cha sbyangs la// laM gyi sa bon
369b7(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i/ / gos dang rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// 'od zer ser po kun tu 'bar// sa yi lha mo lag pa na// gser gyi bum pa thogs pa ni// lus phyed sa
370a1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa ru/ / bltas te lag pa g.yas pa ni// sa la reg nas bskul bar bya// oM e h+ye ma hA de bi br-i thi bI lo ka mA te sarba rat+na saM pAr+Na di bya a lad+hA ra b+hU Shi te sAr nu pu ra niH/
370a2(rgyud 'bum): She badz+ra sa twa pra pu dzi ta gr-i hI tA/ i daM ar+g+haM a smin+dan+ni hi to b+ha ba hIHhi hi hi haM swA hA/ me tog dri la sogs mchod nas// de nyid du ni thim par bsam// khang bzang rdo leb gzhi dang ni// gtsug lag
370a3(rgyud 'bum): khang dang zhabs kyis bcag/ ba glang lhas dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram// lag pa sa la bzhag nas su// rang gi snying po brgyad brgyar bzla// der ni brko sogs bya mi dgos// de ltar sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi
370a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ / dkyil 'khor dang ni rjes mthun pa'i// rin chen la sogs bzhi 'gyur gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni khang pa bya// oM AHlaM hUM zhes brjod nas// sa 'og rdo rje'i dngos por bya// oM me di ni badz+ri b+ha
370a5(rgyud 'bum): ba hUM/ khung ni rim pa 'di yis dgang // de dbus khro bo chen po ni// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba bsgoms// de nas khwa yi gdong sogs ni// stang ni khro mo'i gzugs can la// lte ba man chad rtse
370a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa/ / rdo rje yi ni gzugs su spro// bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pa'i// bsgyings bcas sngags ni zlos bzhin du// de rnams snying kar gdab par bya// oM badz+ra DA ki nI sarba big+ha/
370a7(rgyud 'bum): nan a nuts+tshed ya kI lA ya hUM phaT/ de nas sngar bstan sa dbus su// rdo rje 'dzin chen sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid nye bar gnas nas ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs par bsgom// don dam la ni
370b1(rgyud 'bum): blta ba ste/ / 'di ni bsrung ba'i dam pa mchog/ gang zhig bsrung ba'i cho ga kun// 'di nyid du ni brtags pa yin// de nas rdo rje mda' yi ni// dra ba rdo rje ra ba dang // rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa ru bya//
370b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen por bsgyings byas la// dkyil 'khor sa la hUM zhes brjod// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis kun tu bskor// bdud rtsi lngas ni kun tu byug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnams su// tsan
370b3(rgyud 'bum): ngan sogs pas gru bzhir bya/ / phal pa yi ni gnas rnams su// so sor zlum por byas nas ni// lha yi 'khor lo cho ga bzhin// me tog sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas rin chen gser dang
370b4(rgyud 'bum): dngul/ / zangs sam 'jim pa dag kyang rung // ji ltar 'byor pa'i rjes mthun par// bum pa dag ni bya ba ste// rtsa ba nag po la sogs spangs// lho yangs bum pa bzang po'i dbyibs// bya
370b5(rgyud 'bum): gri seng gri dbyug pa yi/ / ut+pa la dang gzhan mi thub// sa ha de ba'i sman chen bcas// gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang // mu men byu ru rin chen lnga// til dang nas dang gro dang ni// mon sran
370b6(rgyud 'bum): gre'u dang mud kar bcas/ / ga pur tsan dan dmar po sogs// sman gyi chu yis dgang bar bya// de ltar dam tshig chen po yis// me tog chu dang ldan par bya// dngos po rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir//
370b7(rgyud 'bum): yid 'ong mi 'ong brtag mi bya// dngos kun rtog pa las byung bas// yid 'ong mi 'ong dpyad mi bya// rdzas kyi nus pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas nyid du 'bab par 'gyur// dper na snga
371a1(rgyud 'bum): yi rtsa ba ni/ / dkar po nag po rna ba dang // dpral bar byugs pas bud med kyi// zla mtshan 'dzag pa zhi bar 'gyur// glang chen gcin dang ga ba k+Sha// dkar po'i sa bon
371a2(rgyud 'bum): mig bskus na/ / lho ni 'khru bar 'gyur ba bzhin// 'dir yang yo byad khyad par can// sbyangs la nye bar spyod pa yis// khyad par 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// dper na sngags kyis skrangs pa'i
371a3(rgyud 'bum): dug/ zos pas nad rnams thams cad ni// 'joms shing bcung len nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang brtag par bya// thams cad rang rang mtshan ma dang // so so'i sngags kyis mngon par
371a4(rgyud 'bum): bzla/ / mtshan ma rang rang mdog tu bya// mgrin par ras zung gsar pas dkri// kha ni shing lo gsar pas dgab// ku sha'i chun po 'og tu bting // kha dog btsos pa'i skud pas brgyan// lhag
371a5(rgyud 'bum): par gnas shing mchod byas nas/ / bdug spos dag ni phul nas su// 'khor lo'i dbus su gzhag par bya// de nas pus mo g.yas pa ni// sa la btsugs te spyis gtugs la// 'di skad brjod de
371a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen par gsol/ / dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i rang bzhin can// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bdag ni de ring 'dri bar 'tshal// ji bzhin re ba bskang ba
371a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sems can rnams la sman slad du// mgon pos gus ldan bdag la ni// bka' drin dag ni gnang bar gsol// de ltar lan gsum brjod bya zhing // bum pa sta gon gnas nas su// sangs
371b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ / de ring bdag la brtse bar dgongs// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gang gzhan sngags kyi lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
371b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la ni dga' ba yi// 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // gang yang lha yi spyan can rnams// rdo rje can dag 'di zhes byas// dkyil 'khor dge ba 'di zhes pa// yo byad ci 'byor pa
371b3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / de ring 'dri bar 'tshal logs na// dkyil 'khor dang ni bcas pa yi// bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs bcas la// kun gyis byin rlobs nye bar bzhugs// cho ga bzhin du lan gsum
371b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / de nas gsar pa legs par bsgril// tshad ldan shin tu mdzes pa yi// skud pas shes rab thig ni gdab// cho ga bzhin du me tog mchog/ nyi shu rtsa lngar phye ba yi// skud pa dag ni
371b5(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bar bya/ / shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig skud brkyang ba'i rim pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor dag ni cha brgyad bya// phyed ni lag par bsdogs nas su// thig gdab cho ga brtsam par bya//
371b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ni// lte bar bzhag ste gzung bar bya// de yi 'og tu ci bder bya// sngags pa shar du kha bltas te// phyogs kun mnyam par dmigs nas su// mnyam zhing tshad dang ldan pa ru//
371b7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i thig gnyis bri bar bya// me mtshams gnas te rlung dang ni// bden bral grwar gnas dbang ldan du// sngags pa shar dang lhor bltas la// skud pa dag ni gdab par bya// 'di ni slob dpon
372a1(rgyud 'bum): slob ma dag/ g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// slob ma med na rang nyid kyis// phur bur btags te bri bar bya// nyis 'gyur byas te phur bur gdag/ nang gi 'khor lo rdo rje/
372a2(rgyud 'bum): rA// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rim gnyis su// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams nas ni// g.yas skor du ni skud pa bskor// sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad cha ru// mu khyud med par 'dod pa yin// sgo yi/
372a3(rgyud 'bum): tshad kyis sgo khyud de// de yis phyed kyis 'gram pa bya// sgo yi sum 'gyur tA ra Na// ba dan dril bur ldan pa yin// rgyal mtshan ba dan ri dgas bcas// kha khyer tshad dang ldan par bya// tA ra Na yi/
372a4(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol tu// tshon gyis sa yi nyis 'gyur du// phyi yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bya// 'khor lo de yi phyi rol tu// shing la sogs pa'i dur khrod bya// gzhan yang 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par// ji ltar
372a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par rab tu brtag/ thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi// dman dang lhag pas nad 'byung ste// phyogs ni 'khrul na slob ma myos// de bas skyon med shes par bya// ye shes thig skud gshegs
372a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol nas/ / de nas las 'di brtsam par bya// 'dod dang thar pa rab ster ba'i// tshon rtsi dag ni bskyed par bya// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ldang // kun gyi nang rol nag po ru// tshon gyi cha ni rim
