372a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dgye/ / de nas slob mas ci dgar dgye// tshon rtsi re re'i zheng du ni// sgo yi nyi shu cha yi tshad// gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing // yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni// ri mo dma' bas dngos mi 'grub/
372b1(rgyud 'bum): yon po gdung ba skyed byed pas// dpangs ni mthe'u chung gang tsam du// mtho zhing drang ba bri bar bya// de la sbom na nad 'byung ste// dma' na nor ni zad par 'gyur// yon pos phan tshun sdang 'gyur te//
372b2(rgyud 'bum): chad na bla ma slob ma dag/ gnyis ka 'chi bar shes par bya// g.yas bskor ma yin bris na ni// rdul tshon phur bus btab par 'gyur// shar ni shin tu dkar ba'i mdog/ lho ni dmar po'i mdog
372b3(rgyud 'bum): tubya/ / nub phyogs ser por bya ba ste// byang ni ljang ku nyid du bya// cho ga dag ni de dag gis// sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa// rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor// 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro
372b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas/ / khwa gdong la sogs dbye bar bya// dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ni// ge sar dang ni ldan pa la// mtshams rnams su ni thod pa'o// dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin sngo// sku la sogs
372b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i kha dog dbye/ / de ltar 'khor lo lha mo che// dpa' bo rnams ni mchod par bya// sngar bshad sa yi mtshan nyid la// dbus su mtho bar bri bar bya// shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni// sngags pa rnams
372b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ / dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dang // rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag thob// byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur ram// nor rnams brlag par 'gyur ba ste// yang na nad kyis 'debs par
372b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas// myur du rigs rnams zad par 'gyur// dbus su dma' ba'i rang bzhin sa// sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang ldan// de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang /
373a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang dang rdo rje 'jigs byed du// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bshad dang ma bshang gang ci'ang rung // thams cad he ru ka la gnas/
373a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro
373a3(rgyud 'bum): las/ sa gzung ba dang / sta gon la gnas pa dang / thig bri ba'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di
373a4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / rim par phye ba bcu bdun par// khyod kyis khams kyi bcud len gsungs// phyi rol rnam pa du zhig dang // nang ni rnam pa du ru dbye// dgra dang mdza' ba shes par ma dang /
373a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzhan yang tshad dbye dang // skam sa dang ni rlan can yul// khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa dag/ ngo mtshar chen po 'di dag la// bdag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
373a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / da ni sde tshan rnams dang ni// 'brel ba rab tu bshad kyis nyon// sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// chung ngu la sogs bye brag dag/ rlung dang mkhris pa bang kan sogs// skyes
373a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni bud med kyang / / re re zhing yang gsum gsum 'dod// nag po ser skya sngo bsangs dang // rtsu ba dang 'jam dang yan lag mkhrang // 'dzer pa can zhes bya ba yin// sdom thung bong tshod
373b1(rgyud 'bum): ran dang ring / / sngo bsangs mtshungs rtsub mgrin pa ring // mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste// 'phreng can thun mong nu ma med// mdog nyams sA li'i dri dang ni// chang dang chang min myos pa'i dri/
373b2(rgyud 'bum): chang gnyis dang ni chang gsum ste// rked pa yi ni bye brag yin// sbrang rtsi ltar 'dzag sbrang rtsi'i dri// so sor bya yi gzhan du min// yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// bu mo'i bcud ni drangs
373b3(rgyud 'bum): te blugs/ / 'dri ni so sor sgrub pa yin// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// yon tan gsal bar gyur pa ste// sgrub pa'i dbang po'i yon tan byed// nyi shu'i
373b4(rgyud 'bum): bar du gzhon nu yin/ / de rnams thabs kyis sbyang bar bya// stobs dang ldan pa gzung ba'i gnas// de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni// rdzas rnams yongs su sbyong byed yin// bya ba kun gyi mtsham
373b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan ni/ / byed po za bo'i lam chen yin// dngul chu yi ni shing chen pos// des na chu skyes yon tan lnga// rang skyon 'joms pa yid ches yin// de dag ni thun mong gi cho ga'o// lho skyes ma brnyings
373b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyi las/ / bskyed don na ni rgas pa 'joms// lhang tsher dngul chu bcings pa'i mchog/ gser bsgyur rtsi chen cho ga yis// rdzu 'phrul la sogs gsal bar 'gyur// lhang tsher dang ni dngul
373b7(rgyud 'bum): chu bzhi/ / rma bya'i mgrin pa'i gzugs dang ni// sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal pa'i gzugs// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// de yi tshad ni kun shes bya// de yang stobs ldan bcud bral na//
374a1(rgyud 'bum): sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur// dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog ni// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// mkhris pa dag kyang skyed par byed// dmar pos khrag ni skyed par
374a2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / dkar pos gzer nad skyed 'gyur zhing // srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin// ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang // ser skyas bshang gci'i lam ni 'gag/ nyis 'gyur chu ni shin tu 'ching //
374a3(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa dag ni brgyad ldan pas// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'// bcud len sngon por shes byas nas// 'bad pas de ltar bcud len spyad// bzhag pa me yi gnas dang ni// chu yi shing la brten
374a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / 'bru yi dbus su gzhug pa dang // bye ma'i phung por 'khrul 'khor 'jug/ gso la kha cig 'bras bu dang // kha cig me tog 'dab mar bcas// shun pa dang ni rus pa sogs// sgrub po
374a5(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i longs spyod ni/ / de nyid rig pas sbyar bar bya// cho ga du ma mthong ba yis// bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa'i// yo byad dag ni rnyed 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes
374a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang ni bzhag pa dang gsol ba'i cho ga'o/ / lci ba dang ni rdo nang dang // ba glang ma he'i lhas la sogs// cho ga bzhin du rnam brtags pa'i// bcud kyis rdzas ni gzhag par bya// bcud ler sngon po
374a7(rgyud 'bum): shes nas ni/ / 'bad de de ltar bcud len bya// bcud brtag pa'i gnas kyi cho ga'o// glang chen mgo yi bcud blugs te// seng ger btso bar byas pa yis// 'bras chen ster ba'i yon tan 'gyur//
374b1(rgyud 'bum): sha ri sha yi rtsa ba dang // gser shog gis ni gso bar bya// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa yin// pags pa dang ni shun pa dang // me tog 'bras bur ldan pa yis// sngon por bcas te btsos pa dag/

380b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' dang ldan pas snga dro bya/ / gos ser la sogs brgyan nas ni// byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te// bzang po yi ni 'dug stangs sam// yang na rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas// 'bras chan
380b4(rgyud 'bum): dkar po zho dang ni/ / bcas bza' de nyid rig pa yis// bza' dang btung bas tshim nas su// rin chen 'byung bar bsgoms nas ni// yi ge laM las byung ba yi// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor la//
380b5(rgyud 'bum): glang chen steng du gnas pa yi// bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su// sngags kyi mthar ni oM brjod cing // rgyas par bya ba'i cho ga sbyar// dbang gi don du 'di gsungs te// mtshan mo chags pa'i
380b6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis ni/ / nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// dmar po'i rgyan gyis klubs nas ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas su// rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bsgom// yaM las byung ba'i rlung
380b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil la/ / btsun mo'i pad+ma 'jam ldan par// bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su// sngags kyi mthar ni hoHbzlas te// 'od zer dmar pos bskul nas su// zur mig blta bas sbyin sreg na//
381a1(rgyud 'bum): bud med rnams ni rmongs par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // dam tshig 'das shing khro ba la// sdung ba'i sems kyis lhor bltas te// mtshan phyed dam na
381a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin phyed la/ / gos sogs sngon pos brgyan nas su// mkhrang zhing rtsub pa'i stan la ni// khro bo'i skyil krung gnas nas su// rdo rje khro bor bsgom par bya// raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// bsgrub
381a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dmigs nas su/ / hUM dang laT ces bya ba ni// 'brug gi sgra ltar grags pa ste// thog ma dbus mtha' sbyar bar bya// bsgrub bya'i las kyi cho ga'o// de nas sgrub po dpal ldan pas// rgyan
381a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyis brgyan nas su/ / gsang ba gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gnas// sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya// chu yi snod ni g.yon du gzhag/ g.yas su bsreg rdzas gzhag par bya// las kun byed
381a5(rgyud 'bum): pas bzlas pa yis/ / rdzas rnams kun la bsang gtor te// de nas bkra shis bcas pa yis// g.yas nas bskor bas ku sha dgram// rtse mo'i cha las byas pa ni// dri ma med cing ma nyams
381a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'dab mar bcas shing kha dog sngo// shin tu ring min thung ba yin// mdud par byas pa g.yas bskor dgram// de nas las kyi rjes mthun par// thab khung phyogs kyi bye brag gis// gzhan
381a7(rgyud 'bum): yang shar phyogs bstan te 'gram/ / de yis sgor ni bkram nas su// de nas thab kyi nang du ni// sgrub pa po yis ku sha sbyin// ku sha'i las ni rdzogs nas su// me yi las ni brtsam par bya// gtsub/
381b1(rgyud 'bum): shing las byung me'am ni// yang na las kyi bye brag gis// skye gnyis la sogs me yang rung // rlung yab kyis ni sbar nas su// 'o mar ldan pa'i bud shing sogs// me ni gsal bar sbar bar bya//
381b2(rgyud 'bum): me ni 'bar bar shes nas su// de nas me lha dgug par bya// me yis phyogs nas spyan drang ba// drang srong gi ni 'khor gyis bskor// yi ge raM las yang dag byung // oM las byung ba'i pad+ma ni// mdzes
381b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lug gi steng gnas pa/ / bsam gtan la bzhugs yang dag bsam// mdog dang na bza' rgyan la sogs// las kyi rjes su mthun par bya// me yi khams kyi rang bzhin te// 'bar ba'i 'phreng
381b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya chen bcas/ / zhal gcig dang ni phyag bzhir ldan// rdo rje rtse gsum dbyig pa dang // bgrang 'phreng ril ba spyi blugs ni// gAyas dang g.yon du rim bzhin bsam// rdo rje me ni byon pa dang /
381b5(rgyud 'bum): / thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de nas arga sogs byin te// cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya// las kun byed pa'i chu yis ni// gsang gtor byas nas zhal bsil sbyin// dngos grub blang ba'i
381b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa yis/ / de yis khar ni dgang blugs dbul// dge ba'i las la gru mo ni// pus mo'i bar du bcug ste bsreg/ drag po'i las la lag pa g.yon// phyi ru phyung ste bsreg par bya// oM badz+ra
381b7(rgyud 'bum): an la ma hA b+hu ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+ha sl-i ku ru sarba duSh+TAn bin+d+ha hUM laT/ me yis sngags ni de nyid la// las dang rjes su mthun par spel// oM sarba sam+ba de swA hA/ zho zin gyi'o// oM ag+na ye sA hA/
382a1(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi'o// oM a pra ti ha ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni ku sha'i 'o// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba til gyis sdig pa bsreg par bya ba'i'o// oM badz+ra A yu
382a2(rgyud 'bum): / She swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dUr ba'i ste tshe spel bar bya ba'i 'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni 'bras kyi ste/ khyim rgyas par bya ba'i 'o// 'bru la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang 'dir mar gyis bsgos
382a3(rgyud 'bum): te bsreg par bya'o/ / de 'og bsang gtor zhal bsil sogs// me ni tshim byas 'bar ba yi// rnam par yongs su thim par 'gyur// de nas me dbus bdag gi lha// rgyan dang na bza' kha
382a4(rgyud 'bum): dog sogs/ / las kyi rjes su mthun par ni// bsam zhing me yi mtshan ma brtag/ gser la sogs pa'i kha dog gis// me yi mdog ni shes par bya// zhi la kha dog dkar po shis// rgyas
382a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni gser lta bu/ / dbang la byu ru bcag pa'i mdog/ mngon spyod la ni nag po dang // sngon sogs mtshan mar shes par bya// dbyibs ni dpal gyi be'u dang ni// rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs pa/
382a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mtshan mas brgyan pas shis// me ni shin tu dri zhim na// dge ba'i las kyi dngos grub ster// mi ro'i dri dang nya yi dri// du ba che zhing sgra dang ldan// me stag gis ni sngags pa sreg
382a7(rgyud 'bum): me yi mtshan ma ngan pa de/ / mi dge ba yi mtshan ma ni// mi dge ba yi las la shis// de nyid shis pa'i las rnams la// shis pa'i mtshan ma ma yin no// de nas bgegs ni bskrad nas su//
382b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas slar yang sbyin sreg brtsam// de nas rang gi sngags kyis ni// me la bsang gtor byas nas su// dgang gzar cho ga bzhin bkang la// da gang blugs lan gsum sbyin par bya// oM a ga na
382b2(rgyud 'bum): / ye a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir// yi ge gsum gyi sngags mngon du bzlas pa dang rang gi sngags spel te rim pa bzhin du bsreg par
382b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de la bsreg pa'i go rim ni 'di yin te/ dang por ni yam shing ngo // de'i 'og tu ni mar ro// de nas gro dang til la sogs pa'o// de nas bza' ba la sogs pa'o// de nas zan no// de nas
382b4(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa'i tshogs bsregs la/ de nas rnal 'byor pas me tog dang / so rtsi la sogs pa dbul lo// de
382b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rang gi lha'ang mchod nas 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub gsol bar bya'o/ / de nas mgon po gshegs su gsol nas/ slar yang slob mas me lha mchod de gshegs su gsol na rnal 'byor/
382b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// gser ram dngul lam zangs ma 'am// mchod sbyin gyi ni shing yang rung // dgar gzar skya dang dbyig pa sogs// tshad dang
382b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs la sogs pa bshad/ / steng du sor bzhi dang ldan pa'i// sgyu ni gru bzhir bya ba ste// zabs su sor gnyis brko bar bya// dkyil du ye shes rdo rjes brgyan// de yi steng du mchu sor bzhi//
383a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur bya// de dbus bcud ni 'dzag pa yi// bu ga mthe'u chung tshang du bya// de nas 'og tu dbyug pa ste// rdo rje rin chen sor drug brgyan// dgang gzar chos
383a2(rgyud 'bum): nister ba'i ma/ / blugs gzar ro ldan thabs yin te// sems can kun la phan byed pa// rgya ru sor gnyis zabs sor gcig/ kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra// dbus su rdo rjes mdzes pa
383a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / lhag ma sngon bzhin mtshon par bya// sor mo lnga dang ldan pa yis// gang ba'i sbyin sreg bya bar brjod// sor mo gsum dang ldan pa yi// sbyin sreg cig shos bya bar brjod// zhi ba byang chub
383a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis gzung / / nor bu'i khu tshur rgyas pa la// dbang dang dgug pa dag la no// de bzhin pad+ma'i khu tshur gzung // drag po'i las la 'bad pa yis// de bzhin khro bo'i khu tshur bya// dgang
383a5(rgyud 'bum): gzar blugs gzar gyi cho ga'o/ / dgang blugs zhes bya ba ni grang ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o// de yi cho ga gzhan bshad bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // dge ba yi ni las rnams la//
383a6(rgyud 'bum): gdong ni 'dzum dang bcas par bya// drag po'i las la khro gdong gis// yam shing la sogs bsreg par bya// de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang // gsang dang rdo rje 'jigs byed bcas// ti la ka
383a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs ma bshad pa/ / sbyin sreg mdo ru bsdus pa'o// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
383b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thams cad kyi gsang chen sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // slar
383b2(rgyud 'bum): yang lha mos gar byas te/ / tshig 'di dag ni gsol bar gyur// chung ngu la sogs ji lta bu// de rnams bye brag ji ltar lags// khams kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs la// rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gang bshad
383b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / de dag bdag ni the tshom skyes// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da ni chung ngu la sogs kyi// bye brag la sogs bshad par bya// yon tan ldan pa'i
383b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzas mtshan nyid/ / bshad kyis shes rab lha mo nyon// chung ngu la sogs pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag ni chung ngu la sogs pa ste/ sogs pa'i sbas par ma dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po dag la
383b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / gnas skabs kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhir dbye bar bya'o// rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbye bas bud med dang skyes pa dag bye brag tu shes par bya ste/
383b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya'o// de'ang rlung can la ni snum pa'i rdzas sbyin par bya la/ mkhris pa can la ni bsil ba'i rdzas byin na phan te/ bad kan can la ni kha ba dang / bska ba'i rdzas sbyin no// yang
383b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsub pa dang / bsil ba dang / snum pa rnams rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan can so sor bsngags so// skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang // re re zhing yang gsum gsum 'dod// ces bya
384a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni khams kyi rang bzhin gyi nges pa gsum du 'dod pa'o/ / kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa ste/ ma ning la ni bcud kyis len mi sbyar ba'i phyir ro// nag po ni kha dog nag po ste 'dzag pa la
384a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / ser skya yang kha dog ste 'pho ba la'o// sngo bsangs ni nag po dang ser po gnyis 'dus pa ste/ 'dzag pa dang 'pho ba gnyis ka la'o// dang zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i don
384a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / rtsub ces bya ba ni ba lang gi lce ltar rtsub pa'o// 'jam pa ni pad+ma can zhes bya ba'o// mkhrang ba ni khu ba sra ba ste/ gang gi khu ba 'thas par gyur pa'o// 'dzer pa can ni dung can ma ste/ pad+ma
384a4(rgyud 'bum): la sha 'dzer yod pa'o/ / bud med 'di dag ni bcud bcing ba la dbang bar gyur pa la yin no// sbom zhes bya ba ni gdong dang / kha dang / nu ma 'phel kha che zhing sbom pa'o// thung zhes bya ba ni bong
384a5(rgyud 'bum): thung ba dang skra thung zhing chang gi dri dang ldan la 'dod pas myos pa ste/ de dag ni bong tshod ran zhes bya bar bshad do// ring ba ni gdong dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa'i dkyus ring ba'o// gzhan
384a6(rgyud 'bum): yang nya'i dri dang ldan pa'i khu ring du 'dzag pa ste/ dung can ma'o// sngo bsangs mtshungs zhes bya ba ni dbyangs mi snyan zhing yan lag dang skra thung ba'o// yan lag rtsub ces bya ba ni dri mi zhim zhing dgros
384a7(rgyud 'bum): dal ba ste/ ri mo can ma'o// mgrin pa ring ba ni gang gi mgrin pa mtho ba de mgrin pa ring ba ste/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i 'od yod cing yid du 'ong la dus rtag tu rdul gyi dri zhim pa dang / ri dgas kyi
384b1(rgyud 'bum): mig 'dra la ri dgas ltar lta zhing mgrin pa dang lho ri dgas 'dra la rked pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po lta bu ste/ pad+ma can du shes par bya'o// mig ni sangs ltar dmar ba zhes bya ba ni mig dang / rkang pa
384b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / lag pa shin tu dmar zhing ma li ka'i dri dang ldan pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs la dga' zhing de bzhin du bde ba'i dngos grub ster ba'o// pi no u na ta zhes bya ba ni pi na ri 'o ma
384b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa ste/ de mkhrang zhing skra li ba dang / bzhin kun nas zlum pa dang / lte ba'i dbus na ri mo gsum yod pa de ni 'phreng ba can du shes par bya ba'o// thun mong ni gang gi rgyu sbyin par byed
384b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / nu ma med ces bya ba ni ngang tshul ngan pa dang skyes pa ltar nu ma spangs pa ste/ yan lag ma tshang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// mdog nyams pa zhes bya ba ni mdangs rtsub pa'o// sa la dri
384b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni sA li ltar yid du 'ong ba'i dri yod pa'o/ / chang ni stobs te/ dam tshig dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o// chang min dri zhes bya ba ni khyad par du mi
384b6(rgyud 'bum): / ro'o dri'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// myos pa ni shin tu khyad par gyur pa'o// cha gnyis pa ni cha gnyis te gnyis gnyis bsdus pa'o// cha gsum ni cha gnyis po de gsum du bsgyur ba ste/ smra rer/
384b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sha che ba dang / rus sbal gyi rgyab ltar mtho ba dang / glang po che'i ze ba ltar mkhrang ba dang / skyes gnas yangs pa dang / khrag dang khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa ste/ drug po de dag ni
385a1(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang ma ste/ su b+ha ga yin la de dag ni sgrub pa po la mchog ster ba yin no// de dag ni rked pa'i bye brag go// de nyid kyis snang rtsi ltar 'dzag sbrang rtsi'i dri snga
385a2(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi'i rang bzhin no/ / so so ni dam tshig gi don dang gzhan la so so snga tha dad par sbyar gyi/ gzhan du ste sems can gyi don du ra sa ya na la sogs pa las gzhan du ni nam yang ma yin te/
385a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du ni tshig tsam yang sbyar bar mi bya'o// 'dir ni so so sgrub pa ste/ yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis zhes bya ba la/ yid las byung ba ni yid la sems pa ste/ 'khrul 'khor
385a4(rgyud 'bum): ni shing dang pags pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'khrul 'khor ro/ / sgrub pa ni nges bsgrub par bya'o// bu mo gcig ni dang po ste/ byang chub dang thar pa'i don du'o// gnyis ni dam tshig gi don du'o//
385a5(rgyud 'bum): mang po ni nor gyi don du brtag par bya zhes bya ba ni khyad par du rdzas bco brgyad kyi sde/ gsal bar gyur pa ni gcig nyid mtha' yas pa'i yon tan ster ba'i phyir ro// su la zhe na/ sgrub pa
385a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po la ste/ yon tan byed pa ni de nyid kyis bya'i gdong pa'i rtsi'i bdud rtsis yon tan de yang dang yang du goms par bya bas so// byis pa zhes bya ba ni shrad ma bye ba ste/ bu mo gzhon nu
385a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / nyi shu zhes bya ba lo nyi shu'i bar du'o// de rnams thabs kyis sbyang bar bya zhes bya ba ni de rnams nyid sa bon gdab pa'i zhing du gyur pas spang bar bya ba yin la/ de rnams nyid thabs
385b1(rgyud 'bum): te mngon par 'dod pa'i don nye bar gtod cing ster la 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / phra mo ni yid du 'ong ba ste/ nam mkha' lta bu'i spyod yul lo// stobs ldan pa rung
385b2(rgyud 'bum): ba yin gnas zhes bya ba la/ stobs ldan ni nus pa yod pa'o// gzung ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o// gnas ni dbyibs te thur du 'bebs pa dang / gyen du 'phen pa'i do la dang / kur pa la
385b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'o/ / rdzas ni yongs su sbyong zhes bya ba la rdzas ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'o// de las glu ltar sbyong zhing phan 'dogs par byed pas na yongs su sbyong ba'o// kun gab ces bya ba ni srog
385b4(rgyud 'bum): chags ne'u le ltar kun tu 'khyud pa dang / phug ron lngar 'o byed cing sos ma mchu bzung ste 'jib pa dang / skra nas gzung ba dang / sen mo 'debs pa dang / khu tshur bsnan pa dang / sos
385b5(rgyud 'bum): 'debs shing 'dral ba dang / mchan khung dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla gnyis dang / mgrin pa dang / rgyab tu sen mos 'dral zhing sid ces bya ba'i sgra dang bcas par sngag
385b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sngon du bya zhing / gzhan yang nu ma mnye ba la sogs pas de'i sems rnam par 'dul ba'i bya ba de dag so sor byed pa'i tshul rnam pa brgyad dang sbyar ro// sen mo 'debs pa de'ang
385b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam zhing gzhon nu la ni ku sha'i tshad tsam du gdab pa dang dral bar byas te/ rked pa dang / rgyab dang / b+ha ba'i steng dang / swa dang / 'gram pa la sogs pa rnams su 'bras kyi gzegs
386a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo ci rigs par chags pa lhong pa rnams la gdab bo/ / de'ang sen mo 'ba' zhig ni ma yin gyi/ 'o bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tshim par bya'o//
386a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig chags pa sra ba rnams la ni sor mo ring po gsum sbrul gyi mgo ltar byas la/ mo mtshan gi bu gar bcug nas srid ces bya ba'i sngags 'byung gi bar du drud par byas pas/ rgan mo
386a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa tshim par bya ba ni rdo rje sor mo zhes bya'o/ / gang zhig gzhon zhing mnyen pa rnams la ni rang gi mtshan ma dang 'od dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 'bab pa'i ru ra lce bcug sde bsgral
386a4(rgyud 'bum): ba tsam gyis dga' bar bya ste/ rdo rje lce'i thur ma zhes bya'o// de ltar sgrub pa pos yang dang yang du bskul bas snying 'dar ba dang / dpa' bas pos shing sems kyi rdul phra mo'i chu 'dzag la
386a5(rgyud 'bum): ngo tsha ba la sogs pa dang bral te/ ba spu langs nas shin tu chags pas blta zhing 'khyud pa la gus par gyur cing sad ces zer pa dang / de nas skyal grum bcings la rdo rje dang pad+mo mnyam par sbyor bas
386a6(rgyud 'bum): do la dang / ku ra pa na dang / pu tsi dang / ud kre pa dang / su pra sa ri dang / gra ma na gra ra dang / preng khe na dang / u ru s+pho ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan bcos thams cad las byung ba'i
386a7(rgyud 'bum): ka ra na bsten par bya ste/ de dag kun kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar brjod do// de dag gis rang gi don gyi dngos grub rab tu sgrub pas na de dang kAr gab las byang ba'i rdzas ni yongs su sbyong
386b1(rgyud 'bum): byed yin zhes bya ba nyid zab mo zhes bya ste/ de'ang ji srid du yul rnams kyi ra sa ya na la/ skyes bus dman par spyod cing dga' ba'i 'khor lor zhugs nas kyang / skyes bu dman par spyod pa ni/
386b2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'pho zhes bya'o// bya ba kun gyis lam gyis ni zhes pa ni byang chub kyi lam ste zab mo zhes bya ba phyi dang nang gi mig la sogs pa'i dbang po dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad gcig
386b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bsdus shing rang rang gi tshul dang rang rang gi cha la gnas pa'i nye ba'i longs spyod pa thams cad bsdus te nyams bskur ba yin gyis/ gzhan du so so bas ni thams cad la re bar longs spyod par
386b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / nye bar longs spyod pa de nyid khrid par byed pas na lam mo// dngul chu yi ni shing chen po zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dpag bsam gyi shing 'dod pa'i don thams cad ster ba ltar byang chub kyi
386b5(rgyud 'bum): sems 'dis kyang 'bras bu thams cad spyod yul du byed pa'i phyir ro/ / des na chu skyes yon tan ldan// rang skyon 'joms pa'i yid ches yin// zhes bya ba la gang gis don sngon cing gsal bar
386b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pas na yid ches te/ de kho na nyid la lta bar byed pa'o// de'ang 'dir phyag rgya'o ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbugs phyung ba yin la/ phyag rgya'i ye shes kyang rnam pa gnyis te/ dngos grub
386b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dang / bde ba 'jug pas rig pa dang rig par bya ba gzung ngo // de ltar na dbang po kun las skyes pa'i yid ches pa des dpal dang / na so dang / nad med pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs
387a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te/ dpal dang / na so dang / chags pa dang ldan pa'i zla ba la sogs pa la nye bar spyad pas dbang phyug dang / nad med pa dang / stobs 'phel ba dang /
387a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi don du yun ring du 'tsho zhing bde ba dam pa de nyid kyis de kho na nyid la lta zhing yid ches pas phyin cig ma log pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// rang gi zhes bya ba
387a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rang gi khu ba ste/ des zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / dgug pa la sogs pa kun tu 'gyur te/ de nyid ni tsa zhes bya ba ra sa ya na'i gtso bor bshad do// lho skyes ma brnyings
387a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyi lus zhes bya ba la/ ma brnyings pa ni ma rgas pa ste/ 'bu la sogs pa dang bral zhing mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o// lto skyes ni mngal nas dang po byung ba shi ba'o// las ni de'i
387a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ste mi snang ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur ba dang / rtsi la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad sbyar ba'o// skyed byed don ni rgas pa 'joms zhes bya ba la/
387a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kyi mthu gang gis skyed byed kyi don rgas pa 'joms pa ste/ skyed byed ni 'byin pa po'o// rdzas der skyed byed kyi don nyid rgas pa 'joms po'o// rgas pa 'joms pa la sogs
387a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang dbang pos o tsa ka'i nad rnams la zla ba brgyad du mngal na gnas pa'i byis pa'i ros bcom pa la sogs pa yin no/ / lhang tsher dngul chu bcing ba'i mchog ces bya ba la/ mchog
387b1(rgyud 'bum): ni gsal ba dang / mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// rtsi ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i cha zhes bya ba la/ rdzu 'phrul ni nam mkhar 'phur ba la sogs pa'o// cha ni cha shas te skyon gyi
387b2(rgyud 'bum): / tshogs yin la/ de dang bral ba la 'grub pa'o// dngul chu bzhi zhes bya ba ni ba ra da dang / nye ba'i bcud dang / bcud can dang / rtsi'i dbang po rnams so// lhang tsher bzhi zhes bya ba ni
387b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po'i bye brag gis so// de re re zhing yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ rma bya'i mgrin pa dang / sbrul dang / sbal pa dang / sprin gyi bye brag
387b4(rgyud 'bum): gis so/ / de la rma bya'i mgrin pa ni mgrin pa'i spu ltar sngon dmar du 'dug pa'o// sngon po ni bcud chen po ste lhag par gzung bar bya'o// sbrul gyi gzugs ni bye brag tu 'phel bas sprul
387b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbyings ltar gyur pa'o/ / sbal pa'i gzugs ni sbal pa'i 'gros lta bu'o// sprin gyi gzugs ni chu 'dzin gyi 'gros lta bu'o// stobs ldan sogs bcud bral na ni// sngon bzhin
387b6(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ / zhes bya ba la/ stobs ldan ni mu zi ste/ de'i skyon ni lci ba dang / snum pa dang / sra ba dag yin te/ skyon des snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ba'o// gnag pa dang /
387b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba dang / lci ba ni lhang tsher dang rtsi'i skyon no// rdo dang / rlan dang / lci ba dang / srog chags kyis zos pa lta bu dang / rtul ba ni rnon po'i skyon te/ skyon lnga po des snga ma bzhin no//

388a2(rgyud 'bum): men gyi ni gser med pa'o/ / nor bu'i ni phug pa'o// gser gyi ni bcos ma'i lhad do// dngul gyi ni 'gas pa dang sra ba la sogs pa'o// zha nye'o ni yan lag la gnod pa'o// ro nye'i ni sbrul ltar ring
388a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / 'khar ba'i g.yu dang byi ma la sogs pa ni skye bo'o// skyon de dag thams cad kyis kyang snga ma bzhin te rin po che'i cho ga'o// ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan srog chags dang rtsa ba la sogs pa'ang
388a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sA sta'i 'dab na pi yang ser skya'o// kha di sa'i rlig pa'i yang bcos ma dang ser skya'o// sman sen mo'i ni phag pa'i rna ba lta bu'o// ri dgas kyi skyon chen po ni nya dang thal sman la sogs pa'i dri
388a5(rgyud 'bum): lta bu dang bsregs na myur du thal bar 'gyur ba ste spang bar bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i sdig pa'i yang cung zad ser zhing skya ba ste/ las thams cad la spang bar bya'o// lung ba'i ni mdog med pa dang /
388a6(rgyud 'bum): skyaskye bo dang / phra ba'o// shu dag gi ni ljang kur sgrub pa pos shes par bya'o// ru rta'i ni bcag na rgya mtsho'i dbu pa lta bu'o// ka ko la'i ni sbal ba'i gzugs ltar mi mnyam la sbun pa ltar yang ba'o//
388a7(rgyud 'bum): dza ti pha la'i skyon ni skye ba dang / snum med pa dang sgra phyung ba'o// sug smel dang 'bras bu gsum gyi skyon ni sbun pa ltar yang ba ste/ nyes pa gsum skyes par byed do// re'u nu ka'i ni na le

388b3(rgyud 'bum): spang bar bya'o/ / gla sgang gi ni rlan can las skyes pa'o// tshi tra ka'i ni kha dog ljang ku'o// saM hA li'i ni rtsa ba med pa'o// ku su ma'i phra ba'o// tsam pa ka'i ni kha cher bye bar bya'o// kai ta ki'i ni

389a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i nor bu skye bar 'gyur ro/ / brag ser po chu ser po 'bab pa las ni byA ru dang / btsag dang / brgya byin gyi gzhu lta bu'i nor bu dang / nor bu dzi ba ni ri dmar po dag las
389a2(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ro/ / ri'i ljongs gang ljang sngon du 'dug cing dro ba dang bcas la rlangs pa du ba lta bu yod cing // sa rdo gnag pa las ni gser rdo dang / 'khar ba dang / gzhan dag dang / lcags khab
389a3(rgyud 'bum): len gyi rigs rnam pa bzhi skye bar 'gyur ro/ / brag ljang sngon las ni byi ba la sogs pa rnams dang / mu men dang / nor bu snyam pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dag skye bar 'gyur ro// brag kha dog sngon

389b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyis kun tu gtor ba ni// thams cad rmongs par byed pa yi// dngul chu zhes ni bya bar grags// chu gting las byung dman pa ste// de bzhin ri las skyes pa mchog/ da ni dri yi sbyor ba dag/

393a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo sgyu ma che/ / sbrang rtsi lta bur bcud bsdus pa// rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yin// gnas sogs ji bzhin mchod ras su// bde mchog sngags kyi bsnyen par bya//

393a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos bzhin du byas na ni// dngos grub 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// sngar bshad rig pa sbyang byas te// dang po dam tshig sbyin par bya// gcer bu'i btul zhugs 'dzin pa yis// gnyis pas ming
393a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs dbang ni bskur/ / dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bsten// stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i// ro ni mi mchog gis rtogs bya// sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas// sbom po zhes ni bya ba ste/
393a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin// bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin// len pa snying stobs zhes byar bshad// snying stobs rdzas zhes bya ba ste// dngul ni zhu ba zhes byar brjod// de ltar rdzas dang zhu ba
393a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o// mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste// phra mo nam mkha'i khams mtshan nyid// phung po la sogs khyad par dang // khams rnams thams cad 'tshod pa yin// sna tshogs
393b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni/ / nga yi ye shes kyis bskul yin// de dag lha mo skal chen mo// rdzas dang khams ni bsdus pa ste// brtson 'grus dman zhing tha shal dang // bsod nams
393b2(rgyud 'bum): dman pas mthong mi 'gyur/ / brtson 'grus bcud kun gnas yin pas// de bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// bcud ni bcing dang gso ba dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// yongs
393b3(rgyud 'bum): su smin pa'i mchog gis ni/ / mnyam med bcud la brten pa yi// rnam bcing la sogs nyes pa brgya// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dgag/ bcud ni nag po sngon po ste// bcud ni yongs su grub
393b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / dngul chu ljang tsher cho ga yis// ji srid bcud chen grub kyi bar// de srid du ni 'bad de dpyad// 'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba// de ni karan rgod ma'i kha// 'khrul 'khor gang
393b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig rdza rnga 'dra/ / de nyid bong bu rnga mo'i kha// rgod ma'i kha ni 'od ma yin// spu gu yis ni brgyan par bya// ka raN+Da yi 'khrul 'khor ni// ral gri shubs kyis brgyan par bya// 'khrul 'khor
393b6(rgyud 'bum): dong bu'i kha zhes pa/ / kang ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar// rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor ni// bya rog mchu dang mtshungs par sbyar// tshar bcang ba ni sbal pa ste// 'od ma can gyis sbrang rtsir btso/
393b7(rgyud 'bum): bya rog mchu can bung bar btso// rdo le ba ba bar zhing 'od dang bcas// kang ka'i mchu can glang chen btso// ral gri shubs can 'khrul 'khor gyis// seng ge ru ni btso ba yin// bcud chen yi ba
394a1(rgyud 'bum): dang khros pa dang / / 'thor zhing shin tu chos pa yis// chu yi nang du 'bros par 'gyur// de nas glang chen mgo bcud dang // mu pi la sogs byin nas ni// bsregs pas tshar
394a2(rgyud 'bum): gcad mnan pa dang / / 'og tu sa la bor nas su// 'dar zhing rmongs la du bar 'thul// khrol khrol gyi ni sgra 'byin no// de nas a sa gnad dang // ba la tsa kra marda dang // ba la ta ka shi khru ste// ngi
394a3(rgyud 'bum): ri tsha da ku mu dang / / ut+pal ma li ka sa bon// rgya shug rus pa ki sa bon// ku ba'i sa bon ma du dang // po son pa la sha ba'i shun// phye ma skyo mar byas pa yi// nang du de nas brdung bar bya//
394a4(rgyud 'bum): cha ni nges dang bcas pas 'ching // rdzas ni drug cha sbyin par bya// de nas rdo yi gtun du mnye// dang po re zhig sbyang bar bya// de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang // phag gi zhag dang khrag tu bcas/
394a5(rgyud 'bum): dkrugs pas nyes pa gzhom par bya// 'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad par bya// tsan+d+ra thal sman la sogs dang // bcas pa rkang gi nang du gzhug/ dbang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya// phyi
394a6(rgyud 'bum): nas lho skyes bcas pa'i bcud/ / 'od ma'i nang du bcug nas su// sngar bshad gnas su gzhag par bya// rtsa ba 'bras su zhes bya ba ni sau pan dza la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'o// ka tu
394a7(rgyud 'bum): mdza rdza la sogs pa'i ni me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo // bcud btso ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga'o// lhang tsher phyogs kyi cha dang ni// bcud ni dbang po'i cha dang
394b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / cha yi nges pas 'ching 'gyur te// cha bcus rim gyis spel bar bya// dri zhim zla ba re re sbyin// gser gyis mdog ni bzang por 'gyur// dngul gyis so ni bzang por 'gyur//
394b2(rgyud 'bum): mu tig mig ni dag par 'gyur// nu med sgra dang spu la phan// rdo rjes thog ni zlog 'gyur te// lcags kyis chu dang mtshon rnams bzlog/ sna tshogs dbang phyug sems dang ni// lhang tsher gyi
394b3(rgyud 'bum): ni brgya byin dang / / me dang gshin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan la sogs bgegs kun bzlog/ nA ga par ni mar gsar dang // rgya mtsho lan tshur bcas pa yi// dngul chu'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis// rgas
394b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni mdze nad sogs/ / ba glang lce yi sman dang ni// dngul chur bcas pa byugs pa yis// gzhang 'drum nad ni sel bar byed// ka ri ke sas gso ba ste// gi ri kar ni ka dang ni// ral pa dmar pos
394b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu zhing bsad/ / 'dzag dang a sha gdad dang // nA ga ba la ba li ka/ na mnyam gyis ni rmongs par bya// da du ra yi khu ba yis// rang gi yon tan ma lus byed// de nas snying po kun bsdus pa'i// mar
394b6(rgyud 'bum): khu'i cho ga bshad par bya/ / mar khu rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// snod dang sems can las byung ba'o// dang po snod ni bshad bya ste// 'bras bu chen po gsum gyi chus// snum steng rnams la yang yang bsgo//
394b7(rgyud 'bum): ni legs par bskams byas la// rdul la sogs pa'i skyon bral ba'i// sa yi char ni sngags pas bskyed// legs par smin cing sdum pa dang // skya bo la sogs skyon spangs gnag/ legs par brdung zhing
395a1(rgyud 'bum): bsros nas su/ / skyu ru ra khu char chus spang // sra ba de yi bdug pas bsgo// du mad me yis ran par bdug/ de nas 'khrul 'khor dag gis bcing // dpyid dang sos ka ston dus gsum//
395a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i 'od la sman mar btso// dgun sto de dgun smad dbyar dang gsum// mar khu me yis ran par btso// gnad pa tra tA tsa dang // sug smel na ga pus par bcas// ral pa dang ni sa li la// de dag phye
395a3(rgyud 'bum): mar byas pa ni/ / til las byung ba'i nang blugs te// chu ni mar khu'i bzhi 'gyur bya// a ka ru ni srang phyed dang // sman gyi bzhi 'gyur byas nas su// de nas me ni ran pas bskol// slar yang ral pa gla
395a4(rgyud 'bum): skad dang / / tsan dan shing tsha ba trar bcas// sngar bshad phye ma mnyam por bya// de bzhin snga ma bzhin du btso// slar yang si h+la dkar min lha// ru rta dza la ba thar bcas// thams cad bsres pa srang gci
395a5(rgyud 'bum): btang / / mar khu srang ni brgyad dang bcas// 'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni// nyi ma bdun du nyi mar btso// yid 'ong skal bzang stobs rab ster// 'dod pa'i don ni phun sum tshogs// gal te tshangs
395a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mar khur bcas/ / rnal 'byor can la mchog ster 'gyur// gzhan yang sba la sug smel dang // pa ta bring ga ra dza dang // sen mo ru rta pi sha tsa// so sor cha bzhi cha drug bdun// cha ni bcu gnyis dag
395a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas/ / 'di rnams sman gyi skyo ma ni// sngar bshad 'od ma'i cho gas btso// gang tshe rkang gi mar khur bcas// nad rnams thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur// de nas sha chen mar khu dang // lhan cig/
395b1(rgyud 'bum): bsres te sbrang rtsi yi// snod du blugs te nyi mar bsro// nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis// ri dgas lte ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa ste// srung ba kun gyi bla na med// ti tra tsa yi 'bras bu dang /
395b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan si h+la shing tshar bcas// sngar bshad pa yi mar khu de// rkang gi mar dang bsres nas ni// sngar bzhin sbrang rtsi'i snod gzhag sogs// de ni ga pur mtshungs 'gyur te// skye bo thams cad rmongs par
395b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / de nas ri skyes mar khur bcas// 'bras gsum gla sgang shu dag dang // pu ti ta dkar ku su ma// se ba la yi ngar pa dang // gur kum dang ni lhan cig bcas// sbrang rtsi'i snod du blugs nas su// nyin bdun
395b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i drod la btso/ / skal bzang stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan// rtag tu 'o ma btung bya zhing // bsam gtan bzlas la 'bad par bya// tshangs par spyod la rtag gnas nas// khu ba dag ni dgag par bya//
395b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa ru// sgrub pos phra mo zla drug bza'// de yi bshang ba kun blangs la// lha mo lhan cig phye mar bya// rdza ma gsar pa bzhag nas su// tsha gsum tse ra'i phye ma ni// nyis 'gyur du ni byas pa
395b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'byin byed phye ma bcu char bsre// bu ram gyi ni ril bu bya// sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// nyi ma re re zho gnyis gnyis// zos na nad rnams thams cad ni// 'jig 'gyur khyad par gzhang 'brum 'jog/
395b7(rgyud 'bum): mes po yis ni cha bzhi dang // sgog skya dang ni bcu drug bsre// 'o ma dang ni lhan cig btung // nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis// gzer nad klad nad 'joms par 'gyur// sing po dang ni lhan cig tu// snga ma bzhin du
396a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs na ni/ / nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed// zla drug sbyor ba goms pa yis// skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma 'phrog/ 'bras ni dmar po'i phye ma dang // ba la'i rtsa ba 'dab mar bca
396a2(rgyud 'bum): sgog skya zho gnyis lhan cig tu/ / btags te ril bu byas nas ni// mar ram mar nag nang du btso// zos nas ci dang 'tsham par btung // des ni rus pa chag pa dag/ 'byor zhing stobs dang nyams 'phel
396a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / b+h+ring ga ra dza tshangs pa ni// rlon pa gci ba dang bcas bza'// de yis dug ni 'phrog par byed// yung ba'i khu ba zho gnyis dang // de dang mnyam pa'i gci bar bcas// 'thungs na rgyu ba'i dug dang /
396a4(rgyud 'bum): ni// shu ba dang ni nad kun 'joms// yung ba'i khu ba glang gcin dang // de bzhin 'byung po'i gtso bo ste// rig byed grangs dang mnyam pa'i srang // de la zho ni gnyis gnyis btung // dpyid kyi dus su cung zad
396a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / sbyor ba'i gtso bo 'di yis ni// dug dang rims nad sel bar byed// glo sgang skyu ru ra dang ni// dri rnon dang ni zhag chen dang // sbrang rtsi cha mnyam phye ma ni// khab len lcags kyi snod du gnag/ sbyor
396a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ / srang ni sum brgya'i bar du bya// bad san ta zhes bya ba ste// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// lo gcig bar du sbyor ba yis// yid 'ong yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur// nad
396a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun las rnam par grol/ / gnyer ma dang ni sgra dkar sel// dus kyi rlung dang nyin mtshan sogs// bsten kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o// sbyor ba gzhan la brten pa ni// 'bras bu med cing log par
396b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rtag tu bsam gtan bzlas byas nas// lo ni sum brgya'i bar du 'tsho// pi pi ling dang gur kum ni// cha ni mnyam por byas nas su// sos ka'i dus su bza' bar bya// de rjes gci ba dro 'thung
396b2(rgyud 'bum): na/ / kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing 'ju// nir guN+Di yi khu ba dang // gci bar bcas pa sna sman sbyin// bad kan las gyur nad rnams 'phrog/ de nyid pad+ma'i dri ma dang // bcas par byugs na glang shu sel// mar
396b3(rgyud 'bum): ga da yi rtsa ba dang / / so dang sen mo'i rdul du bsre// rma ni dang po mar gyis bkru// de rjes sman des byugs na ni// rma ni 'drub par byed pa'i mchog/ so phag rdul dang sug smel che// gi ri kar na'i khu ba ru//
396b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyes te mig la byugs na ni// rab rib dag ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ 'bras bu gsum gyi khu bas sbyang // ma ha ha ta ka yi 'angab// 'o ma dang ni lig bu mig/ 'byung po'i chu dang bcas pa ru// mig tu
396b5(rgyud 'bum): blugs nas lo d+ha yis/ / bdugs na dri ma med par 'gyur// yung ba gnyis kyi cha mnyam phye// ba yi dar ba bre dor bcas// bre gang lus kyi bar du bskol// zhag bdun du ni de 'thungs na// de yis lus
396b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyas 'gyur te/ / bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di// dpa' bo rang nyid bshad pa yin// yung ba dang ni so phag dang // de bzhin btsag dang smyo byed khu// rlung med gnas su gnas nas ni// lus la dril phyis byas
396b7(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ / rtag tu stobs ni 'phel byed cing // dngul chu bcing bdag la phan// ru rta mur ba shuk+ti ka/ shing tsha cha mnyam phye dang ni// mang sri tshe ni nyis 'gyur bcas// dril phyis byas na 'dod pa 'grub// brag
397a1(rgyud 'bum): zhun dang ni so phag dang / / nir gur+t+ti dang e la tsha// cha ni mnyam por byas pa yi// yung ba dag ni bzhi 'gyur bcas// gser shing khu ba cha phyed kyis// dril phyis byas na dug 'phrog cing //
397a2(rgyud 'bum): gci bar bcas pa'i dril phyis kyis// khyi rdo dang ni mdze nad 'joms// khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu'i sha/ mar dang bcas pa ci rigs par// rgyun du zos na tshe ring 'gyur// mdzes ma las byung me tog ni// zos na
397a3(rgyud 'bum): rims kyis rga ba 'joms/ / rtag tu ga pur tsan dan dag/ bsten na nad rnams sel ba'i mchog/ de bzhin bzhi mnyam gci bar bcas// sna sman byin na'ang nad kun sel// sha shang ka dang yung ba dang // kha ba
397a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ni snying po dag/ pad+ma can gyi pad+ma ni// sprang po yi khu ba dang // sems kyi dbang phyug lag mthil du// mnyes te rim gyis bsten na ni// nad rnams kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsam pa thams cad rdzog
397a5(rgyud 'bum): byed par/ / gdon mi za bar ngas bshad do// dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya// mkhrang ma zhes bya chen po'i chen// de yi gci ba'i lan tshwa dang // de yi khrag dang khu bar bcas// dngul chu dang ni sbrang rtsir bsre//
397a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba chen po 'di dag ni// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// rtag tu nad med stobs ldan 'gyur// bad kan gyi ni mi rnams la// tsha ba'i rdzas dang lhan cig sbyin// thung ngu'i pad+ma las byung ba// dang po
397a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas gzung bar bya/ / lce dang dkar por bcas pa las// sbyor ba pos ni ril bu bya// zla ba drug tu bsten pa yis// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par 'ching // ji srid lus ni gnas kyi bar// dug kyang 'pho
397b1(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / mkhrang ma las byung me tog gzung // de bzhin khwa gdong bdud rtsir bcas// sha chen dag ni nyis 'gyur bya// rang las byung ba'i sems dang bcas// de ni zos shing bsten pa yis// tshe dang
397b2(rgyud 'bum): nad med phun sum tshogs/ / rim 'di rtag tu bsten byas na// lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho 'gyur zhing // skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma sel// bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med 'gyur// bshad pa'i phye ma do
397b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang / / a ba marga'i thal ba dag/ mi yi gcin dang ma he'i gcin// bcas par mkhas pas blud na ni// stobs rnams bde bar skye 'gyur bar// ngas bshad pa la the tsom med// rdo rje bla ma
397b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas ni/ / de 'og las ni brtsam par bya// yung ba she ka rar bcas pas// khrag dang mkhris pa'i nga sel bar byed// mi mo'i 'o ma srang brgyad dang // rdo rje'i 'o ma srang brgyar bcas// skyu ru ra'i
397b5(rgyud 'bum): khu ba'ang de tsam ste/ / ba yi 'o ma kham phor gang // yung ba sbrang rtsi tsan dan dmar// srang gcig dang ni pa tha dag/ sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// brgya rtsa brgyad ni gzung bar bya// sngon bzhin
397b6(rgyud 'bum): ran par btso byas la/ / dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya// sbom po la sogs lnga yi ni// las kyi cho ga bshad par bya// nu ma med pa rtsub mo dang // 'dzer pa can te gsum pa yi// gci ba'i lan tshwa
397b7(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas su/ / mthe bo yi ni khrag dang bcas// 'gugs par byed pa'i dam pa yin// rdzas la rta dang ma he'i khrag/ khro bo ya ni khrag dang bcas// de bzhin du ni tha chud kyi// khrag dang bcas pas
398a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang pa'ang 'grub/ / thung ngu yi ni lan tshwa dang // de nyid kyi ni khu bar bcas// ring po'i khrag dang bcas pa yis// rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ba yin// de nyid srin lag 'byung
398a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i bdag/ don yod dbang du sdud pa yin// dri yi chu ni rgyal mtshan gyi// khrag dang lhan cig bcas nas su// lag mthil du ni mnyes la bza'// 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin// pad+ma
398a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ma rnyed na/ / ro yi lag pa las byung gzung // rnal 'byor don gnyer dbul po yis// lag pa'i mchod pas yid 'dod bya// rgyud rnams kun tu gang sbas pa// de dag thams cad khyod la
398a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / dbang bskur lag tu bkod nas ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol// mdzes ma kun tu ru'i sa bon// phag gi mche bas mnyes nas su// thig ler byas na rgyu mi rgyu'i// 'gro ba dbang
398a5(rgyud 'bum): du byed par 'gyur/ / gi ri kar na dkar po dang // pri yang ku ru bcas te blag/ nyams stobs dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// bu mo gzhon nu mig rnag dang // ldong ros bcas pa blangs na ni// sna tshogs
398a6(rgyud 'bum): dug rnams 'joms par byed/ / bu mo sngo bsangs mig rnag dang // klad pa yi ni zhag tu bcas// de ni bldag pa tsam gyis su// skra dkar 'joms par the tshom med// lce dang khrag ni cha mnyam la//
398a7(rgyud 'bum): pu ram 'ol se bzhi char bcas// gzhan yang khu ba mar dang ni// dngul chu sngar ni bshad bzhin gzung // mu zi bzang por bcas pa ni// glags na sbyor ba'i dam pa ste// zla drug tsam du nges par ni// rga dang
398b1(rgyud 'bum): na las grol 'gyur zhing / / lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur// rkang gi zhag dang mu zi ni// zho ni phyed phyed sbyar byas la// lo gcig bar du bsten na ni// lha yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med// nam mkha'i
398b2(rgyud 'bum): me ni mnyes byed pa/ / su si ra yi tshad dang mnyam// 'di ni sbyor ba chen po ste// tshe dang nad med 'phel byed yin// rtsi bsad dang ni bkra shis bcas// lhag pa'i lha yis sems par ldan// blag
398b3(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhi ba dang sna sman gyis/ / rdo rje'i lus 'gyur the tshom med// lce myang tsha dang gser shing dang // smyo byed dag la bzhi char bcas// tsakra marda sen mo'i rdul// so ma ra tsa yung ba dag/ thams
398b4(rgyud 'bum): cad gcig tu spyo ba yi/ / rdzas ni srang gcig bzung nas su// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du ni// mar khu dag ni btso bar bya// mi rgyal rta la sa h+ya de// 'bras bu yi ni chu dang bcas// bzhi dang lnga dang
398b5(rgyud 'bum): drug bdun chu/ / de dag ji snyed mar de snyed// lcags kyi dri ma pri yang ku// so dang sen mo yung bar bcas// de dag slar yang mar khur btso// bsal zhing nad med 'phel bar byed// mgo bsku ba'i
398b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'o/ / pri yang ku dang tsan+d+ra dang // kan te la ba na'i me tog/ sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang ku mu da// ut+pal rgyu yi do bar bcas// skyer bar bcas pa'i sgro ma ni// srang gcig tshad ni bzung bar byas// 'dod
398b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i me ni 'bar byed de/ / skal bzang stobs ni 'phel bar byed// tsam pa dang ni gur kum dang // ba bla'i khu bar bcas pa bsku// bsku byug gi cho ga'o// 'byin byed gcig dang mar khu gnyis// dbang po
399a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang ldan par bya/ / bska ba zhes bya skyu ru ra// kri ri ma la e la dzi// tsam pa ka dang tsan dan dang // nA ga ge sar ru rnga dang // pad+ma rak+ta pri dAr bcas// sbrang rtsi me tog bri yang ku/
399a2(rgyud 'bum): pan ma la phur mo dang // a pra da di bus par bcas// chu yi ra~M ba dpa' bo gcig/ sha ta puSh+pa dz+wa la gsum// rgya spos dag ni mchog yin te// mar khu btso ba'i cho gas ni// sna sman btung dang bsku
399a3(rgyud 'bum): byug bya/ / sna sman srang bcu sbyin bya ste// btung ba srang ni rnam pa brgya// nyi shu lhag pa mgor bsku yin// dril phyis srang ni sum brgyar bya// sman bskol cho ga bshad bya ste// sman ni ji snyed yod pa yi//
399a4(rgyud 'bum): chu ni bcu drug 'gyur du btso// sman dang mnyam pa'i chu lus pa// bskol ba'i cho ga'i mchog tu bshang// ki da dang ni mtshan di// sa la dzang dang gu gul dang // kun du ru dang a ka ru// mar dang bcas
399a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bdug spos kyi/ / sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad pa yin// sum cu gsum pa'ang mchod par byed// brag zhun ga pur ru rta dang // tsan dan sen mo pi bi ling // gla sgang bcas pa sngar bshad pa'i//
399a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas dang lhan cig bsres nas ni// bye ma khar mar dang bcas// bu ram dag ni spang bar bya// kham phor thod pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba// ta la'i 'bras bu'i nang du gzhag/ bdug spos kyi 'khrul 'khor
399a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi cho ga'o/ / bi sU kran da kha da si// ral pa dmar po pri yang gsum// shing tsha sen mo ru rta dang // gla sgang rgya spos 'dag gu ni// bud med khrus kyi 'dag chal mchog/ da ni bud med
399b1(rgyud 'bum): mngal gang nas/ / rnag dang thal ba nya dri 'byung // de rnams sbyang bar bya ba bshad// dang po dri zhim chu yis bkru// de nas khri steng bzhag nas su// kham phor bdug spos la sbyar te// bug pa dag ni dbug
399b2(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bya/ / de ru sbu gu bcug nas ni// skye gnas nang du bdug par bya// n+ya gro d+hA yi shing bu ni// mthe'u chung tshad tsam blangs nas su// ba yi gcin gyi nang du ni// zhag gcig bar du spang bar bya// de yis so ni
399b3(rgyud 'bum): drung nas su/ / de 'og ru rta a ru ra// cha mnyam dri yis so la bsgo// kha yi dri ma sel ba'i mchog/ gla sgang ru rnga e la dang // sug smela'u su shing mngar rnams// zos na rnag dang sgog dri dang /
399b4(rgyud 'bum): / chang gi dri ni 'phrog pa'i mchog/ pa la ba ni rnam gnyis kyis// spang ba dang ni bsgo byas na// me tog dang ni sgur po sogs// sbyang zhing dri yis bsgo ba'i mchog/ ral pa dmar po pa la dang // sug
399b5(rgyud 'bum): smel rgya spos bu su bcas/ / sen mo dang ni gla sgang la// skyu ru ra ni sum 'gyur blugs// 'di ni khrus kyi sbyar ba'i mchog/ shing tshwa glu sgang rgya spos dang // pa tra ke ba ra ti yi ni// gla sgang ru Na sen
399b6(rgyud 'bum): mor bcas/ / skyu ru ra ni cha gsum bya// de dag bkru ba'i 'dag chal mchog/ rgyal po la sogs phyi rol sbyor// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rim pa ni// bdag las skyes pa lnga dang bsre// rgyal po la
399b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs bcu drug bya/ / a i o a ste dang po'o// l-i u o r-i gnyis pa'o// I aM a o ni gsum pa'o// u lA rI e ni bzhi pa'o// lha yi gzugs su byed pa yi// sman ni de dag bstan
400a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa yin/ / dbyangs tshad chog shes pa yis// de dag thams cad shes par bya// a ni pa yi bdag po ste// i ni sa ha de ba yin// oM ni rma bya'i cod pan te// a no ngan par sbyor
400a2(rgyud 'bum): / ma yin// l-i ni kri ta a dzA laM// u ni ral pa dmar po yin// e ni rtag tu du ba ste// I ni tsakra ang ka yin// r-i ni gi ri kar nI ka/ aM ni shis she kha ra// o zhes bya ba nyi ma'i shing // au zhes
400a3(rgyud 'bum): / bya ba la dzu ba// U ni smyo byed ces bya ste// l-I ni mgo yi lcug ma yin// rI ni ma he'i rwa yin te// e zhes bya ba rdo rje can// ka ni gu gul lo// Sha ni rdo rje can no// ga ni smyo byed do// g+hA ni ra ma'o//
400a4(rgyud 'bum): dang tsa ni sar pong kaM dang a ta pa ri'o// tsha dang dza ni si hA dang tsa ma pa ka'o// dz+nyA ni kun tu ru'o// nya dang Ta ni ang ko la dang son tsi ka'o// Tha ni ldong ros so// Da ni a kr-i ru'o// D+ha ni lug ru'o//
400a5(rgyud 'bum): ni dur ba dkar po'o// ta dang tha ni nya dang gan ti ka'o// da dang d+ha ni gur kum dang ro tsa na'o// na ni paM shrI'o// pa dang pha ni sha kha ra dang li shi'o// ba ni pri yang ku'o// b+ha ni nA ga ge sar ro// ma ni sen
400a6(rgyud 'bum): mo'o/ / ya ra la wa bzhi po ni// rlung la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ bring ka an+da dza li dang ni// ral pa dmar po sa ha de// dpral bar thig le byas pa yis// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs
400a7(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / su ta pa ti ma yu ra// tri ka dza la gzhan mi thub// de dag b+ha gar byugs na ni// lan cig tsam gyis bka' nyan 'gyur// badz+ri me Sha a ka dang // a dan dza lo thal sman mchog/ ral
400b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ka tam smyo byed dang / / kan ti'i ril bus dbang du byed// na ni na ra an dza li// la dza lar ni bcas pa yis// chu la shAkya'i dbang po bzhin// rgyal po kri ta an dza li// nA ri dang ni de stir
400b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / ma ni bcing ba'i dam pa yin// bi sU he ma badz+ri dang // dri dur bcas pa khar bcug na// de yi mod la ngal sos 'gyur// rgyal po blon po la ta dang // pa na rdo rje mkhrang ba'i mchog/ pa na sa
400b3(rgyud 'bum): ha shi kha dang / / me shar bcas pas dug 'joms byed// par+ya su pa ma sha dang // sni ha b+ha gar blugs na ni// mngal na gnas pa skye bar 'gyur// ma he'i rA dang la ta dang // ni ra a ba nar bcas
400b4(rgyud 'bum): pab/ / lag pas byugs na rgyan rgyal 'gyur// pri ta tsan di na ra dang // sa ha de ba khar bcug na// mtshan mo dag ni 'jigs med rgyu// skag dang rgyal rtsa khris pa dang // ban du blon po de bzhin te//
400b5(rgyud 'bum): pu tra ar thi cha mnyam pa// 'dod dang ldan zhing mngal 'dzin 'gyur// sha ta sring ga hasta dang // tsanA dan gyi ni phye ma dag/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed// bud med kun la bde ba ster//
400b6(rgyud 'bum): ni ta ke ka pe ya dang // skyes bus b+ha ga byugs na ni// dbang du sdud par byed pa'i mchog/ rtsa mkhris ral pa dmar po dang // da la dang ni pa dur bcas// ril bu kha ru bcug na ni// 'khrig
400b7(rgyud 'bum): dus khu ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ ma yu ra dang a shu dang // a ra ka me phyi phye mas ni// dgra bo rlag par byed pa yin// rmongs byed kan tra gzhan mi thub// sa yi bdag por yang dag ldan// smyig ma yi
401a1(rgyud 'bum): ni sa bon bcas/ khya ba kun byed dge ba yin// ga ri du hi kra ma dang // bu tsan tsa ri rdo rje can// rang khrag bcas pa'i sgo ma yis// skye re 'bar ba'ang gangs su byed// a A
401a2(rgyud 'bum): i IH u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ oM A~M/ a eHA la sogs pas lus byugs na// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod 'gyur na// sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos// yang A i o aHrnams
401a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / yid 'ong bdug pa'i sbyor ba'o// l-I U ra au rnams ni// dril phyis sbyor ba'i dam pa yin// A aM e I rnams ni// mig sman la sogs cho ga'o// u l-i ra e rnams ni// khrus kyi bya ba'i
401a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i mchog/ ka sogs bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa// dbang du bya ba'i cho ga mchog/ tsa la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs sogs// skyes pa bud med dbang du byed//
401a5(rgyud 'bum): Ta la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas// dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du byed// tra la sogs pa til chen gyis// dpral bar thig ler byas na ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs byed// pa la sogs dang
401a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi lngas/ / tsan dan bcos pas dbang du byed// sha Sha sa ha rnams kyis ni// rlung dang me dang dbang chen chu// ya la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// cho ga ji bzhin rig pa yis// bslad
401a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs byed par 'gyur/ / mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
401b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang / sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // gsang ba mchog
401b2(rgyud 'bum): gi dgyes pa ni/ / thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs la// gsang chen du ni legs bzhugs pa'i// der ni lha mos 'di skad gsungs// lce khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i// mtshor cha lnga yi tshe

401b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gzhan yang bri ba ci/ / khyod kyi ba dan gsum bshad pa'i// mchod pa yi ni khyad par ci// de dag bdag ni the tshom gyur// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i//
401b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang // de dag thams cad du 'dod pa// sgyu 'phrul chen mo legs so legs// nang gi sbyor ba'i sdom pa ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// lhong rgyud sbyor ba la sogs
401b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs/ / me tog dag ni bsdus pa 'dra// rna drung bar du 'gengs pa dag/ lcags kyu zhags pa'ang sbyang // mda' ni myur ba mgyogs pa ste// 'phen pa mda' yi shugaso yin no// g.yas
401b7(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yon ni gnyis ka yis/ / 'gengs pa mchog ma'i bar du yin// 'dzin pa cung zad gnas pa ste// mi 'da' bar ni 'phang bar bya// mda' yi cho ga brjod mi lang // da ni phyag rgya
402a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / sa ni phyag rgyas gdab par bya// mnyam pa rkang gnyis gzhibs pa ste// yangs pa rgya cher bskyed pa yin// zlum po dkyil 'khor lta bur bya// g.yon pa
402a2(rgyud 'bum): cung zad bskum pa ni/ / g.yas pa brkyang zhes bya ba ste// g.yon brkyang g.yon pa bsrang nas ni// g.yas pa cung zad bskum pa'o// mda' gzhu rig byed cho ga yis// mtshon cha thams cad 'phang bar
402a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / 'di ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya yin// da ni lus kyi mtshan nyid rnams// phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya// grims pa ni mi lhong pa ste snying stobs dang ldan pa'o// sran 'jugs pa ni brtan zhing
402a4(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa dang ldan pa'o/ / mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni mdzes shing snyan par smra ba'o// yan lag brtan zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyas rma srol cher 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can no// rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam
402a5(rgyud 'bum): par dag ces bya ba la 'gengs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ tshad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus 'dzum pa dang bcas shing mthun par 'jug pa'o// lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can zhes bya ba
402a6(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu rdzogs pa'i ngang tshul can no/ / rims dang dug dang dbyig dang // bsam gtan sbyor bas dgug par bya// khro bo'i gzugs su bsgoms nas su// lha yi dbang po gzhur byas nas//
402a7(rgyud 'bum): klu dbang ba su da yi rgyud// glog ni mda' ru bsam bya ste// me lce 'bar ba mde 'ur bya// sgro ni rlung zhes bya ba ste// rnam pa lngar ni 'bugs pa yin// lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba ni sna sgo g.yas

402b2(rgyud 'bum): chang pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang rlung ngo / / mig gdangs pa ni bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'o// lta ba chang pa la gtad ces bya ba ni shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog go// mda'
402b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhus rnam par rgyal ba yi/ / 'bugs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// smin ma'i dkyus ni gzhu yin te// bzlog sde lta ba mda' yin no// 'bugs pa rang gi sems kyi ni// gzhan sems
402b4(rgyud 'bum): don la gtad pa yin/ / rol pa 'gros ni dal ba ste// 'o ma 'dzin pa mkhrang ba ni// po no u na ta zhes bya// bu mo 'di ni yid 'phrog ma// thams cad dngos po gsum yin te// yan lag mi gsal
402b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od ldan gang / / de ni yang dag gsal zhing 'bar// snying gis thams cad 'dzin pa gang // de ni yan lag sgrub par brjod// snying ni pad+ma zhes bshad de// pad+ma de ni kun gyis mchod// thams
402b6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dzin pa mgo bo yin/ / klad pa nas ni kun tu rgyu// gang gi stobs ni gang yin pa// de ni de tshe sbyar bar bya// gnas ni rnam pa du mar bshad// sha dang pus kar bung ba sogs// 'dir yang rim
402b7(rgyud 'bum): ba de nyid kyis/ / sems ni dgug pa sngon 'gro ba'i// bdag gi gdan la sogs pa yin// rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par sla// brda yis bshad pa brjod par bya// gru bzhi la sogs zhes bya la//
403a1(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi pa ni phur bzhi ste// la yig dbang chen dkyil 'khor ro// 'dab ma can ni gru gsum ste// me yi dkyil 'khor raM las byung // de bzhin kun nas zlum po ni/
403a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ya zhes bya bar bshad// bsgrub par bya la dkyil 'khor dag/ yi ge dang bcas bsams te bsgrubs// g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor ba ni// bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun bsam pa'o// rim
403a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis gnon cing 'gro bya ste/ / sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// rdo rje chags par bdag bsgoms na// rgyal srid thams cad longs spyod 'gyur// slar yang a ni gzhur byas te// bzhes

403a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ni g.yul 'gyed pa/ / mi yi bdag po gsad par bya// de dag kun gyi man ngag ni// bla ma'i kha las nges par bya// 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang zhes bya ba la/ 'khrul 'khor
403a7(rgyud 'bum): ni ta la'i 'dab ma dang / gro ga dang / ras la sogs pa la ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sngags dang bcas par bris pa ste/ de ni 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'o//
403b1(rgyud 'bum): mi 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying kha'i yig 'bru las sna sgo'i lam nas byung ste dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'o// lag pas 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhar

403b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ / sgrub pos 'dir ni yi ge bsam// me mar gyi ni rtse ltar bya// rtse mo lta bu zhes bya ba la// shing kha ni mgo ste klad pa'i gong bu'o// rtse mo ni me'i rtse mo ste/ des mar gsar
404a1(rgyud 'bum): bum par bcos pa ltar thams cad du bzhu bar bya'o/ / sngags kyi mar me 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni 'dar bar 'gyur// bu mo chags pas gdungs nas su// ji srid 'tsho
404a2(rgyud 'bum): bar dbang du 'gyur/ / lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin no// lugs ma 'am ni bris pa la// de yi ming ni bris nas su// blo ldan snying khar bcug ste bsgom// nyi ma bdun ni tshun chod kyis// mar me yi ni cho
404a3(rgyud 'bum): ga yis/ / 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// gang gi dbang po rdzas yin te// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub// dbang po mig la sogs pa yin// rigs pa'i sbyor ba lam yin te//
404a4(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang gis rang bzhin te// de dang de yi dngos po yis// bde ba nyid du bsgrub par bya// bde ba sems zhes bya ba ste// de nyid du ni bdag bde sogs// sdug bsngal gyis ni 'grub mi
404a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bde ba yis ni 'grub par bshad// shin tu bde ba'i sgrub thabs ni// thos dang bsam gtan sogs spangs pa'i// dman pa dag ni gang gis kyang // bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te//
404a6(rgyud 'bum): skye bo thabs dang bral bas ni// tshul ngan dman pa dka' bas bslu ba// bdag nyid sgrub pa dang bral bas// skal med pal ba don med cing // de la dngos grub ces mi brjod// a sa ma zhes bya ba ni//
404a7(rgyud 'bum): dpe dang zla med pa'o// a d+hi ta zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas kun tu rang nyid 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su mtshon cing
404b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'o/ / pra ta haM zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re zhing ngo // yang na zla re ste zla ba nya la'o// yang na lo re zhing ste gal te ma 'byor pa 'am/ skal ba med pa dang / 'das pa'i dbang gis kyang rung ste/
404b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis ni lo re zhing bya'o// de bzhin zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ltar bya ba'o// yang na de bzhin te/ slob dpon gzhan med na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba la// de la byin
404b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa ste/ de rnyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu gar bya ba'o// sangs rgyas sdom pa ni sangs rgyas dang 'brel ba ste/ de su zhig ce na/ gzugs la sogs
404b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i bu mo'o// gar zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas spyad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to// des ni 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ phyag
404b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ji ste rgyun du ma 'byor na/ des bde ba slar yang rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ rim pa 'dis mchod pa bya zhing dam tshig bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba'i don to//
404b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang brdas bshad pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ pra ta haM zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po'o// de ci zhig ce na/ khams bco brgyad kyis mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// zla re zhes bya ba ni
404b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dang dmar po'o/ / lo re zhes bya ba ni lo bcu gcig ma nas brtsams te/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du'o// gal te de dag kyang ma 'byor na ji bzhin byir gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba bdag nyid gcig pus
405a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i sbyor bas dam tshig bskyang bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ / phyag rgyas dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba la 'jug pa ni nyams su len pa'o// sgrub pa po yi lag
405a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyis/ / pad+ma'i snod ni bzung nas su// zhes bya ba la/ pad+ma'i snod ni dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa ste/ de la ka zhes bya ba ni lus so// pA la zhes bya ba ni skyong ba ste/ dum bu gcig pa
405a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni ma nyams shing / shin tu mdzes pa'o// de la pad+ma zhes bya ba ni pad+ma can nam/ rigs gzhan gyi bu mo'ang rung ste/ snod ni de'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi pad+ma yin la/ de nyid ma
405a4(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa ste/ rma med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// lag pa zhes bya ba ni brtan pa zhes bya bar 'jug pa'o// g.yon pa zhes bya ba ni zur mig g.yon du lta ba'o// ba da na gsum zhes bya ba ni bu mo'i
405a5(rgyud 'bum): bcud 'dzag pa ste bza' ba'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba la lag pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar yin la/ shes nyen dang ldan pa'i phyir g.yas pa'o// de nyid ni g.yon pa ste/ de las byung
405a6(rgyud 'bum): ba de longs spyod par bya ba'o/ / de la longs spyad pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bla mas nyams su bstar ba de ltar spyad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa pos de ltar nges par shes par byas la de nas dus
405a7(rgyud 'bum): bcing bar bya'i/ gzhan du ni ltung bar 'gyur ro// ltung ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to// sngags ni bla mas bstan pa ste// phyag rgya de la bstan pa yin// de nyid rtag tu
405b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad mi rtogs pa// mi rtog pa yang ma yin te// rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mi rtog pa ni brtags pa yin// dus drug
405b2(rgyud 'bum): tu ni bstan pa dag/ rtag tu rnam par mi rtog gnas// rdo rje sems sogs rgyal ba ru// de yi rang bzhin yongs shes bya// sos ka dang ni dbyar dang ston// dgun sdong dgun smad de bzhin dpyid//
405b3(rgyud 'bum): de dag ma 'dres shes byas la// 'dis ni las rnams thams cad bya// sos ka'i dus ni rta mchog ste// de bzhin dbyar nI he ru ka/ rdo rje nyi ma ston yin te// pad+mas rol pa dgun stong yin// dgun
405b4(rgyud 'bum): smad rdo rje sems dpa' la/ / dpyid ni rnam par snang mdzad do// sos ka mar mes mchod bya ste// de bzhin dbyar ni chu yis mchod// ston ni mar khus mchod bya ste// dgun stod de bzhin me tog
405b5(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / dgun smad ga pur bza' bya ste// khyad par du ni bzhi mnyam gyis// dpyid kyi dus su mchod par bya// dus kyi mchod dang mnyam med de// sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin// rnal 'byor ma ni
405b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo mnyes// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// rang bzhin de dag rdzogs par ni// gang zhig gyur pa'i rnal 'byor/
405b7(rgyud 'bum): pas// sgrub po rnams kyi las rnams ni// thams cad byed 'gyur gdon mi za// de dag rang bzhin grub pa ste// dus zhes bya ba brjed pa yin// dus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rgyal ba thams cad
406a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bzhugs/ / dus kun sems la gnas mod kyi// de ltar na yang rnam par 'khrul// mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge hUM ste/ de'ang bdag nyid lus la gnas pa'i hUM ngo //
406a2(rgyud 'bum): denyid ni yi ge mchog ces bya ste/ yi ge mchog de'i phyag rgya nI na gsum nus bde ba chen po'i skor sna'i sgo gnyis nAs rlung ji lnga ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin la/ de nyid ni A la~M kA li s+ye/ g.yas dang
406a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du'o/ / des 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin la/ de'i steng du ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro// de
406a4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni me'o/ / de nas ni sa'o// de'i steng du ni pad+ma'o// de'i steng gnas pa'i sa bon ni mi shigs pa dang yi ge'i mchog ces brjod do// dbang po kun las byung ba ni// dam tshig thod pa zhes byar
406a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / mdzes pa 'brang ba zhes bshad de// de kho na nyid dbu rgyan yin// gtsug gi nor du dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas zhes bya rjes gnang yin// he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o// thod pa
406a6(rgyud 'bum): lus zhes bya ba ste/ / rked pa 'phreng ba'i ming can yin// dbu rgyan b+ha ga zhes byar brjod// sangs rgyas khu ba zhes brjod do// gtsug gi nor bu bde bar bshad// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur ba'o//
406a7(rgyud 'bum): slar yang bshad par bya ba ste// thod pa dbang gnyis dam tshig ste// 'phreng ba sngags kyi bdag por brjod// bcu drug thig gis btab pa'o// stong pa dbu rgyan zhes byar bshad// a la sogs
406b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ma mo rnams/ / sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra ru brjod// de rnams dbus kyi bde ba gang // de ni gtsug gi nor bur brjod// rigs rnams kun gyis thams cad du// rtag tu dbang bskur de lta bu//
406b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal zhes bya ba dga' ba ste// bde ba sangs rgyas su ni brjod// pad+ma pad+ma nyid yin la// nags ni skya rengs zhes byar grags// rtsa ba byang chub sems yin no// yang na pad+ma lte ba'i 'khor lo ste// /
406b3(rgyud 'bum): nags ni a sogs ma mo yin// rtsa ba thar pa ster byed pa'i// brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin// yang na lte ba mtsho skyes zhes bya ste// nags zhes bya ba dag yin la// rtsa ba lus kyi bla dgas yin//
406b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sems kyi brda yin no// gcig pu nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin// dben pa rtog pa spangs pa ste// sbas pa gsal bar ma byas pa'o// nags ni sngar bshad khams rnams te// lhan cig
406b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'jug pas na/ / bsdus pa zhes ni bya bar brjod// lha zhes bya bar rang ming brjod// gza' dang skar ma la sogs lha// a gra zhes bya'i sgra brjod pa// de ni rnal 'byor shes pa min// u
406b6(rgyud 'bum): gra gtso bo zhes brjod cing / / a gra dam pa zhes bya la// a gra dang po zhes bshad cing // a gra spyi bor gnas pa'o// rang gi ming dang ldan pa yis// sdig pa dag ni sel bar byed// yang na sa ni
406b7(rgyud 'bum): a sogs te/ / de rnams a gra ha zhes bya// mgor gnas 'og tu bltas nas ni// yi ge tha snyad char du 'bebs// tha snyad ces bya ba ni dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams te/ de rnams kyis 'tsho bar
407a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ dbyangs zhes bya ba la swa ni rang nyid kyis so// ra ni mdzes pa ste/ des na me swa ra'o// ha ni skal bzang yi ge ste// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang // rgyan rnams
407a2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis klubs pa yin/ / rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su// bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams
407a3(rgyud 'bum): kun dang ldan pa ru/ / dngos po gsum ni yang dag gnas// bris pas bsod nams gang mthong ba// bsams pas kyang ni de bzhin mthong // slob ma bdag nyid chen po la// 'di yis
407a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang ni bskur bar bya/ / dbang bskur dam pa bsgom byar 'dod// gang drang gang gI lha yi mchog/ de dang de ni slob dpon 'gro// gang dang gang la lhag mos pa// de dang de yis dbang bskur
407a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / dbang ni rnam pa bzhi dag tu// yang dang yang du so sor bshad// gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa rnams// de dag kun gyis brjod pa yin// rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs bya'i phyir// bcos
407a6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi ni sgom pa dang / / bcos ma yi ni bzlas pa bya// rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur na// bcos ma'i sbyor ba phyi rol nas// rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur pas// bcos ma dag ni
407a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dper na gzings la 'jus nas ni// chu yi pha rol 'gro bar byed// pha rol phyin nas 'dor ba ltar// bcos ma dag kyang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor la sogs las gang
407b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / bcos ma'i sems kyis gang byed pa// phyi rol las rnams gsal byed pas// dang po'i las can rnams la bsngags// dngos grub de kun 'dir gnas pas// rgyal ba'i dngos
407b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid rig la min/ / gang yang sgra shes bstan bcos rnams// drang song rnams kyis byas pa ltar// rang gi sems ni 'jug byed pa'i// skyes bu'i bcos ma'i bya ba rnams// rgyud kyi
407b3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ / 'bad pas sdug bsngal slong bar byed// de phyir dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// bya ba'i cho ga la 'bad pa// thar pa dang bral phyi rol te// skyes bu nyon mongs
407b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ba' zhig byed/ / mi rtog pas ni 'tshang mi rgya// rtog dang bcas pas kyang de bzhin// shin tu rnam dag yongs shes na// yid 'dod rnams kyi de nyid 'gyur// rgyu dang 'bras/
407b5(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rang bzhin ni// dam pa nyid du yod min cing // rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir// stong pa nyid kyang ma yin no// rang bzhin dbye ba thams cad kyi// rnam pa dag ni rnam gnas pa/
407b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho la ni rin chen bzhin// thog mtha' med pa'i tshul can yin// 'jig rten rtag tu tha snyad spyod// 'jig rten las 'das de dang 'gal// yod dang med ces bya ba ni// rang
407b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid du shes pa min/ / 'di yi tshul gyis rab rtogs pa// rdzogs dang bral bas tho ba min// rnal ma'i lam la brten na ni// thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol// skyon
408a1(rgyud 'bum): dang yon tan 'phel byed pa'i/ / 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dngos// lhan cig skyes par yang dag gnas// mkha' 'gro
408a2(rgyud 'bum): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal
408a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rang bzhin nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga bcu pa'o// / rgyud kyi
408a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lngas btsas kyis bsgyur
